column30: Inclusive accessibility of street art through advanced digital tools and AI
column42: Giulio Montoli, Edmondo Sparano, Giulia Fazzini, Edoardo Giorio, Giulio Maria Pezzini, Arunsankar Periyasami, Dario Baroni, Alessandro N. Ferretti, LVenture Group API Access
column50: Walls makes street art accessible to all through AI-powered tours, inclusive design, and tools for artists to share their stories.
column51:
Street Art offers an authentic and immediate cultural experience, perfectly aligned with the latest trends in Artistic and Cultural Tourism. However, significant barriers still limit its accessibility and appreciation. Many murals remain difficult to access, digital integration is still scarce, and immersive solutions are lacking.

To address these issues, we are developing "Walls", an innovative platform that enhances the inclusive accessibility of street art through advanced digital tools and Artificial Intelligence (AI). Our mission is to make mural art accessible to everyone, offering multimedia content and interfaces designed to adapt to the needs of people with disabilities and users from different generations. Thanks to AI technology, Walls will allow users to explore interactive digital tours, automatically recognizing murals and providing personalized multimedia content to enrich the experience.

At the heart of our vision is the ambition to democratize inclusive tourism, making our AI solution accessible not only to end users but also to "Tour Creators" — artists, guides, and cultural organizations who want to design and share their own customized experiences.

Our prototype is currently under development in Orgosolo, one of the most iconic open-air art galleries in the world. With over 350 murals depicting the history and identity of Sardinia, Orgosolo provides the perfect testing ground to create a replicable model for other cities and countries with a rich heritage of urban art.

column50: The only platform combining smart boat monitoring, predictive maintenance, and real-time rental in one seamless system.
column51:
E-Sea Sharing is a B2B tech startup offering a comprehensive software platform for remote boat monitoring, predictive maintenance, and real-time rental management. Our solution empowers boat owners, rental operators, marinas, and dealers to improve control over their fleets, reduce costs, and operate more efficiently.

The marine sector remains largely analog, relying on manual processes that lead to inefficiencies, unexpected failures, and high operational costs. E-Sea Sharing solves these issues with a modular IoT-based system that connects each vessel to the cloud. Users can remotely access real-time data such as battery status, fuel consumption, live GPS location, usage time, and receive smart alerts for anomalies. This allows proactive maintenance, greater safety, and better planning.

A key feature of our platform is the real-time rental functionality: through our mobile app, boat owners and managers can unlock and lock engines remotely, generate digital contracts, and allow customers to book and use boats autonomously. This opens new monetization opportunities and brings full digitalization to the rental experience.

Our technology was co-developed and tested in collaboration with Yamaha Marine and successfully validated in the field on a fleet of 12 boats, involving over 10,000 users in real-world sharing operations. This experience allowed us to fine-tune the product and shift from a B2C test phase to a solid and scalable B2B model focused on the professional market.

E-Sea Sharing is based on a compact onboard unit (OBU) installed on the vessel, paired with a cloud-based platform. The system is available in various subscription plans, from basic monitoring services to advanced predictive analytics and fleet management tools.

We are now targeting rental operators, boat clubs, dealerships, and shipyards across Europe. With a total addressable market of $15B+ in the global boat rental space, and a growing demand for smart marine tech, E-Sea Sharing is positioned to become a standard for connected, data-driven boating.

Our goal is to bring simplicity, automation, and control to a sector ready for digital transformation making marine operations safer, more profitable, and future-ready.

column50: Our unique integrated software,including two mobile apps, a partner and admin managementsystem portal, streamlines the vehicle pickup proces
column51:
Simba is an innovative service that lets vehicle owners book car maintenance directly through their smartphones,saving them time and hassle. 
Partners can expand their customer base and offer a convenient new service with Simba.
Ourpartner’smain challenges havebeendealing with inefficient booking systems and the lack of an effective and scalablevehicletransportation management system.With Simba, partners can optimize their operations thanks to an intuitive booking system and efficient transportation management. Customers, on the other hand, will enjoy greater flexibility and save time by requesting vehicle pickup and delivery directly through our app.
Our competitive advantage lies in our ability to provide a superior customer experience. Our service provides for a “Jolly”, responsible for transferring our drivers and handling the vehicles.Our unique integrated software,including two mobile apps, a partner and admin managementsystem portal, streamlines the vehicle pickup and delivery process.
We are currently in the operational testing phase, having selected a major Renault and Dacia dealership in Italy as our exclusive partner. From mid-October, following the release of the final versions of our mobile app and management system on the app stores, we will be partnering with four additional workshops in Ancona. Our current client in the Renault Italia group is Tombolini Motor Company Spa, which owns five workshops in the Marche region. This is a valuable partnership as they are connecting us with the Renault Italy group.

column42: Giulio Montoli, Edmondo Sparano, Giulia Fazzini, Edoardo Giorio, Giulio Maria Pezzini, Arunsankar Periyasami, Dario Baroni, Alessandro N. Ferretti, LVenture Group API Access
column50: TrAIvel turns natural language into custom travel plans—no forms, no filters, just a smart, conversational AI that plans your trip for you.
column51:
TrAIvel is an AI-powered travel assistant that helps people plan trips through natural conversation. Instead of forcing users to browse dozens of websites and make sense of endless travel options, TrAIvel allows them to simply describe what they want—such as “I’d like to go somewhere warm and cultural in early spring for a short solo break”—and automatically generates a curated, personalized travel plan.

The platform interprets the user’s language to identify key parameters like destination type, budget, travel dates, preferred activities, and overall travel mood. It then compiles this into a complete proposal: including suggested locations, sample itineraries, accommodation and transport options, and activities that match the user’s interests and context.

Users can interact with TrAIvel conversationally to refine or adjust their trip—adding constraints (“no long flights”), preferences (“I want local food experiences”), or asking follow-up questions. The goal is to make the experience feel as natural and adaptive as speaking with a personal travel advisor, but powered by scalable AI.

What we do in essence is turn vague travel desires into concrete, actionable plans, making the planning process smart, frictionless, and enjoyable. By doing so, we radically simplify the user journey from inspiration to execution, enabling anyone to access unique, well-designed travel experiences—without needing expertise or time.
column55: Busy professionals & couples - Use TrAIvel for smart, time-saving itinerary creation tailored to lifestyle and preferences, Digital-native travelers, solo explorers - Use TrAIvel to plan personalized trips effortlessly without filters, tabs, or forms

column30: Cultural platform for institutions and personalized travel itineraries.
column42: Giulio Montoli, Edmondo Sparano, Giulia Fazzini, Edoardo Giorio, Giulio Maria Pezzini, Arunsankar Periyasami, Dario Baroni, Alessandro N. Ferretti, LVenture Group API Access
column50: Artgonuts offers hyper-personalized cultural routes that connect each user with the right institution, at the right place, at the right time
column51:
Artgonuts is a cultural exploration platform that reimagines how people discover and engage with heritage. By combining geolocated storytelling, personalized itineraries, and gamified experiences, it connects travelers with cultural institutions, local communities, and lesser-known points of interest.

At its core, Artgonuts acts as a cultural passport. Users unlock content only by physically visiting a location—transforming passive consumption into an active journey. Once on-site, they access curated narratives, images, audio guides, AR experiences, and more. As they explore, they earn badges, rewards, and experience points, gradually shaping their unique "cultural traveler DNA."

Artgonuts doesn't offer one-size-fits-all tourism. Each route is tailored to the user's interests, context, and time—whether they have an hour in the city center or a day to wander off the beaten path. The platform integrates content from museums, foundations, local associations, and independent guides, ensuring that each institution can reach its ideal audience: curious, mobile, and digitally engaged.

For cultural institutions, Artgonuts offers a powerful tool to activate their collections and stories beyond their walls. It enables them to connect with new generations, engage audiences through playful formats, and gain insights into visitor behavior across the territory—not just inside the museum.

Artgonuts also supports more sustainable tourism: it spreads visitor flows, boosts local economies, and values the cultural knowledge embedded in neighborhoods, towns, and communities.

Live and growing, Artgonuts is already partnering with museums, cities, hotels, and European initiatives to launch immersive cultural routes and new participation models. The goal is simple: to make every exploration more meaningful, personal—and genuinely fun.

column42: Giulio Montoli, Edmondo Sparano, Giulia Fazzini, Michela Masoni, Giulio Maria Pezzini, Arunsankar Periyasami, Elena Martelli, Dario Baroni, Andrea Tripodo, Alessandro N. Ferretti, LVenture Group API Access

column50:
Users can earn actual cash rewards.
Users can book or signal a parking spot with just one click
column51:
UPAR is an App for smartphones (Android and iOS) that enables information sharing among car drivers about on-street parking spaces that are being vacated. 
Users can report through the App a parking space they are vacating. The App's algorithm will communicate the availability of the spot to the closest user looking for parking who, thanks to geolocation and satellite navigation, will be able to reach the vacated spot in a short time. By sharing the information users earn credits both usable in the App and directly transferable to their bank account.
The business model is that of a marketplace. By connecting the supply and demand for on-street parking, we retain a percentage of the credit transactions that occur between users.

UPAR aims at solving the problem of Parking Pain, the drivers’ physical and mental distress as well as the waste of time, money, and fuel with consequent environmental and economic damages caused by the search for parking. 
The target audience is all driver's license holders who make digital purchases and regularly suffer Parking Pain; this makes up for a global TAM of approx 45Billion $. 
UPAR plays in the Smart Mobility Market with a CAGR of 21% til 2030 ($250.3 Billion)
column55: Car Drivers - Find Parking

column30: Curated Google Maps by locals, sold as digital travel guides.
column42: Giulio Montoli, Edmondo Sparano, Giulia Fazzini, Edoardo Giorio, Giulio Maria Pezzini, Arunsankar Periyasami, Dario Baroni, Alessandro N. Ferretti, LVenture Group API Access
column50: Mapsters sells curated Google Maps made by locals—authentic, personal travel guides you can use directly in your Maps app
column51:
Mapsters is a digital marketplace where travelers can buy curated Google Maps created by locals, offering the most authentic and personal travel experience. Each map is handcrafted by a local expert and highlights their favorite spots—hidden gems, food haunts, cultural treasures, and personal must-sees—directly integrated with Google Maps for seamless use on any mobile device.

Most travel recommendations today come from anonymous blogs, generic guides, or influencers with commercial deals. Travelers end up wasting time researching or following the same tourist routes. Mapsters solves this by turning local knowledge into a product: a ready-to-use, personalized map that feels like having a friend in every city.

Our goal is to scale the supply side by onboarding locals through a simple "create-your-map" flow, incentivized with revenue share. On the demand side, we plan to target niche communities—digital nomads, foodies, and slow travelers—using performance marketing, SEO, and collaborations with local tourism boards.

What makes Mapsters unique is the format (Google Maps embedded guides), the community-driven supply, and the authenticity at its core. It's scalable, low-cost, and taps into the booming experiential travel trend.

Mapsters turns local knowledge into meaningful travel tools. Our vision is to become the “Etsy of Maps”—a global hub where people discover the world through the eyes of locals.

column50:
Purpose-Driven Innovation
Unlike generic travel assistants, AVI is purpose-built for people who are often overlooked as fragilized people.
column51:
AVI is a conversational AI assistant designed to help travelers with disabilities, seniors, and people with specific needs plan and experience more accessible, comfortable, and inclusive journeys.

We combine AI, data intelligence, and inclusive design to deliver a personalized travel assistant that can be integrated into any digital platform.
1. User-Centered Assistance
AVI talks to travelers like a virtual concierge.

It understands individual accessibility needs (e.g. wheelchair access, visual impairments, mobility limitations, sensory sensitivities).

It provides tailored recommendations for:

Transport (adapted trains, shuttles, car rentals)

Accommodations (hotels with accessible bathrooms, elevators, etc.)

Activities & venues (museums with audio guides, parks with accessible trails)

column50: Active/Adventure travel is more complex than tradition travel. CyclingHero is built for the unique needs of the active/adventure traveler.
column51:
CyclingHero empowers cyclists and other active/adventure travellers to visit new parts of the world in safety and security. The CyclingHero platform allows local experts to create and distribute unique itineraries that leverage local service providers. 

Our white label mobile app is used not only to keep in constant contact with users, but also to deliver an enhanced pre-trip, on-trip, and post-trip experience. The CyclingHero app acts as a virtual tour guide to complement existing guiding services, or even replace the need for a guide completely. 

The main features of the app: 
-Full digital itinerary: allows the travel company to completely do away with printed material. It's all in the app. 
-Group location sharing: allows support to see where travellers are, and allows travellers to see where support and their friends are. 
-Mapping/Points of interest display: allows travellers to see their location on a map and have access to a curated list of relevant POIs.
-Smart notifications: allows travellers to be alerted of safety issues and points of interest, and allows support to know when travellers have reached certain locations or taken certain actions.

column50: We develop in house not only software but also hardware. We are the only company to offer a 40Watt power bank for rent
column51:
We give mobility to charging electronic devices by freeing people from the slavery of cables and sockets.
Amperry is an Italian start-up founded in 2022 in Verona that offers a power bank rental service. Through a combination of IoT stations and a webapp/app, users have the possibility to rent a power bank, charge their devices and return it to any station closest to them, all while paying a flat rate every 24 hours.
In these two years, we have gained experience that has allowed us to develop an entirely in-house produced solution (hardware and software) that aims to revolutionise the market. From January 2025, we will market a solution that will not only offer more powerful power banks (with power of 40watt) that can also charge laptops. More other the stations themselves will be more smart, interactive and can be integrated with third-party software and hardware to implement the services offered, re-evaluating the very space in which they are located.
This will not only allow us to offer a new product in the market that meets 100 per cent of people's needs, but will also enable the company to increase its revenue by positioning itself as a producer of premium solutions.
column55: www.amperry.me - https://www.linkedin.com/company/amperry/?viewAsMember=true

column30: The first AI agent in hospitality
column42: Giulio Montoli, Edmondo Sparano, Giulia Fazzini, Edoardo Giorio, Giulio Maria Pezzini, Arunsankar Periyasami, Dario Baroni, Alessandro N. Ferretti, LVenture Group API Access
column50: The first AI agent exclusively dedicated to property management, capable of executing real-world actions, automating burocracy and support.
column51: Maurice Assistant Srl is an innovative startup that designs, develops and markets the SaaS Maurice Assistant, a platform powered by artificial intelligence for operators of all kinds of hospitality facilities. Maurice can largely replace human intervention in every phase of guest reception, providing a fully automated check?in solution. Our AI agent autonomously handles guest document requests and collection, extracting the required data from the photo submitted, processes payment of the tourist tax via Stripe integration, and automatically submits the required information to the relevant authorities through integrations with Alloggiati Web and Ross1000. Maurice offers continuous assistance throughout the entire stay, interacting in the guest’s language via an adaptive chat interface, and uses web browsing to find the best solutions for every need. Searching for connections to airports and train stations, curating the best food and wine suggestions, and locating local tourist attractions are just some of the requests Maurice can fulfill. The result is an optimal guest experience, with 24/7 support and personalized solutions for every issue. For property managers, Maurice is a reliable partner that enables over 80% savings on operational costs. Its ability to read emails from channel managers, PMS and OTAs without requiring APIs ensures integration with any software or booking channel. The control panel also allows extremely precise customization for each property: Maurice can understand and carry out the owner’s instructions regarding accommodation features and access procedures., including links, images or videos. Its intelligent notification system evaluates each situation individually and alerts the operator only when necessary. Finally, the agent has been designed to establish a warm, natural rapport with users, so much so that in numerous tests its artificial nature has never been detected, contributing to a smooth, human?like interaction experience.
column55: https://mauriceassistant.com/it/ - https://www.linkedin.com/company/maurice-assistant/

column30: Piattaforma software per il trasporto marittimo
column42: Giulio Montoli, Edmondo Sparano, Giulia Fazzini, Edoardo Giorio, Giulio Maria Pezzini, Arunsankar Periyasami, Dario Baroni, Alessandro N. Ferretti, LVenture Group API Access
column50: Immissione nel mercato del trasporto marittimo di un sistema attualmente non presente.
column51: Il progetto consiste nella realizzazione di una piattaforma software (portale web/app mobile) deputata a gestire la fornitura di servizi di trasporto marittimo, mettendo in collegamento diretto passeggeri ed imbarcazioni private. Aqugò nasce per offrire al pubblico un'alternativa al servizio di trasporto e noleggio marittimo collettivo, consentendo agli utenti di prenotare 24h su 24h un transfer privato che gli consenta di raggiungere la propria destinazione in modo veloce e confortevole e noleggiare un'imbarcazione. Sarà inoltre possibile effettuare il servizio "Tour" permettendo alle imbarcazioni private di far conoscere ai turisti anche i luoghi più caratteristici. Il cliente potrà usufruire del servizio in qualsiasi porto e/o banchina di attracco e potrà raggiungere le località in ogni ora della giornata. La novità invece per i clienti non turisti sarà che, nel caso in cui decidessero per motivi vari di trascorrere poche ore presso la destinazione scelta(per una cena, una giornata di mare o un evento) potranno farlo in comodità senza essere soggetti a orari prestabiliti dalle attuali linee di trasporto marittimo. Questo progetto è stato ideato oltre che per potenziare il trasporto marittimo creando una reale alternativa all'utilizzo dei mezzi di terra, anche per dare la possibilità alle piccole località marittime di essere raggiunte in maniera semplice in modo da poter valorizzare le attrazioni del territorio.
column55: Cittadini - Semplificherà il raggiungimento delle isole e di altre località marittime agli abitanti del posto che potranno optare per una soluzione privata alternativa al trasporto collettivo, Gruppi di persone - Soluzione smart per gruppi di persone che vogliono condividere un tour o un transfer dividendone i costi, Turisti - raggiungere qualsiasi località in ogni ora della giornata anche per brevi intervalli di tempo (cena, giornata di mare, eventi privati)

column30: It is a travel agency specialized in wellness and sport retreats.
column42: Giulio Montoli, Edmondo Sparano, Giulia Fazzini, Edoardo Giorio, Giulio Maria Pezzini, Arunsankar Periyasami, Dario Baroni, Alessandro N. Ferretti, LVenture Group API Access
column50: Outdoo unites passionate travelers with Legends—athletes & creators—turning their communities into epic passion-based group adventures.
column51:
Outdoo is a travel digital company on a mission to revolutionize the way people connect through sport, travel, and meaningful experiences. We create and distribute sport-based group trips in collaboration with highly engaged athletes, content creators, and community leaders – the Legends. Our purpose is to offer people the chance to live unique and transformative experiences while strengthening communities around shared passions.
Our vision stems from a simple truth: people today crave more than just traditional travel. They seek purpose, connection, and inspiration. Outdoo answers this need by combining the emotional power of sport and nature with the accessibility of curated travel. Whether it’s surfing in Portugal, bikepacking across Sardinia, or deepening your breath in a freediving retreat in Egypt, our platform empowers individuals to explore the world with intention.
At the heart of our platform is the Legend – an expert, storyteller, or guide with a loyal and engaged following. Through Outdoo, Legends are given an innovative and seamless way to host their own experiences, turning their knowledge and communities into real-life adventures. They receive a fully managed service – from logistics to customer support, travel licenses to booking management – allowing them to focus on what they do best: inspiring people.
Outdoo’s strength lies in offering Legends a full-service, plug & play solution. We handle all operational aspects: planning the trip, coordinating local suppliers, managing admin and legal compliance, building custom landing pages, handling payments, and providing customer care. In return, the Legend promotes the trip on their channels, attracting customers from their existing audience and beyond.
While our initial focus is on wellness and sports, our platform is designed to scale across verticals such as food & beverage, design, culture, and fashion. By empowering Legends in any niche to host passion-based travel experiences, we are building a scalable model that connects people to their interests through immersive, real-world encounters. Future phases will also include B2B collaborations with brands, enabling them to engage their audiences through branded retreats and storytelling-driven travel.
column55: Individuals passionate about a specific interest (sports, art, fashion, design, food) - Join passion-based group trips, connect with the Legends, and meet like-minded people

column50: Abbiamo ideato il primo metodo che consente di organizzare, in contemporanea, centinaia di eventi di branding.
column51:
Wudstok è un media phygital che si occupa di potenziare la visibilità dei brand sul territorio, integrando soluzioni digitali e fisiche per creare connessioni autentiche tra aziende e comunità locali. La nostra missione è valorizzare il legame tra il brand e il territorio, sfruttando un approccio integrato che combina campagne online, eventi dal vivo e contenuti interattivi. Wudstok aiuta le imprese a comunicare il proprio valore in modo efficace e coinvolgente.
Wudstok si distingue per il suo approccio phygital: integra soluzioni digitali e fisiche per creare esperienze immersive che collegano in modo autentico i brand al territorio. Mentre molte realtà si concentrano esclusivamente sul digitale o sull'evento dal vivo, Wudstok combina entrambe le dimensioni, offrendo campagne online e interazioni sul campo che rafforzano il legame tra il marchio e la comunità locale. Questo mix innovativo consente di raggiungere una vasta audience, personalizzando ogni progetto in base alle specifiche esigenze del mercato e utilizzando tecnologie all'avanguardia per garantire risultati concreti e duraturi.

column30: Reviving Italian villages with remote work, cultural exchange & innovation.
column42: Giulio Montoli, Edmondo Sparano, Giulia Fazzini, Edoardo Giorio, Giulio Maria Pezzini, Arunsankar Periyasami, Dario Baroni, Alessandro N. Ferretti, LVenture Group API Access
column50: The way we are blending innovation with deep local cultural integration, by bringing international people together in little tiny villages.
column51:
Tursi Digital Nomads is a non profit organization founded in 2021 with the mission of revitalizing Italy’s inner areas through remote work, cultural immersion, and social innovation. The organization addresses some key challenges faced by rural villages like depopulation and the underuse of cultural and architectural heritage.
Started from the historic village of Tursi, in Basilicata, the initiative attracts digital nomads, remote workers, freelancers, and creatives from around the world to live and work in these underexplored areas. These individuals become temporary residents who contribute both economically and socially to the local fabric.
Tursi Digital Nomads provides medium-stay accommodations in the historic center boosting local accommodation providers, free coworking spaces nested inside non used-public places, workshops, cultural activities, and authentic local experiences co-designed with the local community.
We partner with local administrations to create long term economic opportunities and social innovation.
We design memorable workation experience for our clients with the organization of activities both in weekdays, to let them discover the local products and traditions, and in the weekends, with daily trips visiting the best villages, beaches, natural parks.
Our clients benefit of these organized communities because they can easily meet new people and friends even if they are full-time solo travelers. More than 30% of our clients are returned clients and many of them joined more than twice of our communities.
Beyond Tursi, the organization has scaled its model to other villages in Italy and in Greece, turning them into hubs for remote work, learning, and cultural exchange. The focus is on sustainable tourism, inclusive growth, and digital inclusion, ensuring that the benefits of the digital economy reach even the most remote parts of the internal areas.
In 2025–2028, Tursi Digital Nomads aims to scale further under the brand Remote Inn, combining coliving, coworking, and mentoring services in a franchise model that can be adopted by villages across Italy and Greece. Through this expansion, the organization is shaping a new narrative for rural life, dynamic, international, and deeply rooted in place, as well as increase our revenue streams through a new business model with new services and targeted clients that will transform our core business from a B2C to a hybrid B2C & B2B, with the introduction of company retreats and affiliation fees.
column55: Remote workers, entrepreneurs - Workation, travel, meet new people, discover new places

column50: MeeTravel unisce AI, community e promozione turistica trasformando l’ispirazione in viaggi reali, autentici e tracciabili
column51:
MeeTravel è la piattaforma intelligente che collega territori e viaggiatori realmente in partenza.
Non vendiamo pacchetti. Ispiriamo, connettiamo e trasformiamo l’interesse in azione concreta grazie a una community attiva e a un sistema di AI proprietario.
COMMUNITY
MeeTravel si basa su una community di oltre 100.000 utenti che organizzano avventure autentiche: trekking, on the road, weekend culturali ecc.
I nostri travel creator – micro-influencer selezionati – pubblicano viaggi a cui altri utenti si aggregano, pagando in app. Il sistema permette di scegliere in anticipo i compagni di viaggio, grazie a un matching calcolato con AI.
PROMOZIONE TURISTICA
MeeTravel offre a enti turistici, DMO e aziende locali un sistema innovativo per promuoversi in modo profilato e misurabile. Le campagne ispirano la community e si trasformano in viaggi reali, generando contenuti autentici (UGC) che amplificano l’attrattività della destinazione. Tracciamo chi propone, chi parte e da quale stimolo è stato attivato. I dati raccolti sono strutturati e pronti per essere condivisi con enti e strumenti esterni
COME FUNZIONA
Le destinazioni vengono promosse tramite campagne digitali visibili all’interno dell’app. I creator ne vengono ispirati e propongono viaggi in autonomia, definiti nei costi, attività e tempistiche. Gli utenti interessati si uniscono, scoprono in anticipo chi parteciperà, e pagano in app. Ogni passaggio, dalla campagna alla partenza, è tracciabile. 
TECNOLOGIA
L’algoritmo proprietario di AI è il cuore della piattaforma. Basato su un ensemble di tre modelli di machine learning, allenato su dati reali, calcola real time la compatibilità tra viaggiatori e itinerari, secondo preferenze, stile di viaggio e interessi. È uno strumento efficace, scalabile e già attivo. 
Stiamo inoltre avviando lo sviluppo di una piattaforma SAAS che permetta ai Partner di promuoversi in modo autonomo e innovativo, evolvendo e rendendo altamente scalabile l’attuale approccio. 
CARATTERISTICHE DISTINTIVE
MeeTravel
Potenzia l’incontro tra domanda e offerta turistica 
Porta valore reale ai territori, con dati tracciabili 
Permette di viaggiare secondo i propri interessi e con le persone più affini 
Offre un sistema P2P sicuro e trasparente 
IMPATTO 
Oltre 6.000 viaggiatori sono già partiti tramite la piattaforma e nell’ultimo trimestre abbiamo attivato 5 nuove accordi. MeeTravel è la risposta concreta e digitale per un turismo autentico, misurabile, sostenibile
column55: https://meetravel.it/ - https://www.linkedin.com/company/meetravel-social-traveling/, https://www.facebook.com/MeeTravel.fun/ - Sistema di P2P di pagamento viaggi

column30: Djinne is a multisided freemium PWA that creates customized travelbooks
column42: Giulio Montoli, Edmondo Sparano, Giulia Fazzini, Edoardo Giorio, Giulio Maria Pezzini, Arunsankar Periyasami, Dario Baroni, Alessandro N. Ferretti, LVenture Group API Access
column45:
Giulia Fazzini
guida turistica tipo "travelbooks", too early
column50:
Personalized and real-time updated travelbooks
From points of interest to people of interest
Platform not app
Unique stories of local people
column51:
The Djinne project aims to revolutionize the approach to tourism through the development of a multisided freemium platform offering personalized digital travel guides. Through this platform, users receive detailed editorial content based on their specific interests, including links to podcasts, blogs, videos, and articles. The innovation lies in the ability to integrate local stories, allowing residents to promote themselves and share their stories, thus enriching the platform's database. In addition, Djinne uses advanced technologies such as generative writing through LLM and ontology creation with GraphDB to develop personalized recommendations.
The GraphDB includes the collection of public data on cultural heritage and experimentation with editorial content that actively involves citizens and visitors in reviewing narratives and recommendation systems. Information is presented in two modes: a quick one, through easy-to-read tabs, and a detailed one, which invites users to explore further, based on the principles of Daniel Kahneman's book "Thinking, Fast and Slow." Our recommendation system adapts based on users' interactions, offering a highly personalized experience aimed at redistributing tourist flows to lesser-known and frequented areas, encouraging more sustainable and engaging tourism. Djinne not only proposes a new way of exploring cultural heritage, but also seeks to enhance intangible culture, local traditions, and the people who reside there, transforming the perception of territories from mere sites to visit to places to experience and authentically appreciate. Our platform also intends to build a network of business partnerships with individuals and businesses that wish to contribute to the tourism sector and actively participate in the development of our innovative proposal. Djinne once developed can also be used by municipalities to promote the area by acting as a de facto SaaS. Involvement of public entities takes place through presentations of the effectiveness of the platform, workshops to adapt functionality to local needs, and agreements to share stories and data from the area.

column50: Travelfun doesn’t just sell a ticket – it offers a complete package combining holidays and sports through its e-commerce platform.
column51:
Travelfun, founded at the end of 2023, is a digital tour operator that offers unique travel experiences integrated with sporting events for enthusiasts. The startup aims to turn every trip into a memorable adventure by connecting tourists and sports through personalized offers. 
TravelFun aims to become the leading platform for customers around the world who want to enjoy extraordinary travel experiences and unforgettable sporting events.

Whether it's football, tennis, or the NBA, or other sports, our goal is to celebrate people's diverse passions, engage them, and create memorable experiences around these interests.
We offer group trips and individual journeys centered around a passion for sports. Through our e-commerce platform, customers can book a group trip or build their own tailor-made individual travel experience.

column51:
Tourism Innovation Lab S.r.l. is a startup that has developed a digital solution for the tourism market, with the goal of distributing travel experiences and ancillary services offered by accommodation facilities to tourists in a new and integrated way.
Travelers, whether for business or leisure, need specific services during their stay and want to enjoy new experiences—ideally exclusive and authentic—that reflect the identity of the destination they are visiting.
When booking a trip, users want to:
• explore a compelling and complete story of the destination
• find categorized and well-described POIs and experiences, both free and paid
• book and purchase tourist experiences and ticketed attractions
• discover all the services offered by their hotel, with the option to reserve them in advance
Accommodation providers need to increase revenue by:
• highlighting their unique features
• upselling ancillary services
• cross-selling local experiences tied to the destination
Service providers want to:
• gain visibility and be organically integrated with destination offerings
• be offered to hotel guests from the moment of booking
• receive early online bookings to better manage operations and improve service quality
The solution introduced by the company equips destinations—or even individual hotels or service providers—with an integrated system to promote and sell local experiences.
Specifically, accommodation facilities can integrate this solution with their property management system to automatically communicate with guests (via WhatsApp, email, or SMS), without the need for additional human resources. Guests receive personalized suggestions and booking opportunities for experiences.
This is more than just a CRM module: it’s a real-time communication system powered by a PWA (Progressive Web App) through which users can discover and book not only hotel services (such as the restaurant, spa, meeting rooms, gym, etc. with special rates) but also the best local experiences—activities, tours, excursions, points of interest, guides, and ticketed attractions.
In this way, guests will have a complete overview of what the destination has to offer even before they arrive—starting from the moment they book their stay.

column42: Giulio Montoli, Edmondo Sparano, Giulia Fazzini, Edoardo Giorio, Giulio Maria Pezzini, Arunsankar Periyasami, Dario Baroni, Alessandro N. Ferretti, LVenture Group API Access
column50: 1. Non è più il lavoratore a candidarsi ma il datore di lavoro a contattare la figura di suo interesse. 2. Creare Flessibilità nel settore
column51:
Attualmente, molti professionisti e imprenditori si affidano ancora a strumenti poco efficienti come Subito.it, gruppi Facebook o WhatsApp per la ricerca di personale. Risotnic vuole rivoluzionare questo processo con una soluzione più efficace e indispensabile per il mondo dell’ospitalità.
La piattaforma è provvista di un wall di annunci di lavoro, pensato per esigenze di breve termine come singoli turni, coperture extra per turnover e sostituzioni dell’ultimo minuto. I lavoratori possono candidarsi facilmente, sia per integrare un reddito già esistente sia per cercare un’occupazione stabile. Questo modello consente di offrire un’opportunità di guadagno flessibile, alternativa anche a lavori come il food delivery, e al tempo stesso avvicinare sempre più persone al settore dell’hospitality.
Per gli imprenditori, Risotnic rappresenta uno strumento fondamentale per affrontare carenze improvvise di personale, ferie, sostituzioni o picchi stagionali. Inoltre, la piattaforma permette di accedere a un database intuitivo e innovativo di professionisti, attraverso il quale è possibile trovare rapidamente la figura più adatta alle proprie necessità con pochi click. Molte funzioni saranno integrate con AI per performare meglio ed eliminare piccoli passaggi in grado di velocizzare il processo di onboarding

column51:
Prof. ALFRED is an AI-powered EdTech platform designed to tackle student disengagement, teacher overload, and the growing pressure on school administrators. By leveraging Generative AI and Gamification, the platform transforms traditional learning into a dynamic, personalized experience.

The current MVP provides:
- A GenAI-based Virtual Tutor, available to students 24/7, simulating oral exams and offering contextual support on selected subjects and topics;
- A real-time dashboard for teachers and administrators to monitor student usage, learning progress, and areas of improvement.

Prof. ALFRED is already being validated through three pilot programs currently active in different Italian high schools. These pilots are providing critical feedback to refine our UX, features, and learning impact.

We have also gained early traction by participating in two acceleration programs: PLAI by Mondadori (Milan) and IKIGAI (Tuscany). Furthermore, the project has won competitive public grants and awards, totaling over €11,000 in funding.

Our solution targets:
- Students, who engage with tailored learning paths and interactive challenges;
- Teachers, who benefit from automated content generation and student analytics;
- School managers, who access key performance indicators to guide strategic decisions.

Our business model is a B2B SaaS with school-wide subscriptions and modular premium features. With a modular and scalable architecture, Prof. ALFRED is designed to integrate seamlessly with existing school systems and grow into a reference standard for AI-assisted education in Europe and beyond.

column50: Our service is the first lawful alternative to move around the Italian cities point-to-point with no need for tendered taxi licenses!
column51:
Wayla is the first Italian city van-pooling service that aims to disrupt the urban mobility landscape in Italy and all over the continent.

The Italian legal framework has led to the creation of a monopoly in the urban mobility ecosystem: today, when it comes to moving around a city like Milan or Rome point-to-point, the only option is to take a taxi.
Unfortunately, this is frequently a nightmare, due to the lack of cabs and the huge untapped demand (up to 40% of taxi requests are not fulfilled just because of that).

Therefore, we launched Wayla: the first city van-pooling service in Italy!
Our users can request any point-to-point ride through our app, onboard our vans, and share it (partially or totally) with other users, thanks to a pooling algorithm that matches the requests and optimizes the vans' routes in real-time.

It represents a safe, affordable, and sustainable alternative to move around our cities, but the coolest part is that it can lawfully operate without the need for any expensive taxi license, along with the abovementioned legal framework.

We launched the service on October 31, 2024, from Milan.
However, our forecasted fares and unit economics would make Wayla competitive all over Europe: therefore, we are already planning to expand into all the main Italian cities and beyond our country, aiming to become a global mobility player.

column30: Ruuts.travel - making travel more sustainable!
column42: Giulio Montoli, Edmondo Sparano, Giulia Fazzini, Edoardo Giorio, Giulio Maria Pezzini, Arunsankar Periyasami, Dario Baroni, Alessandro N. Ferretti, LVenture Group API Access
column50: As the first dedicated Slow Travel Agency, our mission is to make travel more sustainable and address the challenges of mass tourism.
column51:
Slow travel is booming—worth €90B annually in Europe and growing twice as fast as mainstream tourism. Yet access remains fragmented, making it hard for travellers to book immersive, sustainable trips.

Today, the travel industry is broken. 80% of travellers visit just 10% of destinations, leading to overcrowding, cultural erosion, rising emissions, and frustrated locals. Travellers increasingly seek meaningful, low-impact journeys that connect them with nature and local cultures. Ruuts.travel is here to simplify and scale this movement.

Ruuts.travel is the one-stop platform for slow travel, offering curated booking access to unique stays, authentic experiences, and more sustainable transportation—like rail and campervans—all in one place.

Our marketplace brings together alternative accommodations, nature-based activities, and immersive cultural journeys, powered by community, gamified loyalty, and AI-driven travel tools.

We’ve started our journey in Romania and are now expanding to the UK, Germany and the UAE, markets with superior buying power and demand for slow travel.

Since launch, we’ve grown to 15,000+ active members, processed 200+ bookings, and reached €160K in GMV, with standout metrics: ARPU of €979, LTV-to-CAC ratio of 7.14, and marketing spend at just €0.21 per €1 revenue. Our white-label deal with Romania’s largest OTA, Vola.ro, proves our B2B2C go-to-market strategy is scalable and efficient.

Backed by award-winning founders and recognised across the industry (Touristech Startup Fest 2023 Winner, 2024 Travolution Awards Finalist), we’re now raising a €250k bridge round to enhance tech, expand supply, and enter new markets.

Ruuts is redefining how the world travels. Join us in making travel more sustainable
column55: Adventure & Nature Seekers - People interested in outdoor activities such as hiking, camping, glamping, and unique nature-based experiences., Digital Nomads & Remote Workers - Travellers looking for extended stays in peaceful, nature-centric environments, with a focus on work-life balance and alternative living experiences., Eco-Conscious Travellers - Individuals seeking sustainable, nature-friendly travel experiences, often prioritizing low-impact tourism options like RVs, eco-lodges, and off-grid stays., Families & Small Groups - Groups looking for eco-friendly getaways, particularly multi-generational families who seek nature-focused, child-friendly trips and unique accommodations like campervans or rural stays., Local Tourism Operators & Hosts - Ruuts’ B2B partners, such as local hosts, experience providers, and RV rental companies, who list their offerings on Ruuts to reach a growing community of slow travel enthusiasts., Millennials & Gen Z - Tech-savvy, community-driven travellers who prioritize experiences over material possessions and are inclined toward conscious, sustainable tourism., Slow Travel Enthusiasts - Travellers who value authentic, immersive, and slower-paced experiences, looking to connect deeply with local cultures, communities, and natural surroundings.

column50: Travelhood offers intimate, Talent-led trips focused on JOMO, with personalized experiences, small groups, and freedom to choose travel opti
column51:
Travelhood is a travel platform that brings together Talents and their communities for unique, curated experiences. Rooted in the JOMO (Joy of Missing Out) philosophy, our trips offer a balance between guided activities and personal time, allowing travelers to disconnect from stress and immerse themselves in meaningful experiences.

With Travelhood, each journey is led by a Talent—a travel influencer or expert in a specific field—who shapes the trip around their community’s interests. Travelhood takes care of all logistics, ensuring a seamless and authentic adventure.

Not just a trip, but a curated experience where travel meets passion, connection, and freedom.

column30: Socialeat è una piattaforma che connette viaggiatori attraverso esperienze
column42: Giulio Montoli, Edmondo Sparano, Giulia Fazzini, Edoardo Giorio, Giulio Maria Pezzini, Arunsankar Periyasami, Dario Baroni, Alessandro N. Ferretti, LVenture Group API Access
column50: Socialeat è una community che unisce persone attraverso eventi autentici, chat dedicate, gestione centralizzata e perfetta per turisti
column51:
Socialeat è una piattaforma che facilita l’incontro tra persone attraverso esperienze gastronomiche condivise. L’obiettivo è creare connessioni autentiche tra locali e viaggiatori, favorendo l’integrazione sociale e la scoperta culturale attraverso il cibo.

Come funziona?
Organizzazione di eventi gastronomici ??

Gli utenti possono partecipare a cene sociali, aperitivi, picnic e altre esperienze legate al cibo.
Gli eventi sono creati sia dalla community che da organizzatori locali, come ristoratori, guide turistiche o appassionati di cucina.
Prenotazione semplice e veloce ??

Tutti gli eventi sono visibili nell’app, con dettagli su luogo, data, orari e numero di partecipanti.
Gli utenti possono prenotare in pochi clic e ricevere aggiornamenti in tempo reale.
Chat dedicata per ogni evento ??

Ogni evento ha una chat privata, permettendo ai partecipanti di conoscersi prima dell’incontro e agli organizzatori di gestire meglio l’esperienza.
Evita confusione nei gruppi generali e rende la comunicazione più efficace.
Esperienze autentiche per i turisti ??

Socialeat offre ai viaggiatori un modo unico per immergersi nella cultura locale, incontrando persone del posto e gustando piatti tipici in un contesto conviviale.
Perfetto per chi viaggia da solo o vuole scoprire la città in modo più sociale e coinvolgente.
Crescita della community ??

L’app permette agli utenti di proporre e segnalare eventi, contribuendo alla creazione di una rete sempre più attiva e dinamica.
Favorisce la socializzazione in modo spontaneo, senza la necessità di creare sottogruppi o chat dispersive.

column42: Giulio Montoli, Edmondo Sparano, Giulia Fazzini, Edoardo Giorio, Giulio Maria Pezzini, Arunsankar Periyasami, Dario Baroni, Alessandro N. Ferretti, LVenture Group API Access

column50: Patented interactive photos & dynamic stickers. Proprietary software. 2 Patents. First mover.
column51:
Revibes Srl combines physical and digital experiences through patented interactive photography and dynamic sticker technology. Our solutions allow businesses and individuals to create engaging, updatable, and immersive experiences linked to physical objects.

Our Core Solutions:
	•	Photo 2.0 (Patented Technology): Printed photos that can store up to 24 images, soundtracks, and digital links, making memories interactive.
	•	Magic Stickers: Dynamic, customizable stickers that link to digital content, allowing businesses to update promotions, product details, or customer engagement experiences in real-time.
	•	Smart Labels & Packaging: Stickers for fashion, food, and retail that offer storytelling, authenticity verification, and sustainability insights.
	•	Event & Tourism Solutions: Interactive souvenirs and event memorabilia with scannable content, enhancing user engagement.
	•	Corporate Marketing & Brand Storytelling: Businesses use our stickers and platform to create evolving digital experiences for customers.

Our B2B and B2B2C model enables companies to enhance customer interaction through a scalable, easy-to-manage digital storytelling system, all without the need for technical expertise.

column50: Offre strutture abitative mobili tailormade per cantine con piattaforma di prenotazione, box regalo. Struttura compliant con Regolamenti ITA
column51: Hublot Cabin rivoluziona l'enoturismo combinando design innovativo e funzionalità personalizzate in strutture abitative mobili che si integrano perfettamente nel paesaggio vinicolo. Ogni cabina è progettata su misura per esaltare la specificità e l'identità della cantina partner, offrendo agli ospiti un'esperienza di soggiorno unica. Attraverso la nostra piattaforma, facilitiamo la prenotazione di soggiorni e l'acquisto di prodotti locali, mentre offriamo esperienze di degustazione indimenticabili. Hublot Cabin non è solo un luogo dove dormire, ma un'esperienza che arricchisce la visita alla cantina, aumentando l'engagement dei clienti, spesso anche giovani, e creando un nuovo punto di riferimento nell'enoturismo.

column51: Currently with my Davvero Italy custom travel advisor business, I create tailor-made travel itineraries recommending under-the-radar, off-the-beaten-path destinations, family-owned & operated spots, agriturismos and other green-eco accommodations/businesses most who I know and have relationships with personally. Always focusing on sustainable, responsible and respectful travel/tourism, my mottos are "slow travel", "travel differently" and "travel deeper" in order to "Discover Italy for REAL" which is my tagline (and the company name I chose). But I wanted to do something more meaningful and impactful - and on a much larger scale.  An initiative that could actually help the tourism industry in Italy on a broader level, and not just individually and on the small scale which I am doing now. But above all, I wanted to create a solution to the current Overtourism problem in Italy and this could be that and so much more...

column30: Naviga tra locali in cerca di un aperitivo. Info aggiornate, eventi e promo
column42: Giulio Montoli, Edmondo Sparano, Giulia Fazzini, Edoardo Giorio, Giulio Maria Pezzini, Arunsankar Periyasami, Dario Baroni, Alessandro N. Ferretti, LVenture Group API Access
column45:
Giulia Fazzini
L'app per fare aperitivo ... a Milano (al momento). Prodottino limitato ma carino, Campari era interessata ma sinceramente non ci vedo potenziale nella vision com'è impostata adesso.
column50: Non esiste una piattaforma dedicata all'aperitivo, un momento radicato nella tradizione che coinvolge 14 milioni di italiani.
column51:
Il mercato dei Bar, Lounge e Cocktail Bar è caratterizzato da una forte concorrenza e da una performance economica stagnante. L'aperitivo rappresenta il core business di questi locali. Nonostante un volume di ricerca significativo (330.000 ricerche mensili), l’offerta informativa risulta frammentata e dispersiva.

A differenza delle piattaforme esistenti, orientate principalmente alla ristorazione classica, DABAR si concentra esclusivamente sul segmento dell’aperitivo, offrendo una soluzione digitale che connette locali e consumatori attraverso strumenti avanzati di ricerca, prenotazione, promozioni, eventi e menu digitali.

La nostra Web App offre un duplice vantaggio: da un lato, consente agli utenti di scoprire nuovi locali, confrontare facilmente i prezzi delle formule aperitivo e conoscere gli eventi in zona, facilitando la scelta in base al budget e alle preferenze personali; dall’altro, mette a disposizione dei locali una suite gestionale altamente personalizzabile per ottimizzare la gestione dell’agenda, creare promozioni esclusive, organizzare eventi singoli o periodici e gestire il menu.

Il menu digitale interattivo, accessibile tramite QR-code, non si limita a mostrare l’offerta del locale, ma si adatta dinamicamente ai gusti dell’utente, suggerendo prodotti e abbinamenti personalizzati e raccogliendo dati statistici utili per affinare l’offerta.

Il modello di business prevede una commissione fissa per ogni esercente: 0,85€ a coperto sulle prenotazioni, 1,00€ per ogni partecipante agli eventi e 0,05€ per ogni accesso al menu digitale interattivo, fino a un massimo di 500 interazioni al mese (25€ mensili).

column50: Aiandi is simple to use and saves you time. It gives truly local, personalized answers in real time, no need for endless searching
column51:
Aiandi aims to become a key reference in the tourism industry, much like TripAdvisor did in the 2010s, but with a broader ambition. We want to be the first thing a traveler turns to upon arriving in a new city, offering an innovative, interactive, and AI-powered personalized experience. Aiandi is not just a guide but a travel companion, crafting bespoke experiences and adapting in real-time to each traveler's needs.

Unlike other solutions, Aiandi does not simply respond; it listens, learns, and adapts to create personalized experiences that only a local expert could offer. We save important information to further tailor each experience. While ChatGPT pulls data from the web, we integrate this information with the knowledge of real local people and professionals, such as licensed tour guides.

For investors, Aiandi's strength lies in its scalability, starting from one city and expanding internationally, with the potential for limitless growth. Our ability to keep users engaged and loyal, combined with an ecosystem capable of generating revenue through partnerships with local services and tourism sector players, makes Aiandi a compelling opportunity.

Our goal is to create an intelligent assistant that delivers a personalized and engaging tourism experience, enhancing each journey with meaningful experiences through a familiar interface like WhatsApp. We want to support local communities and small artisans, helping to restore value to what makes each destination unique while promoting a more sustainable and authentic form of tourism.

column50: Oppose to generalist influencer marketing platform, we provide a tool to serve the specific needs of the travel marketers.
column51:
treepli is an AI-powered travel influencer marketing platform that bridges the gap between social media inspiration and actionable bookings. Designed exclusively for the travel industry, we empower destinations, airlines, and brands to activate and convert micro-influencer content into measurable tourism growth.

Core Solution & Technology:

AI-Driven Creator Matching: Our algorithms analyze 100+ data points (audience demographics, engagement, content style) to match brands with niche micro-influencers (e.g., cultural, luxury, adventure). 

End-to-End Campaign Tools: Streamline scouting, contracting, content production, and logistics (flights/hotels), cutting setup time by 50%.

Social Commerce Engine: White-label “travel storefronts” let users book trips directly from influencer posts via real-time pricing and deep-linking. 

Hyper-Targeted Segmentation: Proprietary algorithms segment audiences by travel intent (e.g., “halal travelers”), enabling personalized campaigns.
column55: Travel brands, e.g. DMO, Airlines, Hotel Chains, OTAs - Scout and activate creators for influencer marketing campaign, manage and monitor content operations and performance, Travel creators - Create travel content, promote their content portfolio, find collab gigs with travel brands

column45:
Paolo Ottaviani
Dispositivi plug-in montati su sistemi di alimentazione convenzionali per il trasporto diesel/benzina denominati promotori/attivatori di carburante. Round altino e USA, purtroppo out
column50: We reduce fuel consumption by 10-20% (gasoline, diesel), reduce emissions of harmful substances by 15% CO2 in combustion engines
column51:
With the time of operation of internal combustion engines there is wear and tear of parts and mechanisms of the engine, which leads to poor combustion of fuel and an increase in consumption by about 15-25%, it is black smoke from the exhaust system we see this waste of money
The average pickup truck loses up to $1000 a year from poor combustion.
 A truck in logistics loses up to $11,000 a year.


	Transports are the biggest source of pollution in cities and metropolitan areas and we will not be able to abandon them in the near future, but the problem needs to be addressed now.
In some cases, it is better to improve the technology than to abandon it completely, while having no alternatives from both the financial and user side, and our solution will solve the problems of reducing fuel consumption and reducing emissions of harmful substances in the secondary automotive market. 

FuelWell is a fuel combustion improvement technology plug-in devices range for various internal combustion engines. Reduces fuel consumption by up to 20% and CO2 emission by 15%.
We improve the fuel and environmental efficiency of vehicles on the aftermarket by upgrading internal combustion engines with an additional FUELWELL device that reduces fuel consumption and reduces emissions of harmful substances
FuelWell - a plug-in device, fuel promotor , installed on the fuel system of internal combustion engines.


Fuel passing through the device's cartridge is activated and promoted at the nano-level by metals with catalytic properties, resulting in faster and more complete fuel combustion, leading to reduced fuel consumption and emissions
column55: logistics companies, vehicle owners, Business with its own vehicle fleet,  - To reduce the cost of transportation of goods, to reduce emissions of harmful substances

column50: AI chatbot, user profiling, full IoT automation, and sustainability for a smart, personalized, and eco-friendly hospitality experience.
column51:
Sostify is an innovative hospitality management platform that integrates technology and sustainability to enhance operational efficiency and improve guest experiences.

Sostify provides Property & Lifestyle Management through two key roles. The Property Manager ensures the operational efficiency and maintenance of properties, optimizing their performance. The Lifestyle Manager, an AI-powered virtual concierge, offers 24/7 personalized support to guests, creating tailored experiences based on their preferences.

The platform incorporates advanced technology solutions to streamline operations. IoT systems enable intelligent control of energy consumption, climate settings, and overall environment management. Automated self-check-in simplifies the arrival process, while AI-driven personalization enhances communication and guest services.

Sostify provides comprehensive operational management, handling booking coordination and calendar synchronization across major platforms like Airbnb, Booking, and Expedia. The service also includes cleaning, maintenance, and linen management, ensuring high hospitality standards. Additionally, it manages bureaucratic and legal compliance, easing the workload for property owners.

To maximize revenue and optimize visibility, Sostify applies dynamic pricing strategies, adjusting rates based on demand and data-driven insights. Digital marketing efforts, including multilingual content and SEO strategies, help expand customer reach. High-quality photography and 3D virtual tours enhance property listings, making them more attractive to potential guests.

Sustainability is a core principle of Sostify’s business model. The platform promotes eco-friendly hospitality through 100% certified green energy usage, plastic-free accommodations, and automated resource management to reduce waste. It also encourages guests to adopt sustainable practices during their stays.

By merging technology, personalization, and sustainability, Sostify is redefining hospitality management, offering a smarter, greener, and more efficient way to enhance property operations and guest satisfaction.

column50: Nextflag stands out by leveraging AI and your personal network to offer tailored travel insights beyond the average star-review system.
column51: Nextflag is revolutionizing travel by leveraging artificial intelligence and the power of personal networks to offer a truly personalized and social travel planning experience. We understand that every traveler's needs and preferences are unique, which is why our platform focuses on tailoring each journey to the individual. By integrating AI-driven recommendations with insights from trusted friends and networks, Nextflag enables users to discover authentic experiences, from hidden gems to popular attractions, all recommended by those they trust. Beyond mere recommendations, our platform serves as a dynamic community of travelers, sharing tips, experiences, and must-see destinations, making Nextflag the go-to hub for planning, sharing, and experiencing travel in a way that's as unique as our users. Our vision extends to becoming the ultimate one-stop shop for all travel needs, redefining the way travelers explore the world by making every trip an adventure personalized just for them, supported by a community that values authentic and shared experiences.

column30: Software blockchain avanzato per gestione compliance normativa alberghiera
column42: Giulio Montoli, Edmondo Sparano, Giulia Fazzini, Edoardo Giorio, Giulio Maria Pezzini, Arunsankar Periyasami, Dario Baroni, Alessandro N. Ferretti, LVenture Group API Access
column50: Unica piattaforma blockchain con notarizzazione documentale, IoT e QR code, che digitalizza compliance asset, controlli normativi per hotel.
column51:
L'innovativa piattaforma Hey Chain rappresenta una soluzione avanzata basata sulla tecnologia blockchain per la gestione integrata e la compliance normativa specifica nel settore alberghiero. Questo innovativo sistema permette di digitalizzare completamente le procedure relative agli adempimenti di legge, creando un ambiente centralizzato, sicuro e trasparente. Nello specifico, la piattaforma opera come un archivio intelligente in grado di acquisire, catalogare e storicizzare tutta la documentazione rilevante, garantendone l’immutabilità e l'integrità grazie alla notarizzazione tramite blockchain. Tale funzione elimina il rischio di manomissione dei dati, garantendo al contempo la validità giuridica della documentazione archiviata grazie alla marcatura temporale e all’hashing.
Tra le sue caratteristiche principali vi è la gestione avanzata degli asset alberghieri attraverso tecnologie innovative come QR Code e soluzioni IoT, consentendo un efficace tracciamento delle risorse quali macchinari, impianti di sicurezza, attrezzature e sistemi tecnologici smart interconnessi. Ogni risorsa è censita digitalmente con informazioni dettagliate quali anno di installazione, caratteristiche tecniche, storico delle verifiche effettuate, e normative applicabili, facilitando una gestione puntuale e preventiva delle manutenzioni e delle ispezioni periodiche.
Il sistema integra un calendario automatizzato degli obblighi normativi, con notifiche di promemoria e alert automatici per le attività di verifica periodiche, garantendo una gestione tempestiva degli interventi obbligatori. La piattaforma dispone inoltre di un'interfaccia intuitiva accessibile sia al personale interno sia ai fornitori esterni autorizzati, che possono così inserire documentazione certificata direttamente nel sistema, rendendo immediatamente disponibili i dati di conformità agli organi di controllo.
Infine, il software include funzionalità avanzate di notarizzazione blockchain per certificare la conformità dei dati, fornendo un supporto affidabile in caso di controlli da parte delle autorità competenti. Questo assicura non solo la sicurezza informatica dei documenti, ma contribuisce significativamente anche alla business continuity e alla sostenibilità ambientale, tramite la riduzione della documentazione cartacea e la prevenzione di inefficienze energetiche. Il sistema di rating fornitori infine permetterà alla piattaforma di diventare nel tempo un vero e proprio marketplace di servizi.

column30: The community that connects travelers with local tourism operators.
column42: Giulio Montoli, Edmondo Sparano, Giulia Fazzini, Edoardo Giorio, Giulio Maria Pezzini, Arunsankar Periyasami, Dario Baroni, Alessandro N. Ferretti, LVenture Group API Access
column50: Cityfy replaces unreliable reviews with curated local recommendations, empowering Hosts to offer personalized, bookable experiences.
column51:
Cityfy is a community-driven travel platform that connects travelers, hotels, tour operators, and local businesses, enabling them to share and access curated, authentic experiences without relying on unreliable online reviews.

We empower Hosts (hotels, B&Bs, guides, and local operators) to create their own personalized Cityfy platform, which serves as a curated guide for their guests. Through this platform, guests can discover, explore, and book the best activities, restaurants, tours, and events—handpicked by their Host.

How It Works:
1. Hosts personalize their Cityfy platform
- Customize branding, logo, and color scheme.
- Handpick and recommend activities, restaurants more, and events.
- Choose between automatic bookings (guests book directly) or manual bookings (Hosts manage reservations).

2. Guests access a curated selection of top experiences
- Browse highly recommended tours, restaurants, and activities.
- Book experiences instantly or request reservations through their Host.
- Get AI-driven personalized suggestions based on preferences and location.

3. Tour Operators and Businesses benefit from trusted recommendations
- Gain visibility through Hosts who suggest their services.
- Create and promote events visible to the entire community.
- Manage bookings and track performance with insight analytics.

Key Features:
- Two Booking Modes – Hosts can choose automatic (direct booking with commission) or manual (personalized service).
- Integrated Contact System – Hosts using manual mode can select how guests reach them (WhatsApp, Telegram, Email).
- AI-Powered Smart Recommendations – Analyzes preferences to enhance user experience.
- Revenue Model for Hosts – Earn 10% commission on each experience booked through their platform.
- Insights & Performance Analytics – Every user has access to data on engagement and bookings.
- FareHarbor Integration – A vast network of tours and activities ready for booking.

Current Phase & Expansion
We are currently developing the platform, working on:
- Website & user registration flow
- Business model refinement & legal structure
- Launching the first test phase in the Sorrento Peninsula

Our goal is to scale globally with a community-driven expansion model, bringing trusted local expertise to travelers worldwide.

column50: Siamo fra i pochi in Italia a utilizzare tecnologie no-code e low-code che accelerano e abbassano il costo dello sviluppo digitale.
column51:
Nasciamo come agenzia digitale specializzata nello sviluppo di siti web e applicazioni su commissione, utilizzando tecnologie no-code e low-code. Il nostro obiettivo è quello di supportare le piccole e medie imprese locali che non trovano soluzioni personalizzate nei prodotti standardizzati del mercato e che non hanno il budget o il tempo per sviluppare con codice.

Parallelamente, stiamo sviluppando in house un progetto volto a rispondere alle esigenze del dinamico mercato della ristorazione locale e internazionale, sempre più orientato verso l'innovazione tecnologica.

Stiamo lavorando infatti su EasyMenu, un menù digitale versatile che funge sia da menù visivo multilingua sia da piattaforma di e-commerce. I camerieri o i clienti possono quindi effettuare ordini (e pagamenti) direttamente sulla piattaforma e inviare le comande in stampa in cucina. Grazie al sistema di cassa integrato, il flusso dei dati è unificato, consentendo al gestore di monitorare in tempo reale le performance del ristorante e generare analisi e report dettagliati. 

Oltre alle funzionalità sopra elencate, pronte e in funzione, siamo al lavoro sulla gestione integrata del magazzino e del personale all'interno della stessa applicazione.

column8: Hospitality, Luxury, Tourism, Luxury & Personalized Travel, Travel Tech
column30: Eterrea is the first tech enabled luxury Destination Management Company
column42: Giulio Montoli, Edmondo Sparano, Giulia Fazzini, Edoardo Giorio, Giulio Maria Pezzini, Arunsankar Periyasami, Dario Baroni, Alessandro N. Ferretti, LVenture Group API Access
column50: The combination of cutting-edge technology with genuine human interaction, ensuring a highly experiential, immersive and emotional journey.
column51:
Eterrea is a next-generation, AI-powered Destination Management Company (DMC) redefining luxury travel across the Mediterranean. Our mission is to deliver deeply personalized, emotionally resonant travel experiences for high-end clientele—beginning in Italy and France and expanding throughout the Mediterranean. By fusing cutting-edge technology with human expertise, Eterrea addresses a major shift in the luxury tourism landscape: the growing demand for direct, customized, and digitally enabled journeys from affluent global travellers.
The traditional B2B model of destination management has failed to keep pace with this evolution. Eterrea fills this gap with a smart B2C-first platform, supported by an intuitive interface, AI-generated itineraries and video previews, and dedicated travel designers, with every aspect designed for HNWIs seeking authenticity and exclusivity.
Market Opportunity
Globally, the luxury travel market is projected to reach $3.7T by 2032, with the Mediterranean representing 10% of that demand. Italy’s luxury travel market is valued at €23B, with €6B attributable to high-spending American tourists—Eterrea’s primary target. 
Business Model & Traction
Eterrea’s revenue model is rooted in commission-based accommodation bookings (up to 20%) and high-margin itinerary services (up to 100% markup). Bookings are expected to grow from 32 in 2025 to over 1,250 by 2029, reaching €30.9M in annual revenue and a SOM of 0.5%. The company achieves operational scale through AI automation, enabling high-quality delivery without proportional increases in staffing costs.
Technology
At the heart of Eterrea is a proprietary AI platform, integrated with ChatGPT, capable of generating customized itineraries and video previews based on an unique products Database, from simple user prompts. The system continuously learns from user behavior, optimizes supplier selection, and supports internal resource allocation. This allows for real-time scalability, personalized content, and a superior user experience.
Go-to-Market Strategy
•	B2C: Digital-first, content-driven campaigns targeting affluent travelers online; platform MVP launches May 2025, with a soft B2C launch in June and a full launch in 2026.
•	B2B: Tactical engagement with luxury travel agents via sales calls and trade show participation; soft launch in May 2025.
Eterrea is not simply selling trips—it is curating memories, powered by innovation. Now is the time for A New Era of Luxury Travel.
column55: HNWIs & UHNWIs - Planning, organizing & booking high end full itinerary travel services

column8: Hospitality, Airlines, Insurance, Tour Operators, B2B Travel, Travel Insurance, B2B2C
column30: TravelKare provides documentation information to prevent boarding denial
column42: Giulio Montoli, Edmondo Sparano, Giulia Fazzini, Edoardo Giorio, Giulio Maria Pezzini, Arunsankar Periyasami, Dario Baroni, Alessandro N. Ferretti, LVenture Group API Access
column50: The adoption of this TravelKare helps to optimize management processes and enhancing the overall travel experience.
column51:
INADs, short for inadmissible passengers, are a challenge that results in fines for airlines, which can exceed 2 million euros annually for larger companies.
TravelKare, through the use of AI that processes data from IATA's TIMATIC (Travel Information Manual Automatic) in a user-friendly manner, provides travelers with all the information about the necessary travel documents.
TravelKare is designed to be integrated into airlines' ticket purchasing systems, offering a service that helps ensure passengers have all necessary documentation and information to avoid the risk of being denied boarding.
Additionally, providing all the information related to the documents required for boarding a specific flight—verifiable in advance by the airline—will help streamline boarding operations, minimizing delays, which are also a cause of fines for airlines.
The service will be provided to airlines through the payment of an annual subscription.
TravelKare can also be used by tour operators or those involved in hospitality, in order to ensure their customers have a smooth and hassle-free trip while maintaining a high quality of services.

column55: Airlines - They use it to raise the quality of the services offered and to reduce the number of INAD cases (passengers not accepted on arrival) and to avoid delays on flights to deny boarding to the passenger., Hotel group  - By helping travelers comply with entry requirements, the risk of trip cancellations due to missing documentation is significantly reduced., Tour Operators  - It reduces the tour operator's burden in document verification and enhances the customer experience

column50: Proscaenia® porta il teatro nell’era digitale con streaming, AI e valorizzazione del patrimonio culturale.
column51:
Proscaenia® è la prima piattaforma italiana di streaming interamente dedicata al teatro.
Il nostro obiettivo è democratizzare l’accesso al teatro, rendendolo disponibile a chiunque, ovunque, e preservando al contempo il patrimonio culturale teatrale italiano. Proscaenia si posiziona come un ponte tra il mondo tradizionale del teatro e le nuove tecnologie, offrendo un’esperienza innovativa e accessibile a un pubblico più ampio.

Ecco cosa facciamo in dettaglio:

Diffusione di contenuti teatrali tramite streaming:
Proscaenia consente agli utenti di accedere a spettacoli teatrali attraverso un abbonamento mensile o annuale. La piattaforma ospita una varietà di contenuti, dai classici del teatro italiano alle nuove produzioni contemporanee, garantendo qualità audio-video e accesso in alta definizione.

Tecnologia per un’esperienza personalizzata:
Utilizziamo algoritmi di intelligenza artificiale per analizzare i gusti e le preferenze degli utenti, offrendo raccomandazioni personalizzate per coinvolgere maggiormente gli spettatori. La piattaforma è costruita su infrastrutture cloud scalabili che garantiscono una distribuzione sicura e senza interruzioni.

Valorizzazione del patrimonio culturale teatrale:
Proscaenia non si limita a digitalizzare gli spettacoli, ma si impegna a conservare e promuovere il teatro come forma d’arte. Collaboriamo con teatri, compagnie teatrali e artisti per offrire una seconda vita agli spettacoli che altrimenti verrebbero dimenticati dopo la rappresentazione dal vivo.

Impatto sociale e inclusività:
Democratizziamo l’accesso al teatro per tutte le fasce della popolazione, incluse quelle che, per motivi geografici, economici o fisici, non possono partecipare a spettacoli dal vivo. Abbiamo sviluppato iniziative per portare il teatro in scuole, RSA e carceri, promuovendo l’inclusione e l’educazione culturale.

Monetizzazione per artisti e teatri:
Offriamo alle compagnie teatrali un modello di revenue sharing trasparente, creando nuove opportunità di monetizzazione. Gli artisti ricevono una percentuale dei ricavi generati dalla piattaforma, favorendo la sostenibilità economica del settore.

Espansione internazionale:
Proscaenia si prepara ad espandere il suo pubblico oltre i confini italiani, partendo dal mercato francese. Con oltre 6 milioni di italiani residenti all’estero, il teatro può diventare un veicolo di connessione culturale globale.
column55: Appassionati di teatro - Possono accedere a spettacoli esclusivi ovunque, senza limitazioni geografiche o economiche, con un catalogo sempre aggiornato, Aziende (B2B - Welfare Culturale) - Possono integrare Proscaenia nei pacchetti welfare aziendale, offrendo un benefit culturale ai dipendenti, Italiani all’estero - Offriamo un legame con la cultura teatrale italiana, che spesso non è disponibile nei paesi di residenza, Persone con difficoltà di accesso al teatro - Proscaenia elimina le barriere fisiche e logistiche, permettendo di vivere il teatro comodamente da casa, Scuole e istituzioni educative - Proscaenia è uno strumento didattico innovativo per avvicinare gli studenti al teatro e alla cultura, Teatri e artisti  - Monetizzano e distribuiscono i propri spettacoli a un pubblico più ampio, prolungando la vita commerciale delle opere
