Offriamo alle compagnie teatrali un modello di revenue sharing trasparente, creando nuove opportunità di monetizzazione. Gli artisti ricevono una percentuale dei ricavi generati dalla piattaforma, favorendo la sostenibilità economica del settore.

Espansione internazionale:
Proscaenia si prepara ad espandere il suo pubblico oltre i confini italiani, partendo dal mercato francese. Con oltre 6 milioni di italiani residenti all’estero, il teatro può diventare un veicolo di connessione culturale globale.
column55: Appassionati di teatro - Possono accedere a spettacoli esclusivi ovunque, senza limitazioni geografiche o economiche, con un catalogo sempre aggiornato, Aziende (B2B - Welfare Culturale) - Possono integrare Proscaenia nei pacchetti welfare aziendale, offrendo un benefit culturale ai dipendenti, Italiani all’estero - Offriamo un legame con la cultura teatrale italiana, che spesso non è disponibile nei paesi di residenza, Persone con difficoltà di accesso al teatro - Proscaenia elimina le barriere fisiche e logistiche, permettendo di vivere il teatro comodamente da casa, Scuole e istituzioni educative - Proscaenia è uno strumento didattico innovativo per avvicinare gli studenti al teatro e alla cultura, Teatri e artisti  - Monetizzano e distribuiscono i propri spettacoli a un pubblico più ampio, prolungando la vita commerciale delle opere

column30: Startup nel mondo del Pet Tourism: "Your trip with your pets, no stress!"
column42: Giulio Montoli, Edmondo Sparano, Giulia Fazzini, Edoardo Giorio, Giulio Maria Pezzini, Arunsankar Periyasami, Dario Baroni, Alessandro N. Ferretti, LVenture Group API Access
column50: Bauking si differenzia dagli altri per l'unicità e la novità assoluta della sua offerta (Pet + Travel)e per la sua forte e innovativa vision
column51:
Bauking ha la missione di abbattere le enormi barriere che tutti i Pet Parents incontrano nel portare in viaggio il proprio animale domestico. Oggi, viaggiare con il proprio Pet è davvero un calvario! Per mezzo di una piattaforma digitale proprietaria e innovativa Bauking metterà a disposizione dei bipedi e dei quadrupedi soluzioni di viaggio "pet oriented" e integrate, che puntino in primis a garantire la qualità, la sicurezza, e l'esperienza di viaggio degli animali e dei loro padroni. La soluzione offerta sarà completa, ad iniziare dal viaggio, grazie ad accordi B2B con le compagnie aeree, con navi, treni. e all'introduzione di soluzioni pet friendly ad oggi non presenti, proseguendo con le strutture ricettive che potranno offrire dalla nostra piattaforma un'importante quantità di servizi orientati a tutti gli animali domestici, ponendo attenzione a tutte le specificità e peculiarità possibili (a titolo di esempio razza, peso, presenza di allergie o intolleranze).
L'offerta di Bauking prevederà inoltre accordi con veterinari, compagnie assicurative, ristoranti, bar, impianti balneari, società di trasporto, taxi, e molto altro, con l'obiettivo di integrare e coprire ogni aspetto nell'universo del travel per i pet e diventare il primo Worldwide Pets Hub su scala mondiale, in un mercato, quello del Pet Tourism, che prevede una crescita stimata del 9,5% su base annua.
Particolare importanza viene data a tutti gli aspetti normativi e regolamentari necessari a permettere l'ingresso e il soggiorno dei Pets in paesi stranieri, per mezzo di sezioni nel sito che permettono il download di tutta la documentazione da produrre per portare il proprio animale all'estero.
Il piano industriale prevede una significativa crescita ed espansione geografica, dettata in primis dal modello stesso di Bauking, che vedrà un primo MVP/Pilot nel perimetro nazionale e delle principali mete europee, per poi espandersi su scala internazionale e con un outlook quinquennale verso i mercati UK e USA, sudamericani e, per finire, asiatici.
Bauking punterà molto alla raccolta e valorizzazione dei dati (big data nel mondo del Pet Tourism), e allo sviluppo di linee di revenues B2B2C.
Ad oggi, Bauking ha già concluso una prima importante fase di raccolta che permetterà alla startup di sviluppare il prodotto, la piattaforma, la strategia di marketing e il lancio del MVP in produzione.
column55: Cliente finale - Acquistare viaggi, soggiorno, servizi PET tramite la nostra Piattaforma, Compagnie aeree - Promuovere e vendere sulla piattaforma voli Pet friendly, Compagnie assicurative - Promuovere e vendere sulla piattaforma soluzioni assicurative Pet oriented a protezione dell'animale domestico in viaggio, Ristoranti e Bar - Promuovere e vendere sulla piattaforma menù Pet friendly, Società di prodotto per Pet - Pubblicizzare sulla piattaforma i propri prodotti e collocarli presso le strutture nel network di Bauking (B2B), Società di trasporto - Promuovere e vendere sulla piattaforma trasporti Pet friendly, Strutture Ricettive - Promuovere e vendere sulla piattaforma soggiorni Pet friendly, Veterinari - Promuovere e vendere sulla piattaforma servizi veterinari per viaggiatori

column42: Giulio Montoli, Edmondo Sparano, Giulia Fazzini, Edoardo Giorio, Giulio Maria Pezzini, Arunsankar Periyasami, Dario Baroni, Alessandro N. Ferretti, LVenture Group API Access
column50: Unlike Booking or Expedia, BetweenUs is a collaborative hotel network, enabling referral bookings, supplier deals, and seamless Channel Mana
column51:
BetweenUs is a B2B platform for hotels that allows them to redirect unavailable booking requests to partner hotels, access exclusive supplier deals, and utilize a marketplace for second-hand hospitality equipment.
BetweenUs provides hotels with a B2B ecosystem where they can:
1 Redirect unavailable bookings to trusted partner hotels, reducing lost revenue.
2 Access exclusive supplier deals to lower operational costs.
3 Trade second-hand equipment through a dedicated marketplace.

The platform integrates with Channel Managers and PMS, making it a seamless tool for hoteliers

column45:
Giulia Fazzini
Sono in pratica fornitori di strutture di legno e non da aggiungere ad agriturismi e strutture ricettive similari (per lo più in mezzo alla natura). Non diretti competitor di Friland perchè hanno un modello B2B, al momento attivi in 7 agriturismi e parlano di comodato d'uso (non ho info sul revenue model, rischio è pagamento one shot per la struttura e eventuale manutenzione a carico).
column50: Glamping innovativo: alloggi di design in comodato d’uso per agriturismi, con marketing integrato e upselling di esperienze autentiche.
column51: The SkyRoom è una startup che sta rivoluzionando il turismo rurale, trasformando gli agriturismi in destinazioni glamping di design. Il nostro modello si basa sull’erogazione in comodato d’uso di alloggi glamping unici, che permettono alle strutture ricettive di aumentare visibilità, prenotazioni e ricavi. Offriamo un pacchetto integrato: non solo forniamo alloggi di alta qualità, ma supportiamo anche la promozione dell’agriturismo con strategie di marketing avanzate, realizzazione di video promozionali, fotografia professionale e il coinvolgimento di influencer. In questo modo, valorizziamo il patrimonio rurale e creiamo esperienze autentiche, combinando tradizione, innovazione e design. Inoltre, il nostro approccio consente di incrementare le opportunità di upselling, grazie a servizi complementari come cene, degustazioni, tour ed esperienze locali, che arricchiscono ulteriormente il soggiorno degli ospiti. La nostra missione è quella di creare un ecosistema in cui ogni agriturismo possa prosperare, offrendo un’esperienza memorabile che si distingue nel panorama del turismo esperienziale. Con The SkyRoom, ogni soggiorno diventa un viaggio nel cuore dell’Italia e della Natura, dove comfort, estetica e autenticità si incontrano per offrire emozioni uniche.

column8: Hospitality, Internet of Things, Tourism, Sustainable Tourism, Smart Home, Green Energy, Property Management, Circular Economy
column30: Smart-Home Srl è una startup innovativa che gestisce proprietà turistiche
column42: Giulio Montoli, Edmondo Sparano, Giulia Fazzini, Edoardo Giorio, Giulio Maria Pezzini, Arunsankar Periyasami, Dario Baroni, Alessandro N. Ferretti, LVenture Group API Access
column50: We stand out by integrating smart tech, circular economy, and experiential tourism to enhance sustainability and lesser-known destinations.
column51:
Smart-Home Srl manages short-term rentals with home automation and self-check-in systems, transforming properties from costs into resources. We help owners optimize management with smart devices that reduce energy waste, improve efficiency, and increase profitability. We embrace a circular economy approach by restoring and repurposing existing furniture rather than purchasing new items, extending their lifecycle and reducing environmental impact.

Since 2024, we have also managed Glamping Verde Mare, a nature-immersed site combining experiential tourism and sustainability. We offer eco-friendly accommodations and activities that reconnect visitors with nature, while supporting the local economy by collaborating with producers such as beekeepers and craft breweries. Through our e-commerce platform, we promote these local specialties. The glamping site is located in an area that preserves World War II remains, which we aim to enhance through 3D reconstructions, interactive installations, and educational trails to share history innovatively.

Looking ahead, we plan to develop immersive experiences using augmented reality, leveraging Meta glasses for regenerative and sensory tourism. Visitors will explore local flora and fauna interactively, receiving real-time visual and auditory information. We are also designing digital treasure hunt trails, combining outdoor adventure, storytelling, and educational insights about the area.

Inclusivity is at the core of our vision: we want to make these experiences accessible to the deaf community by engaging LIS (Italian Sign Language) guides for dedicated tours. This will enable truly inclusive tourism, embracing diversity and ensuring every visitor can fully experience and appreciate the region.

New Sustainability Initiatives
At Glamping Verde Mare, we have already installed dry toilets, an eco-friendly solution to minimize environmental impact. Our next step is launching a feasibility study on human waste recovery, converting it into compost to nourish a dedicated biodiversity area. This space will be enriched with flowers for solitary bees, vital pollinators that do not produce honey but play a crucial role in ecosystems. To support these species, we will install solitary bee houses, reinforcing our commitment to circular economy principles and sustainable tourism.

column51: Fill the Galley is a innovative digital platform designed to revolutionize the way sailors and boaters prepare for their vacations. By offering a seamless, collaborative, and eco-friendly provisioning experience, Fill the Galley addresses the pain points of time-consuming shopping, logistical challenges, and lack of customization that travelers face when stocking their boats for a trip. The app allows users to plan, order, and deliver all their provisions online, with groceries and supplies delivered directly to the dock, ready to be loaded onto the boat.

column50: CARE gives the chance to measure the wellness performance, involving people in taking care of themselves in a smart, and shared, way.
column51:
CARE operates in the Sport-Tech sector with the possibility of "touching" it in different ways: product, app and IT platform, service, advertising, AI.

CARE is the starting point for creating different realities related to physical fitness, each capable of evolving and completing itself independently. Basically, CARE offers a sports equipment sharing service to allow users to carry out physical activity where today the majority of sportspeople prefer to do so.

To use the words of those who knew us and helped us build a precise identity, tying it primarily to the world of fitness / wellness, with CARE we dematerialize the concept of gym...

"To place out there", in public and private places, a box capable of opening up to offer what we are looking for. Not just sports equipment and - why not? - equipment in general, but an opportunity. Yes, an opportunity. To ours eyes, your box is first and foremost a tool capable of creating the right circumstances so that people can keep a promise made to themselves: keep fit, finally build this or that, experience an experience, get out of isolation and go back outdoors ... "

The tool designed and built to offer this service is a Smart Locker (like an Amazon Locker ... but cooler) with smart and secure access, a security control system managed with AI (and with the possibility of being integrated with other systems such as RFID portals) that allows you to always have the precise situation of the content of the box and the development of an APP that is useful to the user both for geo-referencing and finding a box, as well as for evaluating their training and being "hired "With gamification dynamics related to VR.

Finally, in order to increase the level of customer engagement and increase the possibility of making the project much more than sustainable, we have inserted LED screens managed with AI to manage the entire sphere of Display Advertising and Addressable Advertising. The same screens can obviously be used for video tutorials in preparation for using the contents of the box.

A simple idea, which, however, we immediately decided to connote technologically in an important way, primarily by building a young but highly competent team in the IOT and Deep Learning / Machine Learning fields. We have a patent on it!

CARE operates in the Sport-Tech sector with the possibility of "touching" it in different ways: product, app and IT platform, service, advertising, AI.

CARE is the starting point for creating different realities related to physical fitness, each capable of evolving and completing itself independently. Basically, CARE offers a sports equipment sharing service to allow users to carry out physical activity where today the majority of sportspeople prefer to do so.

To use the words of those who knew us and helped us build a precise identity, tying it primarily to the world of fitness / wellness, with CARE we dematerialize the concept of gym...

"To place out there", in public and private places, a box capable of opening up to offer what we are looking for. Not just sports equipment and - why not? - equipment in general, but an opportunity. Yes, an opportunity. To ours eyes, your box is first and foremost a tool capable of creating the right circumstances so that people can keep a promise made to themselves: keep fit, finally build this or that, experience an experience, get out of isolation and go back outdoors ... "

The tool designed and built to offer this service is a Smart Locker (like an Amazon Locker ... but cooler) with smart and secure access, a security control system managed with AI (and with the possibility of being integrated with other systems such as RFID portals) that allows you to always have the precise situation of the content of the box and the development of an APP that is useful to the user both for geo-referencing and finding a box, as well as for evaluating their training and being "hired "With gamification dynamics related to VR.

Finally, in order to increase the level of customer engagement and increase the possibility of making the project much more than sustainable, we have inserted LED screens managed with AI to manage the entire sphere of Display Advertising and Addressable Advertising. The same screens can obviously be used for video tutorials in preparation for using the contents of the box.

A simple idea, which, however, we immediately decided to connote technologically in an important way, primarily by building a young but highly competent team in the IOT and Deep Learning / Machine Learning fields. We have a patent on it!

column30: A real estate fund startup focused on tourism and residential properties
column42: Giulio Montoli, Edmondo Sparano, Giulia Fazzini, Edoardo Giorio, Giulio Maria Pezzini, Arunsankar Periyasami, Dario Baroni, Alessandro N. Ferretti, LVenture Group API Access
column50: GreenNest combines AI, crowdfunding, strategic management, and sustainable financing to create an innovative and scalable real estate model.
column51:
GreenNest is a real estate startup focused on acquiring, managing, enhancing, and reselling properties, primarily in the tourism and residential sectors. Its innovative approach combines artificial intelligence (AI) for strategic asset selection and real estate crowdfunding to enhance liquidity and attract a broader range of investors. Both AI-driven analysis and crowdfunding operations will be supported by external specialized firms to ensure efficiency and scalability.

GreenNest is built on three core pillars: innovation, economic sustainability, and sustainable financing. Innovation plays a key role, leveraging AI to identify the best investment opportunities. This cherry-picking strategy, enhanced by external consulting firms, ensures a data-driven and strategic asset selection. Crowdfunding further strengthens this vision, making capital raising easier and increasing accessibility for a wider investor base.

To ensure economic sustainability, GreenNest focuses on active portfolio management, maximizing asset value through strategic interventions, sustainable innovations, and continuous optimization. A well-balanced approach to property selection and management creates a profitable and resilient portfolio.

Sustainable financing is another key element. GreenNest relies on a mix of grants and bank loans, balancing funding without generating excessive debt while maintaining financial flexibility. Grants offer capital without financial burdens, while loans ensure liquidity for project execution.

A highly skilled multidisciplinary team drives this vision. Daniele Tentella, Head of Technology & Innovation, leads the digital transformation, focusing on web development and tech implementation. Edoardo Secci, Technical Lead & Portfolio Manager, manages operational and technical aspects of asset valuation, leveraging his experience in real estate consulting. Biagio Vigorito, Legal & Compliance Officer, ensures legal oversight and regulatory compliance, bringing expertise in real estate and financial law. Livia Fasolino, Financial and Strategic Officer, oversees financial planning, business scalability, and project strategy, drawing from her background in urban regeneration and project management.

By combining technology, financial innovation, and sustainability, GreenNest is shaping a scalable, future-proof real estate model, redefining investment opportunities in the sector.

column30: Helpy Travel: digital concierge and one-stop portal for travel services.
column42: Giulio Montoli, Edmondo Sparano, Giulia Fazzini, Edoardo Giorio, Giulio Maria Pezzini, Arunsankar Periyasami, Dario Baroni, Alessandro N. Ferretti, LVenture Group API Access
column50: Helpy Travel turns short-term rentals into profit hubs with a digital concierge, boosting guest experience and host revenue in minutes.
column51:
Helpy Travel is a SaaS platform designed to revolutionize the short-term rental industry through a digital concierge system. Our goal is to enhance the guest experience while providing vacation rental owners with new monetization opportunities, transforming every stay into a personalized and hassle-free experience.

Our solution allows property owners to create a digital concierge in less than five minutes, accessible via QR code or a personalized link. Guests can access all essential information about their accommodation in a single interface, such as check-in and check-out details, house rules, and Wi-Fi connection. Additionally, the digital concierge offers a wide range of local activities and extra services, enabling tourists to enjoy an authentic and tailored experience.

One of Helpy Travel’s most innovative aspects is the opportunity for property owners to further monetize their guests’ stay. Through the platform, hosts can promote and sell extra services, such as private transfers, guided tours, gastronomic experiences, and more. This not only increases the average customer value but also encourages positive reviews and smoother interaction with guests, reducing repetitive questions and improving time management.

Helpy Travel's business model is based on a SaaS subscription system, complemented by a commission structure on transactions made through the platform. In the future, we plan to implement additional features, including an AI-powered chatbot, advanced analytics tools, a mobile app, and integration with major channel managers for property management.

Helpy Travel is more than just a platform; it is an ecosystem that connects tourists, hosts, and local businesses, creating a virtuous cycle where everyone benefits. Our mission is to transform the hospitality industry, making it more efficient, accessible, and profitable for all its key players.

column42: Giulio Montoli, Edmondo Sparano, Giulia Fazzini, Edoardo Giorio, Giulio Maria Pezzini, Arunsankar Periyasami, Dario Baroni, Alessandro N. Ferretti, LVenture Group API Access

column50: We're a new startup with long-lasting experience in tourism digitalization. We collect and share hyperlocal tourism data.
column51:
We are a digital tourism-focused company committed to helping small and medium-sized inland destinations enhance their tourism revenue in a sustainable way.

We have developed "Entourance", a web platform that gathers all types of digital content from various local stakeholders and distributes this information across multiple promotional platforms. These range from individual business websites, through municipal and regional portals, all the way to the national tourism catalogue Italia.it.

Our platform digitalizes accommodations, restaurants, experiences, points of interest, itineraries, events, and promotional articles. This process is accessible through a user-friendly wizard for those who struggle with technology, as well as through mass import tools for complex databases.

We currently have three applications in various stages of development:

Public Administration:
We have already sold 38 installations for public administration use. We are also in the process of contracting with the Marche Region to develop 10 new DMOs (Destination Management Organizations). Our most prominent public installation supported Pesaro as Italy’s Capital of Culture in 2024, successfully managing thousands of experience bookings over two years.

Museums and Local Information Offices:
This application was developed with the support of Invitalia’s co-financing. We have created three solutions for this purpose and are currently testing them for the 2025 tourist season.

Incoming Tour Operators:
This version is designed to help tour operators engage with their customers before and during their stay, by sharing hyperlocal information and enabling personalized experiences. We’ve invested €40,000 to test it during this season with a well-known Italian tour operator, who will distribute the app to their clients and collect valuable data to improve its functionality.

Destinazioni Digitali created the "Entourance" software suite to enter the incoming tourism market by collecting hyperlocal content and distributing it across all promotional channels.

Our ultimate goal is to become the primary data hub for this type of tourism information across all underdeveloped areas in Italy and Europe.

column50: Quiroom's main strength is its win-win solution: travelers save up to 40%, while hotels boost revenues on unsold rooms.
column51:
Quiroom is an online booking platform (OTA) that allows hotels to sell their unsold rooms ultra last-minute to travelers, who can book up to 7 days before check-in and save up to 40%.

Quiroom helps hotels increase their occupancy and revenues, while enabling travelers to save money.

Quiroom’s mission is to make travel more affordable while helping hotels maximize their occupancy and revenues.

column50: Built for the next generation of entrepreneurs, we empower anyone with a passion for travel to earn flexible income booking trips.
column51:
Place2Be modernizes the traditional agency model, bringing a new generation of entrepreneurs into the industry by defining new ways of creating and distributing a tourism product.

Place2Be takes an industry built around cruises, standard travel packages, and fax machines and brings it into the modern era of digitization and the sharing economy. 

A restyling for an emerging generation of people and entrepreneurs who want to sell travel as a side business or as a full-time career.  

We have re-examined all aspects of the traditional agency model, creating a robust platform that allows individuals to flexibly make money selling travel and creating travel, while leveraging best-in-class tools and new ways of interpreting travel in all its essence.

Our mission is to enable passionate travelers, freelancers, professional creators and independent workers to earn and reap the benefits of this world while simultaneously being part of a unique community.

Exclusive residences and unique experiences carefully selected and lived by our travel designers that will be your guarantee of quality for a memorable trip.

Be inspired by the stories of those who have already had a unique experience, and share your own to inspire others to travel based on your travel style and preferences.

We can create your trip from scratch or help you book what you have already decided, and anything that will make your vacation a memorable experience.

Travel is driven by taste, desire, and specific needs that can only be met by someone who has the same interests as you and who has already had a travel experience in that specific destination, knowing how to perfectly point you to your place to be.
Your new travel companion who will be able to craft your perfect itinerary as a friend who have actually been there.

column30: Italian private chefs at home for authentic culinary experiences.
column42: Giulio Montoli, Edmondo Sparano, Giulia Fazzini, Edoardo Giorio, Giulio Maria Pezzini, Arunsankar Periyasami, Dario Baroni, Alessandro N. Ferretti, LVenture Group API Access
column50: Italy on Demand offers authentic Italian home dining, blending affordability, speed, and quality, bridging the gap between delivery and priv
column51:
Italy on Demand: Revolutionizing Home Dining with Authentic Italian Cuisine  

Italy on Demand is an innovative startup that bridges the gap between traditional food delivery and exclusive private chefs by offering high-quality, on-demand Italian culinary experiences at home. Our mission is to make authentic Italian cuisine accessible to everyone—from students and professionals to families and corporate clients—through a fast, engaging, and affordable service.  

What We Offer  

1. Private Chef Services  
   - Customers can book a young Italian chef to prepare a fresh, home-cooked meal in their kitchen.  
   - The experience is designed to be interactive and engaging, where clients can learn about Italian cuisine, ask questions, and enjoy an authentic dining experience.  
   - Unlike traditional private chefs, we offer a fast, accessible, and informal approach that suits all occasions.  

2. Catering & Corporate Events  
   - We provide customized catering solutions for private parties, corporate gatherings, and luxury hotel partnerships.  
   - Our chefs curate tailor-made Italian menus, ensuring an elegant and high-quality gastronomic experience.  
   - From small group dinners to large-scale corporate events, we bring the flavors of Italy to any setting.  

3. Mini MasterChef Experience  
   - A fun and interactive cooking competition for students, corporate teams, and private events.  
   - Participants engage in a hands-on culinary challenge, judged by our chefs and sometimes featuring a professional guest chef.  
   - This is a social, team-building activity that offers a unique alternative to traditional dining.  

4. Cooking Classes  
   - Our chefs host interactive Italian cooking workshops, teaching participants how to prepare fresh pasta, traditional sauces, and regional dishes.  
   - These classes take place in student accommodations, private homes, or corporate spaces, making learning to cook Italian food both fun and accessible.  

5. AI-Powered Grocery & Meal Planning Assistant (Coming Soon)  
   - Italy on Demand is integrating AI technology to help users plan their meals efficiently.  
   - The assistant will suggest recipes based on available ingredients, budget, and supermarket prices, making grocery shopping more organized and cost-effective.  

 Our Competitive Edge  

- More than just food delivery: Unlike services like UberEats or Deliveroo, we provide freshly prepared, home-cooked meals right in the customer’s kitchen.
column55: CRM & Loyalty Programs - Engaging customers through personalized offers, exclusive events, and AI-driven meal planning., Cooking Experiences & Mini MasterChef  - Interactive team-building, social events, and student engagement activities., Event Catering - Companies, student groups, and private clients use our catering for gatherings and corporate events., Luxury Hospitality -  Premium chef services for high-net-worth individuals, hotels, and luxury apartments., Marketing & Brand Activations - Collaborations with residences, universities, and businesses for promotional campaigns., Private Dining & Home Meals  - Customers book chefs for fresh, high-quality Italian meals at home.

column50: Highly accurate marine weather forecasts using a proprietary algorithm and an AI chatbot that offers personalized sea and tourism advice.
column51:
Mnsimu Srls aims to revolutionize the Italian seaside tourism sector through the PuntoMare platform.

In a context where digital tourism is rapidly expanding and travelers are increasingly seeking personalized and instant experiences, PuntoMare emerges as a cutting-edge solution that redefines the way tourists experience seaside vacations.

The platform effectively addresses common challenges faced by tourists, such as the unpredictability of marine conditions and the lack of detailed information on local services. Thanks to a proprietary marine weather forecasting algorithm, based on geospatial and meteorological data, PuntoMare offers ultra-local predictions for each beach, enabling visitors to better plan their days.
The nature of the algorithm allows it to be filed as a process patent.

Additionally, the integration of an AI Agent, called "Punto", provides personalized assistance, answering questions and offering recommendations like a local tour guide.

PuntoMare stands out from competitors due to its unique combination of advanced technologies and strategic focus: while existing platforms primarily focus on customer acquisition before arrival (destination marketing), PuntoMare focuses on proximity marketing and post-arrival engagement, offering added value to both tourists and local operators.

The business model includes both a B2C component, represented by a transaction fee on bookings made for beach resorts, rentals, experiences, and restaurants (through partnerships with Spiagge.it, Viator, Musement, Manet and Quandoo), and a B2B component, based on the sale of advertising space and data.

Collaboration with prominent organizations such as the National Confederation of Crafts and Small and Medium Enterprises (CNA) and Plastic Free Odv Onlus strengthens the company's territorial presence and commitment to environmental sustainability.

Mnsimu Srls' short-term vision is focused on consolidating its presence in the national market, with the goal of significantly expanding its user base. By integrating new technological features, implementing additional affiliation programs, and strategically involving tourist ports as promotional entities, the company aims to reach a Technology Readiness Level (TRL) of 9 within the next 12 months.

The multidisciplinary team is one of the key pillars of Mnsimu Srls' success. Professionals with complementary expertise in technology, business, and finance work synergistically to achieve the company's mission.

column50: Kosmo is designed for Hotels and replies as a human, performing actions and handling guests communication on multiple platforms.
column51:
AI Kosmo has developed an AI Agent — Kosmo — designed for hotels. Kosmo drastically reduces the time hotel staff spend on guest communications and increases conversion rates by providing users with immediate and accurate responses to their inquiries in any language. Kosmo is multi-platform, meaning that it can reply to guest inquiries on multiple interfaces. Interfaces include, but are not limited to, an Intelligent Chatbot, a WhatsApp Bot, Email Automation, and a Voice Assistant.

The Intelligent Chatbot integrates with the hotel's website to assist users in finding the right information at the right time. It can perform actions such as checking room availability using a conversational approach or redirecting the user to the right website page based on the discussed topics. The WhatsApp Bot functions similarly to the Intelligent Chatbot but connects to the hotel's WhatsApp Business account. The Email Automation allows hotels to automate responses to emails, one of the main channels where they receive inbound requests. Finally, the Voice Assistant can speak in the Intelligent Chatbot and is also linked to the hotel's phone line, handling calls on behalf of the hotel staff.

The Intelligent Chatbot, together with a solution to handle inquiries while guests are in the hotel, is fully functional and sold to customers. The Voice Assistant and the WhatsApp Bot are ready and will be deployed this month. The Email Automation will be ready by the end of Q1.
column55: Hotels - AI Digital Concierge

column8: AI (Artificial Intelligence), Travel Planning, Generative AI
column30: Your AI travel companion: from dream to journey in 1 minute
column42: Giulio Montoli, Edmondo Sparano, Giulia Fazzini, Edoardo Giorio, Giulio Maria Pezzini, Arunsankar Periyasami, Dario Baroni, Alessandro N. Ferretti, LVenture Group API Access
column50: viaggIA combines generative AI and data analytics to deliver dynamic itineraries, monetize B2B insights, and redefine travel-tech.
column51:
viaggIA is revolutionizing the travel industry through generative artificial intelligence, transforming a traditionally complex 53-hour planning process into a seamless one-minute experience.
At its core, a sophisticated AI system analyzes individual preferences, interests, and budgets to craft tailored itineraries. Rather than simply suggesting destinations, the platform builds comprehensive travel experiences, seamlessly integrating cultural attractions, local activities, accommodations, and transportation into a coherent journey.
For individual travelers, the intuitive interface enables easy exploration and customization of itineraries. Strategic partnerships with key tourism operators allow direct booking of flights, accommodations, and activities through a single platform, eliminating the fragmentation typical of travel planning.
The B2B dimension sets viaggIA apart in the market. Tour operators and travel agencies gain access to valuable user data and travel trends through our advanced analytics platform. This data enrichment system provides insights into traveler preferences, booking patterns, and emerging destinations, enabling partners to optimize their offerings and marketing strategies. Travel professionals can utilize our AI system to enhance their services, reduce operational costs, and provide more personalized recommendations to their clients.
The platform's machine learning capabilities continuously improve its recommendations based on user interactions, ensuring increasingly accurate and personalized suggestions for both individual travelers and business partners. Comprehensive destination information, including AI-generated practical tips, historical weather data, and cultural insights, enriches the travel planning experience.
While the basic version offers essential features at no cost, the premium subscription unlocks advanced capabilities including unlimited itinerary generation, exclusive offers, and offline access through downloadable PDF itineraries. For business partners, customized subscription models provide access to analytics, API integration, and white-label solutions.
viaggIA represents the convergence of advanced technology, personalization, and sustainability in travel planning. It serves both as an intelligent companion for individual travelers and a powerful tool for travel industry professionals, creating a comprehensive ecosystem that benefits all stakeholders in the tourism sector.

column50: MOBILITA E LOGISTICA SRL: Eco-friendly last-mile logistics, expert tech support, and a green solution for vehicle and battery regeneration!
column51: is a limited liability company (SRL) that embodies our expertise in micromobility within the urban context of Rome, established in January 2023. Since 2021, we have developed our experience, currently operating from two locations: Via del Gesù No. 91 (historic city center) and Via Filippi No. 57 (S. Paolo - Ostiense area). The SRL was formed after a period of acceleration at the Peekaboo incubator, where the idea, born from an insight, took shape, defining the business model and launching it in the smart mobility market. We position ourselves as the "home doctor" for electric bicycles, leading to our main project and technical brand, “Doctorbike Italia”. We also provide last-mile logistics solutions through the use of eco-sustainable means, such as cargo bikes. Our commitment extends to regenerating vehicles and batteries that would otherwise be destined for disposal, thereby minimizing environmental impact as much as possible. By adopting these environmentally friendly practices, we aim to enhance urban mobility while contributing to sustainability efforts. Our solutions not only offer efficient logistics options but also promote a circular economy by reducing waste and prolonging the life cycle of both equipment and resources. This aligns with our vision of creating a greener and more sustainable urban environment.

column42: Giulio Montoli, Edmondo Sparano, Giulia Fazzini, Edoardo Giorio, Giulio Maria Pezzini, Arunsankar Periyasami, Dario Baroni, Alessandro N. Ferretti, LVenture Group API Access

column50:
- Modalità di visualizzazione swipe
- Capillarità e coinvolgimento anche dei piccoli comuni
- Traduzione automatica dei testi
column51:
Laivop è un’App dedicata al mondo della cultura e del turismo, un aggregatore di informazioni che migliora la promozione dell’offerta culturale in modo tempestivo, innovativo ed efficace, ed è il miglior alleato di tutti i promotori culturali, anche grazie al sistema di intelligenza artificiale di traduzione automatica dei testi.
Laivop combina un algoritmo proprietario, la tecnologia della geolocalizzazione e una innovativa modalità di visualizzazione dei contenuti per favorire e migliorare il processo di fruizione e valorizzazione dell’immenso patrimonio artistico e culturale presente su tutto il territorio nazionale e, in un momento successivo, anche quello internazionale.
Laivop è immediata e user flriendly anche in virtù della modalità di visualizzazione dei contenuti scelta che la rende unica nel suo genere; infatti, attraverso lo “swipe”, movimento effettuato strisciando il dito sullo schermo dello smartphone, gli utenti scopriranno, uno dopo l’altro, gli eventi (spettacoli, concerti, mostre, incontri, sagre e feste patronali) e i luoghi di interesse intorno a sè.
Indicazioni stradali, condivisione con i propri contatti, notifiche e calendario sono alcune delle funzioni già presenti sull’App.
Laivop non si limita a mostrare gli eventi culturali e i luoghi di interesse solo delle grandi città o delle mete turistiche più conosciute, come si limitano a fare le poche altre alternative sul mercato, ma punta soprattutto a render noti tutti gli innumerevoli eventi culturali e i luoghi di interesse dei Comuni più piccoli e delle località più nascoste che il più delle volte restano sconosciuti.
In Italia ci sono circa 7.900 Comuni e ormai quasi tutte le Amministrazioni Comunali si dotano di assessorati con deleghe specifiche alla cultura, al turismo e al marketing territoriale, ognuno dei quali con budget dedicato.
Laivop è il primo e unico progetto “privato” pensato su scala nazionale per rispondere specificatamente alle loro necessità e, in considerazione del modesto valore dei contratti (contratti triennali a 0,15 centesimi all’anno per abitante, con un minimo di 2.500 euro annui), consente l’affidamento diretto.
column55: Amministrazioni comunali - Promotori culturali privati (teatri, musei ecc,) - Comunicazione, marketing territoriale e ampliamento utenti

column50: Instant eSIM activation, no roaming fees, 150+ countries, eco-friendly, multi-destination plans, and a seamless digital experience.
column51:
eSIMTravel is a digital-first platform that provides travelers with instant, hassle-free, and cost-effective eSIM solutions in over 150 countries. Our mission is to revolutionize international connectivity by eliminating the need for physical SIM cards, reducing roaming costs, and ensuring seamless mobile data access for travelers worldwide.

With eSIMTravel, users can purchase, activate, and manage their eSIMs entirely online in just a few minutes. Our process is simple:
	1.	Choose a plan based on destination and data needs.
	2.	Receive a QR code instantly via email.
	3.	Scan and activate the eSIM within minutes.

This eliminates the inconvenience of searching for local SIM cards, dealing with language barriers, or paying excessive roaming fees. Whether you’re a tourist, digital nomad, or business traveler, eSIMTravel offers flexible data plans tailored to different needs—ranging from short-term travel packages to long-term regional solutions.

Key Features & Benefits:

? Instant Activation – No waiting, no physical SIM, no contracts.
? Affordable Plans – Competitive pricing without roaming fees.
? Reliable High-Speed Data – 4G/5G coverage in 100+ countries.
? Multi-Destination Connectivity – One eSIM works across multiple countries.
? Eco-Friendly & Digital – No plastic, no waste, fully online experience.

Our platform is designed to be user-friendly, allowing customers to track data usage, top up, and switch between plans effortlessly. We continuously expand our coverage and partnerships with top-tier carriers to provide the best connectivity experience worldwide.

With the rise of remote work, global mobility, and digital nomadism, eSIMTravel is at the forefront of the travel-tech revolution, offering a smarter, more convenient way to stay connected while traveling.

column50: Change2 makes sustainability profitable: our AI cuts food costs while measuring & reducing environmental impact—effortless & scalable.
column51:
Food production and consumption account for one-third of global emissions, yet the hospitality industry lacks an automated, scalable solution to accurately measure and communicate the environmental impact of its offerings. At Change2, we uniquely bridge this gap by integrating sustainable management of food inventories and recipes with cost efficiency. Our platform not only quantifies environmental impacts but also actively reduces food waste and cuts overall food costs.

By automating the management of food inventories and optimizing recipes, our solution enables hospitality businesses to minimize excess, reduce spoilage, and streamline purchasing processes. This directly translates into lower operational costs while significantly enhancing sustainability metrics. In doing so, we provide a dual benefit: supporting environmental goals and delivering tangible financial savings.

In a market where many solutions address either sustainability or cost reduction separately, we stand apart as the only company linking these two critical aspects. This integrated approach offers our clients a competitive edge, empowering them to achieve robust sustainability targets while simultaneously improving their bottom line.

column50: The strong focus on the individual personality of a traveler joining a group trips, the possibility to customize trips according to budget.
column51:
Through an engaging interactive questionnaire, participants are drawn to the platform and prompted to provide details about their travel preferences, desired period and destinations, and information about preferred travel style. Some additional psycho-attitudinal profiling questions help to better understand the individual's personality, behaviors, values and interests. Using advanced algorithms, we propose three travel options to the traveler, sorted by affinity with the rest of the group.
We then group participants based on questionnaire responses and psycho-attitudinal profiling, creating cohesive and compatible travel groups that buy customizable travel packages from selected tour operators. With a strong focus on acting as creating groups of solo travelers who want to join the same festival or big event, we also provide the possibility to choose cultural weeks in Italy, sport weeks in Europe and backpackers trips around the world.

column50: All the tools that help companies with hybrid work are employee centered, Wodzi is the first platform that has a company centered approach.
column51:
Wodzi is a SaaS platform designed to help companies efficiently manage hybrid work by optimizing office attendance and space utilization. Using advanced algorithms tailored to each company’s needs, Wodzi schedules in-office days to maximize collaboration and productivity while maintaining employee flexibility. This centralized approach allows businesses to better manage their resources, reduce costs, and ensure a balanced, effective hybrid work environment.

Wodzi solves the challenges of managing hybrid work by addressing inefficient office attendance, poor space utilization, and the struggle to balance company needs with employee flexibility. Companies often face underused or overcrowded offices, difficulty fostering collaboration, and maintaining productivity in a hybrid environment. Wodzi's intelligent scheduling optimizes office presence, enhances collaboration, and streamlines space management, turning hybrid work into a strategic advantage rather than a logistical burden.

column51: Motonide is a peer-to-peer marketplace designed for motorcycle enthusiasts, facilitating short-term rentals between private motorcyclists in Italy. By leveraging the shared passion of riders, Motonide creates a decentralized system that promotes a more sustainable, cost-effective alternative to motorcycle ownership. Whether you're looking for a weekend adventure or simply want to experience a different ride, Motonide connects like-minded riders while maximizing the use of existing motorcycles.

column50: Cartesian uniquely enhances user engagement with interactive AI-driven cards, transforming customer care, education, and content creation.
column51:
At Cartesian, we offer a sophisticated platform designed to create and share interactive cards enhanced with artificial intelligence. Our tool allows users to personalize these cards with a variety of elements such as voice and text assistants, documents, quizzes, podcasts, and much more. 

Our primary audience includes a diverse group of users who seek to enhance their communication and engagement strategies. We cater to businesses and startups looking for smart customer care solutions. These organizations can leverage our platform to provide interactive and informative customer support experiences that enhance user satisfaction and retention.

In the educational sector, we support schools and educators seeking innovative tools for teaching. Our interactive cards facilitate dynamic learning experiences, making complex subjects easier to understand while engaging students in a more meaningful way.

Content creators, including marketers and digital influencers, utilize Cartesian to captivate their audience through interactive storytelling. By enriching their content with AI-driven features, these creators can significantly boost engagement and reach, ensuring their messaging resonates effectively.

Cultural institutions such as museums, libraries, and cultural centers also benefit from our platform. We help them innovate content delivery, transforming traditional exhibits and resources into engaging, interactive experiences that attract and retain visitors.

With Cartesian, we empower users from various fields to communicate, educate, and engage innovatively and effectively. Through our intuitive platform, we make it easy to share interactive cards via links, social media, or QR codes, enhancing experiences ranging from training courses to guided tours and customer interactions. This approach not only simplifies content creation but also fosters collaboration among teams, allowing for structured project management and document organization.

In essence, Cartesian serves as a bridge between technology and creativity, enabling individuals and organizations to harness the potential of artificial intelligence in their communication efforts, thus driving engagement and fostering deeper connections within their respective audiences.

Our platform connects travelers with local fishermen, creating unique fishing experiences while helping local fishermen offset their equipment costs. 
By providing a seamless, secure, and insured connection, we bridge the gap between enthusiastic travelers looking to fish and resourceful local fishermen with the necessary knowledge, boats, and equipment. Our platform not only facilitates memorable experiences but also supports local economies and promotes sustainable practices.

column50: We connects travelers with culture keepers for truly authentic experiences, preserving heritage through people who live in these territories
column51:
Hearth S.r.l. is an innovative startup dedicated to preserving and promoting authentic and lesser-known cultural heritage. By leveraging a global network of photographers, scalable technology, and a sustainable approach, Hearth creates high-quality visual and storytelling content. This content supports destinations, tourism operators, and stakeholders in uncovering and sharing the “invisible heritage” of territories, transforming them into authentic and sustainable tourist experiences.

We believe in the transformative power of storytelling and the significance of hands-on experiences with local artisans to convey the authentic spirit of a place. By carefully curating experiences that not only entertain but also educate, we aim to highlight the value of these cultural treasures and ensure their survival for future generations.

Hearth leverages digital platforms, utilizing compelling photos and videos to bring the narratives of endangered cultures to the forefront, inspiring travelers and fostering a deeper understanding of the importance of cultural preservation. Additionally, we partner with accommodation facilities and tour operators on a revenue-sharing basis, supporting our mission while contributing to the local economies of the communities we feature.

Our vision is to create a world where travel is a means of cultural preservation, empowering travelers to make a positive impact on the global heritage they explore. Through Hearth, we invite adventurers to be part of a movement that not only cherishes but actively protects the diversity and richness of the world's cultures.

column45:
Giulia Fazzini

column50: Empowering human relations to foster collaboration between tourism businesses, enabling them to promote each other's offerings.
column51:
In Walltips we are creating a collaborative ecosystem where local tourism operators and businesses work together to promote and sell activities. 

Instead of relying solely on high-commission marketplaces or traditional advertising, and by providing last generation, personalizable Web Apps for free, Walltips turns local businesses like hotels, restaurants, and institutional infopoints into huge promotional hubs for selling experiences, services, products and events. 

This creates a viral, interconnected network that organically drives exposure and sales for tourism services, without the heavy fees associated with other platforms.

Walltips’ freemium model allows businesses to access and use the platform at no cost, with an option to upgrade to premium services for reduced commissions.
Unlike existing marketplaces that function as intermediaries, Walltips empowers local businesses like hotels, restaurants, and tourism offices to act as promoters of experiences for nearby vendors. 
This creates a unique network effect where businesses support each other, driving higher engagement and mutual benefits. 

This approach contrasts with platforms like Airbnb Experiences or Viator, which don't foster local collaboration or partnerships.

We genuinely focus on hyper-local tourism, allowing vendors to directly target travelers in real-time through QR codes, notifications, and personalized recommendations. This localized marketing approach ensures more meaningful interactions and conversion rates for businesses, compared to generalist, global travel platforms.

Through the platform’s viral invite system, users are encouraged to promote each other’s services, creating organic, sustainable growth. This self-expanding network strengthens the community of tourism operators, turning each local business into a hub for others, which is not found in other existing solutions.

In Walltips we leverage a Proprietary Technology: a custom-developed framework that allows for hyper-rapid development and scaling. 
It flexibility and efficiency give Walltips a unique technical foundation that would be difficult to replicate without significant time and resources.

Walltips’ core strength lies in its collaborative, viral ecosystem: building this type of interconnected network requires trust, relationships with tourism operators, and the viral invite system that creates self-expanding growth.
column55: Experience / Service Providers - They add their offer to the platform so that it can be sold through the Web Apps ecosystem, Hotels and Property Managers - They create their free Web App to inform their guest and upsell experiences and services, Local Institutions - They use Walltips to create digital infopoints with Tourist Services

column51:
Yookye, innovative SME, creates tourist omni-comprehensive packages with destination Italy making travel planning simple convenient and fast.
Thanks to the Explorers, people who live and know the territory, every aspect of the holiday is customised with original content in in tune with the interests and passions of the traveller.
Yookye profiles the traveller via an interactive form and proposes packages including accommodation experiences and ancillary services.
Today the form is handled within 1 working day; thanks to the current fundraising we will use AI to enable the optimal combination in real time between the services selected in our database and customer expectations.

mygroup brings together users who have the same travel date and final destination, a virtual community of travelers to whom we give the possibility of accessing group rates discounted by up to 40%, users will have access to a private area in which they can share with future travel companions, opinions, suggest excursions, share travel ideas and more.

MyGroup is a B2B2C, we have a reserved area for travel agencies, we give them the opportunity to insert their products, we give them a web sales channel necessary for their survival in the real market.
siamo una startup turistica con un modello di business b2b2c, per il b2b ci presentiamo come il primo market place di agenzie di viaggio, mentre per il b2c ci presentiamo come il primo gruppo d'acquisto del settore turistico, aggreghiamo persone che in comune hanno setssa data di partenza stessa destinazione stessa destinazione, in questo modo possiamo riconoscere ai singoli utenti le tariffe di gruppo, scontate anche del 40%

column50: ORMA redefines travel with creators and activists as guides, offering sustainable, impactful journeys that inspire action and community.
column51:
ORMA redefines group travel by offering unique, transformative experiences led by activists, creators, and experts in fields such as civil rights, climate action, and social innovation. Our mission is to reshape the travel industry by promoting sustainability, ethical tourism, and community engagement. We believe travel should be more than just visiting destinations—it should be about making a meaningful impact on the world and the places we explore.
Our trips are designed for those seeking a deeper connection to the destinations they visit. Instead of traditional, cookie-cutter tours, ORMA offers journeys that immerse travelers in off-season destinations, working with local NGOs and businesses to avoid over-tourism and promote responsible travel. We focus on low-emission travel options, and our itineraries prioritize activities that support social causes and engage with local communities in a positive way.

The core of the ORMA experience is learning directly from inspiring leaders. Our trips are guided by activists, creators, and educators who share their expertise on topics such as sustainability, social justice, and environmental protection. This allows our travelers to gain firsthand insights into the challenges and solutions driving positive change. Whether it’s volunteering for local causes, engaging in climate action, or learning about political movements, travelers are empowered to make a difference both during and after their trip.

At ORMA, we cater primarily to Gen Z and Millennials, who are passionate about sustainability and social impact. These conscious travelers seek authentic experiences that align with their values, and we deliver just that. We engage them through bold, relatable content and design, ensuring that our messaging and tone resonate with their idealistic and action-driven mindset.

Beyond just travel, ORMA fosters a strong sense of community. We create connections among like-minded individuals, providing a platform for travelers to continue collaborating and taking action long after the trip ends. This community-driven approach is central to our business model, as we aim to build a network of conscious travelers. 

By combining purpose-driven travel with a focus on sustainability, ethical tourism, and community-building, ORMA is paving the way for a new era in travel—one where every journey leaves a positive impact on the world.

column50: ORMA redefines travel with creators and activists as guides, offering sustainable, impactful journeys that inspire action and community.
column51:
ORMA redefines group travel by offering unique, transformative experiences led by activists, creators, and experts in fields such as civil rights, climate action, and social innovation. Our mission is to reshape the travel industry by promoting sustainability, ethical tourism, and community engagement. We believe travel should be more than just visiting destinations—it should be about making a meaningful impact on the world and the places we explore.
Our trips are designed for those seeking a deeper connection to the destinations they visit. Instead of traditional, cookie-cutter tours, ORMA offers journeys that immerse travelers in off-season destinations, working with local NGOs and businesses to avoid over-tourism and promote responsible travel. We focus on low-emission travel options, and our itineraries prioritize activities that support social causes and engage with local communities in a positive way.

The core of the ORMA experience is learning directly from inspiring leaders. Our trips are guided by activists, creators, and educators who share their expertise on topics such as sustainability, social justice, and environmental protection. This allows our travelers to gain firsthand insights into the challenges and solutions driving positive change. Whether it’s volunteering for local causes, engaging in climate action, or learning about political movements, travelers are empowered to make a difference both during and after their trip.

At ORMA, we cater primarily to Gen Z and Millennials, who are passionate about sustainability and social impact. These conscious travelers seek authentic experiences that align with their values, and we deliver just that. We engage them through bold, relatable content and design, ensuring that our messaging and tone resonate with their idealistic and action-driven mindset.

Beyond just travel, ORMA fosters a strong sense of community. We create connections among like-minded individuals, providing a platform for travelers to continue collaborating and taking action long after the trip ends. This community-driven approach is central to our business model, as we aim to build a network of conscious travelers. 

By combining purpose-driven travel with a focus on sustainability, ethical tourism, and community-building, ORMA is paving the way for a new era in travel—one where every journey leaves a positive impact on the world.
column55: Activists - Planning a trip, International travelers - Planning a trip, Sustainability ethusiasts - Planning a trip

column51:
Our business at Hoken Tech is to provide museums and artists with tools to catalyze frictionless, rapid trade of their art. We identify institutions looking for new revenue streams, facilitate the integration of crypto-based solution, and attract visitors to museums who use QR Codes to buy the NFT too! This is not your regular art collecting closet; we can target all aspects of your business from concept to execution.

Everything in more can be linked to our portable NFT distributor to promote and sell NFTs, and in more with our blockchain games that can be used as a promotional and marketing tool

column50: Enthusiasm and extremely high competences regarding the business area, mixed with values of dynamism, innovation and community are our key.
column51:
Night Citizen is a mobile app "The Fork" style, that allows everyone who like to go out at night, to find out clubs and events, purchase tickets or reserve a table, in an easy, fast and effective way.

For the very first time we reverse the paradigm whereby venues look for their customers! In fact, thanks to Night Citizen, users will find out the right place according to what they like!

Basing our proposal on GPS, Data Analysis and user profiling to make it tailored; our app allows users to reserve or purchase their own choice (table/ticket/etc.), getting also exclusive discounts by generating a QR-Code to show at the entrance.

Furthermore, we develop of a BI Software that gives night managers/promoters/artistic directors, not only a way to promote their activities, but also obtain profiling data, easily to manage, about their customers and real time performance analysis of their locations.

column30: Tafa Academy offers curriculum-aligned, accessible, and innovative edtech.
column42: Giulio Montoli, Edmondo Sparano, Giulia Fazzini, Edoardo Giorio, Giulio Maria Pezzini, Arunsankar Periyasami, Dario Baroni, Alessandro N. Ferretti, LVenture Group API Access
column45:
Giulia Fazzini
Out of scope

pietro nobili
Non investibile
column50: Wego Publishers Ltd – TAFA Academy pioneers offline STEM learning, AI-driven analytics, and game-based online safety, scaling across Africa.
column51:
Tafa Academy is an innovative edtech platform transforming education in Africa by delivering accessible, interactive, and curriculum-aligned learning solutions. Our mission is to bridge educational gaps and empower learners across urban and remote areas with quality content, leveraging both online and offline tools to ensure inclusivity and impact.
We provide interactive learning materials designed to enhance comprehension and engagement. These include video lessons, simulations, and quizzes aligned with Kenya’s curriculum, catering to primary, junior, and senior secondary levels. Subjects offered span Integrated Science, Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry, and Biology, ensuring a broad and comprehensive academic foundation for learners.
To address connectivity challenges in underserved areas, we’ve developed TafaPlayer, an offline app available for desktop and Android devices. This ensures that students in low-connectivity regions can access high-quality content seamlessly, bridging the digital divide and fostering equity in education.
Tafa Academy integrates AI analytics tools to provide personalized learning experiences and actionable insights. Educators and institutions can monitor student progress, identify learning gaps, and optimize teaching strategies using real-time data. These analytics empower stakeholders to make data-driven decisions, improving overall learning outcomes.
Our platform has achieved significant adoption, serving over 400 secondary schools and 5,000+ students across Kenya. Designed for scalability, Tafa Academy targets both private and public schools, with plans to expand to regional markets, including Uganda and Tanzania, by 2029.
The vision of Tafa Academy is to empower learners with cutting-edge tools and resources that prepare them for academic excellence and future success. By integrating technology, innovation, and inclusivity, we are shaping the future of education in Africa. With our strong foundation and growing impact, we are actively seeking partnerships and investment to accelerate our growth and realize our vision of transforming education across the continent.

column8: Hospitality, Media, Tourism, Tour Operators, Travel
column30: A travel media startup curating regenerative trips & cultural documentaries
column42: Giulio Montoli, Edmondo Sparano, Giulia Fazzini, Edoardo Giorio, Giulio Maria Pezzini, Arunsankar Periyasami, Dario Baroni, Alessandro N. Ferretti, LVenture Group API Access
column45:
Giulia Fazzini
Borderline tra startup e tour operator, il CEO è ex team WAPI.
column50: Macondo stands out for its conscious approach to travel and hybrid business model, merging regenerative trips with cultural storytelling.
column51:
Macondo Expeditions is a travel-media startup that merges regenerative group travel and cultural documentary production. Our mission is to preserve the beauty, culture, and traditions of the world, transforming tourism into a tool that uplifts communities instead of exploiting them.

We achieve this through two main ways. One: we organize immersive journeys off the beaten path, respecting nature, cultures, and local communities. Two: we produce docu-trips, original travel documentaries that inspire a deeper understanding of the world.

Going deeper, our trips offer an alternative to mass tourism that benefits both visitors and host communities. Our trips are built on three core principles:
- Exploring lesser-known destinations, reducing pressure on overcrowded hotspots.
- Immersion in local culture, creating experiences that involve artisans, guides, and small businesses, fostering genuine connections with local traditions.
- Encouraging personal growth, fostering deep cultural immersion and self-reflection.

Unlike conventional travel vlogs that focus on surface-level experiences, our docu-trips bring destinations to life, inspiring viewers to see travel as a tool for awareness, connection, and deeper reflection. Our language blends:
- YouTube’s immediacy, making them engaging and accessible.
- The educational depth of traditional documentaries, exploring social, economic, and cultural aspects of each destination.
- The poetic touch of cinematic storytelling, offering reflections on universal themes that go beyond time and place.

Our travel and media divisions reinforce each other, generating economic and strategic synergies:
- Travel fuels storytelling, providing authentic stories and research-backed narratives.
- Media drives travel demand, turning our audience into conscious travelers.
- Shared local partnerships built for travel can also support documentary production, optimizing costs and logistics.

Looking ahead, our media production will enable a second revenue stream through product placements in docu-trips, allowing us to scale revenues without increasing the number of trips, preserving exclusivity and authenticity.

Last but not least, we built a powerful digital infrastructure, integrating AI-driven automation to streamline planning, marketing, sales, and customer service. This ensures operational efficiency and scalability, a seamless, user-friendly booking experience, and greater team flexibility—improving work-life balance and happiness.
column55: Conscious travelers - They join our regenerative group trips to explore lesser-known destinations in a meaningful, sustainable way. They seek cultural immersion, personal growth, and deep human connections beyond traditional tourism.

column30: Patio is a marketplace for unique and authentic locations for events
column42: Giulio Montoli, Edmondo Sparano, Giulia Fazzini, Edoardo Giorio, Giulio Maria Pezzini, Arunsankar Periyasami, Dario Baroni, Alessandro N. Ferretti, LVenture Group API Access
column50: Patio distinguishes itself by offering unique venues, by the way it simplifies the booking process by automating it for the customer.
column51:
Patio satisfies the dual need of those who, on the one hand, wish to make profitable use of one or more spaces pertaining to one of their properties (so-called hosts), and of those who, on the other hand, are looking for the perfect place to organise their event (so-called guests).
Patio, in fact, presents itself as a marketplace for unique and authentic locations, i.e. an online platform where guests and hosts can easily fulfill their needs.
Hosts (owners), by registering their locations on the Patio platform, have the opportunity to rent out their spaces to third parties for short periods of time (in terms of hours up to whole days), quickly and easily presenting themselves to an unlimited audience of potential customers, both domestic and foreign.
The host's registration on Patio, and the consequent list of location(s) on the platform, is free of charge and in no way binding: the owner reserves the right, at all times, to accept or refuse booking requests received for his location.
For each location, the host will choose and indicate the hourly price at which to rent his space. From this price, Patio will deduct 15% commission on each transaction; the host will take the 85%.
The locations listed can be rent out for short periods of time, quickly and easily, to an unlimited audience of customers, both domestic and foreign.
Patio, thanks to its matching algorithm, find the ideal location to the kind of event to be organized.
On Patio you can book the less touristy and more characteristic locations, where you can breathe in the true soul of the place.
The venues registered are of different kinds and capacities: gardens, rooftops, historic mansions, private villas, ballrooms, furnished lounges, design kitchens, chalets, art galleries...
The categories of events to which our locations lend themselves are varied and appeal not only to private individuals, but also, for example, to fashion agencies, film productions looking for authentic sets, or companies wanting to host conferences in less ordinary and aseptic facilities than conference halls.
column55: Advertising agencies  - To find the ideal set, Businesses and Corporates - To host corporate events, meetings, parties in unconventional venues, Fashion labels - To find the ideal set for their shootings, Film productions - To find the ideal set, Privates - To find the ideal location to host their event (party, private dinner....), Travel Enthusiasts - To host an event in a typical location, Yoga and pilates school/teachers - To find authentic location for didactical events (classes, workshops..)

column51:
Tabomenu is a SaaS platform simplifying restaurant and hospitality management with an all-in-one solution. By offering everything a restaurant needs to run their business, be it reservation, self-ordering, tap on phone or AI assistance, we help businesses strives. 

Restaurants looking to digitalize face fragmented, outdated, and complicated tools that create inefficiencies and frustration. That's where Tabomenu brings simplicity to the table ( literally). Our all-in-one platform with a B2C-inspired design, eliminates the need for up to 3 different softwares and makes digitalization a piece of cake. 

We are set to launch in the coming months, delivering a game-changing solution for the European hospitality industry and creating immediate value for early adopters.

column51:
Digital Inphinity is a dynamic start-up, focussed in the travel and tourism industry with groundbreaking big data analytics solutions designed to revolutionize the way businesses operate. It specializes in leveraging advanced big data analytics to provide unprecedented insights into travel and tourism trends, competitors behavior, and market dynamics. By harnessing the power of cutting-edge technology, the company offers innovative solutions that enable businesses to make data-driven decisions, maximize thier revenues, optimize their operations, and enhance the overall strategic positioning. Our software not only simplifies the process of collecting and managing Big Data, but it also goes beyond traditional metrics by incorporating advanced KPIs. Our solutions are able to provide our customers with valuable market and competitive insights. 
Digital Inphinity was founded by a team of industry experts with a deep understanding of the challenges and opportunities facing the travel and tourism sector. 
Company’s vision is to become the leading provider of big data analytics solutions for the travel and tourism industry, empowering businesses to thrive in an increasingly competitive and dynamic market. The company is committed to helping its clients unlock the full potential of their data and gain a strategic edge through actionable insights.

column30: Piattaforma che rivoluziona l'organizzazione dei viaggi di gruppo
column42: Giulio Montoli, Edmondo Sparano, Giulia Fazzini, Edoardo Giorio, Giulio Maria Pezzini, Arunsankar Periyasami, Dario Baroni, Alessandro N. Ferretti, LVenture Group API Access
column50: TripSync si distingue per la sincronizzazione automatica delle preferenze dei partecipanti, facilitando scelte rapide e condivise.
column51:
TripSync è una piattaforma tecnologica innovativa progettata per rivoluzionare l’organizzazione dei viaggi di gruppo, semplificando ogni aspetto della pianificazione condivisa. L’obiettivo principale è eliminare la confusione e lo stress tipici dell’organizzazione di viaggi collettivi, trasformandoli in esperienze fluide e piacevoli per tutti i partecipanti.
La piattaforma utilizza l’intelligenza artificiale per sincronizzare automaticamente le preferenze dei membri del gruppo, consentendo di prendere decisioni collaborative in modo rapido ed efficace. Ogni utente può esprimere le proprie preferenze su destinazioni, date, attività e budget; TripSync aggrega queste informazioni per suggerire le migliori soluzioni di viaggio, trovando un equilibrio tra le diverse esigenze. Questo processo aiuta a ridurre i conflitti e accelera la fase decisionale, che spesso rappresenta una delle principali difficoltà nell'organizzazione dei viaggi di gruppo.
Un’altra funzionalità chiave è la gestione integrata delle spese. TripSync permette ai partecipanti di tracciare e suddividere i costi in modo chiaro e trasparente, semplificando il monitoraggio dei pagamenti e delle spese comuni. Inoltre, la piattaforma facilita la prenotazione di alloggi, trasporti e attività grazie all’integrazione con partner del settore, come piattaforme di booking e tour operator, garantendo un’esperienza end-to-end.
TripSync è ideale per gruppi di amici, famiglie, colleghi o chiunque voglia pianificare un viaggio condiviso, perchè offre un’interfaccia intuitiva e funzionalità personalizzabili. La piattaforma risponde anche alle esigenze di sostenibilità, incentivando scelte di viaggio responsabili e rispettose dell’ambiente. Con un focus sulla digitalizzazione, l’automazione e la personalizzazione, TripSync vuole a diventare il punto di riferimento per il turismo collettivo, abbracciando le tendenze di mercato e le nuove esigenze dei viaggiatori.

column50: Ci posizioniamo in una nicchia ben definita rispetto ai grandi portali che offrono esperienze generiche. Vocazione rurale e sostenibile.
column51:
BeCountry è una piattaforma online che connette le persone alle eccellenze delle aziende agricole italiane, offrendo esperienze autentiche e immersive che valorizzano territorio, natura e tradizioni locali. Il suo obiettivo è avvicinare le persone (turisti e non) ai produttori agricoli attraverso esperienze coinvolgenti che uniscono scoperta, condivisione e piacere sensoriale.

Strutturata come un marketplace, BeCountry mette in contatto l’offerta di esperienze proposte dalle aziende agricole con la domanda di turismo enogastronomico. 

Gli utenti possono navigare tra numerose attività presentate in modo chiaro e accattivante, con schede standardizzate per garantire informazioni facilmente fruibili. Attraverso un sistema di prenotazione intuitivo con calendario integrato, è possibile organizzare ogni attività con pochi clic.

Le aziende agricole dispongono di un back office dedicato per gestire esperienze, calendari, prenotazioni e incassi. Il sistema è predisposto per la creazione di cataloghi filtrati per pubblici specifici, come le scuole, o per operatori specifici (tour operator) offrendo la possibilità di gestire più esperienze da un’unica piattaforma.

BeCountry utilizza molteplici canali di comunicazione per attrarre traffico, tra cui social media marketing, ricerca organica, campagne a pagamento e partnership con operatori commerciali. Collaborazioni con aziende attive nel welfare aziendale o nei rewards per community ampliano ulteriormente la visibilità della piattaforma.

Il modello economico si basa su una commission fee applicata esclusivamente sulle vendite. BeCountry gestisce l’incasso iniziale, distribuendo i compensi ai partner agricoli in modo automatico o su richiesta, con report dettagliati sulle performance di vendita (visualizzazioni, ordini, incassi medi).

La piattaforma offre anche opzioni di adv on platform, come evidenze promozionali, badging e contenuti sponsorizzati, che permettono alle aziende di promuovere le proprie esperienze. Inoltre siamo pronti ad aggiungere servizi aggiuntivi come shooting fotografici o staging che possono essere acquistati direttamente dai partner, generando nuove entrate.

BeCountry è un sistema efficiente e intuitivo che semplifica agli utenti la ricerca e prenotazione di esperienze autentiche, mentre supporta le aziende agricole nel ridurre i costi promozionali, offrendo un sistema di gestione prenotazioni gratuito verso un pubblico già targettizzato.
