Andrea Tripodo
Startup innovativa specializzata per le tecnologie e per il modello di cinema high-tech.
Il loro obiettivo è quello di migliorare l'esperienza dell'intrattenimento e dei servizi complementari nelle sale cinematografiche e aree lounge ultramoderne. Next steps: apriranno un cinema-hotel in Italia entro il primo trimestre 2025 e riqualificheranno un cinema tradizionale in Italia in un nuovo Club FCE. Team composto da 7 membri esperti nel settore.
column50: FCE manages and offers services to new Clubs, customer oriented, for high quality entertainment and dining than traditional cinemas.
column51:
We consider entertainment as a form of personal well-being and necessary to life.
We are a start-up specialized in offering to classy clubs high quality services in dining and entertainment.
We are an innovative start-up introducing a new approch into entertainment market with new processes, new services and ultra modern technologies.
Elevating the experience of entertainment and complementary services is our daily goal.
We manage, directly or on behalf of third parties, clubs to offer customers high-quality entertainment and dining with ultra-modern cinema rooms and lounge areas.
We also offer the same services to private customers who want to have a unique and exclusive "real first-run cinema room" in their home or yacht.
Our «All inclusive services» are offered to traditional exhibitors, to owners, directors or managers of commercial spaces, hotels, resorts, ships, quality accommodation facilities, campings, glampings, public administrations, companies, sports clubs, clubs and individuals.
Our services include:
- Designing and building clubs according to FCE layout
- Supply professional cinema and gaming equipment, furnishings and accessories for hall and lounge areas
- Agreements with main distributors and streaming platform to rent premieres, movies, TV series
- Technical assistance and automatic remote management of projection
- Digital communication and promotion of Clubs, films, shows, themed evenings and events
- Ticketing platform to book tickets in standard mode and in Private Screenings mode
- E-commerce platform to purchase exclusive products and services reserved to FCE Club members.

We consider entertainment as a form of personal well-being and necessary to life.
We are a start-up specialized in offering to classy clubs high quality services in dining and entertainment.
We are an innovative start-up introducing a new approch into entertainment market with new processes, new services and ultra modern technologies.
Elevating the experience of entertainment and complementary services is our daily goal.
We manage, directly or on behalf of third parties, clubs to offer customers high-quality entertainment and dining with ultra-modern cinema rooms and lounge areas.
We also offer the same services to private customers who want to have a unique and exclusive "real first-run cinema room" in their home or yacht.
Our «All inclusive services» are offered to traditional exhibitors, to owners, directors or managers of commercial spaces, hotels, resorts, ships, quality accommodation facilities, campings, glampings, public administrations, companies, sports clubs, clubs and individuals.
Our services include:
- Designing and building clubs according to FCE layout
- Supply professional cinema and gaming equipment, furnishings and accessories for hall and lounge areas
- Agreements with main distributors and streaming platform to rent premieres, movies, TV series
- Technical assistance and automatic remote management of projection
- Digital communication and promotion of Clubs, films, shows, themed evenings and events
- Ticketing platform to book tickets in standard mode and in Private Screenings mode
- E-commerce platform to purchase exclusive products and services reserved to FCE Club members.

column50: We are trailblazers in crafting innovative apps with Flutter, Google's open source UI SDK, setting new standards in user experience.
column51:
Indulge Me is transforming the way people explore the world by blending the power of technology with the art of storytelling, turning every journey into an immersive, interactive adventure. Our platform is more than just a travel experience—it's a no-code game development tool, a marketing solution, and a gateway to deeper cultural connections. Designed to be accessible both online and offline, we empower users to craft unique adventures that transcend traditional tourism.

A Dynamic and Adaptable Platform

Our platform thrives in diverse environments, from vibrant urban streets to tranquil nature trails, from iconic landmarks like Rio de Janeiro's Christ the Redeemer to secluded vineyards and enlightening museum tours. Whether for large-scale theme parks, bustling digital nomad hubs, or serene cultural retreats, Indulge Me reimagines exploration with innovative gamification.

Technology-Driven and Purposeful

No-Code Game Development App: Our intuitive app allows users to design custom gamified experiences, making it accessible to tourism boards, educational institutions, and local guides.

Event-Driven Experiences: We create tailored gamified events that engage audiences, from corporate retreats to cultural festivals, blending education and entertainment seamlessly.
Integrated Rewards with Blockchain: When needed, we incorporate blockchain-based rewards to ensure transparency and enhance user engagement through tokenized medals, badges, and prizes.

Marketing as a Tool: By leveraging our platform, businesses can gamify their offerings, turning tourism into a powerful marketing strategy to attract and retain customers.

Customized Journeys for the Modern Traveler Responding to the ever-evolving tourism industry, Indulge Me bridges the gap between tourism, culture, and education. Each experience is crafted to engage travelers on a deeper level, creating connections that extend beyond the destination. Our platform supports social and environmental awareness, offering journeys that enlighten and inspire, while leaving a positive impact on the local communities and ecosystems.

Licensing for Large-Scale Operators

Our licensing model empowers institutions such as theme parks, hotel chains, and resorts to integrate Indulge Me’s gamified solutions directly into their operations. This not only enhances guest experiences but also offers a competitive edge by combining technology, storytelling, and cultural immersion into a single, compelling offering.

column30: SeasonsJob è una piattaforma innovativa dedicata al settore alberghiero, progettata per semplificare l’incontro tra domanda e offerta di lavoro stagionale. Grazie a un sistema intuitivo e personalizzato, consente ai datori di lavoro di trovare personale qualificato in modo rapido ed efficiente, mentre i lavoratori possono accedere a opportunità adatte alle loro competenze. L’obiettivo è migliorare la gestione del personale stagionale, ottimizzando i processi di reclutamento e favorendo la crescita professionale nel settore dell’ospitalità.

column50: SeasonsJob rivoluziona il lavoro stagionale, offrendo continuità, welfare condiviso e una piattaforma intuitiva per aziende e lavoratori.
column51:
SeasonsJob è una piattaforma pensata per trasformare il lavoro stagionale nel settore alberghiero, affrontando le difficoltà che aziende e lavoratori incontrano ogni anno. La stagionalità porta sfide come la ricerca rapida di personale qualificato, l’elevato turnover e la mancanza di trasparenza, ostacolando la creazione di relazioni lavorative solide. SeasonsJob semplifica questi processi, offrendo un sistema moderno che facilita l’incontro tra domanda e offerta, migliorando efficienza e qualità.

I datori di lavoro possono registrarsi, creare profili aziendali dettagliati e pubblicare annunci specifici, indicando mansioni, competenze richieste, durata del contratto e benefit come l’alloggio. La piattaforma consente di accedere facilmente a un database di candidati qualificati, riducendo tempi e costi di selezione. Anche i lavoratori possono creare un profilo professionale completo, evidenziando competenze, esperienze e lingue parlate, ricevendo proposte mirate e costruendo un curriculum digitale basato su valutazioni ricevute. SeasonsJob non si limita però a semplificare il reclutamento: vuole creare un ecosistema che promuova condizioni di lavoro migliori e più sostenibili.

Tra le iniziative previste c’è la promozione di collaborazioni tra titolari di attività stagionali. L’obiettivo è garantire maggiore continuità lavorativa ai dipendenti, collegando aziende con esigenze complementari in periodi stagionali diversi. Questo approccio, unito a un sistema di welfare condiviso, mira a migliorare la qualità della vita dei lavoratori stagionali, offrendo, ad esempio, supporto per alloggi dignitosi, spese di trasporto o corsi di formazione. SeasonsJob vuole così aiutare le imprese a fidelizzare il personale, valorizzandone le competenze e riducendo il turnover.

La piattaforma si propone inoltre di diventare un punto di riferimento internazionale. Tra gli obiettivi futuri ci sono l’espansione in mercati europei come Spagna e Grecia, lo sviluppo di partnership strategiche con scuole alberghiere e associazioni di categoria, e l’introduzione di funzionalità innovative come strumenti per la gestione centralizzata di benefit aziendali.

SeasonsJob rappresenta molto più di un semplice portale di lavoro. È un progetto con una visione ambiziosa e sostenibile, che punta a migliorare l’esperienza del lavoro stagionale per aziende e lavoratori, rendendola più semplice, trasparente e inclusiva.

column51: NotOnlyDesk has developed a web app that allows Users to book a workstation, mainly in coworking spaces, from a dense network of facilities spread throughout the country. With a simple registration and a single online pass, Users will be able to carry out their smart working activities with greater flexibility of movement. In order to revolutionize the world of agile work and business travel, NotOnlyDesk is especially aimed at companies that want to enable their employees to work in facilities close to home or focused for business travellers, guaranteed in terms of access management, secure data network, and with all the necessary amenities and services required to carry out agile work. To meet the needs of all enterprises, NotOnlyDesk provides booking packages that diversify the service according to the amount of annual accesses needed.

column30: Exclusive wedding experiences connecting couples and luxury tourists.
column42: Giulio Montoli, Edmondo Sparano, Giulia Fazzini, Edoardo Giorio, Giulio Maria Pezzini, Arunsankar Periyasami, Dario Baroni, Alessandro N. Ferretti, LVenture Group API Access
column45:
Giulia Fazzini
Ma sul serio?
column50: What truly sets Wedding Privé apart is how it transforms weddings into global experiences. It’s not just a private event but an opportunity
column51:
At Wedding Privé, we create unique experiences by connecting couples hosting their weddings with luxury tourists seeking authentic and cultural moments. Our platform allows couples to showcase their wedding to an exclusive audience of international travelers, offering them the chance to participate in a celebration that reflects the true essence of a country.  

We also operate in the B2B sector, collaborating with luxury travel agencies and tourism operators to offer their clients unique and personalized experiences.  

For couples, it’s an opportunity to offset wedding costs by welcoming carefully selected guests who value privacy, authenticity, and elegance. For tourists, it’s a way to immerse themselves in local traditions, cuisine, and culture in an intimate and refined setting.  

Our team handles every detail, from guest verification to communication and support, ensuring a seamless experience so that couples and guests can focus on enjoying the moment. Whether it’s a countryside wedding, a city event, or a seaside celebration, we create unforgettable experiences for everyone involved.
column55: Luxury travel agencies - They sell our services to their clients (tourists)., Wedding planners - They bring couples to the platform through a referral program.

Alessandro N. Ferretti

column50: “Patented”Self Check-in System with Guest’s univocal identification (Face recognition) to automate all check-in procedures for Hotels & BnB
column51:
Dogghis has developed the first and only platform as-a-service, based on proprietary Hdw and Sfw technology for digital access management, via smartphone, facial recognition and QR code, eliminating the need for physical keys and useful in various scenarios: Home, Office, Hotel & Tourist Apartments. 

Dogghis designs, engineers and manufactures IoT devices and software solutions that allow access to any type of property.

Home & Office, Condo: a digital control system for access via smartphone, facial recognition and QR code. Each electrified lock becomes Smart, without having to replace it. The digital control system integrates multiple openings into a single system.

Hotel & Tourist Apartments: an access control system connected to a digital platform and an App, allows guests to check-in independently, 24/7.The access control system automatically manages all check-in procedures with the advanced use of Face Recognition and univocal identification of guest.
column55: Hotels, BnB & Tourist Aparts - Self Check-in with Guest’s univocal identification, Real Estate Owners - Digital access and smart home-office

column30: Board Game Social Club (BGSC) is a community of board game enthusiasts.
column42: Giulio Montoli, Edmondo Sparano, Giulia Fazzini, Edoardo Giorio, Giulio Maria Pezzini, Arunsankar Periyasami, Dario Baroni, Alessandro N. Ferretti, LVenture Group API Access
column45:
Giulia Fazzini
out of scope

Alessandro N. Ferretti
Non in target
column50: We're creating a tool to answer the question that every board game buyer asks right after their purchase, "who do I play with now?"
column51:
Board Game Social Club (BGSC) is a community of board game enthusiasts, whose aim is to create a matching mechanism between GameMaster and Player. A simple and new way to meet other people.

The idea is to allow community members to easily find other board game enthusiasts in their city of residence, creating a virtuous mechanism that leads to the match between expert collectors (our GameMasters - GMs) and players (our Players).

Experienced collectors like GMs often don't have people to play the games they buy and collect with, while Players just want to try a game that maybe they don't own or even simply to spend a different evening and meet new people.

column50: We're creating a tool to answer the question that every board game buyer asks right after their purchase, "who do I play with now?"
column51:
Board Game Social Club (BGSC) is a community of board game enthusiasts, whose aim is to create a matching mechanism between GameMaster and Player. A simple and new way to meet other people.

The idea is to allow community members to easily find other board game enthusiasts in their city of residence, creating a virtuous mechanism that leads to the match between expert collectors (our GameMasters - GMs) and players (our Players).

Experienced collectors like GMs often don't have people to play the games they buy and collect with, while Players just want to try a game that maybe they don't own or even simply to spend a different evening and meet new people.

column50: sostenibilità,continuità,implementazione,replicabilità,sostegno alla famiglia e al focolare e al credito non speculativo e di transizione
column51:
Iniziative consone al momento e usando molte idee per portare nuove abitudini o rafforzare concetti e abitudini e fare, volgendo verso una collettività e verso un individuo capaci di coesistere e di essere sia ospiti sia tutela alla vita. 
Attualmente un interesse viene mostrato sulla mobilità sostenibile e su eventuali economie circolari.
In tali direzioni si tenta di sostenere un lavoro più orientato a comprendere compiti e non ruoli mansioni ricompense.
L'individuo deve essere tutelato nel poter realizzare una propria famiglia e una casa e anche momenti lenitivi sino anche a momenti di eccesso, necessari al momento formativo. Tutto questo è possibile attraverso l'educazione e l'istruzione e la comprensione dell'imperfezione e dell'errore non come fondamenta ma come parte dell'esistenza. Come dolore e sofferenza ed altre realtà, che vanno comprese e trasmesse e condivise e respirate e insieme accompagnarsi dotando il gesto di una mano di fermezza e sobrietà e capace di dare sino al sacrificarsi e, conscio del prendere, si porta continuità a sensibilità intere acquisite in modi diversi.
Un economia di transizione è necessaria ma resta inutile tentativo se non ben accompagnata da istruzione e informazione e formazione e ispirazioni tali da permettere un percorso in autoregolamentazioni personali e approfondimenti sostenuti e non indotti o peggio premiati.
Un individuo capace di tutelare iniziative e idee per permettere un vascello senza meta e senza approdo, coeso e forte e salubre e certamente senza mai dimenticare necessità e bisogni appresi su individuo e collettività e permettendone di tramandarne contenuti e fare e errore e evitando di prevaricare gli uni sugli altri e premettendo altresì di proteggere idee a sostegno della vita e evitandone strumentalizzazione o peggio dimenticanza. Dimenticare alcune idee o smarrirle a volte resta un dovere soprattutto dove individuo e collettività immaturi siano incapaci di gestire un insieme di responsabilità. Questi sprechi necessitano di ogni sforzo e verso un'esistenza forse dotata di ampia miseria ma anche capace di portare esempio di vita e molto altro.
Abitudini e stimolo a buone prassi e integrazione dell'intera vicenda amministrativa soprattutto innanzi alle fragilità e alla propria perenne responsabilità in ogni fare di ogni ruolo rivestito sia economico che politico e oltre.
Iniziando forse da mobilità e energie rinnovabili si può trasmettere una partecipazione ampiamente consapevole.

column50: We are the leading international company specialized in LGBTQ+ tourism, covering all aspects of the industry. QueerVadis is our new project.
column51:
S&B Brands operates in different areas of the tourism industry with a focus on the LGBTQ+ market (2.7 billion euro of annual income in Italy - Frequent Travelers: 4 trip per year - High Spender: +38% of annual income): hospitality—managing 4- and 5-star All Welcome hotels in Italy; tour operating—organizing LGBTQ+-themed tours in Italy; training & consultancy—providing assistance to companies and CVBs that want to learn how to reach and be prepared to welcome LGBTQ+ travelers; and media—running the first global platform for LGBTQ+ tourism.
In 2020 we have launched the first and only international LGBTQ+ Tourism Certification Program: QueerVadis.

column50: BeLocal stands out by offering tailored recommendations based on user preferences while preserving a selectivity in the suggestion process.
column51: BeLocal is not a social network, nor is it a traditional tour guide. It’s like that one friend who always knows the best recommendations. By analysing users’ tastes, habits, and interests, BeLocal provides personalised suggestions for local restaurants, clubs, museums, and experiences. These recommendations are curated through feedback from local representatives and community surveys. BeLocal aims to create a platform that serves both tourists and locals, offering a fresh perspective on the city they’re exploring or living in. By showcasing hidden gems and worthy local spots, BeLocal seeks to stimulate economic growth and connect people with authentic experiences.

column50: GondolaGo: First app to book & customize Venice gondola tours, with real-time availability, reviews, and a complete Venice guide.
column51:
Core Features:
Easy Booking System: Users can browse through different gondola tours, viewing detailed descriptions including the route, duration, and special features of each tour. Booking is simplified with a few taps.

Secure Payment Gateway: Integrated secure payment system allowing users to pay for their tours directly through the app, supporting multiple payment methods including credit/debit cards, and mobile wallets.

In-App messaging: Contact directly gondoliers for any further information or request.

Real-Time Availability: Shows real-time availability of gondola tours, allowing users to book spontaneous trips or plan in advance.

Multilingual Support: The app supports multiple languages, catering to Venice's diverse, international tourist base.

User Ratings and Reviews: Users can rate their experience and read reviews from others, ensuring quality and reliability.

Interactive Maps and Navigation: Provides interactive maps showing gondola stations, routes, and points of interest along the way.

Additional Features:
Customizable Tours: Options to customize tours, like adding a musician or a guided historical commentary.

In-App Venice Guide: A feature offering tips about Venice, including dining, sightseeing, and cultural etiquette.

Push Notifications: Timely notifications about tour bookings, special events, and promotional offers.

User Interface:
Intuitive and User-Friendly: Designed to be easy to navigate for all age groups.

Visual Appeal:  High-quality images and a theme that captures the essence of Venice.

Target Audience: 
Tourists visiting Venice: Individuals or groups planning to explore the city.

Hotels: A way for hospitality players to seamlessly organize guest's tours

Travel Agencies: To partner for bulk bookings.

Local Venetians: Offering a convenient way to enjoy gondola rides in their city.

Business Model:
Commission on Bookings: A percentage of each booking made through the app.
Featured Listings: Charging a fee for gondola services to be featured prominently in the app.
In-app Advertising: For local businesses and services.

Development and Marketing:
Cross-Platform Compatibility: Available on iOS and Android.
Marketing Campaign: Leveraging social media, travel blogs, and partnerships with travel influencers.
Sustainability and Community Support:
Eco-friendly Initiatives: Promoting eco-friendly gondolas and practices.
Supporting Local Artisans: Featuring tours that include visits to local artisans and craftsmen.
column55: advertisers - they advertise their products to the app's users, gondoliers - they list their tour services , hotels - they book and buy the gondoliers tour services, tourists - they book and buy the gondoliers tour services

column50: We are highly international from the very first step, we see the whole world as opportunities and aim to revolutionize the museum industry.
column51:
CloudGuide is an app to guide and engage the visitors at tourist attractions. 
It unites all the tourist attractions in a single app with official content, creating a long-lasting experience for the visitor and boosting engagement with the site. The visitor uses CloudGuide before the visit to make it easier to plan, during the visit to enjoy it and after the visit to make it more memorable. The tourist site gets an easy-to-implement tool to engage its visitors and get to know them better through statistics and to attract more visitors thanks to the network effect.

column50: We are unique in offering gluten- and lactose-free culinary tourism with CeliacOk-certified venues and digital training for all the staff
column51: Essenza Food is a TravelTech startup focused on gluten- and lactose-free food and wine tourism. We offer culinary tourism experiences within a network of CeliacOk-certified Hotel & Restaurants, ensuring relax and enjoyment for travelers with celiac disease or intolerances. Through a digital platform, we first provide comprehensive training on gluten- and lactose-free protocols to all employees. Once certified, these employees and their establishments join our curated network, becoming part of Essenza Food & Travel’s exclusive culinary experiences. This approach ensures high-quality, safe experiences for travelers with dietary restrictions and strengthens our commitment to inclusive food tourism.

column50: Strategic consultancy for unique businesses and showcasing extraordinary places. Blending innovation, sustainability and tailored strategies
column51:
"Tailored Consulting for Growth"
For over 20 years, we have partnered with bold and innovative companies, turning visionary ideas into tangible successes. Our consulting services are designed to highlight and enhance the uniqueness of each business, blending strategy, creativity, and a human touch to create impactful solutions.

We specialize in commercial development and digital marketing; building robust sales networks; interim commercial management

Our goal is to transform challenges into opportunities, helping businesses grow authentically in an increasingly competitive market. We provide tailored strategies that drive results, ensuring every intervention delivers measurable success.

Under The Moon stands out for its expertise in uniqueness, connecting over 400 extraordinary and unconventional businesses across Italy to help companies differentiate themselves in their industries.


"Showcase for Uniqueness"
Under The Moon is Italy’s cutting-edge experiential digital platform, largely influenced by Generation Z.

We focus on sustainability and a "DIY" (do-it-yourself) approach to create unparalleled travel experiences. Our platform gathers hundreds of unique businesses, including restaurants, hotels, bars, shops, museums, and wellness centers—anything that creates lasting impressions for travelers.

Imagine sleeping in a treehouse, dining in a church, exploring an '80s museum, or enjoying a drink in an igloo. These are just a few of the extraordinary offerings available on our platform.

As a Benefit Company, Under The Moon integrates sustainability into every aspect of its operations, encouraging eco-friendly practices across its network and reinvesting part of its revenue in meaningful community projects.

Our product offers multilingual digital menus, automated table ordering, and seamless payment solutions, enhancing both operational efficiency and customer satisfaction. Additionally, ONE includes advanced data analytics, loyalty programs, and authenticated reviews, providing restaurateurs with valuable insights and tools to optimize their operations. Our unique social component enables features like split payments, restaurant listings, and social media integration, creating a comprehensive and engaging ecosystem for both restaurants and diners.

column51:
We are committed to revitalizing Italy's declining villages through a fusion of tradition and cutting-edge blockchain technology. With over 6,000 villages facing depopulation and neglect, we embark on a mission to unlock the potential of 2 million abandoned buildings.

Our innovative "horizontal hotel" model redefines accommodation, seamlessly distributing rooms and services across multiple buildings while maintaining close proximity. This not only offers a unique experience for guests but serves as the cornerstone of our dedication to breathe new life into small communities and drive economic resurgence.

At the heart of brickBit is blockchain technology, specifically Polygon. This technology enables us to tokenize real estate assets, breaking them into tradable non-fungible tokens (NFTs). This tokenization democratizes global access to real estate investments, empowering a diverse range of investors.

Our strategy involves carefully selecting and renovating specific properties. By managing maintenance and renting them for short-term stays, we transform these forgotten structures into vibrant tourist destinations. The blockchain-based tokenization ensures that investors own a fraction of each property through NFTs, entitling them to a share of rental profits.

column50: Proposal Coach è la prima ed unica piattaforma web in Italia, dedicata esclusivamente all’organizzazione delle proposte di matrimonio.
column51:
Proposal Coach (https://proposalcoach.it/) è la prima ed unica piattaforma web in Italia, dedicata esclusivamente all’organizzazione delle proposte di matrimonio.
Un servizio completo per l’utente che ottiene  tutti gli strumenti per organizzare la propria proposta di matrimonio, dall’idea perfetta (tramite un quiz viene targettizzato per sapere “di che proposta è fatto” e ricevere l’idea perfetta per la coppia e personalizzata) dove farla (suggeriamo i luoghi più belli e nascosti d'italia) all’elenco di tutti i professionisti da coinvolgere, suggeriti in base a geolocalizzazione e tipologia di servizio. Tutto in base al risultato del test. L’utente può utilizzare la piattaforma in autonomia, gratuitamente, o con il supporto di un wedding coach a un piccolo costo. Quindi, risparmio di tempo (nella ricerca) economico (rispetto ai metodi tradizionali) e la garanzia di professionalità del servizio e dei professionisti coinvolti. 
Inoltre un vero e proprio network per i professionisti del settore, location meravigliose ed experience indimenticabili (in tutta Italia), che verranno profilate, geolocalizzate, ed adeguatamente associate ai desideri della coppia e quindi messi in contatto con potenziali clienti interessati. Ogni professionista/azienda ha una sua landing-page dedicata. Un vero e proprio mini sito vetrina con foto, video della sua attività/servizio e testo descrittivo. 
Per affiliarsi il professionista a Proposal Coach ed entrare nel network potrà scegliere tra 3 diversi pacchetti, che rispetto agli altri portali di matrimonio ha il vantaggio di avere i costi nettamente più bassi, una serie ampia di servizi di marketing web e social gestiti dal team e guidati dalla fondatrice e parte del team che, da più di 10 anni, lavora in agenzie pubblicitarie e come wedding planner quindi massima professionalità unita alla piena conoscenza del settore di riferimento e attenzione particolare dei bisogni del professionista così  come dell’utente finale.

column50: Sensibili ai temi quali inclusione, sostenibilità e disabilità. I soci, da buoni capi scout, pongono la società a servizio del territorio.
column51:
La 3D VIRTUAL SYSTEM si occupa di creare contenuti digitali quali: Scansioni di oggetti e persone fruibili in 3D, creazione di tour virtuali di ambienti interni ed esterni e realizzazione di ambienti in realtà aumentata.
Le scansioni tridimensionali vengono effettuate con tecniche diverse, una è la fotogrammetria che permette di scansionare ogni tipo di oggetto con una qualità ultra HD,  e di maneggiarlo virtualmente da ogni angolazione; un’altra tecnica richiede l'utilizzo di scanner a luce strutturata, leggeri e veloci i file che si generano sono eccezionalmente dettagliati e utili per qualsiasi utilizzo.
Un tour virtuale, invece, è un insieme di immagini panoramiche 360 collegate tra loro, che ricreano un ambiente in digitale, sia di interni che esterni . Attraverso un tour virtuale l’utente vive un’esperienza totalmente immersiva e altamente realistica di un luogo in cui in realtà non si trova. Un luogo in cui può muoversi liberamente e con cui può interagire, il tutto comodamente da casa con un pc, smartphone o visore.
È possibile, personalizzare i tour virtuali inserendo nell’esperienza effetti sonori, come musiche o narrazioni che descrivono il luogo, prodotto o servizio, e possono essere inseriti punti di interazione che consentono di visualizzare foto e video, leggere approfondimenti, prenotare un appuntamento e tanto altro.
La creazione di ambienti in realtà aumentata, invece, ci permette di progettare qualsiasi struttura, rendendola fruibile sotto forma di tour virtuale, dunque diventa possibile visitare ed esplorare luoghi non ancora realmente esistenti. 
I nostri prodotti sono fruibili da pc, tablet e smartphone, ma soprattutto nei visori per un’esperienza totalmente immersiva.

column50: Vertumnia stands out in the hospitality sector with its innovative use of AI for personalized guest services and operational efficiency.
column51:
Vertumnia is an AI-driven virtual assistant focused on enhancing the hospitality experience. Its key functions include:

1) Automating Routine Tasks: It handles basic tasks such as check-ins, check-outs, and responding to common guest inquiries, reducing staff workload.
2) Personalizing Guest Experiences: Provides customized recommendations for local attractions and restaurants based on guest preferences.
3) Streamlining Operations: Assists in managing reservations and integrates with hotel management systems for efficient operations.
4) 24/7 Guest Support: Offers round-the-clock assistance to guests, ensuring constant availability.
5) Data Analysis for Service Improvement: Gathers and analyzes guest feedback and preferences to help improve services.
6) Enhancing Marketing Efforts: Helps in identifying and suggesting suitable promotional offers to guests.
Overall, Vertumnia aims to elevate the efficiency and quality of guest services in the hospitality sector using AI technology.

column42: Giulio Montoli, Edmondo Sparano, Giulia Fazzini, Edoardo Giorio, Giulio Maria Pezzini, Arunsankar Periyasami, Dario Baroni, Alessandro N. Ferretti, LVenture Group API Access
column50: Kultrip turns storytelling into unforgettable journeys, making it easy for travelers to explore places inspired by their favorite stories.
column51:
Kultrip helps people create unique and meaningful travel experiences inspired by their favorite books, movies, or cultural themes. Imagine walking through the real streets that shaped Gabriel García Márquez’s magical world in Colombia or exploring locations from Harry Potter’s universe in the UK. Our platform connects travelers with meticulously curated guides and itineraries designed to immerse them in these stories while simplifying the entire trip planning process.

We combine the power of technology with a deep love for storytelling and culture. Kultrip leverages artificial intelligence to recommend personalized journeys and provide the essential details, from where to go and what to do, to lesser-known places that enrich the experience. Whether you’re a solo explorer, a family, or a group of friends, we make sure your trip feels personal and special.

We also bring a human touch. Our community of travelers shares insights, tips, and reviews, making it easy for others to discover incredible experiences. And as a company born from my own family’s travel challenges, we focus on making trip planning effortless so you can spend more time exploring and enjoying the journey.

Kultrip exists to transform travel into something more meaningful—an opportunity to live the stories that inspire us.

column50: ABta will be the first SN with a win-win solution. It will consent user to obtain suggestion by top experts and earn from your own knowledge
column51:
ABta is a social network that allows tourists to easily contact locals (the experts of the city) and connect with them. This way, tourists can receive authentic and reliable information that will help them enjoy a unique experience while also creating their own travel network. Locals, in turn, have the opportunity to expand their own network and, if the tourists find their insights valuable, earn from their knowledge through tips.
Once registered, the users will need to complete their profiles, which consists of three main sections: the locations where they consider themselves experts, their Bio, and their interests. There will be a feature that allows users to search based on the destination they wish to visit or they are visiting. The feature will display profiles that are experts in that destination. This way, the user can browse through the profiles and choose who to chat with to request information about the destination. Based on the response and the subsequent experience, the user - in this case, the tourist - will have the opportunity to review the person who provided the information, evaluating their knowledge of that location.
column55: Locals  - they will use ABta for build their own network and earn from their knowledge, Tourists - they will use ABta for satisfy their own curiosity or questions and build their own network

column50: Ciro App combines geospatial tech, AI, and AR to create a unique gamified experience with personalized content and community engagement.
column51: Tourists face unengaging, generic tours with fragmented info, difficult navigation, and limited language support. Ciro solves this by offering AI-driven, personalized, multilingual tours with AR immersion, making historical exploration interactive, accessible, and enjoyable.Currently, tourists rely on standard tours or guidebooks that lack personalization, interactivity, and often multilingual support. These options are costly, inconvenient, and miss the chance to engage diverse interests. Ciro stands out by offering an AI-powered, AR-enhanced experience that adapts tours to each user’s preferences, language, and age, creating an immersive, hands-free journey that’s accessible anytime, anywhere.

column50: Horecajob non è nè una bacheca nè un ATS. E' una community dove domanda e offerta di lavoro possono contare su un head hunter virtuale h24.
column51:
Horeca Job è una piattaforma nata per rivoluzionare il paradigma della ricerca e selezione del personale operativo nel settore ho.re.ca (Alberghi, Ristorazione, Catering).
Horeca Job offre all'impresa di ottenere un job matching veloce, facile ed efficace; al candidato di vivere un'esperienza più semplice, meno frustrante, capace di garantirgli una candidatura dinamica nel tempo.
Grazie all’AI la piattaforma traccia tutte le azioni per acquisire maggiore conoscenza dei comportamenti e delle scelte dei suoi utenti, al fine di renderne l'utilizzo sempre più personalizzato.

La piattaforma è attualmente composta da due elementi:
1) un chatbot che gestisce in autonomia le attività correlate alla prima intervista conoscitiva e che raccoglie tutte le informazioni necessarie sul candidato, anche sulle sue attitudini e soft skills, evitandogli di dover riprodurre il CV.
Il chatbot intervista anche i recruiters con l'obbiettivo di identificare già durante la sessione il profilo del candidato ideale da ricercare.
2) una piattaforma web che raccoglie tutti dati emersi dalle intervista e che grazie ad un algoritmo di Intelligenza Artificiale sviluppato ad hoc, li elabora e le aziende mostra ai recruiters le candidature secondo il tasso di affinità tra le due parti.

Il progetto ha visto una fase di analisi con esperti di risorse umane del settore e non, oltre ad importanti società di ricerca e selezione del personale.Dopo un MVP creato con il finanziamento Smart Money Invitalia, è stato testato con alcuni importanti clienti, che hanno permesso di raccogliere informazioni sull’utilizzo da parte degli utenti e feedback, grazie alla vincita del bando Innovazione Emilia Romagna 2023 si è sviluppata la versione Beta che sta per andare a mercato.
A fine dicembre 2023 si è effettuato un'operazione di Work for Equity del valore di  220.000.
column55: www.horecajob.it - recruiting

column50: Smart incentive system that boosts frontline engagement, improves service, and standardizes store processes. All without bureaucracy.
column51:
GoodJobbers is a smart incentive system designed for retailers who want to enhance both the customer and employee experience, while improving in-store execution and service quality.

We offer a SaaS platform that helps retail businesses gather private, high-quality customer feedback directly at the point of sale, and use this data to reward store staff in real-time, without administrative burdens or hidden costs.

At the heart of our solution is a mobile-first experience: customers can leave feedback immediately after their in-store visit, which is fast, private, and easy to complete. These reviews are not public, which increases their honesty and usefulness. Our algorithm (in development) helps assess the reliability of the reviews and highlights the most relevant ones for operational improvements.

Unlike standard survey tools, GoodJobbers connects each feedback to specific in-store behaviors and allows the company to turn every positive experience into a reward for the staff involved. This not only boosts employee engagement but also helps standardize service processes across different locations.

GoodJobbers includes:

A mobile app, available in all major app stores, used to collect feedback in-store.

A dashboard that offers real-time visibility over performance across stores, enabling managers to take timely actions.

An integrated marketplace where rewards can be redeemed with no tax impact for employees (when in gift-card or product form).

A pay-per-use pricing model, making the solution accessible for both large and small retailers.

We are already working with several well-known brands and are seeing consistent weekly growth in review volumes (+10%) and new user registrations (+5%).

Ultimately, GoodJobbers allows retail organizations to close the loop between customer satisfaction and employee motivation, transforming feedback into action and performance into recognition—automatically, smartly, and without bureaucracy.
column55: https://goodjobbers.com - https://www.linkedin.com/company/goodjobbers

column50: Our unique approach to integrating AI in daily restaurant operations gives us a competitive edge in a market ripe for innovation.
column51:
Bitebase takes the guesswork out of managing food costs. By analyzing your ingredients and suggesting cost-effective, high-margin recipes, it helps you turn every dish into a golden opportunity for profit, making your kitchen a treasure trove of culinary success.
Problem
Bitebase aims to address the significant challenge restaurants face in managing costs and maximizing profitability. The specific problem involves the difficulty in tracking ingredient prices, calculating food costs accurately, and identifying the most profitable dishes. This complexity often leads to inefficiencies, increased costs, and reduced profitability.

Relevance to Customers

For restaurant owners and managers, this problem is highly relevant as it directly impacts their bottom line. By providing an AI-powered assistant that can create recipes, track prices, calculate food costs, and manage inventory, Bitebase offers a comprehensive solution that simplifies these tasks. This relevance is underscored by the ability of our platform to optimize menu offerings, reduce waste, and negotiate better prices with suppliers, ultimately ensuring higher profitability.

Bitebase offers an AI-powered assistant designed to streamline restaurant operations and maximize profitability. The platform includes several key functionalities:

	1.	AI Recipe Creation: Automatically generate innovative and high-margin recipes tailored to customer preferences and seasonal ingredients.
	2.	Price Tracking: Continuously monitor ingredient prices in real-time, allowing restaurants to optimize menu pricing.
	3.	Food Cost Calculation: Provide precise calculations of food costs for each dish, ensuring accurate cost management.
	4.	Inventory Management: Automate inventory tracking and management, reducing waste and optimizing stock levels.

Demonstration and Use Cases

A demonstration of Bitebase’s platform can showcase the following use cases:

	•	Recipe Optimization: A restaurant owner inputs current ingredient prices and receives AI-generated recipes that maximize profitability.
	•	Cost Monitoring: The platform tracks ingredient price fluctuations and alerts the owner to changes, enabling proactive adjustments to menu pricing.
	•	Cost Analysis: Detailed food cost reports highlight the most profitable dishes and areas where cost reductions can be achieved.
	•	Inventory Alerts: Automated alerts for low stock levels and expiration dates help manage inventory efficiently, preventing shortages and spoilage.

column50: Il Marketplace è direttamente integrato con una piattaforma social network proprietaria (Sounder) che permette di gestire gli users metadata
column51:
Sounder è un social network dedicato agli appassionati di musica che attualmente conta circa 19.000 utenti iscritti alla community della nostra App mobile (iOS + Android).

L'App è gratuita (www.sounder.app) , l'abbiamo costruita da soli in totale bootstrap, e vi invitiamo a provarla per toccare con mano la qualità del prodotto e il livello di interazioni della nostra community.

Sounder nasce per connettere persone che condividono la passione per la musica dal vivo e per gli stessi generi musicali, creando un ecosistema digitale in cui i fan con le stesse affinità musicali possono conoscersi e vivere insieme - nella vita reale - esperienze di eventi, festival e viaggi.

Di recente, in collaborazione con una rete di Tour Operators italiani, abbiamo lanciato MUSIC TRAVEL, un Experience Marketplace di viaggi organizzati per appassionati di musica in occasione di concerti e Festival organizzati in Italia e in Europa.

L’idea del nostro MVP è semplice: creare pacchetti esclusivi che permettano agli utenti di scoprire nuove destinazioni e, allo stesso tempo, vivere concerti e festival in compagnia di una community affiatata, unendo così l'esperienza turistica, l'esperienza sociale (fare nuove amicizie) e quella musicale.

Di seguito il link alla nostra pagina IG dove nella bacheca potete trovare illustrato il funzionamento dei Music Travel e i pacchetti viaggio attualmente in programmazione:

https://www.instagram.com/sounder.app/ 

Marketplace Mission : facilitare il match tra gli appassionati di musica di varie fasce d'età interessati a conoscere nuove persone in occasione di viaggi organizzati (BUYERS) e tour operator che propongono esperienze di turismo musicale (SELLERS)

Marketplace outcome proposition:

BUYERS OUTCOME (B2C) : Grazie all'integrazione del marketplace con la piattafomra social Sounder, aiutiamo gli utenti a trovare più facilmente gruppi di persone con le stesse affinità musicali con cui condividere l'esperienza di turismo musicale

SELLERS OUTCOME (B2B): Aiutiamo gli operatori turistici a massimizzare le vendite sui pacchetti offerti utilizzando la community di Sounder come Sales leverage

column50:
We use contests to drive change in consumer habits and behaviour, and we work
directly with partners to develop sustainability projects.
column51:
We are a platform that allows the correct and effective communication between companies and customers about sustainable matters and topics, thanks to a to a mechanism of green gamification. Users are interested to come on our platform for
fun and information, as well as companies will find the target consumers from a
sustainable point of view.
Our customers, being able to find an environment created specifically for sustainability,
save on marketing strategies as well as on building trust through platforms that do not
natively allow it.
The company decides together with Taiao which sustainable contest to sponsor.
Taiao runs the contest for one month, at the end there is a winner, namely the user
who got more likes (Stars).
The voting users, instead, gain one Seed for each Stars assigned. Seeds are used for
support the favourite sustainable project that Taiao realizes.
These projects have an environmental impact in terms of CO2 reduction and biodiversity protection, or a social impact in terms of supporting diversity, inclusion and community development.

column50: Crea consapevolezza ambientale dei tour in barca, rende il mare accessibile e sostenibile, con barche condivise, sponsorizza tour a 0 Impact
column51:
SHAREBOAT è una piattaforma innovativa che punta a rendere il mondo della nautica più accessibile, sostenibile e coinvolgente. La nostra missione è connettere i proprietari di barche con chi desidera vivere esperienze uniche in mare, senza l'impegno e i costi legati al possesso di un’imbarcazione.

Abbiamo recentemente acquisito il dominio www.shareboat.it e siamo pronti a lanciare la prima versione della piattaforma (MVP), che consentirà di esplorare e prenotare facilmente barche e tour. Sulla piattaforma si trovano annunci sia di privati che vogliono condividere la propria barca ricevendo un rimborso spese, sia di aziende che offrono servizi professionali di noleggio. In questi casi, SHAREBOAT applica una percentuale sulla transazione. Attualmente, gestiamo direttamente tre barche, ma stiamo lavorando per offrire anche i nostri servizi personalizzati.

Uno degli aspetti che ci rende unici è il nostro impegno per la sostenibilità. Abbiamo sviluppato un algoritmo proprietario che valuta l’impatto ambientale di ogni tour e assegna un rating specifico, espresso in “ostriche” (la nostra unità di misura). Questo sistema ha l’obiettivo di sensibilizzare i turisti e incoraggiarli a scegliere opzioni più ecologiche. Inoltre, promuoviamo attivamente i tour a impatto zero, come quelli effettuati con barche elettriche o a vela.

Guardando al futuro, vogliamo introdurre un sistema per compensare le emissioni di CO? sponsorizzando progetti di riforestazione di Posidonia oceanica o la coltivazione di mitili, creando un ciclo virtuoso tra turismo e tutela ambientale.

Un altro passo importante che implementeremo entro il 2026 è una nuova funzionalità per consentire ai turisti di inserire richieste personalizzate direttamente sulla piattaforma. I proprietari delle barche (armatori) potranno rispondere con la loro migliore offerta, accedendo alla piattaforma tramite un abbonamento. Inoltre, una futura sezione blog permetterà a enti locali e privati di pubblicizzarsi, contribuendo a creare un ecosistema ricco e interattivo.

Infine, il nostro sogno è avere in ogni porto italiano un punto fisico – un “baracchino” – che gestisca le barche messe a disposizione da privati, rendendo ancora più semplice e immediata l’esperienza di condivisione per tutti.

SHAREBOAT vuole trasformare il modo di vivere il mare, mettendo al centro condivisione, innovazione e sostenibilità.

column50: Feeder is the only solution on the market that, with a Predictive AI and a unique algorithm able to translate emotions into qualitative KPIs
column51:
FEEDER is an AI-driven platform designed to analyze audience reactions to video content, helping marketing professionals, content creators, and agencies optimize the emotional impact of their videos. Using advanced facial recognition technology, FEEDER measures real-time engagement and emotional responses, providing actionable insights to enhance content performance and maximize ROI.
In addition to its core marketing applications, FEEDER’s technology is also being adapted for real-time use in video calls. Our platform enables coaches, consultants, and professionals across industries to assess emotional cues during virtual sessions. By analyzing participants’ real-time reactions, FEEDER delivers valuable data to enhance communication, improve interaction quality, and uncover emotional patterns that inform better decision-making.
This expansion demonstrates the versatility of FEEDER’s emotional analytics, bridging the gap between digital interaction and meaningful connection. While continuing to serve our marketing clients, we’re excited to support broader use cases, bringing the power of emotional insights to real-time virtual communication.

column51:
FEEDER is an AI-driven platform designed to analyze audience reactions to video content, helping marketing professionals, content creators, and agencies optimize the emotional impact of their videos. Using advanced facial recognition technology, FEEDER measures real-time engagement and emotional responses, providing actionable insights to enhance content performance and maximize ROI.
In addition to its core marketing applications, FEEDER’s technology is also being adapted for real-time use in video calls. Our platform enables coaches, consultants, and professionals across industries to assess emotional cues during virtual sessions. By analyzing participants’ real-time reactions, FEEDER delivers valuable data to enhance communication, improve interaction quality, and uncover emotional patterns that inform better decision-making.
This expansion demonstrates the versatility of FEEDER’s emotional analytics, bridging the gap between digital interaction and meaningful connection. While continuing to serve our marketing clients, we’re excited to support broader use cases, bringing the power of emotional insights to real-time virtual communication.

column50: It's uniqueness in conducting all activities exclusively in English. Authentic Italian countryside plus English language immersion.
column51:
The English Village in Italy: A Unique Language Immersion Experience

## Project Overview
Purchase and renovate an abandoned hotel, castle or village preferably ancient, sparsely inhabited in Italy's Lazio region to create a picturesque space where only English is spoken, offering a unique and authentic experience for travellers or residents seeking tranquillity, local culture, and a break from urban life while practicing English.
 ## Motivations
1. **Scenic Location**: Create an opportunity to speak English in a real environment without spending a fortune on expensive trips abroad while capitalizing on the beauty of the Lazio countryside
2. **Cultural Immersion**: Immerse individuals, families, businesses, schools, and tourists in English language while offering traditional Italian activities and local cuisine
3. **Sustainable Tourism**: Focus on eco-friendly practices, promoting sustainable tourism while respecting the natural environment and minimizing environmental impact
## Objectives
1. **Authentic Accommodations**: Provide diverse lodging options from hotel rooms to rustic cottages and luxury villas, all designed to blend with the natural landscape
2. **Culinary Experience**: Establish a central Italian-themed restaurant serving traditional, locally-sourced dishes, complemented by cooking classes and food tours
3. **Cultural Activities**: Host events including art exhibitions, live music, and traditional performances
4. **Outdoor Adventures**: Partner with local guides for hiking, cycling, and horseback riding through the countryside
5. **Wellness and Relaxation**: Develop a spa and wellness center offering yoga retreats, wellness programs, and holistic treatments

column50: NZIRIA blends local heritage with global creativity, supporting emerging artists, social initiatives, and unique cultural experiences.
column51:
NZIRIA is a multifaceted organization focusing on promoting cultural, artistic, and creative expression. Here's what it does in detail:

Cultural Promotion
NZIRIA organizes and supports events celebrating local and international cultures, blending traditional and modern elements to foster community engagement.
Art and Music 
Web Magazine: Explores emerging trends in art and music through interviews, reviews, and features.  
- Events and Festivals: Hosts live performances, exhibitions, and collaborations spotlighting independent artists and musicians.  

Travel and Culinary Traditions 
NZIRIA introduces audiences to unique travel experiences while promoting regional culinary traditions. This includes tours, events, and content that highlight the connection between local culture and gastronomy.

NZIRIA Beer 
As a social enterprise initiative, NZIRIA introduced Italy’s first "social beer," created in collaboration with the AEFFE brewery. Proceeds support cultural activities and projects that enhance the local community.

Community Building 
Through its platform and projects, NZIRIA creates a vibrant space for creatives and enthusiasts to connect, share, and grow.

In essence, NZIRIA bridges local heritage and global experiences, celebrating the richness of art, culture, and human connection.

column50: The procedure is completely digital, avoiding human intervention and thus human error is also avoided.
column51:
In orthopedics, plaster casts are commonly used to immobilize fractures and support healing. However, they come with several potential challenges that impact the patient’s comfort and recovery. 
LOW COMFORT, POOR FIT and DURABILITY
- The (10-15%) of patients complain of limitations in daily functions due to weight and bulk. 
- They are heavy to wear 
- They emit a bad smell
Need replacement due to: 
- (5-10%) cracks, deformation or water damage;
- (1-5%) impediment to fit;
RISKS OF COMPLICATIONS
Cause of:
Nerve compression
(5-15%)4 Decubitus sores 
(~10%)5 Swelling and circulation problems
(5-30% of the cases)5  Stiffness and muscle atrophy; 
Skin irritation, sores, allergic reactions due to moisture or poor airflow.  
The following problems also exist for medical devices printed with 3D technology.
HIGH PRODUCTION COSTS 
- Involvement of numerous professionals during the production process (at least one orthopaedic physician and one biomedical engineer);
- Custom-made orthopaedic products are expensive, as are their modifications.
ONG PRODUCTION TIMES
- Making individual medical devices takes days if not even weeks for more complex ones.
- Each change requires starting all over again the production process.
- The medical devices are made in successive steps for approximation and subsequent 
printing.
Biolibrary wants to create a Integrated Piattaforma SaaS (MERGE3D) in Cloud.
That allows the orthopedic doctor with three simple steps to build personalized medical devices for the patient. The steps are:
A) The orthopaedic surgeon or the operator, through the MERGE3D platform, acquires the anthropometric data of the patient with a common smartphone.
B) The orthopaedic surgeon selects the best orthotic solution for the patient from the pre-built library of 3D models on the MERGE3D platform.
C) The MERGE3D platform automatically produces the orthotic solution according to the patient's measurements ready to be sent to the 3D printer; in use at the structure or supplied by us.
The production process behind the Merge3D platform is protected by intellectual property, by depositing at European level (patent no. 007690243-0001) and International level (PCT/EP2020/084228).

column30: Autonomous Smart Travel Ecosystem
column42: Giulio Montoli, Edmondo Sparano, Giulia Fazzini, Edoardo Giorio, Giulio Maria Pezzini, Arunsankar Periyasami, Dario Baroni, Alessandro N. Ferretti, LVenture Group API Access
column50: Pioneering the first Autonomous Smart Travel Ecosystem with unique parametric regulation engine for instant, unified passenger verification.
column51:
Further Network is pioneering the aviation industry's first Autonomous Smart Travel Ecosystem, fundamentally transforming how passengers interact with travel infrastructure globally. Our solution transcends traditional document verification by orchestrating every touchpoint of the passenger journey through a unified, intelligent platform.
At the core of our ecosystem are two groundbreaking products:
FurtherPass revolutionizes passenger admissibility by providing a single, authoritative verification platform that processes the entire spectrum of travel credentials. Unlike conventional solutions that focus solely on document verification, FurtherPass delivers real-time eligibility decisions by simultaneously authenticating multiple credentials:

Official identification (passports and national IDs)
Travel documentation (visas and permits)
Biometric data
Health certificates
Accommodation verification
Travel insurance status

This comprehensive approach eliminates the fragmentation in current systems while ensuring regulatory compliance across all travel touchpoints. By creating a global interoperability network, we're enabling seamless passenger processing that adapts dynamically to changing travel requirements.

column30: Educational investing app, that guides users step by step.
column42: Giulio Montoli, Edmondo Sparano, Giulia Fazzini, Edoardo Giorio, Giulio Maria Pezzini, Arunsankar Periyasami, Dario Baroni, Alessandro N. Ferretti, LVenture Group API Access
column50: Platform that teaches beginners how to invest in crypto while they use it — combining education and action in a single, user-friendly app.
column51:
CryptoUnity is the first educational crypto-investing app designed for absolute beginners and late adopters.
We combine a simplified user experience with built-in education to make learning and investing in crypto possible for anyone — no technical background required.

Most crypto platforms are built for experienced users. CryptoUnity changes that. We offer a FinTech–EdTech hybrid solution that guides people step by step, helping them avoid common mistakes and build real knowledge while using the app.

Here’s what we offer:
	•	Step-by-step investment journey: New users get guided from account setup to their first investment, with tips, tools, and learning checkpoints along the way.
	•	Workshops 2.0: Over 100+ bite-sized lessons and quizzes help users understand the basics of crypto, investing strategies, and market behavior — directly in the app.
	•	Short-form learning: Video “shorts” teach key concepts in under a minute, combining entertainment and education in a familiar TikTok-style format.
	•	Reward Levels: Users unlock perks like up to 50% lower fees, free deposits, or premium learning access by staying active and holding the platform’s token, CUT.
	•	Educational Profiles: Users can track their learning streaks, monitor progress, and stay motivated with gamified milestones.
	•	Beginner-friendly investing: Users can buy crypto with a SEPA bank transfer or credit card, and access tools like filters, price lists, and favorites.
	•	Safety-first approach: While keeping UX simple, we comply with strict European regulations and focus on long-term sustainability and user security.

CryptoUnity has achieved strong traction with zero paid marketing:
We’re seeing 27.6% MoM active user growth, 50% WAU/MAU stickiness, and high lesson-to-trade conversion at 34.4%. Users don’t just explore the app — they stay, learn, and invest.

We’re building the go-to crypto platform for the next wave of 3 billion investors — those who want to enter crypto but don’t know where to start.

column50: Platform that teaches beginners how to invest in crypto while they use it — combining education and action in a single, user-friendly app.
column51:
CryptoUnity is the first educational crypto-investing app designed for absolute beginners and late adopters.
We combine a simplified user experience with built-in education to make learning and investing in crypto possible for anyone — no technical background required.

Most crypto platforms are built for experienced users. CryptoUnity changes that. We offer a FinTech–EdTech hybrid solution that guides people step by step, helping them avoid common mistakes and build real knowledge while using the app.

Here’s what we offer:
	•	Step-by-step investment journey: New users get guided from account setup to their first investment, with tips, tools, and learning checkpoints along the way.
	•	Workshops 2.0: Over 100+ bite-sized lessons and quizzes help users understand the basics of crypto, investing strategies, and market behavior — directly in the app.
	•	Short-form learning: Video “shorts” teach key concepts in under a minute, combining entertainment and education in a familiar TikTok-style format.
	•	Reward Levels: Users unlock perks like up to 50% lower fees, free deposits, or premium learning access by staying active and holding the platform’s token, CUT.
	•	Educational Profiles: Users can track their learning streaks, monitor progress, and stay motivated with gamified milestones.
	•	Beginner-friendly investing: Users can buy crypto with a SEPA bank transfer or credit card, and access tools like filters, price lists, and favorites.
	•	Safety-first approach: While keeping UX simple, we comply with strict European regulations and focus on long-term sustainability and user security.

CryptoUnity has achieved strong traction with zero paid marketing:
We’re seeing 27.6% MoM active user growth, 50% WAU/MAU stickiness, and high lesson-to-trade conversion at 34.4%. Users don’t just explore the app — they stay, learn, and invest.

We’re building the go-to crypto platform for the next wave of 3 billion investors — those who want to enter crypto but don’t know where to start.

Bags Parking is an innovative luggage storage service that connects travelers from around the world with people willing to take care of their luggage.
The mission is to help travelers enjoy every moment of their journey, hands-free and worry-free.

By accessing the Bags Parking website or downloading the app, travelers can quickly find the nearest Bags Manager and hand over their luggage for as long as they need, in complete safety.
The use of this secure and personalized service will allow them to make the most of every moment of their vacation.

column42: Giulio Montoli, Edmondo Sparano, Giulia Fazzini, Edoardo Giorio, Giulio Maria Pezzini, Arunsankar Periyasami, Dario Baroni, Alessandro N. Ferretti, LVenture Group API Access
column50: Our Own Ai, unique concept, deeply experienced international team, innovative marketing approach
column51:
Dinabite is a unique marketing automation system for small businesses 

The Problem
Today there are many marketing tools available for small businesses.
But each tool is separate with its own model, making the process very time consuming and difficult to coordinate. 
Smaller businesses can afford very little marketing, or no marketing at all.

Why Dinabite
Dinabite aggregates all the best marketing tools in a single, easy-to-use platform. 
This results in better use of time, increased coordination and better results.
Dinabite will also use AI (Generative, Conversational, and Reinforcement learning) to improve the user experience and maximise marketing results.

column30: The platform that connects restaurants and people over distances
column42: Giulio Montoli, Edmondo Sparano, Giulia Fazzini, Edoardo Giorio, Giulio Maria Pezzini, Arunsankar Periyasami, Dario Baroni, Alessandro N. Ferretti, LVenture Group API Access
column50: RistoBox is the first Italian Meal Kit platform made directly by the best restaurants in Italy and delivered to people's homes in 24h.
column51:
RistoBox is the first Italian Food Experience platform. In practice, it is a platform that allows people to taste the dishes of the best restaurants in Italy directly at home without distance constraints. On the platform, the partner restaurants of RistoBox do not sell ready meals but Meal Kits, designed by RistoBox and the restaurant that will then produce them. The Meal Kits contain within them some semi-finished products fresh from the restaurant, with instructions, which will then allow people at home to recreate their dishes in a fast, fun way and without the risk of making mistakes. In fact, our goal is not to serve people looking for ready or quick meals, but for real experiences to do with food.
The Boxes are packaged directly from the restaurant, just before the Box is collected by the courier, and is delivered within the following 24 hours from its shipment throughout Italy.

column50: Italy Vr Experience offers a full experience of purchasing and using the tourist product thanks to the use of VR
column51: We digitize the Italian cultural tourism offer through the use of VR technology and distribute it both through online channels and through the retail network. Online distribution takes place both through a proprietary website and in metaverse mode. Retail distribution is made possible by the fact that we have patented and produced a VR gift box and this allows us (like a real smartbox) to distribute our tourism product within travel agencies, bookstores, large retailers. A peculiarity of our tourism product is given by the fact that we offer both a real digital tourist guide of the cultural attractor, and a series of accommodation facilities all digitized in VR. The VR digitization of accommodation facilities offers tourists the opportunity to carefully choose the structure where to stay, thus making the shopping experience first, and the stay after, extremely satisfying.

column50: Il nostro brevetto è il cuore del nostro business
column51:
Grazie a Dhom stiamo trasformando il mercato dei cocktail Ready-to-Drink (RTD) con una soluzione innovativa che combina qualità premium, sostenibilità e scalabilità. Al cuore della nostra offerta c’è il nostro bicchiere smart brevettato, 100% riciclabile, capace di mantenere il ghiaccio alla temperatura ideale fino a 90 minuti, garantendo bevande di altissima qualità ovunque, senza bisogno di un bar tradizionale.

Il nostro modello di business è progettato per essere altamente scalabile. Forniamo la nostra tecnologia e le nostre attrezzature ia noleggio a discoteche, locali ed eventi, consentendo di:

Ottimizzare il lavoro dei barman: Preparazione più veloce e riduzione dei tempi d’attesa.
Aumentare i ricavi: Il nostro sistema permette di servire un cocktail in meno di 4 secondi, garantendo un numero maggiore di vendite in meno tempo.
Ridurre i costi operativi: Eliminazione di materiali monouso e semplificazione logistica grazie al sistema di bicchieri riutilizzabili.
Permette di diminuire il personale al bar, problematica comune delle discoteche e dei locali stagionali.
Il mercato RTD è in forte crescita, con un valore stimato di €40 miliardi entro il 2027 e un CAGR del +5%. Dhom è posizionata per intercettare questa opportunità grazie a un prodotto unico, una strategia innovativa e una chiara attenzione alla sostenibilità.

Ad oggi abbiamo dimostrato la validità del nostro modello con oltre 4.000 cocktail venduti, 10 eventi di successo e €25.000 di fatturato iniziale senza investire in marketing. 
Puntiamo a espandere il nostro mercato, sviluppare nuove linee di prodotto e consolidare la nostra presenza in eventi e locali strategici. Dhom non è solo un prodotto: è un nuovo modo di vivere i cocktail, offrendo qualità, efficienza e sostenibilità.

column30: Smart Urban Mobility Ecosystem
column42: Giulio Montoli, Edmondo Sparano, Giulia Fazzini, Edoardo Giorio, Giulio Maria Pezzini, Arunsankar Periyasami, Dario Baroni, Alessandro N. Ferretti, LVenture Group API Access

Giulia Fazzini
out of scope, potenziale per spectrum
column50: The NIODYNE project is so revolutionary that we gained the R&D partnership from the Departments of AI & Robotics at the University of Padua.
column51:
NIODYNE | THE FUTURE MOVES HERE
UNIFIED BY INTELLIGENCE
DESIGNED FOR MOTION
ELECTRIFYING LUXURY

NIODYNE - the  fully integrated AI-powered ecosystem of premium EVs for personal urban mobility— across water, land, and air — all connected through our proprietary OS, enriched by ADAS/autonomous systems, and protected with blockchain-based safety & data integrity.

As bold new startup transforming the future of urban mobility — on land, water, and soon, in the sky — NIODYNE is building a revolution from VENEZIA, a city where sustainable, smart urban transport is not just a goal but a necessity.

NIODYNE has created an innovative mobility ecosystem that combines the technological innovation and forward-thinking vision of TESLA with APPLE's philosophy of a full ecosystem—creating a seamless synergy between vehicles, hardware, software, and infrastructure.
From next-gen e-boats for smart cities like Amsterdam and Venice, to enclosed quad-scooters, modular microcars, and passenger drones — NIODYNE is reimagining how people move in high-density, high-lifestyle environments with luxury-grade design, zero emissions, and cutting-edge tech.

In this phase we are mainly focusing on water-based commuting.
Imagine transforming urban waterways with AI-powered luxury boats.

After more than 4 years of relentless R&D and self-funded development, we’re raising €500K in our Seed round (at a €2.5M pre-money valuation) to build Alpha prototypes and capture a $12B market opportunity.

Why Niodyne?  
Smart Luxury: 6.5m boats with Level 3 AI autonomy (M-ADAS), Italian design, and sustainable materials.  
Integrated Ecosystem: Universal OS and swappable dashboard for seamless mobility, also across our future vehicle lineup.
Safety & Connectivity: Proprietary V2X communication and blockchain-certified black box to prevent accidents and enhance urban integration
Market Ready: €100K committed by NextEnergy Group’s NEXTSTEP fund, forecasting about €60M in pre-order reservations by 2027.

Why now?  
We’re at a pivotal moment to redefine urban water mobility with cutting-edge AI and luxury craftsmanship.
The electric smart boat market is projected to grow from $4.5B in 2024 to $12.3B by 2034 (10.5% CAGR)

With partners like the University of Padova and Venetian shipyards, we’re set to launch prototypes by mid-2026.

column50: It is a staff centric solution where customer satisfaction is reached through staff motivation, engagement and empowerment.
column51:
Andrea Lasalandra is an Italian hotelier which was seeking a way to boost his staff performance inside his hotels. He developed an MVP which was very successful in his hotels and then decided to upgrade the prototype and startup a proper company. Despite he did not dedicate 100% of his time on the project, thanks to his connections in the hotel industry and the direct experience in managing hotels the project quickly gained traction and interest amongst other colleague hoteliers. 

The software has the objective to reach hotel customer satisfaction through staff satisfaction. It aims at doing so through staff empowerment and staff engagement.

Here is a short and "on the point" description of the modules in the software:

Know-how module: a digital vademecum where the hotel can define all its SOPs and relative quizzes so staff's comprehension on procedures can be tested and improved

Merits&Skills: a module entirely dedicated to the meritocracy of staff where employees can earn points according to their performance and to the objectives reached. Milestone can be unlocked and cash-out/bonus can be earned.

Task Manager: a task manager fully integrated with the above sections.

Housekeeping module: a module where the cleaning ladies of the hotel can update the status of the rooms (clean, dirty, clean to be checked, clean checked etc.) They can alert other departments on maintenance work required in the room, they can transmit to hotel software (PMS) through an API connection the extras which have been sold in the minibar.

Action module: the hotel's review are screen scraped from online portals and the staff has the chance to create tasks from guest's feedback
column55: Hotel Managers - Improving staff efficiency

column50: Knowing the live availability of our partner's vehicles we are the only platform that can guarantee an end-to-end online booking process.
column51:
Holidayscoot is an online booking platform for scooter rentals in tourist destinations. By partnering with local rental businesses and equipping them with our proprietery rental management system, we offer travelers real-time vehicle availability, instant booking confirmations, and multilingual support, all while ensuring a seamless and transparent end-to-end booking process.

By addressing inefficiencies  (lack of knowledge of vehicle availability, language barriers, and lack of instant booking confirmation) in the traditional rental market, Holidayscoot bridges the information gap between tourists and two-wheel mobility solutions, empowering travelers to experience their destinations with ease. Backed by a scalable business model and validated product-market fit, Holidayscoot is poised to redefine the future of two-wheel mobility in the tourism sector.
column55: Rental shops - They use our rental management system sharing thier fleet live availability with our booking plaform, Tourists - They book scooter rental on our booking website

column51:
Tamred is a social network revolutionizing how people organize, share, and relive their travel experiences.

We solve two major problems for travelers:

- Lost travel memories: Photos and videos are often scattered across platforms, making it difficult to revisit meaningful moments.
- Complicated trip planning: Travelers spend excessive time switching between tools to create itineraries, which can be frustrating and inefficient.

With Tamred, we offer a seamless solution:

- Personalized 3D world: Users can store and explore their travel memories in an interactive virtual environment.
- AI-powered itineraries: Instant travel plans tailored to users' interests and preferences.
- Community engagement: A trusted network of travelers provides authentic recommendations and inspiration.
Our MVP launched on December 25, 2024, and we are actively building a dedicated community of travel enthusiasts. Early user feedback confirms the value of our approach to creating a unified travel experience that combines nostalgia, planning, and discovery.

Tamred’s mission is to transform travel into a lifelong journey of memories and connections, leveraging cutting-edge technology and a passionate community. We are positioned to disrupt the travel-tech industry with a platform that bridges inspiration and action in an intuitive, innovative way.
column55: Experienced travelers - People passionate about travel who want to easily organize, share, and relive their experiences and sale your itineraries., Travel agencies and tour operators - Businesses that could use Tamred to create personalized itineraries for their clients., Travel influencers and content creators - Users who share travel itineraries and experiences with a community., Young adults and Millennials - A demographic looking for innovative ways to explore the world and connect with fellow travelers.

column50: CityOpenSource works on collaborative mapping and open data, builds a business model that weaves Saas & Daas with analysis tools
column51:
CityOpenSource enables everyone to tell stories in direct connection with the places where they stories develop, creating maps with content and data, to share and reuse. The platform is a PaaS that stimulates the sharing, reuse and personalization of the experience and plays on the possibility to integrate additional services such as push and gammification notifications together with geo analitycs.
A webapp allows georeferencing qualitative content (photos, audio, video) and quantitative data (alphanumeric datasets) that can be imported and exported at any time. The data / content can be reused (compatibly with the use licenses adopted) by all the other users of the platform, thus allowing the reuse of the data as a service (DaaS).
All users on the platform can easily create maps with quantitative data (data visualization) and qualitative content (lifestream), share them, receive votes (ranking and reward) and comments from the community (engagement) and be followed by this (following).
Currently the platform hosts 19 maps with 4.600 locations, over 7.000 contents and 1800 mappers. The contents of these projects, based on the licenses issued, can be reused by other map projects on the platform.
The project has a business model based on the PaaS model that targets the B2B and markets. The market is that of webmapping platforms (Carto, uMap, etc.) that provide expert knowledge or place limits on the export of data (google).
The webmapping market and the tools for location based services are described as a point of intersection between the sectors of the market for the GIS equal to $ 2.5 billion, the market $ 4.2 billion visualization of the data and the market $ 7.5 billion for location-based services. CityOpenSource is a platform where everyone can create maps, import and export data.
