column42: Giulio Montoli, Edmondo Sparano, Francesco Varuzza, Giulia Fazzini, Edoardo Giorio, Davide Pozzi, Giulio Maria Pezzini, Arunsankar Periyasami, Dario Baroni, Andrea Tripodo, Alessandro N. Ferretti, LVenture Group API Access

Paolo Ottaviani
La startup ELNAV sta sviluppando Helm Order Monitor (in attesa di brevetto). È la prima soluzione tecnologica al problema dell'insufficiente monitoraggio degli ordini di timoneria tra timoniere e pilota o navigatore a bordo delle navi. Più per Faros che per noi però la sentirei

pietro nobili
Utilizzano la automatic speech recognition per controllare la correttezza dell'esecuzione degli ordini di manovra e gestione velocità nelle grosse navi commerciali e turistiche per prevenire gli incidenti (loro tra gli esempi citano il caso Concordia). Il progetto è interessante e potrebbe essere in linea con il programma. Team e partnership forti.
column50: ELNAV.AI leverages 30 years of maritime expertise to innovate safety solutions, addressing critical industry gaps with advanced technology.
column51:
Startup ELNAV is developing Helm Order Monitor (patent pending). It is the first technological solution to the problem of insufficient monitoring of helm orders between helmsman and pilot or navigator onboard ships. 

At open sea, ships sail with autopilot turned on, but to enter the port or pass-through narrow channels the ship must go to manual steering. Maritime pilot embarks the ship and steering are conducted by a helmsman via verbal helm orders. 

The most apparent problem is that nothing prevents a helmsman from putting the rudder over the wrong way. The helmsman can also misinterpret or otherwise wrongly execute issued helm orders.

We are fixing these problems with the electronic device that combines automatic speech recognition and data received from ship sensors. This artificial intelligence allows us to continuously monitor whether issued helm orders are clear, confirmed, and most importantly, correctly executed.

The main benefits of this device are:

* The helmsman will have to repeat the helm orders clearly, and the device will issue visual and audio warnings if the helm order is being omitted, misinterpreted, or wrongly executed.

* Assistance in monitoring the execution of helm orders when the concentration drops.

* Indicator of the last issued helm order.

* Implementation of automated warnings otherwise not available in hand steering, such as Default RoT deviation, Drift limit alarm, Max. rudder alarm and Low-speed alarm.

* Transcription of recorded data as an analytical tool and performance benchmarking for insurance companies, shipping companies, nautical schools/colleges, and training centers for seafarers.

Helm Order Monitor is like Lane Departure Warning to use an analogy with road transportation.

In a study conducted by Transport Canada, when pilots were asked whether language barriers make it challenging to communicate orders to the helmsman on foreign-registered vessels, 20% reported that it “often” resulted in difficulty communicating. In the same study, pilots stated that the major problem in pilotage anywhere in the international scene is the language barrier. 

Thanks to rapid advances in ASR technology, the Helm Order Monitor is now in a unique position to become an example of positive action towards language barrier problem solutions in the marine industry.
column55: Shipping companies - 53.000 merchant ships around the world, Training centres for seafarers - For training of new officers / able bodied seamen

Dootbox è una piattaforma di abbonamento alle auto che offre piani flessibili, accesso facile ai veicoli e una mobilità senza problemi. Dootbox semplifica gli ostacoli alla mobilità dei turisti offrendo una piattaforma online di abbonamento alle auto facile da usare. 
La startup si concentra sulla tecnologia per rendere l'abbonamento alle auto un'esperienza semplice e conveniente per i clienti, mentre i partner locali si occupano della gestione dei veicoli. Business model: B2C. Traction: la piattaforma al momento conta 1600 iscritti. Team competente (5 membri) supportato da due advisor.
column50: Dootbox offers a low-cost, high-quality, fast integration tailored for car providers, with major industry players as clients.
column51:
Dootbox is revolutionizing the car rental and sales industry by tackling the inefficiencies of traditional paper-driven lead management processes. Car providers typically face high costs, around €1600, and lengthy onboarding times of 2-3 weeks, leading to frustration and potential business losses. 

Dootbox's innovative ERP software digitalizes the entire car acquisition process, significantly reducing paperwork by 80% and cutting onboarding costs and time. The software automates lead management, accelerates processes, and enhances user experience, making transactions more efficient and error-free.

The competitive advantages of Dootbox include active user involvement, seamless integration with existing systems, improved operational efficiency, and scalability to accommodate businesses of all sizes. These features position Dootbox as a market leader, offering unparalleled benefits to its users.

Dootbox serves leasing companies, car dealers, and financial institutions, helping them streamline operations, reduce costs, and improve efficiency. Operating as a B2B SaaS provider, Dootbox offers a subscription-based model that ensures customers always have access to the latest features and updates without significant upfront investments. This flexible and scalable approach makes Dootbox an essential tool for the industry, driving productivity and profitability for its clients.
column55: Banks - Assist in managing car financing over their distribution networks, increasing transaction volumes and operational efficiency., Car Dealers - Manage leads effectively, reduce paperwork, and speed up the sales process., Rental Agencies - Streamline car acquisition and rental processes, reducing costs and improving efficiency.

Our platform streamlines vendor operations, reducing wait times, minimizing food waste, and boosting revenue.

With PickEat, every moment at your event is optimized for enjoyment, guaranteeing a seamless and unforgettable experience for everyone.

We start by collaborating with vendors to understand their production times and the number of orders they can handle simultaneously. Using this data, we create a distribution plan before the event, allowing us to know the production capacity for each time slot.

On the user side, we enable ordering and payment via smartphone, with available time slots reflecting the vendor's capacity. We notify users when their orders are ready.

By optimizing production capacity, we reduce costs and waste (minimizing errors caused by stress) and provide fans with a seamless event experience without any time wasted.

Beyond attendee benefits, PickEat is a boon for vendors, improving cash flow by facilitating advanced orders and payments. Consequently, this improves stock management and boosts operational productivity. Furthermore, PickEat exclusively elevates typical spending per user through targeted promotions and event-specific deals, enhancing opportunities for revenue growth.

Our final goal si to track the 100% of F&B data at events and monetize them with the event organizer or our partners.

column50: In its approach to know exclusive places (monuments and nature) and products, through meeting local people, in a luxurious & cultural style.
column51:
I have a project to be a central Italy expert DMC (destination management company) which takes care of knowing, studying, testing and proposing new places to visit, aiming to a cultural and sustainable tourism. 
We promote all those areas of central Italy which, despite being ready, are still little frequented, bringing a constant flow of tourism, contributing to move local economies. Of course places have to be beautiful, clean and full of welcoming people.
We are focused on knowing people, their culture, traditions and products, to be proposed in a niche luxury way, and these is what we offer, our core business. We build every single moment of the “experience” using all the items that luxury tourists look for. We have created a “new way of being luxurious”: the sense of luxury is guaranteed by mixing different kind of offers; we bring seemingly simple things to a level of luxury, on the other side we look at the true essence of absolutely luxurious things, trying to grasp the true value. We do so, in a continuous mix of different things, which help customers to immerse and feel the Italian culture, despite they don't understand where exactly the “luxury” is.
All the structures that we propose, are strictly inserted in a context of local, Italian and historical luxury, leaving aside mass-produced hotels belonging to large global hotel chains.
Our purposes are provided for holidays or for a one day tour.
We celebrate the "small". Small groups in small areas, doing "small things" and hanging out in small venues. And, of course, the slow, trying to be a new way of doing tourism after the Covid 19 era, that closed all the human contacts.
We don’t agree with mass-produced luxury, we offer an elite cultural luxury.
Moreover, Inceptioning would like to create an app that will in a certain sense do what a DMO should do, to integrate with a DMC. That is, it will take care of "recruiting" all the structures that want to collaborate with Inceptioning with the common aim of creating a product that can be "consumed" by the customer; so that knowledge of the territory is obtained through a quality and innovative product.
Inside the app there will be all the features sought by Inceptioning, in order to be sustainable, quality and within the Inceptioning mood.

https://youtube.com/shorts/OYmdvH080Lo?si=G8BZRqqzwQFYj4w0
Thanks.

column50: A unique blend of robotics, genomics, and spatial AI for underwater ecosystem intelligence.
column51:
Immersea is a marine deep-tech company developing modular, intelligent systems for environmental monitoring and scientific exploration in coastal and shallow-water ecosystems. Our core mission is to advance marine research and conservation through the integration of ecorobotics, genomics, AI, and 3D spatial technologies. 
We design and engineer compact platforms for underwater data acquisition, combining environmental DNA (eDNA) sampling, autonomous sensor networks, 3D habitat reconstruction, and AI-powered analysis. Our systems are optimized for deployment by scientific divers or integration on mini-ROVs and diver propulsion vehicles (DPVs), enabling access to complex or fragile environments with minimal impact. 
Our flagship platform, Aquascope, is a lightweight and pressure-rated unit that allows georeferenced eDNA collection and real-time acquisition of environmental parameters. Using low-shear filtration and embedded sensors, Aquascope provides reliable data for biodiversity assessment, habitat monitoring, and ecological modeling. The platform is fully modular and designed for cost-effective, in-situ deployment across various field missions. 
Immersea also develops advanced methods for 3D underwater mapping, including photogrammetry and Gaussian splatting, to digitally reconstruct seafloor habitats, submerged structures, and archaeological sites with centimeter-level precision. These techniques are essential for applications in marine spatial planning, restoration ecology, and underwater cultural heritage. 
All our systems are supported by a dedicated software and AI stack, capable of processing biological and spatial data to produce predictive models of ecosystem dynamics, detect anomalies, and support science-based decision-making. 
We operate at the intersection of marine robotics, molecular oceanography, and digital twin technologies, building the next generation of tools for marine scientists, conservationists, and blue economy stakeholders.

column51:
Yenrik31 is an online platform that helps travelers discover and book activities, tours, and attractions around the world. The platform offers a wide range of experiences in destinations around the globe, including sightseeing tours, adventure sports, cultural experiences, and more.

Travelers can browse and book activities online through the Yenrik31 website or app, and access their tickets and vouchers through the app. The company partners with local tour operators and activity providers to offer a diverse selection of experiences and to ensure high-quality service.

Yenrik31 aims to make it easy for travelers to discover and book activities, and to provide a seamless experience from booking to completion. The platform offers a variety of payment options, including credit card, PayPal, and local payment methods. Yenrik31 also offers customer support through its website and app, including assistance with booking and cancelling activities, and help with any issues that may arise during an activity.

In addition to its platform for individual travelers, Yenrik31 also offers group and corporate travel solutions. The company partners with travel agents, tour operators, and corporate travel managers to provide customized experiences and solutions for groups and corporate events.

Yenrik31 also offers SaaS platform to the tour operators to manage their tour activities, their offline bookings, insurance etc..

Overall, Yenrik31 aims to be the go-to destination for travelers looking to book unique and memorable experiences around the world.

column50: It is the first company in Europe to understand the importance and potential of experiential tourism in the brewing sector
column51:
Con Beerple vogliamo introdurre sul mercato italiano un portale specializzato che offra ad appassionati e moderni food travellers la possibilità di scoprire, prenotare e vivere autentiche attività esperienziali legate ad una risorsa pregiata e limitata come la birra artigianale valorizzandone la produzione e le sue tradizionali metodologie di lavorazione. Esattamente come già avvenuto per il settore del vino! La soluzione proposta rappresenta inoltre uno strumento inclusivo, consentendo ai produttori di approcciare in maniera ordinata ed efficace al mondo del turismo, oltre che sostenibile, promuovendo e valorizzando il turismo di prossimità.
Il servizio offerto rappresenta una novità assoluta per il mercato italiano, oltre che europeo, poiché, ad oggi, la totalità dei competitors o è di tipo generalista o è verticalizzato su altri segmenti (vino, olio, cibo, ecc.) offrendo per lo più attività dal ridotto impatto esperienziale. Con Beerple vogliamo invece differenziarci con un’offerta non solo verticalizzata sul segmento della birra artigianale ma vogliamo farlo proponendo attività ad alto impatto esperienziale. Pertanto gli sforzi del nostro Team si concentreranno nell’individuazione di birrifici che: dimostrino di condividere i valori su cui si fonda il progetto (qualità, passione, ospitalità, territorialità, ecc.); presentino determinati requisiti di operatività; siano in grado di offrire ai viaggiatori attività esperienziali che rispettino rigidi standards relativi ad unicità, autenticità, originalità e livello di coinvolgimento.
Dal lato operativo la piattaforma si rivolgerà esclusivamente ai clienti finali (B2C) grazie ad un catalogo consultabile in ogni momento, garantendo un servizio efficiente ed affidabile che, attraverso un sistema di gestione di prenotazioni e pagamenti all'avanguardia, assicuri al viaggiatore i più alti standard qualitativi. In termini di area geografica, verrà servito inizialmente il solo territorio italiano ma a partire dalla seconda metà del 2024 è prevista l’espansione del modello di business anche a tutti quei paesi europei che, come l’Italia, hanno dimostrato e continuano a dimostrare particolare propensione al segmento del turismo esperienziale, in generale, ed in particolare a quello del turismo brassicolo. In primis, Germania, Belgio, Francia e Spagna, in cui la piattaforma sarà disponibile nella lingua locale.

column30: It's a new mobility service that gathers carpooling and micro mobility
column42: Giulio Montoli, Edmondo Sparano, Francesco Varuzza, Giulia Fazzini, Edoardo Giorio, Davide Pozzi, Giulio Maria Pezzini, Arunsankar Periyasami, Dario Baroni, Andrea Tripodo, Alessandro N. Ferretti, LVenture Group API Access
column51:
GreenWisp is a new mobility service that integrates a dynamic carpooling with micromobility. The result is easier usability, more availability, more efficiency and more sustainability. GreenWisp’s team has developed a simulation software thanks to which the GreenWisp carpooling service has been designed to make urban mobility as efficient as possible. As a result of the software simulations, GreenWisp service focuses on the following pillars:
-Real-time booking, to give flexibility to the users
-Meeting points in every municipality of a metropolitan area, to gather daily commuters between the municipality and the city
-Pivot points at the entrances of the city to leave the passengers whose destination is too far from the driver’s path
-Micro mobility integration, offered by GreenWisp (e.g. a bike), to passengers that can’t be left close enough to their destinations, to continue their travel
-High-demand time spans exploitation, to increase the probability of match.

Paolo Ottaviani
Il Team R&S GAMING'S è una componente interna della impresa innovativa R&S SOLUTIONS SRLS, con sede a Cagliari e Roma, opera con un network esteso anche internazionale. Il team è specializzato nella ricerca & sviluppo di game, di prodotti e servizi digitali affini, nello specifico attualmente è impegnato nella conclusione del simulatore di stazione spaziale MARS GREEHOUSE VR, da utilizzare con visori 3D VR. Versioni beta del prodotto / software sono state presentate al BIAT2021 a Taormina, al WMC Barcellona 2022, al BIAT2022 ed al concorso NASA  Al CES2023 di Las Vegas non è stato possibile- Le attività sono condivise con Team R&S interni e dei partner imprese / istituzioni del settore aerospazio, IoT ed innovazione agritech agrifood come da documenti allegati. Creare sistemi di gamification personalizzati per WURTH.  Promuovere i prodotti e servizi tramite un virtual influencer quale ad esempio complesso MARS GREENHOUSE VR oppure il suo "astronauta" o il suo "AI androide ologramma avatar" o creare la "Mascotte WURTH" multiruolo. Migliorare l’esperienza in store dei clienti con virtual tour game o metaverso store con interazione edtech prodotti / utilizzo / sicurezza. Team ed approccio boomer, ma non è un deterrente, quindi direi di si

column51: Il Team R&S GAMING'S è una componente interna della impresa innovativa R&S SOLUTIONS SRLS, con sede a Cagliari e Roma, opera con un network esteso anche internazionale. Il team è specializzato nella ricerca & sviluppo di game, di prodotti e servizi digitali affini, nello specifico attualmente è impegnato nella conclusione del simulatore di stazione spaziale MARS GREEHOUSE VR, da utilizzare con visori 3D VR. Versioni beta del prodotto / software sono state presentate al BIAT2021 a Taormina, al WMC Barcellona 2022, al BIAT2022 (https://biat-ita.it/progetti-edizione/) ed al concorso NASA (https://2022.spaceappschallenge.org/locations/cagliari/event). Al CES2023 di Las Vegas non è stato possibile, sono in corso di programmazione altre opportunità con ICE tra cui la call https://www.call4innovitsf.com/ ed altre iniziative pubbliche e private. Le nostre attività sono condivise con Team R&S interni e dei partner imprese / istituzioni del settore aerospazio, IoT ed innovazione agritech agrifood come da documenti allegati. Nella nostra programmazione è prevista, la dove opportuno, la creazione di startup spin-off delle innovazioni di prodotto / servizio in elaborazione. Se gradito si avrà modo di esplicare in dettagliate comunicazioni.

column45:
Federico Battisti
Tecnologia e soluzione interessante, team pressocchè inesistente. Per me ininvestibile in un ottica da VC. Peccato.

Andrea Tripodo
Piattaforma all in one che consente agli utenti di prenotare treni e hotel per viaggi multitratta in modo smart. Mercato molto interessante. Leggendo i commenti precedenti sembra che il founder sia molto committed. Adesso il team è composto da un altro membro (CTO) che detiene il 20% delle quote. Sembra però che la situazione sia ancora molto early: hanno ottenuto 100 early subscribers grazie a test che hanno effettuato tramite social media (no ads a pagamento) - non hanno ancora lanciato il prodotto sul mercato.

pietro nobili
Come da commenti precedenti, la startup è troppo early e c'è solo un founder. Conosciuto a FIrenze confermo il fatto che spinge e l'ho indirizzato sul trovare un team anche in ottica delle prossime edizioni di Argo. Possiamo rimanerci in contatto per rimanere aggiornati
column50: Our users are able to plan and book multiple tickets in one sitting, building a community while they do so.
column51: A platform where slow travel doesn't need to mean slow booking process. Adopting a mobile first strategy, users will be able to book pan-European trips as easy as setting stops A,B, C..., having their transport e-tickets and hotels all booked and in one place.

Nulla di innovativo per me ma l'app è ben fatta e la user experience è piacevole.

Modello Freemium dove si prendono una fee del 15% su ogni viaggio venduto dal creator
Traction quasi assente al momento e Cap Table bella incasinata

column8: Hospitality, Tourism
column30: "Discover Rome's  history with our guided tours and immersive experiences
column42: Giulio Montoli, Edmondo Sparano, Francesco Varuzza, Giulia Fazzini, Edoardo Giorio, Davide Pozzi, Giulio Maria Pezzini, Arunsankar Periyasami, Dario Baroni, Andrea Tripodo, Alessandro N. Ferretti, LVenture Group API Access
column50: Young founders reinventing Rome's tourism with fresh, modern approaches. Join us in reshaping the industry's future.
column51:
At Memento Experiences, our mission is to transport you through time, unraveling the mysteries of ancient Rome and immersing you in the rich cultural tapestry of the Eternal City. We are dedicated to delivering exceptional experiences, combining historical expertise with a passion for storytelling to create memories that last a lifetime.

Exclusive Guided Tours:

Embark on a personalized journey with our expert guides, who breathe life into the ruins and relics of Rome. Our guided tours offer an in-depth exploration of the Colosseum, where you'll witness the grandeur of ancient gladiatorial contests and learn about the engineering marvels that defined this iconic amphitheater.

The Roman Forum, once the bustling center of political and social life, comes alive as our guides share tales of emperors, senators, and everyday citizens who shaped the city's destiny. Ascend the Palatine Hill to enjoy panoramic views of Rome and delve into the history of this ancient aristocratic neighborhood.

Vatican City Extravaganza:

Step into the spiritual heart of the Catholic Church with our Vatican tours. Explore the Vatican Museums' vast collection of art and artifacts, including Michelangelo's masterpiece, the Sistine Chapel. Marvel at St. Peter's Basilica, a testament to architectural brilliance, and discover the Vatican's hidden gems with our knowledgeable guides.

Tailored Private Tours:

For a more intimate experience, opt for our private tours designed to cater to your preferences. Customize your itinerary, delve deeper into specific areas of interest, and enjoy the flexibility of exploring at your own pace. Our knowledgeable guides ensure a personalized and informative journey tailored to your group's needs.

Expert Guides:

Our team of passionate and accredited guides are the heart of. With a wealth of historical knowledge and a flair for storytelling, they transform each tour into a captivating narrative. Expect engaging anecdotes, historical insights, and a genuine enthusiasm for sharing the magic of Rome.

column50: Unlike traditional gaming solutions that focus on online connectivity, Travel.Passport.GG bridges the physical gap for gamers on the move.
column51: Travel.Passport.GG is a platform that revolutionizes gaming for travelers. We provide a seamless service that allows gamers to find and book gaming stations anywhere in the world, connect with local players for an enhanced gaming experience and ensure their gaming achievements are saved and accessible, no matter where they play. Our service includes detailed listings of gaming spots, reservation capabilities, and a social platform for finding gaming partners.

L'obiettivo principale è promuovere destinazioni culturali e rinnovare la fruizione e la conoscibilità del patrimonio culturale, rispondendo alla crescente domanda di esperienze culturali innovative per attività nel terzo settore, nell'industria alberghiera, nelle istituzioni culturali ed educative, negli eventi di turismo e cultura, e nella promozione dei prodotti tipici del Made in Italy.

column50: A single portal where you can rent and rent multiple veicles at the same time, available for rental companies and private indivisuals.
column51: Ogogo is the Italian 'multisharing' platform that allows sharing owned vehicles between private individuals, with different functions: you can enjoy new experiences, organise leisure trips or move around for work thanks to a complete, interactive and secure service. People increasingly need landmarks that facilitate different transport needs. Our mission is to match the growing demand for temporary mobility with the availability of thousands of vehicles and means of transport, most of whose capacity is still unused. This is the synthesis of our values, a vision born out of the friendship between two fellow travellers who decided to embrace a challenge in favour of innovation and sharing: to offer users the opportunity to move independently and according to their needs, while at the same time promoting the spread of sustainable practices and alternative sources of savings.

column50: An empowering space, where your ideas, experiences, knowledge, have value - regardless of the number of likes and followers.
column51:
A mobile app where you record experiences that mean something to you – with text, images and geo-tagged – which you may share, and discover those of  like-minded people. A quality digital experience, where everyone's ideas are genuinely valued. 

We see a clear market opportunity to create a platform that empowers the user by disassociating their post's intrinsic value from the number of likes received, and by providing a socialisation mechanism based on shared interests, that will deliver a strong bond social network.

The demographic that has responded best to our test advertising campaign, as well as to hacking  (i.e. download and register) have been 40–60yo with tertiary education, and they constitute our target market 

OUR PROPOSITION
• From the user perspective:
1) We have got rid of the damaging and addictive elements  of social networks. Ours is a healthy and empowering experience
2) Data privacy and the user's control of their content. This is in our DNA.
3) The user is also in control, for each post, of its degree of sociability

• From the customer (revenue) perspective:
1) Our revenue model is a form of advertising, which we call Community Marketing. It is a freemium model based on the peer-to-peer recommendations the users give to each other. Once we detect a "buzz" around that post, we invite the local business to interact with those users who have demonstrated a positive attitude towards it. The retailer can then do various campaigns and marketing exercises, building their own community within the platform.
column55: Customers: Local retailers (B2B) - To create their own marketing platform to interact with those users interested in their business, Users: 40yo+ with tertiary education interested in travel and culture - To record their memorable experiences and discover those of like-minded people

column50: Social media that facilitates High Quality & Real interactions with real people doing real walks. We are focused on Health and wellness.
column51:
We are where Strava meets Facebook meets Linkedin
Have you wanted to go for a walk but not by yourself or wanted to see another country or make friends while you walk? Walks around the world connect you with new friends where you can share experiences all by walking and staying fit. You can pick the type of people you want to talk to, where they are located. We have dedicated safe walking places for people to meet. Who knows.. you might meet your next good friend, business Partner, or learn about new culture all while walking. 

There are many people that are bored and just want someone to talk/share/learn with… why not have someone show you Quebec City, Tokyo, or Barcelona. Be a friend and share your experiences. 

My story: As I traveled throughout the world, I barely could find people that I could walk with. Sometimes I wanted to talk about my day or bounce new ideas or learn. Covid has created the new normal, There are millions of people that now think walking is cool. With Walks Around The World, the possibilities are endless.

- Be healthy
- Shop
- Date
- Book a personalized travel tour
- Get a new travel deal that pops up from Priceline.com

Company mission:

* We are passionate about bringing people together around the world
* Everyone can use our service to discover walks and make new friends
* We provide a safe platform for people to walk and talk
* We believe in a world where you can have productive, collaborative, virtual interactions with coworkers while doing things that promote a healthier, happier you
* We believe that the ability to take your meetings on the move increases engagement, sparks creativity, and decreases burnout
* We believe that we can bring the world together by walking

WALKING IS HAVING A MOMENT
59 percent of active adults chose outdoor activities like walking as the best way to stay fit in 2021, a 15 percent increase from the start of 2020

WALKING IS GROWING
Fitness tracker company Strava’s annual report supports that uptick. According to their 2020 data on 73 million athletes, uploads of outdoor walks tripled year-over-year. Even cyclists switched up their fitness routines; walking was the top new activity for cyclists on the platform between April and June.

WALK THE TALK

Why the sudden obsession with walking? For many people, walking has been a way to connect safely with others. “Walking is one of the easiest exercise activities to make social,” says Dani Singer, CEO and director of Fit2Go Personal Trai

column50: Inclusive mobility becomes a reality. Thanks to ¡UP! architectural barriers disappear and art is within everyone's reach. So Wake ¡UP!
column51:
¡UP! project aims to develop a digital tool with integrated services to facilitate the movement of people with motor disabilities and difficulties to overcome architectural barriers in art cities. In addition, it is central to integrate services in support of the person on the territory and to co-design them with local partners.
To meet the above need, the project is set up on 3 lines of action:
The heart of ¡UP! is an application that helps people with motor disabilities, with general mobility difficulties and reduced mobility (such as elderly people and families with pushchairs) in their movements within the territory of the Municipality, promoting the knowledge of itineraries that can be traveled on and without architectural barriers, to facilitate access to cultural sites that are difficult or impossible to reach.
The target audience includes direct beneficiaries such as people with reduced mobility (disabled, elderly but also families with strollers), and indirect beneficiaries such as families and friends of the beneficiaries.
The main functions of the app will be:
- "Routes", a feature that guides users in the best itinerary to travel without architectural barriers and excessive slopes, with a careful description of the morphology of the road surface
- "Report a problem", a function through which the user can report the presence of an obstacle on the path, or add her / himself / herself or a new accessible itinerary experienced in person.
- "Help", a function with which you can request an on-site intervention by a (voluntary) operator within a time range, in the event that the obstacle is impossible to overcome independently or with the support of accompanying persons.
- "Community", a user community portal where ideas are exchanged and cooperated to optimize the app and the accessibility of the city to disabled people. The purpose of the community is to contribute to the identification and sharing of itineraries which they themselves have experimented with.
- "Wheelchair Sharing", a function through which the app allows you to rent electric drives during your stay in the area covered by ¡UP!.
The electric thrusters guarantee greater autonomy of movement to the beneficiaries, allowing them to make climbs that would otherwise be tiring or impossible to do in the absence of their propulsion. The task of the project team will be to identify the investment plan for the purchase and / or rental of electric engines.

column51:
Wildoor is a free mobile application that caters to outdoor enthusiasts, providing a comprehensive platform for both private users and businesses. 
Focusing on three popular outdoor activities—walking, trekking, and running—Wildoor ensures that users can engage in their preferred sports, tailoring the app to their specific interests and preferences.

Private Users:
For individuals seeking outdoor adventures, Wildoor offers a range of features to enhance their experience:
1. Discover New Paths by GPS Position: Leveraging GPS technology, users can explore and uncover new paths based on their current location. This feature encourages spontaneous exploration and helps users find exciting routes in their vicinity.
2. Discover Paths by Interests: Wildoor goes beyond simple location-based recommendations. Users can specify their interests, including preferred sports, skill level, geographical position, and past activities. This tailored approach ensures that recommendations align closely with individual preferences.
3. Activity Tracking and Sharing: Wildoor functions as a comprehensive activity tracker, allowing users to monitor their performance, set goals, and track achievements. The live-sharing option fosters a sense of community, as users can share their outdoor activities with friends and fellow enthusiasts in real-time.
4. Discover Services on the Path: Enhancing the overall outdoor experience, Wildoor provides valuable information about services available along the chosen path. Users can access details about food and accommodation options, making trip planning more convenient.

Business Users:
Wildoor also caters to businesses in the outdoor and hospitality sectors, offering them a unique platform for promotion:
1. Upload and Promote Business Activities: Business users can showcase their outdoor-related services, such as guided tours, hotels, restaurants, bars, hostels, and mountain huts. This feature serves as an effective promotional tool, connecting businesses with a targeted audience of outdoor enthusiasts.

column50: Zonzers is an innovative player in experiential tourism. Unlike others, it's designed as a social platform, flexible and scalable.
column51:
We are developing an app designed to become a game-changer in the experiential tourism market. Zonzers is a platform that connects like-minded individuals, especially in the world of outdoor activities and travel, facilitating the sharing of experiences like never before.

The app mirrors a social network's structure, allowing users to craft profiles and engage. Unlike traditional social networks relying on user-generated digital content (UGC), Zonzers thrives on authentic, 100% real experiences.

After registering, users can create their own experience (Adventure) and publish it on the app. They receive participation requests, which they can choose to accept or decline. All participants in the experience gather in a group chat to get to know each other and organize before living the experience together.

Zonzers' UGC format is highly flexible, enabling users to tailor experiences by specifying activities, participant types, difficulty levels, and moods – all within a few minutes and with high-quality visual output. The entire UX/UI of our app is meticulously designed and constantly improving.

Originally launched as a website in 2021, Zonzers is now an app with over 20,000 members and a monthly volume of 5,000 unique users, steadily growing. The most active users are concentrated in Lombardy, Veneto, Piedmont, Emilia-Romagna, and Lazio. On average, there are between 250 and 300 active Adventures on the platform, mostly located in Italy, but international trips are also present.

“You are doing what needed to be done for a long time, something no one dared to attempt until now”
Our users express sentiments like this every day.

Zonzers is literally changing the lives of many people, enabling them to break free from loneliness, live a fuller and more active life, and build a network of new friendships.

Our target audience (18-35, Europe) adeptly uses digital tools to autonomously organize trips. The desire to meet new travel companions is now potent, no longer supported by traditional social networks.

A shift is underway in the travel/tourism market, propelled by digitalization, heightened environmental awareness, and a stronger-than-ever driver for meeting new people among consumers purchasing travel experiences.

The time is ripe for a new player to emerge, changing the paradigm by enabling every person to create and manage real experiences. Zonzers aims to be the first experiential social network - the social of real life.
column55: 18-35 M/F Italy & Europe - Enthusiasts of adventurous and self-organized travels.

Vumah Ltd is an innovative technology company based in Manchester, United Kingdom, with a singular mission — to redefine and revolutionise the world of vehicle sharing. Founded on the principle of empowering communities through shared mobility, Vumah leverages cutting-edge technology to connect vehicle owners with individuals seeking unique and convenient transportation solutions.

We serve as a dynamic marketplace where users can seamlessly list their vehicles for rent and find an extensive array of transportation options. We go beyond the traditional model of car rentals, fostering a vibrant community of users who share not just vehicles but also experiences. Vumah Social, our integrated social media feature, allows users to connect, share their journeys, and explore a world of exciting adventures.

Vumah is not just a platform, we're a movement toward sustainable, community-driven transportation solutions. Vumah represents the future of mobility, where shared experiences and shared vehicles intersect to create a more connected and sustainable world. Join us on the journey to transform the way we move, one community at a time.

column50: Our recommender system is built on technology that was not available years ago, and we will structure and store data with this purpose.
column51:
Avandra is an AI-powered restaurant concierge offering foodies and young professionals personalized recommendations for any occasion. 

In the Assistant section, users make natural language queries, and Avandra combines insights from local communities—favorites from friends, creators, as well as curated content—alongside detailed restaurant information gathered through web scraping, reviews, reputable dining guides, and booking APIs. This enables Avandra to provide highly relevant recommendations tailored to each user’s unique preferences and context. Results are displayed on a map with detailed restaurant profiles.

The other two sections, Explore and Profile, enhance the assistant’s ability to personalize and improve the relevance of recommendations while providing users with inspiration and suggestions from trusted sources. In fact, the Explore section features inspirational and thematic carousels based on cuisine type or occasions. In the Placelists section, users can import and organize their Google Maps lists into customizable, shareable collections. They can also view lists created by their trusted network and the ones of their favorite creators.
column55: http://www.avandra.app/en - Get fast, precise and trusted recommendations, store and share placelists

column50: Apperfectrip is the idea of a innovative bottom up product, based on years of practical experience in travel management
column51:
We want to develop an app to manage the interactions between all companies and individuals involved in a trip: Tour Operator, local Agency, Hotel, Restaurant, Driver, Guide, etc.
Apperfectrip will offer a real time text, audio and video messaging platform that will allow tourism professionals to be in touch with clients in real time and manage daily operations of tours, allowing exchange of information among all the people involved in a trip, to avoid inefficiencies like missed appointments, to geo and visually locate meeting points, to create empathy between clients and guides, exchanging warm welcome videos.
Hotels and Restaurants will receive detailed info on their guests (intolerances, room preferences) and will be able to convey special offers to their guests (paid room upgrades, bargain spa packages, drink packages).
Apperfectrip allows a shared communication tool to replace the one to one communication between service providers and customers and improves efficiency by reducing the number of interactions needed to share information to the right persons involved.
The app will provide an easy web interface or API and will be tailored on the needs of tour operators.
Apperfectrip will avoid all the inconsistencies that can cost money and reputation: complaints, medical issues, overbookings, unexpected delays, emergencies, accidents and incidents. 
Clients can address inefficiencies or needs by taking photos of the dirty room, for instance, and share it immediately to have the room replaced.
At the same time, Apperfectrip will be a state of the art marketplace, where all the suppliers can add their offers, like upgrades, drinks, invitations to all their clients.
External suppliers can channel their special offers and bargain deals to all the tourists in their area, geotargeted and clustered by the app. Museums and concert halls can deliver their programs and offer special deals to the tourists who are in the area on selected dates.
Apperfectrip is based on years of field experience of the founders, there is no such a specific tool with huge potential market, worldwide.
Buyers will be Tour Operators who will offer this tool to their clients, reducing at the minimum risks during their clients' trips with a personalized and efficient experience.
Apperfectrip will have a handling fee based on volumes, but it can turn into a zero costs investment for Tour Operators, because it will reduce expenses for claims and complaints, increasing loyalty of own clients.

Andrea Tripodo
Piattaforma che permette agli utenti di accedere a informazioni di viaggio professionali grazie a una partnership esclusiva con un editor leader di guide turistiche ("Bradt") e ai contenuti creati dagli utenti. Team competente con solida esperienza alle spalle - composto da 8 membri. Business model: B2B e B2C.
column50: Rich content mix (pro and users generated) that can be uniquely saved and shared in custom guides connected to travel service vendors
column51:
Tiplr is a platform that allows access to professional travel information through an exclusive partnership with a leading travel guides publisher and to user-generated content. All content is organized in “tips”, elemental units characterized by three features: a compelling visual, a thorough and insightful description and rich metadata. Tips are Lego-like building blocks that the user adds to their own travel guide of the destination of choice. Tips are positioned on a map allowing to add directions, and connected with third-party booking services of attractions tickets, flights or hotel rooms. 
Through our unique and patented "suitcase", selected tips can be organized in fully customized guides, shared with fellow travelers and  saved offline to ensure usability also when connectivity is slow or absent.
Tiplr business model targets primarily B2B customers through white-labeling of the platform and API feeds of our content. Differently, B2C revenues are mainly coming from affiliate programs, in-app sales and advertising. Use cases are: customized guides for corporate partners, host-guide tool for AirBnB/Vrbo hosts, multi-editors guide for travelers, marketing tool to promote content for travel service vendors.
Also, Tiplr has a program called Tiplr locals, where local experts sell their services like tours and consultation in selected destinations.

column51:
La società ha per oggetto lo sviluppo, la produzione e la commercializzazione di prodotti o servizi innovativi ad alto valore tecnologico e più specificamente, una piattaforma software per la condivisione di offerte, esperienze e prodotti personalizzati rivolte ai viaggiatori. Tale software è innovativo in quanto permette ai viaggiatori di conoscere in modo interattivo le esperienze e di trovare in modo automatico le aziende migliori che soddisfino la propria curiosità di viaggio sulla base delle preferenze personali. Inoltre, tale software è altamente tecnologico in quanto si basa su un algoritmo proprietario che analizza i dati degli utenti ed elabora una previsione dei flussi turistici su determinati territori catalogando trends e interessi di consumo. Inoltre per le aziende verranno forniti strumenti innovativi di marketing online e promozione sul territorio. Questa piattaforma si concretizza nella creazione di Tourist Card digitali distribuite sul territorio della Valle d'Itria per accompagnare le persone che vogliono scoprire il territorio da chi offre prodotti, ospitalità ed esperienze autentiche. Ideata per offrire al turista percorsi gastronomici, esperienziali e informazioni utili per il soggiorno. Sarà distribuita nei punti strategici del territorio, nelle strutture ricettive e promossa online. La sua natura digitale ci permetterà di avere un’offerta sempre aggiornata, flessibile e personalizzabile. Inoltre l'offerta per le Strutture ricettive si compone di:
- Tourist Card Hello Valle d’Itria con personalizzazione grafica (logo colori e contatti della struttura)
- Sistema digitale di creazione e gestione Tourist card personalizzata con convenzioni scelte dalla struttura (Sarà fornita un’applicazione web per la creazione della propria card per un uso esclusivo nella propria struttura)
Offerta per Attività legate al turismo
- Inserimento di offerte e prodotti all’interno della Tourist card Valle d’Itria
- Campagne di comunicazione mensile su tutti i canali online ed alla rete di distribuzione delle Tourist card (è compreso sponsorizzazione su social e motori di ricerca)
- Campagne di comunicazione mensile su tutti i canali online ed alla rete di distribuzione delle Tourist card (è compreso sponsorizzazione su social e motori di ricerca) e Creazione di contenuti foto e video per la comunicazione.
Si intende avviare l'attivazione dello stesso modello su altri territori per la creazione di una rete nazionale.

column50: The network (and the technology based system) for creating the biggest golf community
column51:
Pin Vision is an innovative startup that is transforming the golf industry with its advanced technology. Our solution is based on the most updated GPS database of Golf Facilities data to provide new digital services both for Golf Players and Golf Clubs.
The golf market represents a huge opportunity for companies that are able to tap into it. This is because the golf market is highly appealing being a global market with a large and passionate customer base. Golf is played in over 200 countries around the world, and it has a strong following among both amateur and professional players. This means that companies that are able to successfully enter the golf market have the potential to reach a large and diverse audience.The golf industry is a multi-billion dollar market that includes a wide range of products and services, including golf clubs, balls, apparel, and accessories, as well as green fees, memberships, and lessons.
Moreover, the golf market is ripe for innovation, with many opportunities for companies to introduce new products and services that can improve the golf experience and drive growth. This makes it an attractive market for companies that are looking to differentiate themselves and to offer unique and valuable products and services to their customers.
The problem we are solving is the lack of accurate and accessible data for golfers, which limits their ability to make informed decisions on the course. Our app empowers golfers to make data-driven decisions, leading to better performance and a more enjoyable golfing experience. Furthermore, we bring digitisation in all the aspects of staying in the Golf Club, from the game to the engagement with the facility.
Our competitive advantage lies in our technology and user-centric design. Our app is highly accurate, efficient, and user-friendly, with a simple and intuitive interface. Additionally, we created a strong relationship with Golf Clubs in order to build a network effect between players, facilities and companies interested in the Golf Market that no one has.

column51:

Live streaming or in Person,  Nonna brings the sweetest, most passionate Italian Nonnas letting them share their secret family recipes, heartwarming stories and deep laughs -- all while teaching you how to make true, authentic Italian cuisine.

And because we know the world is full of amazing yummy recipes, our goal is to expand our business to new cultures, letting grandmothers from all over the world share their traditional recipes, their culture, and their love!

column42: Giulio Montoli, Edmondo Sparano, Francesco Varuzza, Giulia Fazzini, Edoardo Giorio, Davide Pozzi, Giulio Maria Pezzini, Arunsankar Periyasami, Dario Baroni, Andrea Tripodo, Alessandro N. Ferretti, LVenture Group API Access
column50: tutti acquisiscono una quota del valore economico generato dalla loro sinergia, ridistribuendo e aumentando la ricchezza del territorio
column51:
L'idea nasce per convogliare la capacità di spesa del viaggiatore all'interno della città o del distretto turistico ospitante, generando ricchezza per l'intero network, dotando tutti i gestori o proprietari di strutture ricettive di uno strumento completamente gratuito con cui promuovere il proprio territorio e offrire in modo "Smart" un'esperienza autentica, educativa e sostenibile ai visitatori, guadagnando una commissione su tutte le prenotazioni e gli acquisti effettuati dai propri ospiti all'interno del "network", generando per sé un ritorno proporzionale all'utilizzo dell'app da parte di chi soggiorna nella propria struttura.
 Il cuore di Be-IT è una piattaforma digitale che offre:
 - Al viaggiatore (Guest) una completa  presentazione del territorio grazie alla quale potrà conoscere tutto ciò che lo circonda, come arrivare, cosa fare e come muoversi. All'interno dell'app troverà punti di interesse, ristoranti e bar, guide turistiche, escursioni, spiagge e stabilimenti balneari, biciclette e auto elettriche, acquisto di biglietti per attrazioni culturali o mezzi pubblici, e molto altro ancora con la possibilità di prenotare e/o acquistare direttamente dall'app.  Ogni punto di interesse scelto e ogni servizio prenotato sarà inserito nella sezione personale del viaggiatore e sarà rappresentato in un calendario.
 - Per il gestore o proprietario di una o più strutture ricettive (HOST) offriamo uno strumento di guadagno diretto che aumenta e diversifica le sue entrate. Per ogni acquisto effettuato nell'app dal proprio ospite infatti l'HOST riceverà una commissione in percentuale variabile a seconda del servizio utilizzato. Il turista verrà associato all' Host automaticamente in fase di registrazione. Be-IT rappresenta anche un mezzo per semplificare la promozione e la presentazione territoriale, enfatizzando e promuovendo l'offerta di servizi turistici del territorio strettamente legati alla propria struttura ricettiva.
-Il fornitore di prodotti o servizi locali (MERCHANT) ha la possibilità di essere presente, gratuitamente, con i propri prodotti o servizi su una "vetrina digitale locale" allargando la propria possibile clientela ai turisti che soggiornano "a pochi passi". Sfruttando un'interfaccia semplice e intuitiva, potranno gestire le loro disponibilità e prenotazioni o lanciare offerte a tempo.
Be-IT è un prodotto "Win-Win-Win" dove tutti i soggetti interessati ottengono un vantaggio nel far parte del network.

column30: See your bus coming in XX minutes on the map
column42: Giulio Montoli, Edmondo Sparano, Francesco Varuzza, Giulia Fazzini, Edoardo Giorio, Davide Pozzi, Giulio Maria Pezzini, Arunsankar Periyasami, Dario Baroni, Andrea Tripodo, Alessandro N. Ferretti, LVenture Group API Access
column50:
It solves the problem which was supposed to be solved 10 years ago. Nobody else takes care of it.
Very small barrier of entry for customers.
column51:
Problem

Undoubtedly, you know the situation when your passenger and meeting people should call your drivers on the bus to find out when they will arrive at the station. Quite often it happens that the bus is delayed because of traffic jams or checks on the border. Certainly, such calls distract drivers from driving.
Solution

Your drivers already have a phone and maybe even a smartphone. With our app installed, driver's smartphone will transmit the approximate location of the bus to the central server every 1-5 minutes. On the server, each bus will be assigned an address (URL). Anyone interested in the location of the bus will be able to see it on the map on the website. The website will also calculate the approximate time of arrival in any of the cities along the route.
Advantages

Advantages for drivers are obvious. Passengers will wait for the bus quieter and will be able to go to drink water, calmly knowing that the bus will arrive in 20 minutes.

column50: Italiabsolutely è l'unico mezzo di informazione internazionale del settore turistico in italia ed è scritto in inglese.
column51:
I professionisti che organizzano tour in Italia spesso perdono molto tempo alla ricerca di fatti e idee. E non tutti hanno la possibilità di visitare l'Italia o di fare affari in occasione di fiere ed eventi di viaggio. Ora hanno ItaliAbsolutely, una fonte autorevole che mostra in inglese cosa ha da offrire l'Italia e cosa sta succedendo sulla scena dei viaggi.
Tutto quello che devi sapere dall'Italia e sull'Italia. Tutte le novità del trade, notizie ed esperienze di tour operator, hotel, compagnie aeree, compagnie di crociera, autonoleggi e altro ancora, insieme ai consigli utili di protagonisti  del settore.
Idee di viaggio per viaggi coinvolgenti e vacanze indimenticabili. Tour insoliti, viaggi e video stimolanti, destinazioni spettacolari e hotel eccezionali. Questa è l'Italia che ti portiamo.
ItaliAbsolutely presenta una nuovissima sezione di offerte e pacchetti realizzati da esperti operatori inbound italiani.
L'azienda organizza esclusivi fam trip pensati appositamente per acquirenti di viaggi esperti e professionisti del turismo che desiderano il meglio dell'Italia. 
L'Editore
Travel Open Day Srl è una società specializzata in editoria, eventi, web e marketing turistico. column50: Optimizes deliveries, generates extra revenue, fosters guest loyalty, and enables discovery of local services. Operates in a niche market.
column51:
Room Delivery, a groundbreaking web app, transforms the tourist experience by allowing travelers to effortlessly order essentials directly from their accommodations. Using a conveniently displayed QR code in their rooms, tourists can access a diverse range of services, from breakfast and local cuisine to shopping coupons and laundry services.

Key Features:

Ultimate Convenience: Tourists enjoy seamless access to services and products, all from the comfort of their accommodations, facilitated by a user-friendly QR code system.

Local Support: Room Delivery fosters collaboration with local businesses, enabling guests to explore and support the community during their stay.

Service Versatility: Offering a comprehensive solution, Room Delivery caters to diverse traveler needs, from savoring local cuisines to addressing everyday requirements.

Technological Innovation: Our intuitive web app ensures an unparalleled user experience, enhancing the overall convenience of the tourist journey.

Investment Opportunities:

Growing Market: Positioned in the expanding tourism sector, Room Delivery is primed to capitalize on increasing demand.

Local Sustainability: Emphasizing a positive impact on local economies, we align with the priorities of sustainability-focused investors.

Global Scalability: With a flexible model, Room Delivery is prepared to expand globally, bringing its innovative services to destinations worldwide.

Room Delivery not only streamlines delivery logistics but also offers accommodations a beneficial business model:

Operational Efficiency: Partnering with Room Delivery allows accommodations to provide an additional service without allocating significant resources to order management.

Additional Commissions: Every order through Room Delivery generates supplementary commissions for accommodations, creating an extra revenue stream and enhancing financial sustainability.

Customer Loyalty: Integrating the delivery service enhances the customer experience, boosting guest loyalty and satisfaction, encouraging repeat business.

Winning Synergy: The collaboration between Room Delivery and accommodations creates a winning synergy, increasing overall profitability and enriching the tourism offering.

Facilitated Local Exploration: Room Delivery not only connects guests with essential goods but also guides them in discovering local products and services, enhancing their travel experience.

column51: QV aim to promote Diversity, Equity and Inclusion in the tourism industry. The QV accreditation/certification program is based on a standard of conducts that includes best practices on how to welcome LGBTQ+ travelers. Companies and Destinations that adopt this standard can be certified by the international certification body RINA and use the QV Approved label. QV is also a training tool platform about LGBTQ+ Tourism & Marketing, DE&I Management; is the LGBTQ Welcoming Hotels web Directory; is an LGBTQ+ Travel Index developed in partnership with The Data Appeal Company, who measure the online sentiment of LGBTQ+ Travelers referred to the main tourism POI, thanks to AI and Big Data Analysis processes. Every companies can misure the online sentiment referred to their business and download a widget with a score to show on their website. The widget is auto-updated every time a new review is published online.

column51:
QVADIS Srl is an innovative company specializing in the development, production, and marketing of high-tech products and services, with a specific focus on indoor mapping services. The company's main goal is to equip all public facilities with the QVAD indoor navigation system, to facilitate orientation and the finding of points of interest inside these structures. QVADIS aims to become the world leader in the provision of indoor mapping services.

QVADIS's services target various types of structures and contexts, including trade fairs, hospitals, museums, bars, shopping centers, supermarkets, offices, and research centers. The company also offers a service dedicated to schools and universities, to improve orientation inside large buildings. The technology used by QVADIS allows users to be guided through movements with a "map" made of 360-degree images, downloadable on smartphones, providing all the necessary information to move within spaces, even in conditions of no network coverage.

Besides mapping services, QVADIS also includes a software house service that helps B2B and B2C companies grow and enhance the performance of their business processes through customized software. The company handles every aspect necessary to build tailor-made software, using various platforms and offering customized technological solutions that adapt to the specific needs of companies.

In terms of collaborations and acknowledgments, QVADIS is part of a culture and tourism cluster and is associated with BIC Incubatori FVG, a certified innovative startup incubator. Their vision and mission, along with a range of innovative projects and collaborations, reflect the company's orientation towards innovation and improving accessibility and orientation in various types of public and private structures.

column50: The first globally available solution to the market gap identified in tourist services aimed at parents of children and adolescents.
column51:
Monkey’s Time is a marketplace that aggregates offers of various trips for children and teens.
The platform provides an intuitive search engine that helps parents to find the best offer, contact organizers, book, and pay. For organizers, it provides a system to manage reservations and a simple, efficient way to add new offers. (under 3 minutes)

How we do it:
We have created a system and designed particular forms that help the organizers add their offer and describe it as parents expect. 
We are constantly learning, and each additional question asked by parents is verified by us to improve our system and make decision-making easier for parents. 
In this way, we save parents' time in finding an offer according to their criteria. We publish data that previously required contact with the organizer and are important to make a decision (price, form of travel, meals, etc.). We enable reservations and payment.

column42: Giulio Montoli, Edmondo Sparano, Francesco Varuzza, Giulia Fazzini, Edoardo Giorio, Davide Pozzi, Giulio Maria Pezzini, Arunsankar Periyasami, Dario Baroni, Andrea Tripodo, Alessandro N. Ferretti, LVenture Group API Access
column50: We are the only provider of travel insurance to offer product to consumers with existing medical conditions in continental Europe
column51:
Fit 2 Trip is the first travel insurance provider to offer travel insurance  to customers with disabilities or pre-existing medical conditions in the Spanish speaking market. 

We offer our customers a tailored quote for travel insurance by getting them to answer questions about their health conditions through our medical screening system, a system that contains details of over 5,000 medical conditions. 

Based on the answers customers give, we are able to tailor a travel insurance quotation based on their medical condition and the destination they are travelling to.

Working with underwriters and medical specialists, we have developed travel insurance products that allow customers to travel knowing they are covered, even though they may have a pre-existing medical condition.

Andrea Tripodo
Piattaforma che offre agli utenti una vasta gamma di esperienze outdoor. Competitor diretto di Mapo Tapo. Il team è composto solo da un membro che detiene il 100% delle quote. KooKoo Climb è locato a Glasgow e opera principalmente in UK, Chamonix (Francia) e Costa Blanca (Spagna). Nel primo anno di attività, abbiamo hanno fatturato con successo € 100.000 nei primi mesi di commercializzazione. column50: Kookoo is revolutionizing the travel industry with two innovative solution: the ultimate travel search engine and an interactive map tool.
column51:
Kookoo aims revolutionizing the travel industry with our innovative solution: the ultimate travel search engine, comparable to the Spotify of Travel. Using AI, our platform processes natural language input to instantly generate personalized travel packages based on users' preferences. Say bye to traditional travel planning methods.

The competitive advantage which KooKoo Adventure Travel has is an AI-powered platform, along with an interactive map interface. In response to the customer's natural language input, it provides real-time customized travel packages; users can provide their ideal trips through a simple text box. The system comes up with a custom package in less than one second, smoothly advancing into a "Book Now" functionality. In addition to the interactive map, which further enhanced the user experience to allow clients to book activities directly from the experts, for quick and transparent booking. KooKoo distinguishes itself from similar competitors that rely on antiquated keyword-based searches and lack modern, interactive interfaces.

We know that speed and personalization are far more important than just 'packages'. While all other companies focus on traditional search methodologies, we take the advantage of natural language processing to make things easy in the search and buy process.

column30: Conversational AI for seamless, personalized travel planning & instant book
column42: Giulio Montoli, Edmondo Sparano, Francesco Varuzza, Giulia Fazzini, Edoardo Giorio, Davide Pozzi, Giulio Maria Pezzini, Arunsankar Periyasami, Dario Baroni, Andrea Tripodo, Alessandro N. Ferretti, LVenture Group API Access
column50: AI-driven chatbot for tailor-made travel plans. From dream to destination, effortlessly personalized in one conversation
column51:
The realm of travel has expanded immensely in recent years, with destinations far and wide opening up like never before. Yet, the intricacies of travel planning haven’t quite caught up, remaining fragmented and often overwhelming. Enter Wanderlust Wiz, reshaping the very concept of travel planning through the power of conversational AI.
At its core, Wanderlust Wiz isn’t just a travel app—it's an intuitive companion. Users begin a simple chat, akin to conversing with a seasoned travel agent. The difference? This agent responds instantaneously, taps into a vast reservoir of global travel data, and meticulously crafts a journey tailored to personal desires. Whether it's an adventurous solo trip to the Amazon, a romantic getaway in Paris, or a serene retreat in Bali, our AI adapts, suggests, and finetunes in real-time.
But it's not just about suggestions. Every aspect of the trip—from flights, accommodations, and insurance, to local experiences—is booked within the same conversational window. No more endless tabs, no more juggling between platforms. Everything is unified, streamlined, and presented with flair. As plans crystallize, visually engaging snippets and widgets come alive on the screen, offering a tangible preview of the impending journey. Flight details, hotel bookings, local experiences, and more, are showcased in these vibrant digital cards, further enriching the planning experience.
One of the distinguishing facets of Wanderlust Wiz is its adaptability. With every interaction, every query, the platform learns. It understands preferences, remembers past choices, and ensures that subsequent travels are even more aligned with the user's desires. It's this personalized touch, this evolution with each use, that transforms Wanderlust Wiz from a mere tool to an indispensable travel ally.
Moreover, the platform is not insular. Recognizing the vast ecosystem of travel, Wanderlust Wiz integrates with industry leaders, offering a plethora of services, from transport options with Uber and route planning with Rome2rio, to local dining suggestions via Yelp. This synergy with various platforms ensures that travelers have a holistic, comprehensive, and delightful planning experience.
In essence, Wanderlust Wiz isn’t just revolutionizing travel planning—it's setting the gold standard. In an age where experiences matter more than ever, we're ensuring that the journey truly begins not when you set foot at the destination, but the moment you start planning.
column55: https://wanderlustwiz.com/ - for Travel planning and booking

TOWNLY è una piattaforma innovativa che racchiude tutte le informazioni necessarie per il tuo viaggio, semplificando e migliorando la tua esperienza dimostrandosi l’alleato perfetto: affidabile, sempre disponibile, una garanzia per viaggiare sereni e senza preoccupazioni. Con il suo algoritmo estrae le informazioni più rilevanti da fonti affidabili e le presenta nell’applicazione in modo chiaro e conciso all’utente. Questo consente ai viaggiatori di risparmiare tempo prezioso, evitare lunghe ore di ricerche online, e arrivare sul luogo di destinazione sempre preparati. Non è malissimo, ho dei dubbi sul business model, anyway una chiacchierata la farei.

column51:
TOWNLY è una piattaforma innovativa che racchiude tutte le informazioni necessarie per il tuo viaggio, semplificando e migliorando la tua esperienza dimostrandosi l’alleato perfetto: affidabile, sempre disponibile, una garanzia per viaggiare sereni e senza preoccupazioni. 
Il problema che l’applicazione mira a risolvere è la crescente difficoltà nel reperire informazioni essenziali per i viaggi e l'incertezza che ne deriva su quali di queste siano davvero reali e aggiornate. Spesso, i viaggiatori si trovano a navigare in un mare di dati dispersi online, il che può causare stress e confusione.
TOWNLY propone una soluzione a questo problema infatti con il suo algoritmo estrae le informazioni più rilevanti da fonti affidabili e le presenta nell’applicazione in modo chiaro e conciso all’utente. Questo consente ai viaggiatori di risparmiare tempo prezioso, evitare lunghe ore di ricerche online, e arrivare sul luogo di destinazione sempre preparati.
Il punto di forza della piattaforma è la sua capacità di affrontare una vasta gamma di esigenze del viaggiatore. Dalla gestione di emergenze mediche alla conformità alle regole locali, Townly offre un supporto completo: Immagina di trovarsi in un paese straniero e dover affrontare un problema di salute; Townly fornisce non solo numeri di emergenza e dettagli sul servizio sanitario locale, ma ti aiuta anche a localizzare facilmente le strutture mediche più vicine grazie alla geolocalizzazione. Inoltre, Townly si impegna a tenere i viaggiatori costantemente aggiornati sulle regole e le restrizioni locali. Evita il caos dell'incertezza sulle norme di sicurezza e sui documenti necessari per l'ingresso, permettendo ai viaggiatori di pianificare con fiducia e tranquillità il loro viaggio. La piattaforma va oltre il suo ruolo di guida pratica, arricchendo l'esperienza di viaggio con dettagli affascinanti e curiosità culturali. Rispetto alle soluzioni esistenti e alle agenzie di viaggio tradizionali, Townly si distingue per il suo servizio focalizzato: non sovraccarica l'utente con informazioni inutili, ma si concentra sull'essenziale. La sua value proposition è chiara: offrire sollievo immediato e una fonte di sicurezza durante i viaggi in paesi sconosciuti.

column50: Our platform: ELYSIUM: a no-code platform that democratizes creative design, innovation and distribution of spatial computing applications.
column51:
Mythologi is a technology driven design studio composed of multimedia artists based in Montreal, Canada. We empower you to tell your stories through new forms of connectivity and world-building.

In developing our proprietary technology and platform: ELYSIUM, we are designing the necessary tools to empower everyone to imagine and create today at the new frontiers of digital engagement.

ELYSIUM creates and deploys interactive AR experiences that are geolocated and persistent with a no-code, drag and drop solution. ELYSIUM is both a creative world-building platform and a scalable cloud infrastructure.

Think of it as Squarespace or Shopify for the future of building digital experiences at the intersection of people, places, and data.

ELYSIUM empowers anyone to build and manage loyalty programs that gamify visitor experiences through interactive storytelling.

We are focused on developing AR integrations for Location Based Entertainment (LBE) within the tourism, hospitality and live entertainment verticals.

We bridge digital and physical play through interactivity that can even affect physical environments. This is made possible through our scalable Internet of Things (IoT) integration.

column50: Fly With IVA combines AI and human expertise for personalised, efficient and accessible travel planning
column51:
IVA, or Intelligent Vacation Assistant, is an advanced AI travel agent that aims to transform the travel and tourism industry by harmonising the strengths of humans and machines. It uses state-of-the-art AI, NLP, NLU and Deep Learning technologies to ensure a user experience so seamless it's almost imperceptible.

Key features of IVA:

Autonomous operations: IVA autonomously handles tasks such as flight searches, accommodation comparisons, itinerary recommendations and more, with extreme precision.

Expert supervision: Despite its autonomous nature, IVA is supervised by experienced travel professionals who ensure the accuracy and personalisation of its suggestions.

Scalability: IVA's AI-driven approach allows it to serve a large number of customers simultaneously, a significant advancement over traditional travel agencies.



Focus on innovation: By automating routine tasks, IVA frees human agents to focus on creative solutions, complex problems and service innovation.

Seamless user experience: IVA is designed for smooth, intuitive user interactions, making the use of AI in travel planning straightforward and user-friendly.

Comprehensive travel solution: From planning to booking and ongoing travel support, IVA provides comprehensive assistance at every stage of the journey.

Inclusivity and accessibility: IVA reaches a broader audience, including those who may not typically use traditional travel agencies, by providing virtual assistance.

Human support for complex issues: While technology-driven, IVA retains the option of human intervention for complex or unforeseen travel issues.

Revolutionising the travel industry: IVA represents a significant leap forward in travel management, enriching the customer experience and expanding the possibilities within the industry.

IVA is a revolutionary tool that combines the efficiency of AI with human creativity and problem solving. It's designed not just to streamline travel planning, but to enhance the overall experience, making travel more accessible, efficient and enjoyable. A transformative innovation, IVA redefines the role of travel agents, shifting their focus to higher-level tasks and creative customer solutions. This synergy of AI and human expertise positions IVA as a disruptive solution in the world of travel and tourism.

column50: Earn REAL gold rewards, not points. Our B2B SaaS platform empowers businesses to drive loyalty & reduce CAC with gold-backed cashback
column51:
Goldbck: The Gold Standard for Customer Acquisition, Loyalty, and Payments

A B2B2C Platform Transforming Customer Engagement

Goldbck is a disruptive fintech platform revolutionizing how businesses acquire, retain, and reward customers. We offer a unique, gold-backed ecosystem that empowers both businesses (B2B) and consumers (B2C) through a seamless blend of loyalty programs, payments, and travel solutions.

Our Core Offering: A White-Label B2B SaaS Platform

Goldbck provides businesses with a white-label SaaS platform that allows them to:

- Offer Gold-Backed Rewards: Differentiate their loyalty programs by rewarding customers with real, gold-backed digital currency (eGold) instead of traditional points or cashback. This offers tangible value and increased perceived worth.

- Reduce Customer Acquisition Costs (CAC): Replace expensive marketing and aggregator fees (15-25%) with eGold cashback, significantly reducing CAC and improving ROI. Goldbck charges a nominal 1% transaction fee.

- Drive Customer Loyalty & Retention: Gold-backed rewards foster stronger emotional connections and encourage repeat business.

- Gain Valuable Data Insights: Access aggregated, anonymized customer data across the Goldbck ecosystem, providing valuable market intelligence.

- Expand Reach Through the eGold Network: Tap into a growing network of businesses and consumers, expanding market reach and driving new customer acquisition.

For Consumers (B2C):

- Earn Real Gold Rewards: Earn eGold on purchases, travel bookings, and more, providing a tangible asset that can be appreciated in value.

- Seamless Spending & Redemption: Spend eGold across a growing network of partner merchants or redeem for cash.

- Exclusive Travel Benefits with Access GoldPass: Access exclusive travel deals, airport lounges, and concierge services within specific cities, enhancing the travel experience.

Access GoldPass: City-Specific Travel & Lifestyle Enhancement

Access GoldPass is a key component of the Goldbck ecosystem, focusing on enhancing the travel and lifestyle experience within specific cities. It provides:

- Curated City Experiences: Access to exclusive deals, discounts, and experiences within a designated city.

- Seamless Travel Integration: Streamlined travel booking, airport services, and local transportation options.

- eGold Rewards Integration: Earn and redeem eGold points within the Access GoldPass ecosystem.

column51:
Wagglo is unique vacation planning to meet the evolving needs of today's travelers. Wagglo sets itself apart with a user-friendly interface that combines gamification and social media elements, making discovering top vacation destinations a delightful experience. What makes Wagglo unique is its ability to tailor recommendations to your preferences. Wagglo offers unprecedented flexibility. You can effortlessly share your travel plans with anyone, collaborate seamlessly with friends through QR codes, and tap into a repository of sample plans crafted by seasoned travelers. For businesses, Wagglo offers a user-friendly platform to create events and leverage advertising opportunities. The "Wagglo bubble" serves as your centralized command center, accessible from any screen, providing access to interactions, updates, and essential features. Wagglo excels in optimizing travel routes, considering real-time factors like traffic conditions and your current location.  Wagglo's revenue model is built on various income streams, including commissions from transportation and accommodation partnerships, taxi applications, car rentals, ticket sales, and reservations through collaborations. Businesses can gain visibility by paying for prominent placement in recommended places and targeted advertising sections. Impressions and clicks on general platforms contribute to revenue. Event fees for businesses looking to organize gatherings like happy hours, and the "Claim Business" feature, where business owners can pay for a pro-license to modify their venue's appearance, further boost income. Users can unlock unlimited access to features like "Wagglo It" and "Create Plan," generating additional revenue. Pop-up advertisements and beacon services for business owners enhance monetization, along with professional account registrations.
In essence, Wagglo is a groundbreaking travel companion, delivering personalized, collaborative, and revenue-generating vacation planning in a concise and efficient manner. It ensures your trips are not only memorable but also stress-free.
