column50: L'unicità della sua tecnologia immersiva a servizio di un turismo accessibile ed inclusivo.
column51:
Vi&Ca s.r.l.s.  propone Fly On, un servizio turistico innovativo che grazie a tecnologie combinate tra droni e visori fpv permette l'esplorazione dei luoghi impervi o inaccessibili abbattendo barriere architettoniche e naturalistiche.
Attraverso il servizio turistico offerto, gli utenti vivono l'esperienza di un suggestivo tour immersivo in tempo reale, apprezzando in prima persona la sensazione del volo. 
Ogni esperienza prevede la partecipazione di un massimo di 10 utenti.
Allestito un piccolo aeroporto per droni con un team di piloti, il passeggero viene munito di un visore che, garantendo la visione fpv (visione in prima persona), è collegato al volo in diretta  del drone e alla sua telecamera.
La durata del tour immersivo varia dai 10 ai 15 minuti in base alle condizioni meteorologiche e al percorso e/o area naturalistica sorvolata. 
La narrazione di una guida turistica accompagna  due nuove affascinanti prospettive di visita: quella dei luoghi dall'alto  e quella tesa alla scoperta di location difficilmente accessibili.
L'offerta innovativa si posiziona, dunque, nell'ambito del turismo accessibile ma anche inclusivo.
La proposta, potenzialmente realizzabile in tutta la nostra bella nazione, risulta adatta davvero a tutti.

column45:
Paolo Ottaviani
Active Orbit è un'applicazione per la promozione e la motivazione all'attività fisica basata sulla scienza comportamentale, che combina il tracciamento del movimento (camminata/corsa/ciclismo) e la ricompensa degli utenti per i minuti di attività svolta, al fine di incoraggiare la partecipazione e aumentare l'attività nel tempo. Si concentra sull'attività, non sul fitness o sull'esercizio fisico, per ottenere il massimo beneficio dall'incoraggiamento all'attività dei cittadini sedentari.  Ci sono startup italiane che fanno più o meno la stessa cosa e che hanno applicato per Argo, darei a loro la precedenza
column50: Behavioural - daily walking, encouraging active travel and promotes transport links, with flexible rewards marketplace. Healthy ageing
column51: Active Orbit is an activity promotion / motivation app based on behavioural science, combining a mixture of tracking of movement (walking/running/cycling) and rewarding users for their activity minutes in order to encourage uptake and increase activity over time. Focussing on activity, not fitness or exercise, to get the most benefit from encouraging uptake from sedentary citizens. Our engaging app is linked to a rewards marketplace and community platform, providing vast flexibility in offering incentives, discounts, affiliate offers alongside advertising, community events, third party information. Our business model is to deploy through third parties, either employers or other businesses with a large constituency like transport operators, active travel ambassadors, property developers. commercial landlords, health insurance etc. Rewards can be discounts on transport costs or loyalty vouchers, invite local businesses to promote buy-local behaviour (perhaps walking to the business) or provider rewards such as vouchers and additional privileges at work. This deployment route allows a focus on B2B relationships rather than needing to directly acquire thousands of individual users. Longer term the platform will be able to collect detailed data sets around usage, mobility, uptake and activity levels as well as reward redemption and trends.

column51:
Short-term (next 2 years) vision: WinWin.travel is set to become the ultimate platform for travelers with dogs to find and book accommodations. Imagine finding the perfect dog-friendly stay in just 3 clicks! Just drop all your specific needs into a chat - like needing a hotel room for a 20-kilo dog, with an in-room pet station, an in-hotel pet walking area, no leash/muzzle policies, and no pet fees or deposits. Then, you can compare all the hotel deals and pick the best one.

Our grand 10-year vision: We aim to be an AI-powered, fully automated travel assistant that plans all your trips better than you ever could. And this isn't just for pet owners - it's for all leisure travelers worldwide.

Prototype live: https://demo.winwin.travel/

column50: We innovate by comparing e.g. Booking, Expedia & Airbnb using LLM. We uniquely integrate social travel content for an enriched experience.
column51:
We revolutionize the trip planning experience for our users, catering to the late Gen Z and early Gen X demographics, by seamlessly integrating AI and social travel content into our platform. Our app has several key elements:

* 		Extensive Accommodation Database: We've curated a comprehensive selection of over 3 million hotels, villas, and apartments from major OTAs such as Booking.com, Expedia, and Airbnb.

* 		Social Travel Content Integration: Enhancing the user experience, we aggregate social travel content in the form of engaging videos. This content includes valuable metrics like the number of likes, comments, and views for each stay.

* 		Intelligent AI Engine: We've developed a cutting-edge AI engine that not only recommends personalized travel destinations but also answers any questions users may have about their stay. Whether it's inquiring about heated pools or seeking restaurant recommendations in the vicinity, our AI is equipped to provide instant and tailored responses.

* 		User-Friendly Interface: Navigating through our platform is a breeze, thanks to our user-friendly interface. Drawing inspiration from popular social media platforms like TikTok, Instagram, and YouTube shorts, our UI ensures a seamless and enjoyable experience for our users as they plan their next adventure.

column30: We produce smart inflatable tents for festival goers
column42: Giulio Montoli, Edmondo Sparano, Francesco Varuzza, Giulia Fazzini, Edoardo Giorio, Davide Pozzi, Giulio Maria Pezzini, Arunsankar Periyasami, Dario Baroni, Andrea Tripodo, Alessandro N. Ferretti, LVenture Group API Access
column50: Nothing even remotely luxurious exists. People are ready to spend extra for comfort but there is just no full-package product out there.
column51:
We produce smart inflatable (2-3 person) tents.

Currently we finishing our final stage prototype. The last prototype instance was already fully functional. To explain a bit more what the product is: It’s an inflatable tent with a built in battery that is fully controllable via a phone app.

With the phone app the user can control the following:
1.	Turn on the automatic inflation e.g. build in pump and set-up the tent with a push of a button (the poles are inflatable and the base, the mattress, is also inflatable)
2.	Ventilation
3.	Reading lights
4.	RGB lights (the user can play with a big color pallet and light the entire tent up)
5.	Build-in speaker

Some other features include:
a)	An automatic pressure sensor that triggers the pump if the pressure inside the structure falls below a certain value. This adds an extra layer of stability.
b)	Very light bendable solar panel on the roof of the tent that charges the built-in battery. There are 4 USB ports + wireless chargers inside the tent so you can always have your devices up and running.
c)	White noise – a high pitch noise that camouflages external noises (in case you are camping at a loud festival for example)

Due to good relationships within the Croatian Music Festival scene, B2C opportunities are present. This will also serve as a good marketing platform for potential customers in the B2B sector to get familiar with our product.

column30: Guidebook is a personal recommendations sharing and planning app.
column42: Giulio Montoli, Edmondo Sparano, Francesco Varuzza, Giulia Fazzini, Edoardo Giorio, Davide Pozzi, Giulio Maria Pezzini, Arunsankar Periyasami, Dario Baroni, Andrea Tripodo, Alessandro N. Ferretti, LVenture Group API Access
column50: Guidebook is the only app that makes trusted recommendation sharing and activity planning easier while reducing the number of apps you use.
column51:
Guidebook is a personal recommendations platform, allowing you to find, save, and share great recommendations from and with people you trust-- because you know them-- and to use our joined-up tools to turn those good recommendations into great plans. 

Basing your plans on recommendations you trust, from sources whom you know personally or by reputation, means that you can immediately believe what you see-- because you can intuitively assess your friends' and chosen experts' credibility and expertise. This dramatically speeds up the repetitive and frustrating elements of the travel planning process-- no more cross-referencing dubious online sources, checking to see whether a guide's recommended spots are still open, or working out where they are in relation to the other sights you wish to see. It also reduces the risk of missing a great spontaneous find-- a coffee after a long morning in a museum, a cocktail in the evening-- because you did not know that it was there. Having these locations visible after having been shared a single time, quickly and easily, significantly reduces the burden on the friends providing these recommendations-- they will never need to write another recommendation email again. In short, we provide a shortcut to trust.

Bringing together the tools you need— tools like shared to-see lists, itineraries, maps, bill splitting, packing lists, and photo sharing, all nested within a discrete trip framework—in one joined-up environment makes planning a trip or activity, especially with others, much easier. Travellers use an average of six different apps and types of sources to plan their travel and activities; this fragmentation makes planning a trip or activity, managing it while it is underway, and sharing photos, memories, and recommendations much more complicated than it needs to be. This comes at a cost-- the average weekend trip takes over 15 hours to plan. Much of that time is wasted on frustrating inefficiency, rather than used in enjoyable planning. Using Guidebook's single linked-up ecosystem reduces much of that waste, and eliminates many of those headaches. 

This is not just useful while planning a long trip— Guidebook's tools are equally useful in making spontaneous or quick plans, like dinner with friends or an afternoon in the park. With Guidebook, you can spontaneously find great locations around you, make plans, and ensure they run smoothly, by using our single streamlined tool.

column30: Tap to ID: accessing the world with a single tap.
column42: Giulio Montoli, Edmondo Sparano, Francesco Varuzza, Giulia Fazzini, Edoardo Giorio, Davide Pozzi, Giulio Maria Pezzini, Arunsankar Periyasami, Dario Baroni, Andrea Tripodo, Alessandro N. Ferretti, LVenture Group API Access
column50: We improve privacy and security while also providing a more seamless and convenient user experience to the users.
column51:
Gimly is at the forefront of transforming identity verification and access control. Our proprietary Tap to ID technology, utilising secure NFC-enabled devices, is driving a new era of seamless identity management. In sectors like travel and hospitality, we’re reshaping experiences. With Gimly ID, users can effortlessly verify their identity and access spaces with a quick tap, ensuring both security and convenience.

Our focus is clear: simplifying identity verification and access control through cutting-edge innovation. Our technology enhances security and user experiences across various industries. We believe in the power of decentralized identity, allowing individuals and organisations to have greater control over their information while ensuring privacy.

As a dedicated team, we’re using our extensive experience in UX research and design to lead product development, crafting a unique value proposition. Gimly envisions a future where identity management is seamless, secure, and user-centric. We’re committed to building this future by providing state-of-the-art solutions that redefine how people interact with their identities.

Pebble è un piccolo dispositivo che avvisa i viaggiatori quando possono ritirare il loro bagaglio dal deposito bagagli e comunica loro la posizione del loro bagaglio, garantendo loro la tranquillità e la possibilità di fare ciò che desiderano durante l'attesa. Idea interessante ma comunque non posso uscire dall'aeroporto senza prende il bagaglio, quindi ad ogni modo devo aspettare. Team figo ma non ITA, no per Argo
column50: Pebble is like the "food buzzer" for airports.
column51: Pebble is a device that renders travelers’ time spent at baggage claim stress free and more productive. Before traveling, users place the device into their suitcase, and once they are at baggage claim and the device recognizes that it is on the conveyor belt, it sends a notification to the Pebble app on the user's phone. Because travelers often wait between 15-45 minutes for their baggage, Pebble would allow them to finish work, write an email, watch their children, go to the bathroom, or simply relax. With Pebble, users don't have to stress about missing their baggage or having it stolen, having to wait longer than necessary, or crowding around the conveyor belt. Instead, they can do something productive which makes the time pass quicker.

column42: Giulio Montoli, Edmondo Sparano, Francesco Varuzza, Giulia Fazzini, Edoardo Giorio, Davide Pozzi, Giulio Maria Pezzini, Arunsankar Periyasami, Dario Baroni, Andrea Tripodo, Alessandro N. Ferretti, LVenture Group API Access
column45:
Andrea Tripodo
Piattaforma che consente agli utenti di pianificare un itinerario sulla base dei propri interessi. User-experience bassa dal mio punto di vista. Prodotto non a livello (sembra un’app del 2010) e concept molto confuso..c’è un’area nella piattaforma chiamata negozio che ti suggerisce attività che non tengono minimamente senso della location dell’utente. Non vedo UVP. Revenue model: *vendono pacchetti pubblicitari da agenzia di marketing..
column50: TWIP è l’unica app che crea itinerari intelligenti e interattivi basati sugli interessi degli utenti, combinando esperienze autentiche.
column51:
TWIP emerge nel mercato dei viaggi come una soluzione unica per la pianificazione personalizzata di viaggi. L’app combina tecnologia avanzata e un approccio user-friendly per rivoluzionare l’esperienza di viaggio degli utenti.

Funzionalità Core di TWIP

	•	Profili Utente Personalizzati: Gli utenti inseriscono interessi e preferenze per ricevere suggerimenti di viaggio su misura.
	•	Itinerari Personalizzati e Automatici: TWIP utilizza algoritmi intelligenti per creare itinerari personalizzati. Gli utenti possono generare percorsi sia manualmente sia automaticamente, basati sulle loro preferenze.
	•	Integrazione con API di Google: Per fornire informazioni affidabili e aggiornate, TWIP integra Google Maps per mappe dettagliate e indicazioni stradali.
	•	Social e Community: La piattaforma incoraggia la condivisione di esperienze, permettendo agli utenti di scoprire nuove destinazioni attraverso la community.

Impatto e Crescita

Da quando è stata lanciata, TWIP ha visto una crescita sostanziale. L’app ha attratto oltre 4000 utenti attivi, dimostrando il suo potenziale nel settore del turismo digitale.

Sviluppo e Innovazione

TWIP è in continua evoluzione, con piani per espandere la personalizzazione degli itinerari e migliorare l’interfaccia utente. L’obiettivo è rendere ogni fase del viaggio, dalla pianificazione alla realizzazione, un’esperienza fluida e adatta ai desideri individuali.

Conclusione

TWIP non è solo un’app di viaggio, ma un innovatore nel campo della personalizzazione del turismo. Offre agli acceleratori l’opportunità di investire in un prodotto che sta trasformando il modo in cui le persone esplorano il mondo.

column42: Giulio Montoli, Edmondo Sparano, Francesco Varuzza, Giulia Fazzini, Edoardo Giorio, Davide Pozzi, Giulio Maria Pezzini, Arunsankar Periyasami, Dario Baroni, Andrea Tripodo, Alessandro N. Ferretti, LVenture Group API Access
column45:
Paolo Ottaviani
David Technologies intende rivoluzionare la gestione turistica dei beni culturali introducendo un'applicazione innovativa basata sull'intelligenza artificiale. Partendo dalla pratica limitata e obsoleta del monitoraggio delle condizioni utilizzando foto e liste di controllo cartacee, il nostro prodotto si sforza di: Migliorare la promozione dei siti culturali prevedendo il flusso di visitatori per mostre specifiche, massimizzando così il potenziale di guadagno e creando un'esperienza turistica più dinamica e reattiva. Sarà sincero, non ho capito bene cosa e come lo fanno, citano l'AI diverse volte. Fondati ieri (anche se c'è scritto Aprile 24) e sono estremamente early.
column50: We are using AI in a simple way with a user friendly UI and UX, made by professionals of cultural heritage management.
column51:
David Technologies aims to revolutionize cultural heritage tourism management by introducing an innovative AI-based application. Departing from the limited and outdated practice of condition monitoring using paper photos and checklists, our product strives to:

Introduce a state-of-the-art solution, replacing traditional methods with an intelligent system that leverages AI for more effective and predictive preservation, catering to the needs of tourism engagement.

Enhance the promotion of cultural sites by predicting visitor flow for specific exhibitions, thereby maximizing revenue potential and creating a more dynamic and responsive tourist experience.

Investing in David Technologies signifies a commitment to overcoming current challenges in cultural heritage management by adopting cutting-edge technology, ensuring the preservation and optimal utilization of cultural assets for the benefit of tourism.

column50: We co-design the experiences with the artisans and serve small groups, ensuring authenticity together with customer needs-fit.
column51:
Although artisans bring forward traditions that are very fascinating to discover and are a source of diversity, creativity and innovation in society, they mostly remain out of tourism circuits.

We empower local artisans, who are passionate about what they do and whose craft can be of interest to visitors, by co-designing authentic experiential tours with them. Hence, while visitors enjoy unique experiences, local artisans directly earn from tourism and obtain visibility.

We sell our unique experiences directly to customers on our e-commerce (B2C) and through selected partners like tour operators and hotels (B2B2C). We have a 40% gross margin on the B2C channel and a 30% gross margin on the B2B channel.

column50: In Dora travelers can find all the information in one place, book a customized and responsible trip validated by expert and saving time
column51:
Dora is a platform where responsible travel enthusiasts can design and book the perfect itinerary for their next trip.

Planning and booking a trip is a time-consuming effort: everything can be found on the web, but users need to go through a multitude of websites and blogs to find the right information, spend time looking for the right hotel or restaurant and navigate different platforms to book what they need. In addition there are no guarantee that itineraries and experiences will be truly authentic. Our surveys showed that users go through an average of 34 websites and spend around 4 weeks for a total effort of 26 hours to plan the trip before booking it.

Dora will offer everything they need in one single place: where to go and when, how to plan their days while traveling, best places to visit, best restaurants where to eat, hotels where to sleep and much more. Everything will be bookable with one single click. The itinerary will be fully customized automatically by Dora based on user needs and preferences: budget, family/couple/single, food preferences (vegetarian/vegan...), travel style (adventures, relax, fun…), etc. The original itinerary will be created by travel creators and Destination Management Companies to ensure itineraries are feasible and all the restaurants and hotels suggested are fully assessed for their quality and aligned with a responsible tourism. All these itineraries will be stored within Dora’s database, broken down day by day and tagged based on their content. Every user will create a profile with their preferences; in this way Dora will be able to match user needs to what is available within our database and design a fully tailor-made trip. Dora will allow users to book the full trip with one single click.

Revenue will come by selling trips and apply a margin on top. Everything will be available to users through a free desktop and mobile app; in the long term we plan to add premium features to keep supporting users during their trip and to generate more recurrent revenue streams.
column55: Travelers - To plan and book their next trip

column50: Breakfast zero food waste ; valorization of the quality of ingredients and local food, enhance operational efficiency and guest satisfaction
column51:
Recognizing the issue of high food wastage linked to traditional buffets inside hotels, We have created a system through a digital platform in order to streamline breakfast order from guests. 
1.Enhanced Customer Journey: hotel guest can order and choose prefered time by scanning a QR code. The solution transforms the customer experience by enabling guests to specify their allergies and dietary restrictions too. It also extracts detailed information on ordered dishes for each guest and identifies the number of individuals in a registered room requiring special menus. This customization streamlines meal preparation and ensures precise catering to individual needs.
2.Client Order Summary: guests will receive a comprehensive summary of their placed orders. This feature ensures clarity and confirms the accuracy of requested items for guests, enhancing their experience and facilitating any necessary adjustments.
3.Restaurant Order Summary: the solution generates a categorized summary for the restaurant staff, organizing orders by items or products. This feature streamlines kitchen operations, providing a clear overview of the required ingredients and dishes to be prepared, optimizing efficiency and reducing errors.
4.Capacity Management Assessment: The solution provider is exploring the potential inclusion of a capacity management feature: to automatically close time slots when the hotel is overbooked. The tool could efficiently manage and optimize the restaurant's capacity, aiding in strategic decision-making regarding guest flow and service optimization
At the Moment We use a prototype. Our idea of Breakfast offers nine customizable portions categorized into three energy, three sweet, and three savory seasonal, homemade and local products ; served at the table.

column50: Everything is designed to prioritize the individual and their unique learning curve within a team, achieved through a meticulous process.
column51:
With my partner, we have created and successfully tested three different software over the past 2 years, covering technology, artificial intelligence, tourism, human resources, and team building.

The first one allows for digitized treasure hunts with prizes and rewards worldwide, thereby increasing tourism and knowledge of different places.

The second is the well-known game of Goose ("OCA" in Italian), fully digitized, enabling companies and professional institutes to teach and learn concepts and texts through gamification.

Our third software is our flagship product, the most requested one, called "TEAM-METRICS." Through a source file, we can provide important feedback on the situation within a company for engineers, CEOs, managers, and employees in any sector. It highlights and values strengths while also identifying specific areas where the company has not yet become a recognized leader.

We have tested all three softwares in every imaginable situation, and we are now ready to take the big leap into the mainstream (Italy, Europe, and the rest of the world). We are actively seeking investors and funds to launch our project on a larger scale. We are searching for raise money and grow up in the world.

column50: We aggregate all events in one place to make it easier and faster to search for events, which are finally based on the users’ interests.
column51:
It is difficult for people to find events and 80% of them miss events they would have liked to take part in. Events communication is too fragmented and dispersive; events organizers find it difficult to reach their audience.
Nowadays young people search for events on the internet and it takes too much time due to the difficulty of finding well organized information; they can also find events on social media, but to find them, they need to know the organizer of the event.
During the last year we have done many questionnaires and interviews to users (people from 14 to 35 years old) and event organizers over 5 Italian regions (thousands of people have been involved): they have expressed all those problems listed above. 
We have created a platform that can connect end users and event organizers. To always have all the events available we are developing algorithms that can search for the events on the internet and keep our database always up to date.

column51:
Human Drone Team Srl si occupa dello sviluppo dei sistemi per il monitoraggio e rilievo del territorio al fine di conservare il dato raccolto per lo sviluppo e la divulgazione digitale sempre conservando il dato centimetrico per futuri interventi di ripristino o stime di intervento.
Le mappe digitali insieme agli elaborati 3D danno la possibilità di conoscere un territorio da qualunque punto nel mondo essi si trovino, attraverso i paesaggi/edifici storici 3D stampati è possibile creare una mostra itinerante a livello internazionale dove i visitatori tramite appositi qrcode potranno visitare interattivamente i vari luoghi e potranno trovare tutte informazioni ( possibilità di sviluppo di visori di realtà aumentata). Attualmente è gia' nata la digitalizzazione di borghi storici e strutture presenti sul territorio Toscano-Ligure.
 Inoltre, grazie alle nostre collaborazioni con il dipartimento di robotica del Sant Anna di Pisa, ISPRA Livorno abbiamo già iniziato un percorso di collaborazione per lo sviluppo di un sistema di monitoraggio ambientale semiautonomo a sciame mediante APR (Droni) con il quale abbiamo già iniziato con eccellenti risultati un servizio di salvataggio in mare con dispositivo di nostra produzione di cui deteniamo i diritti.
Vantiamo inoltre una collaborazione con Vellerie San Giorgio per la fornitura di LifeJacket per la ricerca di nuovi approcci per il supporto in mare.
Human Drone Team Srl sempre grazie alla collaborazione con il dipartimento di robotica del Sant Anna di Pisa e l'utilizzo di intelligenza organiche ha iniziato la prototipazione e la stampa 3D di questi ultimi mediante sistemi che ottimizzano al massimo la resa e l'efficienza riducendo oltre che alle ore di lavoro i costi a loro connessi.

column50: We have complex solution along the all value chain: inform, inspire, find tourists product, help guides, sell, accessible tourism education
column51:
Don’t let disability limit the possibilities. 
Your Accessible Guide is an ecosystem of inclusive digital products designed to help tourists with special needs plan their trips, book adapted tours, services, and adventures, inspiring them to travel; on the other hand – provide people with disabilities an education in the sphere of accessible tourism, help them to create their own travel products (tours & services) and work as guides or accessibility experts.
The vision of the project is that in every part of the world a tourist with disability can be met by a person, who knows how to help and make the trip unforgettable.
Your Accessible Guide is a social innovation that has the function of integrating people with disabilities into society and the global economy through tourism and education. People with disabilities often live closed within their communities, they lack communication and inclusion.   This problem is throughout the world: there are 1,2 bln people with disabilities globally. Based on the principle “Nothing for us without us”, we invite people with disabilities discover the sphere of tourism, undergo training, and become guides and organizers of adapted tourist routes, developing an accessible environment and inclusion in the hospitality industry. We want to include people with disabilities in tourism, help them with self-realization, make accessibility and inclusion in tourism a mass phenomenon, and help them to become active actors in the global economy.
column55: guides - can publish excursions and tours, earn more money, tourism professionals - can find new guests and sell appartments for tourists with disabilities, tourists with disabilities - can book adapted excursions and tours

column42: Giulio Montoli, Edmondo Sparano, Francesco Varuzza, Giulia Fazzini, Edoardo Giorio, Davide Pozzi, Giulio Maria Pezzini, Arunsankar Periyasami, Dario Baroni, Andrea Tripodo, Alessandro N. Ferretti, LVenture Group API Access
column45:
Paolo Ottaviani
Piattaforma per far scoprire posto non turistici e non affollati, mentre altri siti altrettanto preziosi sono stati trascurati. Xplorer affronta questa sfida offrendo una soluzione per scoprire le destinazioni meno conosciute, superando le lacune informative e la frammentazione presenti su altre piattaforme, Fornisce anche alle imprese e agli enti locali gli strumenti per colmare il gap tecnologico. Facilitiamo la collaborazione tra territori e imprese, favorendo la sinergia per promuovere l'innovazione e aumentare la visibilità. Una sorta di smartway (senza retreat) , mettendo anche le PMI in mezzo per essere valorizzate. Non è malissimo, però non vedo un VP fortissima
column50: We go beyond event booking and tourist information, striving to connect adventurous travelers with proactive local administrations.
column51:
In a world where popular tourist destinations are struggling to cope with high numbers of visitors, often at the expense of lesser-known places, Xplorer goes beyond the typical travel platform. It serves as a driving force for positive change in the Italian tourism industry.
Mass tourism has led to an overemphasis on a few locations, such as Rome, Venice, and Florence, while other equally valuable sites have been overlooked. Xplorer tackles this challenge by offering a solution for discovering lesser-known destinations, overcoming information gaps and fragmentation found on other platforms.
It is a comprehensive platform that not only narrates stories and unveils hidden gems through a web app but also equips businesses and local entities with tools to bridge the technological gap. We facilitate collaboration between territories and enterprises, fostering synergy to promote innovation and enhance visibility.
It is the Xplorer's ecosystem that makes us exceptional. It is not just an app for event bookings or tourism information. It serves as a bridge connecting travellers eager to explore new territories with local institutions keen on promoting their resources. Cooperation is the key.
Xplorer promotes transparency and sustainable tourism while advocating inclusivity, supporting local communities, and forging deeper connections between travelers and the unique offerings of the Italian landscape.
Join us, as our success will translate into a positive impact on both a national and global scale.
Xplorer: Live authentic experiences, a journey that goes beyond expectations.

Andrea Tripodo
Touring è un sistema di guida audio per tour personalizzati, adattandosi alle esigenze e agli interessi dell’utente. Funziona ovunque e parla qualsiasi lingua. Hanno Hanno rilasciato la versione beta (250 tester). 
Team composto da +10 persone. Quote equamente divise da 5 membri del team (20% delle quote ciascuno).

column50: An experience comparable to a professional tour guide standing in front of you, but works everywhere, speaks any language and is cheaper.
column51:
We want to empower travellers around the world with the ability to explore the world and learn about it in a more immersive, intimate and tailored way.

Beside two main limitations (human touch and physical presence) Touring offers an equivalent experience to travellers compared to a professional human tour guide standing in front of them. 

Touring can work anywhere in the world and speak any language. It adapts to the traveller's needs and interests. This intimately addresses a large unserviced portion of the travel market - that today is not hiring guides due to the above limitations.

Touring can do all of this by leveraging topological data, satellite maps, large language models, text-to-speech technologies and real-time information retrieval algorithms.

column42: Giulio Montoli, Edmondo Sparano, Francesco Varuzza, Giulia Fazzini, Edoardo Giorio, Davide Pozzi, Giulio Maria Pezzini, Arunsankar Periyasami, Dario Baroni, Andrea Tripodo, Alessandro N. Ferretti, LVenture Group API Access
column50: We love data, we are focused and we have a long term vision on creating value based on having a network of trusted providers and partners.
column51:
Tina Connects artisans and companies across Europe in an Operative system where users can book and manage team activities (team buildings, dinners and offsites) offered by local businesses

Promoting cultural and economic sustainability is at the heart of our mission. By facilitating connections and interactions among individuals, businesses, and local craftspeople, we aim to build a world where "sustainable," "authentic," and "local" are the common choices. 
To start so, we offer companies the opportunity to connect and create long-term collaboration with local craftspeople. This way the local sustainable economy is supported and corporations can have and report a positive impact on their local communities.

By building this platform we can support local producers and their sustainable practices. Ultimately giving back to the territory and its communities. And also we make it very easy for companies to find effective and enjoyable team events.

At the heart of our mission there will always be value delivered to artisans and local realities that do thing sustainably. This is why we measure the impact of each company on their local territory and ecosystem by chosing us.

Thanks to this we found out that 
- Artisans trust our vision to the point of recommending other friends of them to us. making it easy for us to find "the offer side" 
- Companies get a lot of value out of these events. Not only they build strong teams and develop the relationships between colleagues, but also they support local producers. 

The next step is establishing ourselves as the platform for "team things". This will allow us to reach as many individuals as possible and then opening the B2C market as we had a lot of demand from the current attendees from the B2B market. 
We do this boosting our presence also thanks to partnerships and conjoint events with renowned brands this upcoming October and November.
One of these brand is a famous e-commerce for artisanal authentic products. we are developing the partnership so that we can use their logistics to distribute also the product from our own artisans, as a pilot project to evaluate the profitability of this as well and start distributing products in the future.

This is the reason why it would be perfect timing for us to join an accelerator. at the end of which we cold be ready to start international expansion of the brand.

Un'applicazione (basata su iOS e Android) che può aiutare a sviluppare la rete commerciale dei suoi utenti. Unisce la passione personale per i viaggi, la comunicazione e lo sviluppo del proprio business e del tempo libero lontano da casa quando si è in viaggio per lavoro.  Estremamente early stage (sono ancora a livello "idea) e non hanno assolutamente nulla (attivi dal 2021)
column50: Non of the products offer the options FF has
column51:
FlyFriends (FF) – working title – is an application (iOS & Android based) which can help to develop the business network of its users. It combines the personal passion to travel, to communicate and to develop one’s business and have leisure time away from home when you have business trip. 
The app is generally an ecosystem of the participants of business traveling:

Users can start to communicate in advance or while their traveling according to their preferences to develop business and network, hire a new colleague or just have a good time with a person traveling the same place

Air Companies, Air hubs and Organizers of business events (forums, exhibitions and etc) can have full direct access to their target audience, the most loyal one, to realize their needs.
Imagine an app which you inform about your traveling plans: flight you are starting with, and it shows you back other users travelling with you the same flight and if you give details of your trip it can show you people participating the business event you are going to in the point of your destination.
 
Moreover, during the preparation to your travel you can meet those in the plane or in the city you are going to, whose professional and personal profile is close to you, as Facebook and LinkedIn Profiles are processed if the user wants it.
 
While traveling, the app gives some interesting lifehacks in terminals of departure and arrival, and also counts air miles from your point of departure to the point of arrival by geo tags.
 
You are participating in global ratings with your traveling experience and have special promos from airlines.
 
The app also makes AI based recommendations in the following tracks: your industry events close to the area you are flying to, people from your industry in the area or participating the event, professional profile points of interest.

column42: Giulio Montoli, Edmondo Sparano, Francesco Varuzza, Giulia Fazzini, Edoardo Giorio, Davide Pozzi, Giulio Maria Pezzini, Arunsankar Periyasami, Dario Baroni, Andrea Tripodo, Alessandro N. Ferretti, LVenture Group API Access

column50: TrovaFestival è l'unico portale che mappa gratuitamente i festival culturali italiani, mostrando la distribuzione geografica del ferme
column51:
TrovaFestival è il sito che raccoglie i festival di arte, musica, cinema, letteratura, teatro, danza, video, libri e approfondimento culturale in Italia e nel Canton Ticino, portando avanti l'idea dei festival come elementi culturali autonomi, motori di attivazione culturale e sociale sui territori, e strumento di creazione e di incentivo di nuovo turismo. 

Nel 2021 TrovaFestival diventa Associazione Culturale con gli obiettivi di promuovere, informare, orientare e diffondere la cultura e le arti, in particolare attraverso la mappatura, l'analisi e la conservazione della memoria dei fenomeni culturali e artistici, a cominciare dall'impatto che le manifestazioni temporanee hanno sui territori. 

A oggi, gennaio 2024, i festival censiti sono oltre 1500: la possibilità di vedere su mappa la distribuzione geografica dei festival consente di avere già visivamente la percezione del fermento culturale di un determinato territorio.
Il sito consente poi di selezionare i festival in base al settore disciplinare (cinema, teatro, musica...) e il periodo. In questo modo il portale diventa uno strumento utile per poter programmare gite fuori porta, vacanze, o esperienze culturali conciliando festival e conoscenza dei territori.

Nell'aprile 2022 esce in libreria In giro per festival. Guida nomade ai festival culturali, il libro scritto da Giulia Alonzo e Oliviero Ponte di Pino (edito Altreconomia) che mette nero su bianco il progetto TrovaFestival. In aprile 2024 è prevista la pubblicazione della terza edizione della Guida, sottolineando come i festival culturali possano essere uno strumento di creazione e di incentivo di turismo, turismo culturale. 

TrovaFestival è composto da un affiatato team di esperti. Cuore del progetto sono:
Giulia Alonzo, Ph.D. in sociologia della cultura su una tesi sui festival culturali. Scrive di teatro e arti performative su diverse testate online. Ha scritto un libro sulla mediazione culturale (FrancoAngeli 2017).
Oliviero Ponte di Pino, che frequenta festival da più di 40 anni. Si è occupato di editoria (per 12 anni direttore editoriale Garzanti), giornalismo su carta, tv, radio (Radio3 Rai), web (ateatro), ha ideato mostre e progettato eventi culturali (Bookcity Milano, Le Buone Pratiche del teatro).

column51:
SocialStation è un ecosistema digitale all'avanguardia progettato per rivoluzionare il modo in cui le organizzazioni interagiscono digitalmente con il pubblico e gestiscono i servizi. L'approccio di SocialStation è multifacetato, con un focus principale sui servizi digitali per la pubblica amministrazione e l'interazione cittadino-PA.

E-learning Personalizzato: SocialStation offre un approccio all'e-learning altamente personalizzato attraverso la sua piattaforma Think4. L'AI-Core analizza il comportamento dell'utente, adattando i contenuti di apprendimento alle preferenze individuali. La modalità di apprendimento include anche elementi di gamification per rendere l'esperienza coinvolgente e motivante.

Pubblica Amministrazione Digitale: La soluzione SocialStation si inserisce perfettamente nel contesto della trasformazione digitale della pubblica amministrazione. Offre servizi digitali avanzati per semplificare le interazioni tra cittadini e istituzioni. Questi includono richieste di documenti, prenotazioni online, comunicazioni istituzionali e molto altro, migliorando l'efficienza e l'accessibilità.

Workstation Interattiva: La workstation di SocialStation integra un ambiente di lavoro interattivo che incorpora elementi di intelligenza artificiale e machine learning. Offre funzionalità avanzate per la gestione di progetti, la collaborazione in tempo reale e la presentazione di dati complessi in modo intuitivo.

Riconoscimento Facciale e Linguaggio Naturale: Utilizzando tecnologie avanzate di riconoscimento facciale e analisi del linguaggio naturale, SocialStation rende le interazioni più efficienti e sicure. Queste funzionalità possono essere implementate per l'accesso a servizi, la sicurezza e la gestione delle informazioni.

Servizi per la Green Economy: SocialStation promuove la sostenibilità attraverso servizi dedicati alla green economy. Questi includono monitoraggio ambientale, gestione dei rifiuti, promozione di pratiche sostenibili e coinvolgimento della comunità in iniziative ecologiche.

Portale del Cittadino: SocialStation fornisce un portale del cittadino intuitivo e accessibile. Attraverso questo portale, i cittadini possono accedere a servizi, informazioni e interagire con le istituzioni in modo rapido e user-friendly.

Supporto per la Cooperazione Internazionale: SocialStation può facilitare la cooperazione internazionale attraverso la sua piattaforma, consentendo lo scambio di informazioni, la collaborazione in progetti comuni.

column51:
Garden Sharing è l’unico portale in Italia che offre più di 20'000 soluzioni per indimenticabili vacanze open air in Tenda, Camper o in comodi Glamping.

•	Garden Sharing è il marketplace dedicato a chi ama il turismo sostenibile e vuole soggiornare immerso nella natura, in spazi sicuri e particolari messi a disposizione da privati, aziende o associazioni. Il portale permette di cercare la perfetta sistemazione sotto le stelle, impostando vari filtri, scorrendo immagini e leggendo descrizioni dettagliate inserite dal proprietario dello spazio. La prenotazione è sicura e avviene tramite il sito, come pure il pagamento digitale che viene processato da Stripe, piattaforma leader mondiale nel settore.

•	Garden Sharing è al contempo il marketplace adatto a chi ha uno spazio dove gli amanti della natura possono soggiornare e desidera metterlo a frutto condividendolo in tutta sicurezza. Si possono pubblicare aree tenda e camper in un giardino oppure un terreno o ancora una sistemazione già pronta al prezzo che è il proprietario a decidere. L'iscrizione è gratuita e permette da subito di sfruttare la vetrina e il bacino di oltre 500'000 visitatori annui del sito.

column50: Our streamlined logistics and network of services and professionals, gives families easy and safe access to an otherwise scattered offer.
column51:
GoLalla wants to redefine the family travel experience!
Family trips with young children are challenging. GoLalla is committed to providing, on a single platform, all the solutions a family needs when travelling, and make a family vacation a stress-free and pleasant experience. 
It offers a reliable support network, covering everything you need from equipment rentals, such as strollers or cribs, to the best offers on infant products (hygiene, food), as well as connecting you to a network of essential family services, such as babysitters and paediatricians. 
Everything your family is used to finding back home, GoLalla brings it to you. Wherever you go!
Baby Gear Rentals:
We acknowledge the logistic hassle that represents carrying all the gear a young kid may require during a trip. GoLalla offers an extensive selection of high-quality baby gear, from strollers to car seats, from cribs to high chairs.
Baby Products Delivery:
In an unknown city, finding the adequate products for babies, such as food or hygiene products, may be a hurdle. GoLalla gives you the chance to choose personalised food and hygiene products packages, that we will bring to you whenever you need. We favour local and sustainable products, so that your kids can have a taste of local products while you preserve the planet.

 Network of Family Oriented Service Providers: 
GoLalla works with many multilingual, passionate and highly qualified babysitters, so you can have a romantic dinner by the Colosseo or a well-deserved glass of Italian wine at Piazza d’Espagna. You should enjoy your vacation, right? And what if your children are not feeling well? Don’t worry, GoLalla also takes care of it with its extensive network of paediatricians and specialised health-care professionals who speak your language.
One-Stop Platform for your Convenience:
GoLalla is a all-in-one high quality support for family travel. Instead of spending hours looking for various services in multiple (and sometimes confusing) platforms, our platform offers a seamless, convenient experience, adapted to families who love to travel.
Reliable partner:
GoLalla is a platform that provides family oriented services and businesses. As such we have developed a streamlined approach for integrating partner businesses and professionals. We guarantee careful follow up and communication as well as transparent procedures. GoLalla aims to establish long lasting and win-win collaborations.

column51:
WONDERGOLF: Exclusive Network of Italian Villas: An International-Level Gastronomic Experience

Introduction:
Welcome to a unique journey through the heart of Italian tradition and luxury. Our project aims to create an exclusive network of villas in Italy, each carefully selected to offer unforgettable experiences to a discerning and sophisticated international audience.

Vision:
Imagine an experience where every detail is meticulously crafted to convey elegance, history, and the charm of Italy. Each villa in our network is not just a place to stay; it's a gateway to Italian culture and beauty, set in breathtaking surroundings that range from the rolling hills of Tuscany to the Amalfi Coast.

Key Values:

Network of Exclusive Villas: Each property has been chosen not just for its beauty and location, but for the history and uniqueness it represents. Our villas are more than mere accommodations; they are experiences in themselves, offering a deep dive into Italian history and culture.

Network of Certified Chefs: We firmly believe in the value of Italian cuisine as an expression of art and tradition. Therefore, we exclusively collaborate with certified chefs, true masters in the culinary arts of Italy. Each chef brings a regional specialization, ensuring an authentically Italian experience.

Excellence in Italian Food: Food is at the heart of Italian culture. Our mission is to bring high-end Italian cuisine to the international palate, combining top-quality ingredients with world-renowned culinary techniques. Each meal is a journey through Italy's flavors and traditions, meticulously crafted to leave an indelible memory.

Objective of the Investment Bid:
With the support of the investment bid, we aim to expand our network, incorporating more prestigious villas and enriching our culinary offerings. The investment will be used to:

Acquire and renovate additional historic villas.
Expand our network of talented chefs.
Enhance marketing activities to reach a global audience.
Conclusion:
Our project is not just a business venture; it's an invitation to experience Italy authentically and memorably. We combine a passion for gastronomy, a love for history, and a commitment to excellence to offer an unparalleled experience. With your support, we can bring the magic of Italy to an even wider audience.

column42: Giulio Montoli, Edmondo Sparano, Francesco Varuzza, Giulia Fazzini, Edoardo Giorio, Davide Pozzi, Giulio Maria Pezzini, Arunsankar Periyasami, Dario Baroni, Andrea Tripodo, Alessandro N. Ferretti, LVenture Group API Access
column45:
Federico Battisti
Non credo sia completamente Out of Scope - il buyer persona lato B2C è più mirato ai turisti che alle persone del territorio. SaaS aggregator e piattaforma all-in-one per ristoranti. Unisce le caratteristiche di tanti player del mercato diversi (TheFork, Tripadvisor, Glovo), ai classici gestionali + POS, unendo una funzione di social network in modo da creare una community. Un'idea secondo me interessante per quanto difficilissima da scalare - costo di acquisizione altissimo lato utenti cosi come ristoranti/attività. Conserva però, numerose possibilità di ingresso degli utenti per risolvere diversi bisogni. Scenari di Exit numerosi. La terrei in pipeline come possibili proxy per Olivia.

Andrea Tripodo
Non in target per Argo. - Appeaty è un'app per il tuo smartphone che ti aiuta a trovare e ordinare cibo da ristoranti, anche se sei in un paese straniero o non parli la lingua locale. In poche parole è un assistente personale che ti aiuta a mangiare fuori senza problemi
Solo due persone nel team (il founder detiene il 100% delle quote). No traction. Mercato super competitivo.

Edoardo Giorio
out of scope per Argo
column50: You can decide the food you want and we show you the restaurant that match your preferences, we have a focus on table and room service.
column51:
Mission. At Appeaty, our mission is to empower all diners to make informed and healthier choices at the restaurant, through a seamless digital ordering experience regardless of language or location.

Vision. We strive to enhance the dining experience by providing transparency in ingredients and personalized options, fostering well-being and satisfaction for every guest.

Value proposition. Appeaty empowers restaurants to transition to digital ordering and payment systems, enhancing efficiency and customer satisfaction. Diners can pre-order meals for quick service upon arrival, reducing wait times and improving service flow. This streamlined approach not only boosts revenue by allowing restaurants to serve more customers but also fosters loyalty through personalized offerings. With Appeaty, dining establishments can elevate their service while maximizing operational potential.

Appeaty is an all-in-one key to connect final users with the kitchen and the cash desk, regardless the ho.re.ca. managing software in use. Appeaty is efficient because the advance knowledge of customers' orders and arrival times allows optimization of kitchen management and speeding up service. Appeaty is ecological because taking orders, payment, and tax receipts are done electronically, eliminating the use of paper chemicals and providing a magnificent green return for our planet. Appeaty is customizable, since thanks to its intuitive interface, it allows the display of different menus depending on the day and time, and for dishes to be enhanced by inserting descriptions, photos, and ingredients used. Appeaty is reliable because the reviews cannot be falsified: only customers who have placed an order with Appeaty can review the restaurant and the individual products they ordered. Finally, Appeaty helps local communities, we can arrange corporate discount codes and coupons to increase and allow workers to spend their lunch outside the work place, without any time or money lost, without any ticket restaurant to be used and with an unique deferred invoice at the end of the month.

We have a patent on Appeaty codes but our secret sauce is the database we developed: over 1.500 single ingredients translated by native speakers with allergens matched, and a Wikipedia link to each of them. 

FUTURE OF DINING IS HERE. 
Are you ready to take a bite and elevate dining service while maximing operational potential?

column45:
Federico Battisti
Team con Esperienza nell'Hotellerie e fortemente Tech. Captable 100% in mano al founder. 
La soluzione non mi dispiace, sarebbe interessante capire come funziona. Red Flag: Squadra di boomer, deck incomprensibile e sito rimasto agli anni 90. Li terrei in backup per eventuali slot liberi.

Andrea Tripodo
Creazione di viaggi personalizzati in base alle esigenze personali tramite AI. Il deck riporta praticamente solo informazioni sul data science ma non rilascia alcuna info sulla startup. Team composto da 2 persone (solo il founder ha il 100% delle quote). Non mi piace.
column50: I create tour packages tailored to personal passions through data science
column51:
I work in Data Science and Artificial Intelligence; I created an online Travel Agency that builds packages by acquiring Data and creating relationships between them, using Artificial Intelligence algorithms and Digital Cartography, to create tourism stories related to the Territory. This working system of mine has been codified into a protocoled procedure that can be reproduced everywhere. I have called this system: Environmental Data Mining. 
The stories created are sold as small documentaries, with lectures and excursions to the places mentioned in the package itself. My packages vary in length, depending on the topic, from three days to a week.

column42: Giulio Montoli, Edmondo Sparano, Francesco Varuzza, Giulia Fazzini, Edoardo Giorio, Davide Pozzi, Giulio Maria Pezzini, Arunsankar Periyasami, Dario Baroni, Andrea Tripodo, Alessandro N. Ferretti, LVenture Group API Access
column45:
Federico Battisti
Soluzione non estramente innovativa, cap table ok. Traction menzionata: 397 itineraries,
>240 travelers con 92 nations covered. Bisognerebbe approfondire quanti di questi viaggi siano stati svolti e nel caso se abbiano generato revenues. Li sentirei in call da 45. Potrebbe essere un team interessante ma ancora destrutturato.

Andrea Tripodo
Piattaforma di viaggi social per ispirare gli utenti, condividere, pianificare e prenotare viagg.
Non hanno metriche. Hanno sviluppato come MVP il sito web.  Non vedo UVP: sul mercato ci sono moltissimi social che fanno la stessa cosa (anche meglio rispetto a quello che vogliono realizzare loro come Mapify o Evaneos).
Team composto solo da 2 persone - captable divisa equamente 50/50.
Secondo la roadmap lanceranno l’app nel 2025. Super early. 1,5 per me.

Edoardo Giorio
Social app per la condivisione dei viaggi che si organizzano e che ha elementi di gamification su vari livelli di planning.
Hanno diverse revenue streams come Adv in app, commissioni sulle prenotazioni, subscriptin fee delle agenzie e partnership
Traction assente e non è chiaro dal 2020 al 2023 cosa sia successo
Team e Cap Table ok

Li inviterei a Roadshow MI per approfondire
column50: The possibility to have fun sharing travel itineraries and to book next trips using local agencies for a sustainable traveling
column51:
Itineriamo is a travel platform where travelers inspire each other to share, plan and book their next trip around the world.
Currently online travel planning and booking is still a frustrating and boring activity, with scattered information all over the web. When a user want to plan and book a trip, often spends a lot of time.
Currently Itineriamo is a prototype. We have a mvp that is represented by a website where travelers have already shared about 400 itineraries.
With Itineriamo we want to facilitate the entire process, from planning to booking.
To do that we want develop a social platform, where travelers have fun sharing their itineraries and can book trips by means of local agencies, contributing to sustainable traveling.

column30: The 1st Netwok Marketplace to find and enjoy Food Experiences & Products
column42: Giulio Montoli, Edmondo Sparano, Francesco Varuzza, Giulia Fazzini, Edoardo Giorio, Davide Pozzi, Giulio Maria Pezzini, Arunsankar Periyasami, Dario Baroni, Andrea Tripodo, Alessandro N. Ferretti, LVenture Group API Access
column50: 1st Food Network Marketplace: a powerful viral strategy to realize the vision of healthy, tasty and sustainable food on every table by 2026
column51:
We have created "TrovaciGusto |The Food Revolution Platform".
It is mainly a b2c platform, but there is also a b2b layer, where enogastronomic/food experiences and products (of Restaurants, Chef, food e-commerce, etc.) can be published, found and booked/ordered by tourists/citizens and by businesses.
Besides price lists and menus, there are 9 kinds of "Offers/News", easy to publish: Specialties, Special Menus, Discounts, Gifts, Events & Experiences, Chef Boxes, Food Kits, NoProfit, News, Recipes.
Every user can also create his own "food network" and stay informed on experiences, offers and news regarding food businesses and food influencers he likes.
The user can become "Fan" of a food business, and in this way he has access to the "special offers for fans" that the business has reserved only to its fans.
Every user can also be "followed", and become a "Food Guru", so that food businesses have interest in inviting (and rewarding) him as a "testimonial", using a "influencer marketing" strategy.
Every user can propose himself as a "staff / service provider" (e.g. as a delivery man, waiter, chef, barman, sommelier, etc., for a total of 12 options).
Every user can manage its own "real" food business (e.g. food producer, GDO point, restaurant, bar, home chef service, catering, shop, business canteen, etc.) or its "virtual" food business, e.g. becaming a sort of "p.r. of food experiences": in every case, the food business will have powerful marketing tools, like a quick and guided system to create and list and share (via fb, whatsapp, twitter, sms) his food offers/news, with 40+ "smart" offers already suggested and ready to be cloned, a automatic web site, a newsletters sending system, a real time notifications sending system to the app of his fans, fidelity program, digital price list or menu, and much more.
In few words? TrovaciGusto is an innovative mix of a marketplace and a network (exploiting the viral growth of this model) and is vertical on the enogastronomic/food sector:: it connects all food actors (from producers to shops to restaurants to staff to final customers and tourists) and make the sector much more efficient, so that our "food revolution" vision become reality: by 2026, every person will enjoy good and healty food every day in good company.

column30: Nimrod is an instant translation system, through bone conduction
column42: Giulio Montoli, Edmondo Sparano, Francesco Varuzza, Giulia Fazzini, Edoardo Giorio, Davide Pozzi, Giulio Maria Pezzini, Arunsankar Periyasami, Dario Baroni, Andrea Tripodo, Alessandro N. Ferretti, LVenture Group API Access
column45:
Paolo Ottaviani
Nimrod è un traduttore simultaneo che combina la tecnologia della conduzione ossea con un sistema di traduzione basato su algoritmi di deep learning e reti neurali in continuo aggiornamento. La caratteristica principale di Nimrod è la possibilità di comprendere e scambiare messaggi vocali e/o scritti in oltre 100 lingue. Sfruttando la conduzione ossea, Nimrod si differenzia dai concorrenti per versatilità, praticità, comfort e igiene, essendo un accessorio esterno non inserito nella cavità auricolare. Li conosciamo già per due programmi nostri, ne parlano tutti bene ed è validato. Da sentire
column50: Nimrod is the first "one to many" simultaneous translation system, we believe we have found a valid solution to a 4000-year-old problem ;)
column51:
Nimrod is the answer to the problem of language barriers, a practical and hygienic solution that does not interfere with the user's normal life or work routine and allows the translation of messages into more than 100 languages.
Nimrod is a simultaneous translator that combines the technology of bone conduction with a translation system based on deep learning algorithms and continuously updated neural networks. Nimrod's main feature is the possibility to understand and exchange vocal or/and written messages in more than 100 languages. By taking advantage of bone conduction, Nimrod differs from competitors in versatility, practicality, comfort, and hygiene since it is an external accessory not inserted in the ear cavity.
column55: MICE - Conferences, Museum - Guided Tour, https://www.facebook.com/Nimrodinfo - Guided Tour, https://www.nimrod2p.com/ - https://www.linkedin.com/company/2pgreco-nimrod/

column50: We found a nice intersection to use B2C as acquisition strategy and B2B to maximise our revenues.
column51:
Pasajo is dedicated to enhancing the urban travel experience for tourists. Our strategic development unfolds in three key phases:

- Developing a digital, interactive welcome city guide (here our MPV: https://pasajo.notion.site/Milan-City-Guide-a5a0e075ceb548deae8f9f35971288cb)
- Creating an AI bot trained on the guidebook, accommodation listings, and host-specific documents to deliver stay information in a user friendly manner (chat). Example: "The light went off, what should I do? Where is the grid?"
- Expanding vertically into diverse digital concierge services for BnBs and Hotels. First step would be automatize most boring and repetitive tasks such as sending guest documents to municipality and ISTAT.

Thus we initiate with a sleek, user-friendly product, gradually progressing to more sophisticated, high-margin tech solutions.

column30: Voice Concierge is a voice-based platform for the accomodation facilities.
column42: Giulio Montoli, Edmondo Sparano, Francesco Varuzza, Giulia Fazzini, Edoardo Giorio, Davide Pozzi, Giulio Maria Pezzini, Arunsankar Periyasami, Dario Baroni, Andrea Tripodo, Alessandro N. Ferretti, LVenture Group API Access
column45:
Paolo Ottaviani
Competitor di Vikey, Voice Concierge è la prima piattaforma voice based in Italia per strutture ricettive: trasformiamo i comuni assistenti vocali (Open Ai Based) in un assistente personalizzato, attivo 24 ore su 24, di facile utilizzo per gli ospiti. Un assistente personale in camera segue il comfort, la privacy e gli orari dell'ospite. Lavoriamo molto sul design della voce per rendere la conversazione il più naturale possibile, con interazioni articolate. Pro: validato e revenues. Contro: Non costituiti e vivi da 4 anni ma i risultati non sono eccelsi. Forse no

Marco Riccio
Voice recognition assistant (Alexa) per Hotellerie. Non male, anche se fa esattamente la stessa cosa dei device già esistenti.. Team ben organizzato, anche se non mi sembrano il massimo dello smart. Captable buona.
column50: Wireless, maintenance free switchboard, all in one solution, for both guests and hosts, integrated with Open Ai
column51: Voice Concierge is the first voice based platform in Italy for accomodation facilities: we transform the common vocal assistants (Open Ai Based) in a personalized assistant, active 24 hours a day, user-friendly for the guests. A personal assistant in the room follows the comfort, privacy and times of the guest. We work hard on the voice design to make the conversation as natural as possible, with articulated interactions. Voice Concierge will respond to the most varied requests of the guest, giving information about the services of the structure and its  advices and information about the territory. The service covers more than thirty interactions, including reservations of services as breakfast in room: we automate the most repetitive part of the work. That leaves much more time for situations that require more empathy. We are really focused on the implementation of the most useful possibilities of voice technology: we work in a costant dialogue with hoteliers to identyfing their needs during this difficult period. In this way we've been able to innovate a niche market already present in the accomodation facilities: the switchboard. Our service replaces the phone in hotel rooms and reduces its maintenance costs. Guests can call the reception simply asking to their vocal assistant and vice-versa. The platform includes a dashboard from which hotel staff can customize the responses that the vocal assistant provides to their guests, in real time and in a very simple way. When a guest makes a request a live notification appears on the dashboard with all the useful details. We also extend the advantages of voice control to the daily workflow. From the dashboard the reception can assign a request to the staff members with a simple click and can follow the take-over of every task.

column50: GODOIT is the first player focused on Italian incoming cycling luxury market combined with Made in Italy pillars
column51:
Godoit aims to be the first Italian operator specialized in carbon free cycling experience for private and companies with own brand. Matching the passion for road bicycles with the excellences of Made in Italy: fashion, design and food. This is our view of well being for people: beauty + sport + emotions.
The business has 2 main channel: one dedicated to high end foreign active tourism  (B2C) and the other one for companies and events (B2B).
Referred to B2C sector, the goal is design and promote exclusive all-inclsuive cycling experience for foreign tourists where bike road is the way to discover the best of Made in Italy. Godoit has to be focused only on incoming tourism getting a strong market positioning.
About B2B, we’ve designed the innovative "Team Building Track" format, which is inspired to the strong aggregative, strategic and motivational dynamics that happen within professionals cyclists during international competitions; by the way the Covid19 pandemic has pushed us to project new format to replace "team building", so we've launch successfully Challenge Duathlon and "Hit The Tracks" starting turnover and cyclist community growth.

column50: Una modalità di visita innovativa che permette, attraverso i visori, di esplorare liberamente i luoghi che si visitano in autonomia
column51:
Kronos si propone di creare un innovativo servizio per i turisti incentrato sul longlife learning. Il servizio vuole essere una modalità di apprendimento innovativa per coloro che vanno a visitare una città storica, un'area archeologica o in generale un luogo che abbia subito nel corso del tempo diverse trasformazioni. Attraverso l'impiego dei visori di realtà mista, i turisti potranno vivere un'esperienza straordinaria, immergendosi completamente nei luoghi visitati. Avranno la possibilità di passeggiare fisicamente tra le diverse costruzioni, osservandole con la prospettiva autentica di chi le ammirava nel passato e visitare dunque quel luogo in modalità immersiva e interattiva. Modalità di apprendimento che sono sicuramente più dinamiche e visive rispetto alle normali esperienze.
Kronos è dunque un servizio di noleggio di visori di VR/MR. L’esperienza inizia tramite la pagina web di Kronos dove sarà possibile prenotare il servizio all'ora che si preferisce e che verrà consegnato attraverso un servizio di delivery direttamente al cliente. Una volta consegnato verrà svolto un breve training sulla corretta modalità di utilizzo del visore al termine del quale si avrà completa autonomia di spostamento. I turisti saranno dotati anche di una apposita borsa dove potranno riporre il visore quando non lo utilizzano.
Il funzionamento del visore sarà molto semplice; una volta indossato appariranno al visitatore le immagini della ricostruzione del luogo che sta osservando esattamente come si presentava nelle epoche passate attraverso la realtà virtuale. La VR sarà attiva fintanto che egli rimane fermo al suo posto, in piedi o seduto. Quando inizierà a muoversi o farà un gesto con la mano (i visori saranno dotati di hand tracking) i visori passeranno automaticamente alla modalità XR, in questo caso il turista continuerà a vedere le ricostruzioni virtuali dei maggiori monumenti ma ritornerà nella sua realtà e quindi potrà vedere le persone attorno a lui e il pavimento dove cammina. In questo modo egli potrà spostarsi liberamente nello spazio ed osservare comunque le ricostruzioni antiche. Se si ferma nuovamente o fa un gesto della mano da fermo il visore tornerà a presentargli l'ambiente circostante in modalità VR. Una volta finita l'esperienza i turisti potranno richiamare il driver che li rintraccerà attraverso il GPS del loro cellulare e verrà a ritirare i visori.

column50: Innovative fundrasing web-app which takes advantage in term of innovative solution from the adaption of advanced digitalization.
column51:
ARTI uses advanced technology to support, promote and encourage engagement and participation of the community in initiative of enhancement and preservation of the cultural and natural heritage. 
Within a system strategy and reciprocity mechanism with local stakeholders and cultural and creative identities, i.e. values, specificities and implications of an immaterial nature - such as those linked to traditions, knowledge and to creativity which enrich the notion of Heritage - we develop an fundraising platform to publish and communicate initiatives from local municipalities, museums, foundations. 
With the functionality and algorithm of our web app, we accept micro donations; donors can decide the portion of the digital asset where to address their donations; traceability of donation is guaranteed with blockchain protocol developed; every donation releases the right to download a discount voucher – based on the amount of the donation: donor can choose from ones made available by one of our cultural and creative industries (CCIs) affiliate partners.
Every affiliate CCI partners have a dedicated page in ARTI platform where we promote the values of the company and all elements within the notion of quality and made in Italy, to contribute for visibility and customer attraction locally and worldwide; the functionality measure the return of value generated by our partner, calculating the difference between the value of the voucher released and total spent by our user.

column50: A Cutting-edge Start up for Real Time Navigation in the Outdoor Sport Sector (trekking and ski slopes)
column51:
Easy Ski is a real-time navigation app dedicated to mountain trails (trekking) and ski slopes, similar to traffic apps, introducing digital maps for the first time. Users can find the most convenient route to their destination, choose the type of slopes/trails to avoid, check the estimated time of travel, and assess the level of crowding. 
Additionally, users can use the app to alert others about potential dangers/issues on the slopes, locate and reach restaurants, mountain huts, and tourist attractions.

The application, with its ability to create digital maps, represents a sustainable solution by eliminating traditional paper maps, contributing to paper conservation. Furthermore, Easy Ski commits to adopting practices and initiatives aligned with various Sustainable Development Goals (17 SDGs), such as promoting decent and sustainable work (Goal 8), adopting eco-friendly technological solutions (Goal 9), promoting environmental sustainability in tourist activities (Goals 11 and 12), and collaborating with other stakeholders to achieve common goals (Goal 17).

Our application will be easily accessible to a wide range of users as it will be available on both Android (Play Store) and IOS (App Store). Users can install and use the app on mobile devices and desktop computers. Our target audience includes all enthusiasts of skiing, winter sports, snow vacations, trekking, mountain exploration, and cultural attractions.

Easy Ski will also be a valuable tool for winter sports enthusiasts who wish to explore not only the magnificent ski slopes but also the rich cultural attractions in Italian ski areas. Its functionality of providing information and directions to places of interest such as historical churches, local museums, and other tourist attractions will be of invaluable value for those who want to enrich their experience with a touch of culture.

The pricing strategy is based on: selling data (demographic, registration, operating systems used, browser language, connection type, sentiment), in-app advertising (PPC), and selling digital maps (similar to Navionics maps, costing 20/30 euros per map depending on the area).

The growing trend of interest in winter mountain activities, both in terms of the number of practitioners and frequency, supports the market opportunity. The increase in tourism related to winter sports and mountain exploration will further contribute to the demand for innovative services such as digital maps.

column50: Cora is targeting a vertical of the hospitality business which is not touched by common hospitality software ( PMS).
column51:
Cora is a Cloud Platform thought by hoteliers for every accommodation business. It wants to help optimizing operations in 3 different way: operational efficiency, quality control and cost Analysis. It starts form the "dark side" of facility management, giving to cleaning and maintenance departments a useful tool that helps digitizing their tasks and keep track of them, and it provides to management insights about how their accommodation business ( hotels, Short term rentals, ecc.. ) is running on the internal side, even with the help of the custom AI system (Cora GPT).
Cora is able to provide informations not collectable by other systems or software, such as the operational cost of every available unit, bringing light and clarity in areas where is very difficult to extrapolate datas.

column50: At Italian Local Expert we provide full travel packages crafted and delivered by native and local experts at the click of your mouse.
column51:
PlayItaly is a groundbreaking collaboration of four distinguished Italian entrepreneurial entities, joining our collective experience, know-how, and presence in the tourism sector to redefine the way you experience Italy. Our mission is to create unforgettable journeys that go beyond the ordinary, rooted in the rich tapestry of Italian culture, traditions, and undiscovered places.
At PlayItaly, we envision a travel experience which unveils the true essence of Italy, breaking free from stereotypes and presenting the country for what it genuinely is. We strive to be the ultimate point of reference for meticulously researched and complete experiences, catering to the diverse needs of every traveler, while preserving the environment and the beauty of our beloved destinations.
Our trips are designed to be real and transparent, woven from the fabric of Italian culture, traditions, and hidden gems. We go beyond the surface to offer you an authentic glimpse into the heart of Italy. PlayItaly is not about guided visits; it's about crafting genuine Italian experiences. Our journeys are curated with the expertise of Italian experts and creative artists, ensuring that every moment is infused with the richness of Italian heritage. We tell our story through brand awareness, ensuring that you understand the values and passion behind PlayItaly. Our commitment to attentive customer care spans the entire journey, from pre-booking assistance to post-experience support.
PlayItaly is revolutionizing the travel industry with an innovative online infrastructure that brings together the digital know-how of four distinct entities. With this revolutionary approach, you can explore, book, and immerse yourself in Italian experiences without leaving your home. No need to travel to a physical location to purchase a package – everything is detailed, prepared, and ready for you to embark on an unforgettable journey.
Join us at PlayItaly, where digital innovation meets the warmth of Italian hospitality. Your journey begins with the click of a button, and the adventure unfolds seamlessly, leaving you with memories of an authentic Italian experience that will last a lifetime.

column50: offer authentic experiences led by experienced people who know well local venues and cultures, getting off the classic touristic routes.
column51:
Slow tourism is always more important to adventures journeys and sustainability is an important driver to life choices. We want to offer an opportunity to all the people who search an authentic way of travel. 

We organize journeys for people who want to discover unexplored places and different cultures authentically and with a deep personal relationship. We make deep connection with local activities to promote local economies, enhancing people life conditions. 

Our journey are group experience because we believe in creating a worldwide community of proactive and responsible travelers exploring the World with respect, connecting with the cultural, social and environmental diversity of places. Our mission is discovering places and cultures authentically and respectfully, offering adventurous and curious guides around the world to promote authentic travel experiences and deeper connections between people and different cultures. 

After our MVP in Georgia, we are ready to get through three more tours to improve our idea. We have already three booked tours in May 9-19, June 26-July 10, August 9-19. The tours will consist of adventour tours in Kazakhstan, Kyrgyzstan and other Central Asian countries. While the first one focuses on the Almaty region (where Tommaso resides), the other ones encompass 2 or 4 countries. Participants will be guided through Central Asian's diverse landscapes, ranging from the Alatau mountain range to the majestic canyons, and steppes inhabitated by horses and semi-nomadic people. The tours also focus on the Soviet cultural heritage, history and architecture, which is mostly visible in the urban centres such as Almaty, Bishkek, Tashkent and Dushanbe. Trekking days on the plateaus will be alternated to walking tours in the cities and towns, the tours aims to balance outdoor activities with cultural and in-depth exploration of the urban environments. We will be mostly staying in guesthouses run by local families where participants have the chance to engage with the local people, experience their everyday lives, and taste the traditional Central Asian cuisine. 

We believe in a new way of travel and we want to leave a positive trace in the World, enhancing the #offthemap places and people. We keep in touch with our travellers and design a community that it focus on slow tourism and local people.
