Tourism Sector:
The “Enricher tool” embedded in the platform shall allow entities of Tourism Sector (hotel, b&b, etc.), as well as their clients, to focus on all and each elements belonging to various isochrone areas. This would allow the enterprises to:
- improve their offer to customers through, among other things, (i) the construction of online itineraries based on real travel time and means of transport; (ii) the identification of stores, shops, amenities that match with customer needs
- optimize times for: (i) guest pick-ups and taxis; (ii) delivery of materials and other items to and from the facility; (ii) cleaning and ordinary and extraordinary maintenance;
- enter into agreements with neighboring businesses and therefore increase turnover (exchange of introduction fees);
- understand the effective impact of competitors on their target customers.
Public administrations will be allowed to better exploit the territories and the operators.
Museums and places of interest shall use the software to enhance a tailored offer to visitors.

Catering Sector:
We develop a software aimed to let clients understand, together with other elements of traditional analysis, the potential cash flows of a specific city area in the restaurant & bar (AFH-away from home) sector.
Based of public data available, our solution, on one hand, helps entrepreneurs to better plan, build and monitor their own business comparing it with local competitors and, on the other hand, provide banks with an innovative creditworthiness assessment method to assess whether financing a client and, subsequently, control the trends of such business: thanks to this profiling and monitoring tool, impaired exposures, defaults (UTP) and non-performing loans (NPL) will fall below the average, reducing the risk for banks and financial institutions.  
Our software measures in real time the positioning of a AFH company within the target local market in comparison with its close competitors.
This is made possible thanks to the use of specific data to analyze the competitors and the most appropriate behavior for a company’s prospects in a specific location.

column50: Tourist accommodations turned into a Diffused Museum, for a new travel experience that brings together travelers, local community and hosts.
column51:
HostNarrate: Art, Technology and Heritage for a new travel experience. ??

When HostNarrate was born we asked ourselves two questions: What pushes us to travel and what we look for when we travel. This is how HostNarrate was born: to unite hosts, local communities and travellers in a common project.??In the early stage HostNarrate intends to focus on property management activities for vacations rentals, with the application of our narrative hosting model. ?

By integrating technology, art, and local heritage enhancement, HostNarrate increases revenue opportunities for holiday home owners, assisting a user-friendly approach that delivers a unique and memorable experience to travelers around the world. The tourist home is complemented by technological devices and exhibition spaces for Artists and Designers: a Diffused Museum that transforms the Homes into a gateway to the city, preparing the visitor to discover the territory. Each Home is configured with interactive installations and totems perfectly integrated into the domestic environment and guides the traveller in his travel experience, through insights that reveal the true face of the territory, guiding him to a conscious gaze. The tourism industry is experiencing strong growth, particularly in the holiday home sector. This trend is driven primarily by the changing preferences of travelers, who now prefer more and more private homes for their travels. Travelers are looking for new stimuli and services, eager to experience a more immersive, cultural and experiential travel experience. Unfortunately, mass tourism generates a gradual loss of cultural identity in the territories and the consequent standardization of tourist experiences makes the choice for travelers complex. As a result, it is increasingly difficult for tourism operators to emerge and reach new customers.?

We believe that giving new impulses to the life of the local community not only encourages a process of regeneration of the territories, but also helps to return the traveler a less stereotyped image and a less standardized experience. The tourism industry is the one that is best suited to lay the foundations for the development and the strengthening of territorial realities, but this can only be done by creating a model of cohesion among all local realities, by focusing on human capital, specific identities and socio-economic and cultural structures of a place.?

column50: The freemium model of booking a cultural city tour and receiving free personalized suggestions on local activities
column51:
Inigotravel is the e-retailer that provides cultural travelers with tailored city tours and suggests personalized activities for exploring the essence of a destination.
Inigotravel offers a unique combination of learning by walking and living recommended experiences based on travelers tastes and interest, matching them with a selected database of activities using a cutting-edge approach, made of:
-	Professional tour guides for a slow and social learning cultural experience
-	AI-based tech and Big Data for personalization of local activities based on traveler characteristics and taste
-	Chatbot for a customized and more performing interaction with customers
-	App for activities proposals tailored to customer preferences with geo-localization
Pursuing the mission to inspire people to learn what makes a place, its people and its culture special, unique and meaningful, to leave memories that will last a lifetime.

column50: The Big Wave integra tecnologia, cultura, sostenibilità e inclusività per creare esperienze uniche e promuovere il patrimonio culturale.
column51:
The Big Wave è un'azienda che si distingue per la sua missione dedicata a sfruttare la tecnologia per arricchire l'esperienza umana e valorizzare il patrimonio culturale e ambientale. Fondata con l'obiettivo di creare soluzioni innovative per la cultura, il turismo e l'ambiente, si è affermata come un importante attore nel campo della digitalizzazione e dell'innovazione.
Una delle principali iniziative di The Big Wave è l'applicazione Fenicio, una piattaforma avanzata che utilizza la tecnologia dei sensori di prossimità e del digital twin per creare esperienze interattive e coinvolgenti per i visitatori nei contesti culturali e naturali. Fenicio consente di trasformare i luoghi storici, i musei, i siti archeologici e le aree naturali in ambienti virtuali accessibili tramite dispositivi mobili, fornendo al pubblico un modo innovativo per esplorare e interagire con il patrimonio culturale e ambientale.
La piattaforma Fenicio offre una vasta gamma di funzionalità, tra cui visite guidate virtuali, informazioni dettagliate sui luoghi, giochi ed esperienze immersive. Ma ciò che rende Fenicio davvero unico è la sua capacità di creare gemelli digitali, modelli virtuali di luoghi fisici che consentono il monitoraggio ambientale in tempo reale e l'analisi approfondita dei dati.
The Big Wave si impegna anche nella promozione della sostenibilità e della responsabilità sociale d'impresa attraverso le sue iniziative. La piattaforma Fenicio è stata utilizzata per sviluppare progetti di turismo sostenibile, consentendo ai visitatori di scoprire il patrimonio culturale e naturale in modo eco-friendly. Inoltre, collabora con enti pubblici e privati per promuovere l'accessibilità e l'inclusione, rendendo i luoghi culturali accessibili a persone con disabilità.
L'azienda vanta una solida esperienza nel settore, con un team di professionisti altamente qualificati in settori quali software development, fotografia, patrimonio culturale, ambiente e formazione. Questo team eclettico e competente ha consentito di sviluppare soluzioni innovative, mantenendo l'attenzione sulla qualità, l'efficienza e la sostenibilità.
The Big Wave non si ferma alla creazione di applicazioni, ma si concentra anche sulla formazione e sulla diffusione delle sue soluzioni. Come Agenzia Formativa Regionale certificata ISO 9001 per la formazione tecnico-informatica, l'azienda offre programmi di formazione per aiutare individui e organizzazioni a sfruttare appieno il potenziale delle tecnologie digital

column50: Cycle mechanic assistance at home or in the streets for urban users by Doctorbike App and smart solutions for bike - friendly companies
column51:
A truly unique service for cycle tourists and urban cyclists. We are a team present in Rome and with several offices in Italy, with over 3000 satisfied customers to date thanks to our specialized cyclomechanics who, with over 15 years of experience, carry out their work starting from very high quality standards and with 30-day guarantees. All this assures our community a positive and reassuring experience.

From today, requesting emergency assistance on the road or at home will no longer be a problem: with us you will always have your cycle mechanic in your pocket!
With the new Doctorbike App, just a few simple steps are enough to get assistance anywhere, thanks to our mobile cycle workshops and professional affiliated cycle mechanics. Furthermore, for the most difficult repairs, we provide our 3R service: Collection-Repair-Return of the vehicle to your home after processing in the cycle workshop.

Our application is designed to encourage and increase gentle and sustainable mobility. A special button will allow you to report a disruption on a cycle path and send a geolocated photo of the damage, together with a brief description of the problem. A team of experts will communicate it to the municipality to which it belongs and will resolve it in a short time!

We provide also smart solutions for bike - friendly companies that want to increase their engagement in promoting bike - to - work among their workers ( fleets to rent, tools for bike friendly sites, planned mantainance service of the fleets )

column50: It's a brand new system focused on promoting niche wineries all over the world, enabling travelers to discover them and book online in 2 min
column51: Winedering enables wineries, tour operators, guides and local tour leaders to create, refine and sell unique and authentic wine tourism experiences, on Winedering.com, to international tourists and professional buyers, who can book and review online in less than 1 minute. Winedering is a B2C marketplace active since 2021. In less than 1 year we generated more than 800.000 organic visits with a main focus in Italy. Our platform is now growing towards a direction of more digital and technological assets: B2B marketplace, API, Business Intelligence and AI system for niche wineries to reach new customers. As of today a customer goes online, search for a wine experience, finds winedering.com and book. We are working with 1700 experiences and our goal in 2023 is to become the largest platform worldwide in terms of wine experiences.

column45:
eric larsen
Sentiti in call da 45, i founder sono belli tosti, tutti ex Vodafone e BCG. Sanno come far girare le cose e le stanno facendo girare molto bene. La piattaforma è prettamente B2B, onboardano le grandi aziende/corporate per dare la possibilità ai dipendenti o all'azienda stessa di fare esperienze settimanali in Borghi che loro stessi vanno ad allestire. Sicuramente la parte di allestimento borghi, trovare appartamenti per il pernottamento dei dipendenti è la cosa che ancora ad oggi è meno scalabile. Per fare questo Stipendiano delle persone (Town manager) per tutta l'operatività. Hanno una pipeline di 600k in contratti e sta per entrare pure CDP. Hanno automatizzato l'acquisizione con mailmarketing. 

Molto bravi e solidi.

column45:
Paolo Ottaviani
Revisior è un servizio completo di feedback e NPS (Net Promoter Score). Forniamo analisi dettagliate del servizio in numeri, grafici, dashboard, per una comprensione completa della situazione e una sua pronta soluzione. Già visti per Power M e selezionati da Wurth. Sono interessanti ma non so per applicabili nel settore travel (forse si). Non credo siano disposti a rilocarsi
Revisior è un servizio completo di feedback e NPS (Net Promoter Score). Forniamo analisi dettagliate del servizio in numeri, grafici, dashboard, per una comprensione completa della situazione e una sua pronta soluzione.

Aiutano le aziende a identificare e risolvere rapidamente i problemi dei clienti. Rispondono rapidamente alle recensioni da diversi canali di comunicazione (QR, Viber, SMS, e-mail, API, call center). Track record molto interessante e numeri nella media (anche se mi aspettavo di più)
column50: We are increase the profitability of brands with the help of service improvement and control via NPS and feedback system.
column51:
We form a positive brand reputation by improving the quality of service.
We help businesses to identify and solve customer problems quickly. Fast respond to reviews from different communication channels (QR, Viber, SMS, Email, API, call center).

Revisior is a comprehensive feedback and NPS (Net Promoter Score) service. We provide detailed analytics of the service in numbers, graphs, dashboards, for a complete understanding of the situation and its prompt solution.

Successful cases of feedback collection and NPS integration for more than 1000 SMB and Enterprises clients. With the help of Revizion, such market leaders as: «British American Tabacco», «Burger King», «New Balance», «Pandora», «Union group», «Epicenter», «Intertop», «TAS Life», «IPay», «New Products», «Global Spirits», «Luxoptika», «Watsons», «Ukrpost», «Puzata Khata», «La Famiglia group» and others.

Revisior is the best service for working with feedback and NPS, building a complete business process for customer retention and return.

column50: Roadolando organises an accessible, affordable and well-planned green adventure on the road with a Jeep owned by Roadolando.
column51:
Roadolando organises green adventure trips, on the road aboard Roadolando's proprietary 4x4 pickup equipped with camping gear capable of autonomous living, with the aim of letting the customer experience nature at 360º and with the awareness of doing sustainable adventure. Roadolando through direct interviews has developed full-immersion and complete 7 days-trip to trendy destinations. 
The vehicles will be driven by customers and will leave in groups of at least 4 people, where there will be a professional and experienced guide who will lead the Roadolanders (customers) to the every-day plan with a single car and provide total support during the duration of the trip.

column42: Giulio Montoli, Edmondo Sparano, Francesco Varuzza, Giulia Fazzini, Edoardo Giorio, Davide Pozzi, Giulio Maria Pezzini, Arunsankar Periyasami, Dario Baroni, Andrea Tripodo, Alessandro N. Ferretti, LVenture Group API Access
column45:
Edoardo Giorio
Piattaforma di match tra Staff e offerte di lavoro per eventi privati/aziendali. Garantisce meno tempo di attesa su preventivi, ricezione profili, minori costi fissi e una scelta più ampia rispetto alle agenzie tradizionali.
Al momento prendono fee sul margine del servizio e €15 su assicurazione, dal 2024 aggiungono SaaS tramite licenza annuale/acquisto crediti una tantum
Hanno già della Traction e raccolto €126k in crowd Team esperto nel settore.

Andrea Tripodo
Toget4U è una piattaforma che offre un servizio di staff in appalto per eventi privati e aziendali. Le classiche agenzie offrono un servizio simile a quello di Toget4U ma a prezzi molto più alti. UVP: risparmio in termini di tempo per la ricerca dello staff e di costi (dal 20% al 60%).
Modello SaaS integrato al capisco modello Agency platform based. A differenza dei competitor principali (come  Hostess.it e Showgroup) offre alle aziende la ricerca di staff assistita  senza alcuna registrazione (poco amata dalle aziende).
Team con solida esperienza nel settore degli eventi..sembra abbiano le idee chiare. Traction positiva ed in crescita rispetto agli anni precedenti: +16k utenti registrati (+80% rispetto al 22’), +300 clienti (+75% rispetto al 22’), +800eventi gestiti + €900k fatturato. Cap table ok. Hanno raccolto €126k tramite crowdfunding.

column50: As a Benefit Company, TUTTOTONDO is committed to operate in a responsible, sustainable, and transparent approach to the community.
column51:
TUTTOTONDO has been developing TRATOO since its inception, the MVP created has already been thoroughly tested by over 50 volunteer users in the city of Milan and Bologna, where the testing and debugging phase was conducted. TUTTOTONDO has already obtained interests from over 30 future commercial partners and can count on the TECHINNOVA S.p.A. network. (which is available to invest in the start up) to position TRATOO in at least 5 countries in the next 12 months.
In its year of birth (2022) TUTTOTONDO achieved a turnover of 172,500 and a total production of 240,118 thanks, above all, to the consultancy services carried out on behalf of partners in the Techinnova network. In 2023 the turnover rose to just under 500,000 euros (preliminary data) and TUTTOTONDO became a communication and marketing partner of 2 supply chains, 2 business networks and over 30 customers, of which 23% are international. TUTTOTONDO, a benefit start-up, entered 2 international R&D projects (Italy, Switzerland and UAE) in 2023 and began to develop the international A4W (Art 4 Women) project which will use TRATOO as a vehicle for promoting exhibitions and events of the project with a strong social character. 
Tratoo is an innovative service that revolutionizes the tourism sector by leveraging advanced GPS localization and augmented reality. Users can create tailor-made thematic itineraries, such as cultural, gastronomic, or fashion tours, based on their preferences. Available in multiple languages, Tratoo features a user-friendly interface compatible with Android and iOS devices. Its cutting-edge GPS system ensures precise navigation, while augmented reality and 360° multimedia galleries enhance the exploration of historical monuments by providing immersive audio-visual storytelling. TUTTOTONDO is developing an AI that allows you to better organize the choices of tourists on foot in the construction of their tailor-made thematic routes. The AI will acquire the profiles of interest of users, compare them with previous experiences it has in Database and propose paths to new customers.

column30: Servizi turistici innovativi per il turismo accessibile e inclusivo
column42: Giulio Montoli, Edmondo Sparano, Francesco Varuzza, Giulia Fazzini, Edoardo Giorio, Davide Pozzi, Giulio Maria Pezzini, Arunsankar Periyasami, Dario Baroni, Andrea Tripodo, Alessandro N. Ferretti, LVenture Group API Access

column50: Piattaforma web con informazioni verificate sull'accessibilità e contenuti multimediali  per facilitare il turismo di persone con disabilità
column51:
Favoriamo una trasformazione culturale che migliori il turismo italiano rendendolo più inclusivo e facile per tutti, aiutando gli operatori turistici a migliorare  l'accessibilità dei propri spazi e servizi.
Forniamo consulenza a chi progetta e crea prodotti turistici per renderli inclusivi con la collaborazione e la partecipazione progettuale di associazioni ed enti del terzo settore specifici per ogni disabilità.  
Agli operatori della filiera turistica (hotel, ATL del territorio, tour operator, agenzie di viaggio, imprenditori turistici) proponiamo una formazione di base sul turismo accessibile per cogliere le opportunità di sviluppo del business nell'ottica del turismo  inclusivo e sostenibile secondo gli obiettivi dell'agenda 2030. 
In particolare alle strutture ricettive e catene alberghiere proponiamo una consulenza specifica con la mappatura dell'accessibilità degli spazi e della fruizione dei servizi per tutti i tipi di disabilità ( motoria, sensoriale, cognitiva e relazionale) oltre che una formazione di base sull'accoglienza e ospitalità inclusiva.
Pubblichiamo e promuoviamo sulla nostra piattaforma esperienze turistiche sviluppate in collaborazione con guide e operatori turistici che abbiamo formato sull'accessibilità.
Nelle esperienze che proponiamo integriamo il più possibile le informazioni dettagliate di accessibilità con contenuti multimediali (audio descrizioni, video sottotitolati o in LIS, virtual tour) in modo da facilitare le esperienze per tutti e renderle più immersive e coinvolgenti utilizzando le tecnologie più innovative (AI, Virtual Reality).

Edoardo Giorio

column50: Freedoo addresses the tourist market in Italy  which totalize a purchase flow of 1.6 billion euros.
column51:
Freedoo is an advanced digital platform that help retailers with innovative technological services for customers. Innovation is based on optimizing relations between retailers and customers through a mobile application that combine traditional shopping with e-commerce thanks to the concept of "e-commerce proximity".

WHAT FREEDOO DO
•	Allows you to buy directly in the store using the app by qrcode scan and, at the same time, let you send the items wherever you want, even if the store is closed.
•	Offers coordinated services that facilitate the relationship between retailers and customers in a single instrument
•	Allows to geolocate and highlight different product categories to promote local artisans, small 
Producers and shops
•	It is a valuable loyalty and remarketing tool for retailers
•	Manage offers and discounts customized by retailers
•	Allow multiple purchases, deliverable anywhere with a single shipment reducing shipping costs
•	Allow secure payments by App
•	Remove language barriers 
•	Display the item cost in user own currency
•	Allow an easy compilation of tax refund forms

BUSINESS MODEL
In the start-up phase, Freedoo's business model is based on:
•	8% on the transactions made through the App
•	Free subscription for retailers for the first 12 months
In the following phase:
•	8% on transactions made through the App
•	Paid subscription for retailers
•	Fee on each shipment 

THE IDEA
The idea was born thinking how often tourists give up buying something because they don’t know how to take it home. At the same time retail and consumer goods companies have fewer opportunities for growth due to a mature market. The increase in competitors, the development of alternative sales channels (Ecommerce), the creation of large marketplaces (Amazon, ebay ...), have put small shops in crisis.

The increase in competitors, the development of alternative sales channels (Ecommerce), the creation of large marketplaces (Amazon, ebay ...), have put small shops in crisis.

column50: iSpace2o designs and creates innovative crafts unseen on the market (world's first) integrating innovative technology for energy efficiency.
column51: The sector in which the initiative is part is the nautical one with the mission of developing electric and / or hydrogen hybrid propulsion boats. The flagship project is a hydrofoil / submarine boat called DeepSeaker for which an Invitalia Smart & Start loan for 1.5 million euros was obtained. The company currently has no employees and uses third-party companies to carry out the design, engineering and construction of the DeepSeaker prototype. The use of electric motors powered by lithium-ion batteries and the possibility of using hybrid technology to use hydrogen as a zero-impact fuel qualifies the project with a very low environmental impact, also thanks to the use of recyclable materials in the construction. The initiative is therefore part of a project aimed at minimizing the impact on the environment in the nautical sector as much as possible by producing a very versatile vehicle that can respond to numerous uses (pleasure craft, rescue, scientific research, etc.) powered by clean energy.

column51:
FaunaLife brings together all the web services pet owners can use in one place. FaunaLife has 3 souls:
- Beegle, the search engine for pet owners.
- Pointer (the IOP Internet of Pets).
- FaunaLife, your pet's data safe and always available
-In many legislations dogs and cats are still considered as objects, while their owners consider them family members. Providing them with a digital identity, with a past and a future, is a first step in protecting them and recognizing their rights
-Unified registry at national and international level: in Italy every region keeps a different dog registry, and every Country in the world has a different one, often difficult to compare with the others
-FL simplifies the movement of animals during travel and facilitates adoptions between different regions and countries, with an almost immediate update of data
-Every year, millions of purebred dogs and cats around the world are registered with different and disjointed agencies. These have limited and difficult access to informations. FL makes it possible to reconstruct the family tree of all animals, not just purebreds, without limits, and makes the data easily accessible
-In case of loss of the animal who finds it has the opportunity to report the owner by reading the NFC tag. It will also have the necessary information to treat it in the best way in the meanwhile
-FL allows to fight more effectively the trade of puppies from Puppy Farms, the exploitation for breeding purposes and the sale of fake pedigrees
-FL allows you to have always available the animal's documents, such as passport, health booklet, certificates, insurance data.... Informations are immediately available if required 
-The inserted data, linked together, would allow research centers to carry out studies on the transmissibility of genetic diseases with accuracy and on a very large sample
-FL creates a digital medical record that veterinarians can consult as needed. Data are available for consultation by different specialists who do not have their own shared databases
- Simplification of the current data collection model, which is scattered, inefficient and a waste of time and resources. FL represents a system that is simple to use and easily accessible by everyone. We use a Blockchain with a very low environmental impact
- FL makes possible to track the presence and movements of endangered or protected species under international protocols such as CITES, hindering illegal trafficking of exotic animals

column42: Giulio Montoli, Edmondo Sparano, Francesco Varuzza, Giulia Fazzini, Edoardo Giorio, Davide Pozzi, Giulio Maria Pezzini, Arunsankar Periyasami, Dario Baroni, Andrea Tripodo, Alessandro N. Ferretti, LVenture Group API Access
column45:
Paolo Ottaviani
Travelvite è una piattaforma di viaggio rivoluzionaria, che ridefinisce il modo in cui le persone esplorano il mondo. A differenza delle agenzie di viaggio convenzionali, Travelvite consente agli utenti di essere sia gli artefici che i partecipanti dei loro viaggi, promuovendo un approccio alle esperienze di viaggio basato sulla comunità. La piattaforma si basa sui viaggi generati dagli utenti, consentendo agli individui di creare e invitare altri a partecipare alle loro avventure, promuovendo un senso di indipendenza, flessibilità e cameratismo.  Bello tutto ma sono nati ieri e non hanno nulla. Argo3
column50: Travelvite disrupts the travel industry, empowering individuals to transform their travel aspirations into reality through decentraisation.
column51:
Travelvite is a revolutionary travel platform, redefining the way people explore the world. Unlike conventional travel agencies, Travelvite empowers users to be both the architects and participants of their journeys, fostering a community-driven approach to travel experiences. The platform thrives on user-generated trips, enabling individuals to craft and invite others to join their adventures, fostering a sense of independence, flexibility, and camaraderie. 

Features and Functionality:

1. Trip Creation Freedom: 
At Travelvite, users have the autonomy to design their dream trips from scratch. They can outline destinations, activities, accommodations, and any specific preferences or requirements. The platform provides intuitive tools and templates for trip planning, ensuring that even those new to trip curation can effortlessly craft exciting adventures.

2. Invitation System: 
Travelvite's unique invitation system allows trip creators to invite fellow users or share trip details publicly within the platform. Invitations can be sent to individuals or groups, providing flexibility in assembling travel companions. Users can browse and accept invitations that align with their interests and schedules, fostering a diverse community of travelers.

3. Communication Hub:
To streamline coordination and collaboration, Travelvite features a robust communication hub. This includes real-time messaging, itinerary sharing, and a collaborative space where trip participants can discuss plans, share insights, and finalize details. This fosters a sense of camaraderie among travelers even before the journey begins.

4. Community Ratings and Reviews: 
Transparency and trust are paramount in Travelvite's ethos. Users can rate and review trip creators and participants based on their experiences. This feedback loop ensures a reliable and authentic community, enhancing the quality of future travel collaborations.

5. Safety and Guidelines:
While Travelvite champions independence, safety guidelines and best practices are integrated into the platform. Users can access safety tips, guidelines for responsible travel, and emergency assistance features to ensure a secure and enjoyable experience for all.

Value Proposition:
Travelvite's core value lies in its ability to democratize travel. By empowering users to create, organize, and participate in trips independently, the platform breaks free from conventional tour structures.

column50: the choice of "day trip", use of open source data, fast go-to-market thanks to the technology implemented, local community based
column51:
The proposal has a twofold objective. On the one hand to offer a digital platform (based on a strong social community on facebook, instagram, youtube, linkedin, medium), which constitutes a local guide for day trips based on the WikiVoyage open data. Personalisation algorithms and artificial intelligence allow for the suggestion and organisation of tailor-made itineraries based on user interest, distance and available time. On-site information services, purchase and booking of experiences on the platform and contactless payments are provided. At the end of the trip, gamification activities are proposed to involve users to leave reviews and useful advices for future travellers both on the app and on the community.
On the other hand, there is the possibility for typical local activities to have a digital showcase (similar to a CMS) where they can create and/or promote their digital presence, organise and manage in a simple and effective way customer relations, bookings and the sale of products and/or experiences. WikiVoyage APIs allow hosts and locals to personally contribute to the digitalization of data and information of the territory.
The business idea is based on a 2-sided platform model that enables the matching of demand for activities to be carried out by tourists and supply by service providers on a digital omnichannel web+mobile app platform.
The focus is on typical local activities that are less crowded and cover the entire territory in a capillary manner, based on slow, local, proximity and sustainable tourism, with a preference for lesser-known destinations such as "borghi" and local communities. A further differentiation concerns the collection of data on user habits, useful for customising proposals for places to visit, activities and experiences to enjoy, and enabling service providers to improve and adapt their proposals in a customer-centric perspective. The proposal also responds to the difficulty of organising long-distance and long-duration trips in the current pandemic situation, making it possible to fall back on solutions that are closer to home, COVID safer and less crowded by mass tourism.

column50: Among the first delivery services offered on the sea, it is very innovative compared to the traditional food & beverage sellers in the sea.
column51:
Sealivery offers a delivery service on the sea through its Sealivery mobile and web app allowing boaters to order from partners (restaurants, groceries, pharmacies etc) whatever they prefer and receive it directly on their boat. Our riders, on board of our Sealivery boats, are delivering orders from partners to boater clients. 
In around 7 months of cumulative operations, Sealivery managed to sealiver 700 orders, with an average order value of >110€ generating gross revenue of more than 100€ (including sponsors and SaaS fees). Sealivery is currently active in the islands of Ponza and Palmarola with 2 dinghies, both proprietary, and 2 directly employed riders. Aim is to expand operations, we need more budget and bigger team, and develop a franchise model to expand in more location easier. 
On top, Sealivery recently tested the offering of accommodation and boat rentals, trekking trails and enogastronomic tasting tours, transacting €10k without sponsoring much the initiative. Goal is to leverage on our increasing customer base, knowledge of locations and partnership to develop coastal tourism. We'd like to be a 360° reference point for boaters and travellers on the sea, in particular in the locations we are present.
column55: B2C clients as well, ie. boat owners/renter  - use the service to better enjoy their stay on the sea, Skippers, charters, shipyards, rentals (they connect us with their many private clients) - use the service and offer it to their private clients and make their journeys much easier

Andrea Tripodo
tabUi è un’app che ti permette di avere tutte le informazioni utili su un territorio a portata di mano tramite realtà aumentata.
L'app raccoglie migliaia di contenuti, tra cui beni storici, itinerari, luoghi di interesse, percorsi, consigli ed eventi.
Hanno traction: 100k di fatturato nel 2022 e 300k di fatturato nel 2023 - partnership con il ministero del turismo. Team composto da 5 membri (*nel deck non sono presenti info).
column50: tabUi is an Augmented Reality app that accompanies you throughout Italy, updating automatically with new activities and experiences to disco
column51:
tabUi is an innovative experiential tourism app that allows people to discover hidden places, local traditions and unique events throughout Italy without having to download a different app for each territory. 
Translated into 32 languages, the app leverages augmented reality and artificial intelligence algorithms to offer an immersive and personalized experience. By positioning itself as a one-stop shop for public administration, tabUi solves the problem of digital fragmentation, maintaining contact with the user and overcoming abandonment due to the accumulation of specific apps. 
Through an intuitive and interactive design, tabUi enhances Italy's cultural and natural heritage, supporting accessible and sustainable tourism with a single versatile and inclusive platform.

column51:
Ower The Moon, the cutting-edge experiential digital platform in Italy, enters a market valued at 16€B, with 75% of bookings made online, of which 70% are influenced by Generation Z.

This segment, driven by sustainability and a "DIY" (do-it-yourself) approach, represents a significant and currently untapped opportunity.

Ower The Moon not only offers unique experiences but also gathers hundreds of restaurants, hotels, bars, shops, museums, and wellness centers - anything that can create a memorable impression for those who partake.

Sleeping in a tree, dining in a church, bookstore or on a train, staying in a stable or on an airplane, enjoying a drink in an igloo or exploring an '80s museum are just a few of the offerings the platform provides.

Gamification is central, allowing users to receive more information while having fun.

With Generation Z set to become consumers, not just influencers, attention to sustainability, technology, a DIY approach and experiential tourism will increasingly drive Italian tourism.

Ower The Moon is a Benefit Company, meaning it makes sustainability the cornerstone of its operations, promoting eco-friendly practices among network facilities and allocating part of the revenues to concrete sustainable projects in the community.

column50: Plus of Puglia experiences is my person. People or tour operator can trust a real person because my name and my face are everywhere.
column51:
I'm a travel advisor (local) specialized in sharing the best Puglia can offer. I have both b2c and b2b connections. What I did last year (the first one) was to provide authentic experiences connected to the inner tradiitions of this land.
The experiences are made by me first hand, because I want to be sure of what I m selling to my clients. 
I don't sell packages because I try first to understand what they are looking for.
So most of the experiences I provide are customized. 
My work is 80% of the time digital. I organize everything and I follow them during their staying in case they need something else. I love to find solutions to their requests.
If they need I can also be available in person for a sort of welcoming or also during their staying and during their experiences.
They pay me usually through links payment.

column45:
Andrea Tripodo
Team composto da un unico membro senza esperienza. Super early. L'idea è quella di sviluppare l'ennesimo social network di pianificazione viaggi sfruttando l'AI. No UVP. Ad oggi non è stato sviluppato nulla.
column50:
- organizing trips from a single platform
- high level of customization
- user support
-innovative features
column51:
The app gives the ability to plan trips from start to finish, booking hotels, flights, and activities from a single app. The benefits are to have personalized planning, thanks to the use of AI so as to offer the user options in line with their budget, interests, and travel style. The app can suggest authentic and relevant activities saving time and money by monitoring prices of accommodations and activities suggesting the best time to buy. In addition, it will be possible to receive real-time updates on special events, weather conditions, and transportation schedules. The app would allow users to create their trip in detail from start to finish through access to the third-party site to make reservations and then have the entire itinerary saved within the app, with the ability to make changes and receive real-time updates. Users have the ability to leave reviews (possibility to give discounts to users who decide to leave feedback) on individual bookings and in this way the app gives a rating to activities and the algorithm will make them appear among "favorites," so you will have the ability to see which destinations, activities, restaurants are most popular among users but at the same time, thanks to a high customization to each user will be offered services more suitable for them. There will also be the possibility to share travel plans with friends and family so as to facilitate the organization in case of group travel.
At the end of the trip it will also be possible to make one's itinerary public to other users of the app or share the program on other social networks. Users will have the opportunity to enrich the trip with interactive information about the place. They can frame monuments/points of interest with the camera to display information. It will be possible to implement guided tours or historical stories that take place in the real context. In addition, information on sustainable transportation options and accommodations will be available, as well as promoting responsible travel experiences. It can help users keep track of their individual impact. (68% of tourists globally say they prefer eco-responsible destinations and 87% prefer to travel in a way that reduces their impact on the environment (Booking.com))

column50: Fitner brings together athletes and trainers, giving them the opportunity to create and participate to events, anywhere and at any time.
column51:
Fitner is an Italian company, whose aim is to help connect athletes of any level and of any sport with established and successful champions in their discipline.
Fitner wants EVERYONE to have the opportunity to overcome their limits.

And for this we set ourselves two objectives:

Helping athletes improve through training with professionals live or online (EVERYWHERE), without barriers. We are convinced that thanks to the guidance of those who compete at the highest levels, an athlete's growth is extremely faster.
Helping the champions of the most varied disciplines to have a following, to be able to spread their way of doing sport, their way of BEING sport.
Whether they are novice athletes or future champions, they will have the opportunity to train these new recruits until they reach their goal.

What does it offer?

The possibility for all athletes to train with the best trainers of their sport, and for all coaches to find new clients, promoting and increasing national and, in the future, international sports tourism.

The goal is to help the athlete find qualified coaches, and the trainers to find clients, even on holiday.

Fitner offers an experience, something that no one had ever thought of until now.

column51: 2020 Capital srl our startup incubate in VEGA (Scientific Park of Venice) and from January the HQ is in Milan at the Fintech District, develop a new P2P Lending platform oriented only to touristic sector,the borrower such as green field and renewals projects, energy efficency, digitalization and devolpment of ethical work conditions in hospitality and accommodation. Lenders are people who love Italy and who want to help adapt the tourist offer to world competitors and make it the most attractive, with the possibility to reach a remunarative investiment. Thanks to the policy promoted by the platform, in addition to an excellent return on capital (therefore a form of alternative investment), lenders will receive benefits directly from the deals in which they participate. therefore the objectives are 3, to provide alternative financing instruments to a sector severely affected by covid19 which, above all in Italy, is in need of heavy renewals. Only elect projects with certain objectives in line with the European PNRR guides. Provide an alternative channel of remuneration to investors in a sector such as that of lending in full development. Lenders also become part of "Club dei finanziatori" that constitues a new market for the companies that receive the financing, and for that type of guests provide a renewals policy with high standards of advantages. The operative team it is formed by Teamwork Hospitality (first Italian tourism advisor company), BFA spa for accounting and Avvocati.net for legal. Invest4italy.com is  Payment Agent of Lemonway SA (strategic partner) authorized by Bank of France.

column50: We develop 'blind-first' and tailor-made smart glasses that meet the needs of visually impaired people.
column51:
We develop smart glasses that use proprietary AI models for object, text and distance recognition. Our target audience is the blind and severely visually impaired (with a visual field of less than 4/10). Our business model is based on the B2C sale of glasses and in-app subscriptions to additional features. 
Our glasses will allow the user, thanks to a tailor-made sensor, to recognize distances, trace routes, detect objects and text.
This product will also have the basic functionality of generic smart glasses currently on the market.

column30: Innovative start-up aimed at the digitalisation of hotels
column42: Giulio Montoli, Edmondo Sparano, Francesco Varuzza, Giulia Fazzini, Edoardo Giorio, Davide Pozzi, Giulio Maria Pezzini, Arunsankar Periyasami, Dario Baroni, Andrea Tripodo, Alessandro N. Ferretti, LVenture Group API Access
column45:
Paolo Ottaviani
una piattaforma e un'app per rendere i processi operativi degli hotel più veloci e fluidi, oltre a implementare una comunicazione diretta tra gli ospiti e i reparti dell'hotel.
Honek sviluppa la digitalizzazione degli hotel ottimizzando i processi operativi con strumenti di smart check-in, smart key, chatboard, up-selling e cross-selling, strumenti di manutenzione e housekeeping, registro degli oggetti smarriti.  
Honek prevede inoltre di aumentare le entrate degli hotel attraverso il Direct Marketing e il miglioramento delle prestazioni del personale.
La nuova comunità di ospiti e viaggiatori che interagiscono in questo social media dedicato produce un'enorme quantità di dati e aiuta a capire esattamente l'esperienza dei viaggiatori.
Honek crea un mercato virtuale B2C, in cui gli hotel possono implementare il marketing diretto e, grazie al know-how dell'esperienza utente, generare la proposta perfetta. Alla fine come backup ci può anche stare anche se 10k di revenues da un solo cliente in 2 anni.
column50: Honek is a CRM connected to a social media and the big data generated is the great value of this project.
column51:
We create a platform and an app to make hotel operational processes faster and smoother, and also implement a direct communication between guests and hotel departments.
Honek develop the digitalisation of hotels optimising  the operational processes with tools of smart check-in, smart key, chatboard, up-selling and cross-selling, maintenance and housekeeping tools, lost and found register.  
Honek also plans to increase the hotel revenue  performing  the Direct Marketing and improving the staff performance.
The new community of guests and travellers interacting in this dedicated social media, produces a huge amount of data and helps to understand the exact travellers' user experience.
Honek   create a B2C virtual market, where hotel may implement the direct marketing and with the user experience know-how  will generate the perfect proposal. 
Furthermore hotels have the opportunity to improve up-selling and cross-selling, offering guests what they are looking for.
In this virtual market, there are no intermediaries, for hotels it means a cut in commission cost of 15-30% each deal.
Honek’s incoming will be constituted partly by hotels fee, due for the digitalisation system and staff training and partly by the direct marketing campaigns that hotels will decide to carry out.
column55: Hotels - Operational digitalization

Raccolta fondi: 130k
Team completo
Cap table aiuto!
column50: Traveleco è una startup innovativa che opera nel settore del turismo sostenibile
column51:
Traveleco è la community dedicata al turismo sostenibile, che nasce per mettere in relazione i viaggiatori e le strutture ricettive che perseguano il fine di aumentare la qualità, la diffusione e sostenere il turismo ecosostenibile.
Tre sono le linee di azione del progetto:
- assegnare un punteggio di sostenibilità alle strutture e renderle prenotabili su un portale dedicato ad alloggi sostenibili;
- migliorare le performance ambientali delle strutture;
- fornire gli strumenti finanziari per realizzare la transizione ecologica.

Si rivolge a due categorie: le strutture ricettive e i viaggiatori. Le strutture sono state differenziate secondo i seguenti criteri: 
- strutture ricettive attente alla sostenibilità: adottano uno o più di uno degli accorgimenti sostenibili sulla base dell'Agenda 2030, vogliono implementare le proprie azioni e renderle visibili;
- strutture ricettive non sostenibili: non hanno insufficienti criteri di sostenibilità e vogliono implementare la propria impronta ecologica.

Lato viaggiatori troviamo invece: 
- viaggiatori ecosostenibili: attenti alle novità nel settore, hanno uno stile di vita sostenibile e ricercano soluzioni di viaggio a impatto ridotto;
- viaggiatori inclini alla sostenibilità: attenti alla sostenibilità, gradiscono le alternative green alle classiche

Traveleco prevede e fonda il suo business sulla trasparenza e sulla digitalizzazione, pertanto il principale strumento di interazione sia con le strutture ricettive che con i clienti sarà la piattaforma che integrerà tutte le varie funzioni e attività di Traveleco. La piattaforma sarà supportata dallo sviluppo di una app.
Il valore offerto dal progetto riguarda proprio la sostenibilità. La tutela ambientale può diventare un’occasione di sviluppo e un ambito strategico su cui investire e lo sarà sempre di più in un futuro caratterizzato dalla necessità di ripensare modelli di sviluppo, consumo e produzione come l’emergenza da Covid-19 ha contribuito a evidenziare. 
Traveleco intende offrire il proprio contributo al raggiungimento degli obiettivi declinati dalle Nazioni Unite, avvertendo l’urgenza del momento storico e il dovere, morale e sociale, di costruire un futuro a basse emissioni di carbonio e sicuro per il clima, caratterizzato da una green economy dinamica, una società prospera ed inclusiva e un ambiente sano.

column50: It doesn’t require any additions, QR codes, NFC nor Bluetooth. It uses already existing images/objects - no need to produce them.
column51: Runvido brings pictures to life, just like in Harry Potter movies! Runvido solves the problem of limited space to communicate with consumers as well as making internal communication much easier and fun. On flyer, business card or product packaging there’s only a little space for you to use. With Runvido, you can convey a message, personalize offers and engage your customer in an innovative way. Such a solution also impacts the environment - thanks to such features as geolocation, schedule or language version you can diversify your content displayed on static images and at the same time, reduce the print run. We started in the printing house where we first discovered the problem so we want to  combine the digital media with the printed one.

column50: ©SDG Assessment is the world's first UN Sustainable Development Performance Indicator (SDPI) Scorecard and SDG Linked token for DeFi markets
column51:
©SDG Assessment is a sustainability, environmental, social and governance (ESG) performance reporting tool that assists SMEs and large businesses with benchmarking their performance in relation to UN Sustainable Development goals (SDGs) by encouraging organisations that complete the self-assessment process to commit to addressing pertinent UN SDGs. We have created ©SPF+ the world's only digital scorecard aligned to the UN Sustainable Development Performance Indicators (UN SDPI).


Unlocking Sustainable Development with SDGA Token
Our SDGA Token is designed to bridge the staggering $4 trillion USD annual financing gap for Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs). Aspiring to become the leading digital asset for Regenerative Finance (ReFi), encompassing Carbon Credit Tokens, Plastic Credit Tokens, Biodiversity Credit Tokens, and various impact projects.

This innovative approach utilizes Decentralized Finance (DeFi) and Cryptocurrency to revolutionize crowdfunding, empowering projects with clear objectives and measurable results. SDGA Token enhances transparency through the use of the SDG Assessment SPF+ and SDPI scorecard, ensuring accountability at every step.

Built using blockchain technology, the SDGA Token offers top-tier security for investors, safeguarding your contributions to a sustainable future.

column51:
Cycligo is a SaaS-driven Dynamic Holiday Planning engine that lets cyclists easily plan and book their personalized bike holidays. Cyclists can easily choose tours based on their physical and technical level, add apartments, airline tickets, transfers, insurance, and easily book everything in one checkout. We generate infinite booking options and personalization in a few clicks.

Cycligo is an all-in-one solution that tackles the cycling tourism industry's inefficiencies. For customers, we address the time-consuming, fragmented process of planning cycling holidays, offering a dynamic engine for personalized, easy-to-book experiences. For B2B partners, our platform manages and markets their activities, streamlining daily tasks and boosting their revenue. Cycligo is the bridge connecting passionate cyclists to unique experiences and tourism companies to a wider customer base. Cycligo's innovation lies in its approach to simplifying cycling holiday planning. We integrate a dynamic holiday planning engine, personalization algorithms, and a seamless booking system into one platform, disrupting the traditional, fragmented booking process.

column50: We solve many problems by removing solid boosters from rockets on takeoff
column51:
MesoLaunch concerns a tubular exoskeletal structure shaped like a mushroom, around whose upper base, under the cap of the mushroom, a toroidal-shaped inflatable ball is anchored. The Structure can house a space rocket inside it, to be able to transport it up to the mesosphere using helium or gas, useful for its ascent to reach a height of about 40km and, only once this altitude is reached, to start the rocket engines to actually do so take off into space.
Technical characteristics improved by the filing of a new Patent application for a telescopic cage structure to contain the rocket and a multistage toroidal balloon,
The telescopic cage serves to give greater vertical balance during the ascent of the balloon and of the mushroom structure, and is useful for promoting the pendulum effect as a function of the expansion of the toroidal balloon during its ascent, in the sense: The more it rises, the more the balloon and the more the telescopic cage containing the rocket gets longer

Andrea Tripodo

DockPower ha brevettato  una nuova tecnologia per la costruzione di pontili e/o banchine. Può diventare un fornitore diretto di energia sia per le barche da lavoro che per le barche da diporto. Business model basato su tre opzioni: pontile galleggiante innovativo - sistema di produzione di energia interato - licenze. Team molto competente composto da 4 ingegneri. Hanno già stretto partnership con 2 comuni locati sul lago di Garda).

Edoardo Giorio
Costruiscono pontili galleggianti o fissi che dissipano il moto ondoso e che producono energia elettrica. Soluzione coperta da brevetto valido in diversi paesi. Team molto tecnico ed esperto. Hanno già fatto dei test in alcuni porti italiani e chiedono €300k per la realizzazione del prototipo finale.

Probabilmente out of scope per Argo ma interessante per Zero 3 in caso

Paolo Ottaviani
Banchine innovative e sostenibili. Produce elettricità il movimento delle onde (brevettato). Estremamente early stage (anche se hanno già un ponte costruito), non mai hanno ricevuto investimenti, anche se interessante
column50: The dock produces renewable energy with a minimal impact on the environment and practically no impact in terms of landscape insertion.
column51:
DockPower designs the marinas of the future by developing innovative and sustainable docks. Providing safe mooring for boats, it produces electricity through unique and internationally patented mechatronics based on the physical principle of “diffraction”. DockPower has been designed as a standard module, to minimise production costs, but can be reproduced in series to suit various spatial scales. The peculiarity of DockPower is the ability to dissipate wave motion without blocking the passage of water: the wave passes through the section of the dock, dissipating its kinetic energy and producing electricity. In addition, this feature significantly reduces the mechanical stress on the infrastructure and consequently on the anchoring elements, allowing the exchange of water within the mooring areas. In this way, stress on marine habitats in the harbour area is mitigated.
The dissipated energy is partly recovered by a "mechatronic" system able to produce electricity, whose production varies depending on the location and the wave motion to which the pier is subjected. From preliminary calculations, it is able to generate 500/600 W per linear meter and 20 cm wave. The strengths of the project are the originality and the ability to introduce absolutely innovative elements, compared to the many initiatives that seek to produce energy through wave motion. In particular, the project offers the best result with the least use of resources. It has a minimal impact on the environment, in terms of production and practically no impact in terms of landscape insertion. The mechatronic part is in fact completely hidden inside the pontoon and the "dissipative comb" solves some environmental problems typical of port areas, through an internationally patented technology that exploits wave diffraction. This means that the installation of a DockPower pier enables the creation of port infrastructures that are compatible with the environment and able to produce renewable energy. Therefore:
1) Clean energy production is guaranteed 24 hours a day; 2) DockPower provides sustainable solutions for better management of marine and coastal areas in terms of landscapes and environmental values; 3) DockPower may become a direct energy supplier to both work and pleasure boats, with a clean energy source guaranteed; 4) Thanks to its modular structure, DockPower can be installed in different contexts and spatial scales, from the smallest touristic pier to the greatest industrial terminals.

column30: An AI based local friend for the travellers.
column42: Giulio Montoli, Edmondo Sparano, Francesco Varuzza, Giulia Fazzini, Edoardo Giorio, Davide Pozzi, Giulio Maria Pezzini, Arunsankar Periyasami, Dario Baroni, Andrea Tripodo, Alessandro N. Ferretti, LVenture Group API Access
column45:
Federico Battisti
AI Traveltech indiana. €350k+ revenues. Difficile possano venire in italia.

Alessia Cerbone
Pacchetti turistici personalizzati con AI. Il ceo è l'unico founder, ma conta di distribuire il 30% agli altri membri del team. Non credo voglia spostarsi nel nostro hub. Hanno 1200 users paganti.
column50: 1. Unique Customer Journey; 2. Tailored plan in seconds; 3. Flexible Bookings in a click; 4. 24/7 live support; 5. Culturally Immersive;
column51:
Imagine you're a traveler, and you want to visit some place; You might be interested in an exciting road trip, or thrilling treks, maybe a heritage walk and what not. What market has to offer you - 
1. Travel Agents, where you can get a pre-prepared package which can be customized for dates and number of guests. While the pros are safety and security, the cons are lack of flexibility, personalization, transparency and the declining trust factor.
2. Self-Research, where you read blogs, talk to someone etc and book through various platforms. While the pros are flexibility and personalization, the cons are lack of security, safety, biased and too much information. Moreover, it is a lot of hassle. One major point is transparency; When the users don't know what they're paying for, they feel insecure while trusting any platform or travel agent; As a matter of fact, they don't have a favorite company to travel, they just go with the cheapest.That is somewhere we are trying to build our space in the market.
To achieve our vision of innovating and simplifying travel, we're building an artificial intelligence based platform where users can find and personalize unique and immersive travel experiences, or create them from scratch by answering a small questionnaire. We are connecting and tying up with local communities across the country, smallest of the NGOs to create our immersive experiential travel programs, like Life in a Pahadi Village, where the users get to experience the lifestyle of a traditional villager, or Travel & Learn Handicraft, where the users can learn the traditional handicraft of a village in Gulf. This works both ways, while we're generating employment for these local communities, users get to experience these unique and culturally relevant programs.
If the user can not select a specific experience, through our dynamic recommendation algorithm, we try and understand the user and once the user answers a few set of questions, we provide a detail tailor-made travel itinerary, all the bookings in just a click and 24/7 live concierge while the user is traveling. The best part is that the user gets a complete picture about the bookings and we take a service fee rather than any commissions, thus ensuring flexibility as well as transparency. Note that we're building our software and offering our services manually since August 2018.

column45:
Federico Battisti
Out of scope Argo

Paolo Ottaviani
CRONACHE. - Changing Timelines offre servizi per aumentare l'efficienza dei clienti proponendo simulazioni di problematiche legate alla gestione del tempo, alla gestione dei team e alla gestione dei prodotti. 
I servizi restituiscono valore al tempo dei clienti e degli utenti attraverso il potere dell'interattività e del Meaningful Play, per consentire maggiori prestazioni ed efficienza. 

Il nostro prodotto principale è SEPHIROT - the Game©: 
un sistema di gamification sviluppato nel 2018 dopo un attento studio degli ipertesti che permettono l'applicazione delle più recenti tecnologie AR e VR su strutture testuali algoritmiche.  Ribaltando la struttura della storia tradizionale e permettendo ai partecipanti di modificare attivamente l'andamento degli eventi, SEPHIROT© ricrea il concetto stesso di interazione. Questo sistema può essere utilizzato su scenari diversi e infiniti con la volontà di coinvolgere in modo immersivo e interattivo.

Quasi si, ma con riserva
column50: Chrones. is the first reality that promotes the multifunctionality of video games, putting the customer's needs first.
column51:
CHRONES. - Changing Timelines offers services to increase the efficiency of customers by offering simulations of issues related to time management, team management and product management. 
The services restore value to the time of customers and users through the power of interactivity and Meaningful Play, to allow greater performance and efficiency. 

Our main product is SEPHIROT – the Game©: 
a gamification system developed in 2018 after a careful study of hypertextual that allow the application of the most recent AR and VR technologies on algorithmic text structures.  By overturning the structure of the traditional story and allowing the participants to actively modify the progress of events, SEPHIROT© recreates the very concept of interaction. This system can be used on different and endless scenarios with the willingness to engage in an immersive and interactive way.
SEPHIROT© can be used in diverse markets and with different purposes:

1. SEPHIROT© - INTERACTIVE EXPERIENCE in VR offers immersive simulations based on precise clients' needs. We guarantee a deep introspection of the participant by introducing and guiding them through an unpredictable world in which they will be invited to work with other people to achieve a specific goal. This course is designed not only to strengthen group bonding but also to leave room for individual skills to emerge and strengthen themselves, through a field test. SEPHIROT©INTERACTIVE EXPERIENCE will in fact provide interesting data at the end of the experience. Through statistical analytics based on the actions performed during the course and relational analytics based on the relationship between the guides of the experience and the participants, the client will be able to draw useful and concrete information regarding the performance, efficiency and peculiar propensities of each participant. 
2. SEPHIROT© - THE VIDEOGAME,  a mix of an immersive first-person RPG, a dynamic turn-based adventure and a strategic boardgame in VR!
3. SEPHIROT© - PERFORMANCE, an interactive live performance, in which the public influences the choices of the performers producing a specific ending of a story. This type of narration allows each Scenario to have a wide “replayability”, with different endings and alternative paths.
column55: B2B - We provide simulations for Business with Scenarios that can improve their efficiency., Gamers, Videogamers - We'll launch on the market our VR game, a local and online multiplayer., Performing Arts - We create interactive performances and experiences through our Sephirot® system!

Servizi di copertura sanitaria per i viaggiatori di tutto il mondo. Ogni viaggiatore riceve un pacchetto di copertura basato su servizi di teleassistenza attraverso un insieme di servizi tecnologici e medici complementari. Travelsafe è un SaaS integrato da stazioni di telemetria sanitaria appositamente progettate che supportano i servizi di triage per i viaggiatori presso i POI (Point-of-Interest) designati. column50: Complementary services supported by a valid system, already developed and in-use telemetry stations and existing network of care providers.
column51:
Health coverage services for travelers around the world. Each traveler gets a coverage package based on telecare services through a set of complementary technological and medical services. Travelsafe is an SaaS complemented by specially designed health telemetry stations that support triage services for travelers at designated POIs, (Points-of-Interest). Extra piece of mind for travelers, especially travelers with care needs or elderly people, less worries for businesses that host and service travelers, less expenses for travelers who undergo care services abroad and significant savings for insurance companies that create totally different care value streams based on prompt tele-triage. The care supply chain is optimized saving unnecessary expenses and clinical examinations, plus delivering the best care plan for the beneficiaries who are in need. 
Travelsafe services bring together businesses from the tourism and hospitality domain, care providers and travel and health insurance companies. The health telemetry stations that support the web triage in all 4 models can be equipped in every hospitality facility or even in open touristic places (POIs). This is a real revolution in the tourism sector that brings piece of mind to travelers and big savings to insurance companies.

QX is a deep-tech software company committed to transforming human lives and the enterprise landscape through cutting-edge innovations. Our team of entrepreneurs and engineers offers decades of experience in building user-friendly solutions that seamlessly integrate the latest AI and blockchain advancements.

Specializing in Small Language Models (SML), blockchain, and decentralized identities, we focus on boosting operational, security, and even emotional efficiency for both individuals and organizations. Over the past 15 years, we’ve placed a strong emphasis on open-source development and have been proudly backed by top global investors and accelerators.

Looking ahead, we’re harnessing the transformative power of SML—bolstered by blockchain-grade security and privacy—to create personalized AI advisors for consumers and enterprises alike.

We’ve launched multiple products with major global enterprises and brands in banking, tourism, retail, fashion, and consumer goods. Our work has been recognized by partners such as Coca-Cola HBC, Banca Mediolanum, Domar Mall, Veranda Mall, NGI TrustChain, Startupbootcamp, Societe Generale Bank Group, CDP, and EBRD, among others.

At QX, we pursue deep-tech innovations with a vision of building a more connected, intelligent, and efficient world—one that helps businesses and people thrive in the digital era.

column50: Bikademy is a unique product and concept that rewards people for everyday cycling and exploring cultural and natural sights by bicycle.
column51:
Bikademy is an innovative platform designed to merge cycling tourism, urban mobility, and sustainability into a rewarding experience for users, municipalities, and companies. We promote green thinking and sustainable practices by encouraging cycling as both a lifestyle and a mode of transportation.
Main Features
Bikademy offers two distinct sets of features:
________________________________________
1. Bikademy Studies (B2G)
Bikademy Studies are created for municipalities to promote cycling tourism and green mobility within their regions. A Study represents a geographic area—typically a city or region—highlighting cultural and natural landmarks as Exams. Users cycle to these locations, check in via the app, and earn rewards for completing all Exams in a Study.
•	Tourism Promotion: Studies encourage both tourists and locals to explore destinations by bike, promoting eco-tourism while increasing visibility for lesser-known landmarks.
•	Marketing: Each Study includes a marketing mix—storytelling videos, PR campaigns, influencer outreach, and printed materials—helping municipalities increase engagement and visibility.
________________________________________
2. Challenges
Bikademy Challenges present urban mobility feature in which we reward users to cycle every day in four different categories depending on total daily rides – 0-10 km, 10-20 km, 20-60 km and 60+ km. 

Special Challenges are public cycling campaigns created by companies to boost brand visibility. These challenges invite users to log cycling rides during a specific event (e.g., Earth Day), promoting the company’s sustainability efforts.

Special Studies are tailored cycling projects created for companies that want to promote specific locations or events. Companies sponsor a Study, encouraging users to explore certain areas while engaging with the brand’s sustainability message.

column51:
Creiamo storytelling educative in Realtà Virtuale fruibili su Oculus Quest 2/3, senza cavi e senza PC.

In questo momento abbiamo due linee di Business B2B: 
1. Scuole. 
Stiamo vendendo alle scuole una produzione di 30 lezioni in VR su argomenti e con contenuti condivisi con gli Istituti stessi. Non facciamo semplicemente contenuti in VR, creiamo Storie dietro ogni argomento per far vivere vere e proprie esperienze immersive ed interattive. Abbiamo consegnato le 30 Lezioni VR all’I.C. Cannizzaro Galatti Messina (primo cliente) e fatto il collaudo.
2. Storytelling.
Sempre con lo stesso Format facciamo storie dietro qualunque argomento. Abbiamo venduto ad AVIS direzione Reggio Calabria una storia sull'"importanza della donazione" che altro non è che un viaggio che parte dal Duomo di RC e finisce dentro le vene con globuli rossi/bianchi, piastrine ecc. con voce narrante che spiega l'argomento. Potete scaricare la DEMO qui https://drive.google.com/file/d/1XFpKmzf2dRSSmKsPIJOxGsdHMMEB_WOS/view?usp=sharing

Abbiamo, in cantiere, una terza linea di business B2C : 
3. Classical Music VR. Sono canzoni di musica classica di pubblico dominio trasformate in esperienze VR.  Potete scaricare la canzone WINTER di Antonio Vivaldi da qui https://www.oculus.com/deeplink/?action=view&path=/app/25561858356762542


La standardizzazione del Ns Format, regolarmente depositato c/o SIAE, ci consente di abbattere i costi di produzione e ci consente inoltre rapidi cambi per adattarlo a target differenti. Abbiamo il 100% di feedback positivo.

Per il Prodotto "Scuole" ogni nostra uscita è una storytelling in VR con oggetti interattivi e test finali di apprendimento. 
L’utilizzatore è immerso nella materia oggetto di studio aumentandone l’apprendimento attivo. Ogni Lezione dura in media 10 min. Le lezioni si aprono con lo studente in aula, si apre la porta ed il banco inizia a volare dentro la lezione VR.


Dowload Demo Lezioni VR:

-Il Sistema Solare https://sidequestvr.com/app/23926/vr-school-italia-il-sistema-solare

-I Bronzi di Riace https://sidequestvr.com/app/24440/vr-school-italia-i-bronzi-di-riace

Su richiesta possiamo inviare altre Lezioni VR.

Grazie per l'attenzione

Digital Nomads need travel products and services that are very different to short term leisure or vacation tourists.

Built on the latest Microsoft technology our platform and increasing use of AI.

column42: Giulio Montoli, Edmondo Sparano, Francesco Varuzza, Giulia Fazzini, Edoardo Giorio, Davide Pozzi, Giulio Maria Pezzini, Arunsankar Periyasami, Dario Baroni, Andrea Tripodo, Alessandro N. Ferretti, LVenture Group API Access
column45:
Paolo Ottaviani
Una sola società con tutti i servizi per problemi con inquilini morosi.. Out of scope
column50: È una società di servizi e per questo può offrire molteplici soluzioni ad un unico problema.
column51:
Sfratto Protetto nasce con l'unico obiettivo diventare l'unico interlocutore per chi ha problemi con inquilini morosi.
Sia che per quanto riguarda immobili residenziali che commerciali.
Il servizio offerto parte dalla procedura legale, nel corso della procedura legale ci può essere bisogno di professionisti, come medici, medici veterinarii, assistenti sociali fabbro.
Al fine della procedura legale offriamo servizi post sfratto, come servizio di pulizia, primo intervento e trasporto e deposito, per far si che il cliente possa subito mettere l'immobile sul mercato.
Finito l'iter e dopo aver restituito l'immobile al cliente ci occupiamo del recupero del credito che in Italia il 70% di questi crediti viene perso e mai più recuperato.
Sfratto Protetto ha come obiettivo quello di acquisire tali crediti per poi poter farli confluire, previa cessione, ad agenzie di recupero crediti.
Il 70% di debiti dovuti per immobili occupati non vengono mai riscossi e perciò rimangono fuori dal mercato.
Infine per fidelizzare il cliente si offre il servizio di controllo e gestione del prossimo contratto d'affitto, con possibilità di offrire polizze assicurative a copertura di eventuali danni.

column50: Textomap provides a unique ability. We're making maps an accessible and natural part of daily content creation and exploration.
column51: For travel businesses and creators, generating and displaying interactive maps that add value and provide their audience with a better browsing experience of itineraries or articles is often tedious, time-consuming, and expensive. That's where Textomap, an artificial intelligence-powered service, comes in. Textomap turns location-based text into smart, interactive maps in seconds, saving users hundreds of hours. Users can effortlessly create, customize, share and embed maps into their websites, enhancing their audience’s experience with interactive guides, relevant data and affiliate links.

column50: Textomap provides a unique ability. We're making maps an accessible and natural part of daily content creation and exploration.
column51: For travel businesses and creators, generating and displaying interactive maps that add value and provide their audience with a better browsing experience of itineraries or articles is often tedious, time-consuming, and expensive. That's where Textomap, an artificial intelligence-powered service, comes in. Textomap turns location-based text into smart, interactive maps in seconds, saving users hundreds of hours. Users can effortlessly create, customize, share and embed maps into their websites, enhancing their audience’s experience with interactive guides, relevant data and affiliate links.

column51:
Whable is a project focused on helping individuals with motor disabilities quickly find truly accessible places through its app, in order to minimize discomfort and dangers to their physical and emotional safety. Whable's value proposition includes creating a geolocated map of restaurants and entertainment venues that are truly accessible, verified in person by a team of wheelchair users who will award a certified Whable accessibility badge to the places they visit. This approach aims to solve the issue of unreliable information on the real accessibility of certain places, facilitating safe outings for people with disabilities

The idea of Whable has gathered positive feedback, demonstrating the perceived usefulness of the application. Survey participants rated the idea very positively, emphasizing the importance of reviews by individuals with motor disabilities to ensure reliable information on accessibility.

column50: GuideMeet's magic lies in its potential to democratize the overlanding sector, making it accessible, user-centric, limitless.
column51:
GuideMeet is the go-to platform for 4x4 travelers and local guides. 
Created to facilitate the overlanding experience - car journeys to remote and otherwise inaccessible places - our mission is to disintermediate the relationship between travelers and guides, making them easily reachable without the need for specialized agencies.
Our target is twofold: 
travelers who own a 4x4 or simply want to participate as passengers on expeditions to remote locations
local guides scattered around the world seeking visibility and direct contact with their potential customers.
Users simply select a destination and dates, and the system takes care of finding a group of other travelers and a guide. The guides registered on GuideMeet will be automatically contacted every time a user proposes a trip in their area of operation.
The problem we want to solve is the difficulty for individuals, who don't have their own network of contacts, to find a group of travelers and local guides for remote destinations. 
Long journeys, finding people with compatible holidays and interests - it's a complex task. Currently, either manual agreements among friends are made, with all their difficulties, or specialized forums are used. The last resort is choosing a pre-packaged trip from specialized agencies.
For guides, the problem is visibility and independence. 
They typically rely on local agencies, which in turn have contacts with agencies in the travelers' home countries, typically in Europe and North America. Without their own businesses, websites or independent visibility tools, guides struggle to advertise themselves and cannot create direct relationships with travelers, as they can currently only be hired by the local agency they work for.
