column50: Conversational commerce, a solution for travelers and travel company. Search and book travel services via chat
column51:
Winners of the "Bravo Innovation Hub 2021" program, the business accelerator promoted by Mise, we participate from June 2022 to the CTE in Rome and from September to the Dubai Global Startup Program (AstroLabs) organized by the ICE agency and the Ministry of Foreign Affairs. In May 2023 we were awarded by the Chamber of Deputies as the best Italian startup.

"Travelino" is our innovation that aims to introduce "Conversational Commerce" in the life of operators and consumers in the tourism sector. Market innovation has great social value as it aims to improve user / traveler habits and to provide less digitized operators with a solution for organizing with customers, marketing and online sales.
 Travelino offers the traveler a useful and streamlined service that improves the quality of the "funnel of research and purchase and management of travel services", through the use of its most widespread instant messaging chats in the world.
The phases of research and purchase of travel services normally involve infinite passages on the web that lead the potential leisure traveler to waste large amounts of time jumping between different portals, apps, platforms, leaving the traveler frustrated. Business travelers, on the other hand, do not have an effective technological solution that can immediately solve the urgency of obtaining, comparing and booking a specific transport service or travel solution. Furthermore, there is no simple method of comparison, of sharing offers between users who intend to plan a couple, group or family vacation. The traveler can hardly come into direct contact with the local or international operator. For local travel agencies it is impossible to extend the offers to an international target.

Imagine being a traveler in charge of organizing a vacation or looking for a specific service suited to personal and group needs, how many portals do you visit before finding a solution? How many screenshots are taken or links shared with friends to discuss a service? Now imagine that you have booked a travel service, how many times have we had to search for the booking of that service in the emails or look for a code to be able to check-in online and then start the entire online procedure on the various portals?

Manca il pricing del modello di business

column50: The level of detail, flexibility and dynamic rendering of our mapping product.
column51:
The foundation of our product is the accurate base map (geo-database) and metadata that we relate to each location feature whether that is a point, line or polygon.

This data with a dynamic map rendering UI/UX on top allows us to solve multiple problems across the customer journey in outdoor hospitality for consumers and business operators.

Some examples for users:
Allow them real choice when booking their stay
Allow them to easily find their camping accommodation with GPS navigation
Allow them to quickly find information on what and where things are

Some examples for camp operators
Market their product in more detail than has ever been possible before
Allow them to provide choice to their guests and charge a premium for for it 
Reduce staff time answering repeat questions and supporting guests

Some examples for third party platforms
Save time and costs by using our map API rather than develop their own
Increase revenue by improving user experience and product choice
Save time and costs gathering data on campsites by using our API

CampMap is digitising the outdoor hospitality in a way that has never been done before and as a result we will transform the way it operates and sells its products.

column50: HIO is the first platform that dares to create an all-in-one experience for the golfers while working with many providers and DMCs.
column51:
Premise: Golf is among the top 10 most practiced sports in the world. Golf tourism represents the largest market for sports-related travel, with a turnover of US$ 30 billion (projected to grow to over US$ 40 billion in the five-year period 2021-2025) and over 25 million golfing tourists.
Despite the evolution of tourism, which has seen digital platforms prevail in recent years, the offer of golf tourism services is still linked to a traditional approach.
There is no digital booking platform that allows users to book all the necessary services for themselves and their non-golfing companions in real time.
Market operators (courses, professionals, etc.) have poor visibility and very little information to optimize their offerings.
HIO brings the digital revolution to the world of golf tourism with an integrated global platform that offers all the necessary services for any type of traveler and for providers in the golf tourism sector.
HIO is the reference portal for golfing tourists where users can:
- Find all the necessary information on golf destinations
- Book hotels, green fees, transportation and experiences
- Request the best quote for their bespoke trip to DMCs and travel agencies
- Build their own integrated package
- Book events (main tour tournaments, Majors or amateur tournaments)
- Book golf clinics
- Participate in pro-ams
- Participate in group trips

HIO is also the solution for golf tourism service providers.

They can benefit of:

- No investment required (providers will receive a commission on sold services)
- Billboard effect, i.e., visibility
- A showcase for their media content
- Multilingual channel
- Integrated payment tools
- Customer preference data analysis

And with our tools they can:

- Insert media and information to promote their company/organization/destination
- Insert their own offers
- Offer green fees
- Offer competitive rates to golf professionals and clubs
- Offer group trips
- Offer tailor-made trips
- Offer local experiences

column50: Driven by young innovators, we’re revolutionizing rural life—blending tradition with cutting-edge tech for a vibrant future.
column51:
Ruralis is a PropTech startup that stands out for its innovative approach to short-term rental management, focusing specifically on rural areas. Our primary goal is to simplify the lives of property owners—many of whom face technological and operational challenges—by helping them unlock the full economic potential of their properties.
Rural areas are often overlooked by major property management platforms. Property owners, particularly older individuals or those with limited digital experience, struggle to navigate the complexities of platforms like Airbnb or Booking. Additionally, these regions face depopulation, economic decline, and real estate devaluation, which threaten the sustainability of entire communities.
Ruralis bridges the gap between tradition and innovation through the following services:
- Potential Assessment: Using a proprietary algorithm, we evaluate each property to identify untapped potential and estimate possible revenues.
- Comprehensive Digital Management: Our platform automates all aspects of short-term rental operations, including guest communication, payment processing, revenue optimization, and administrative tasks.
- User-Friendly Access: Through an intuitive app, property owners can monitor their rental performance, access financial insights, and improve their offerings with personalized recommendations.
Ruralis is more than just a business—we are committed to promoting sustainable development and contributing to SDGs. Through our efforts we protect the cultural and natural heritage of rural areas, promote responsible tourism and stimulate local economies, reducing the impact of urban migration.
Ruralis generates revenue through a hybrid model:
1. A 10% commission on each completed booking.
2. An annual subscription fee of €195 for property owners, which includes access to advanced tools and exclusive services.
We aim to transform rural areas into thriving, dynamic spaces where tradition and modernity coexist. We believe every property has a unique story to tell, and with the right tools, property owners can become ambassadors for their regions, contributing to equitable and sustainable development.

column51:
We revolutionise the traditional tour experience by replacing live tour guides with a 100% digital experience and support cultural awareness. With our comprehensive "e-commerce" map, users can seamlessly purchase entrance tickets, delve into the historical and cultural background of various attractions, and embark on unique audio self-guided tours. Our platform is enriched with a wealth of data, blending open data sources with meticulously curated content provided by our esteemed B2B partners. Simultaneously, we extend our services to the hospitality sector as a valuable tool for enhancing customer loyalty. In essence, we empower B2B entities to stay at the forefront of digital innovation while making efficient use of their innovation and marketing budgets.

Ptolemy goes beyond the typical "top-10 things to do" lists, offering users a next-level, personalized experience that unlocks the true allure of destinations. Our platform provides tailored information, enabling travelers to enjoy a more profound and enriching tourism experience. Local institutions can also leverage our platform to digitize their content, fostering a genuine connection between tourists and destinations. This approach raises awareness and contributes to the promotion and preservation of cultural heritage.

In an era where digitization is inevitable in the tourism industry, Ptolemy stands as an accessible and versatile solution for everyone. Whether day or night, with or without physical travel, our platform remains readily available, ensuring that individuals can explore and engage with destinations on their own terms.

column45:
Andrea Tripodo
CityGuyd è un’app di tour guida AR con presenza globale per migliorare le guide turistiche reali.
Pilot programs: ardens by the Bay, Portugal Ministry of Tourism, Australian Grand Prix, Israel Nature & Parks Authority, Ministry of Tourism of Saudi Arabia. Quote sbilanciate verso il CEO che detiene quasi l’87% (*Startupbootcamp: 6%).
Business model basato sull’integrazione del Software e della tecnologia AR + Guide marketplace + ADS.
Il team è composto da 3 professionisti del settore dell’AR.
column50: We bring a new digital, Covid friendly way to connect face to face with your favorite sports star or a local tour guide to help get around!
column51: CityGuyd uses AR technology to augment real life tour guides or famous VIPs at cities & events across the globe - improving the travel experience, increasing fan engagement, and providing our clients with valuable data on their attendees. CityGuyd offers AR tours via our own digital smartphone application as well as an SDK for easy integration with clients existing software, bringing CityGuyd's AR guide experience to their visitors instantly. We have multiple pilot programs running now, including with the Ministries of Tourism in Portugal and Singapore, Gardens by the Bay in Singapore, and Birthright Israel in Tel Aviv. Additional LOIs signed with Tour de France, the Australian Grand Prix, and others!

Menumal lets restaurants update their menu instantly via WhatsApp — no apps, no logins, no friction.
It's not just a digital menu: it’s a Tr
column51:
Menumal is the fastest way for restaurants to update their menu — by simply texting on WhatsApp.

Menus are still the most undervalued asset in restaurants. Most are managed with PDFs, static websites, or fragile workflows. Menumal changes that: we turn the menu into a live, dynamic interface that reflects the restaurant’s daily operations — accessible instantly through WhatsApp, no training needed.

But this is just the entry point.

Menus are our Trojan horse: once deployed, they unlock an entire ecosystem — upselling tools, allergen compliance, real-time translations, branding control, and AI-powered automation. The restaurant gets full control, and the customer gets a seamless, modern experience.

We’ve onboarded 700+ restaurants in Italy without paid acquisition. With 99% retention, we’re now scaling across Europe to build the operating system behind every restaurant’s customer-facing touchpoint.
column55: restaurants, cafes, bar - Saas software for menu management

column8: Real Estate, Social Networking, Smart Cities, Urban Regeneration, Work/life Balance, Meeting Management, Community, Office Space, Office Management, Platform Developers, PaaS (Platform as a Service)
column30: NUBO is the smart match-making platform for office lease
column42: Giulio Montoli, Edmondo Sparano, Francesco Varuzza, Giulia Fazzini, Edoardo Giorio, Davide Pozzi, Giulio Maria Pezzini, Arunsankar Periyasami, Dario Baroni, Andrea Tripodo, Alessandro N. Ferretti, LVenture Group API Access
column45:
pietro nobili
Team piccolo ma fortissimo, conosco personalmente. Aggrediscono il mercato dei coworking cambiando il modello: non hanno location di proprietà ma si appoggiano a location 'non consone'.  Da portare al Selection Day

Andrea Tripodo
NUBO è una piattaforma di coworking che offre spazi di lavoro flessibili e a prezzi accessibili.
Il servizio consente agli utenti di lavorare "ovunque e quando vogliono", sfruttando una rete capillare di spazi urbani sottoutilizzati, come hotel, spazi di coworking e altri locali.
Il modello di business di NUBO è semplice: il cliente paga un abbonamento (giornaliero, mezza giornata, mensile) e NUBO paga una commissione variabile ai luoghi.
La piattaforma è disponibile su WebApp e l'azienda ha in programma di rilasciare un'app entro 6 mesi/1 anno.
NUBO sta crescendo rapidamente: da marzo ha raddoppiato le prenotazioni MoM, passando da 47 a 50 prenotazioni da giugno a luglio.
Il 40% degli utenti paganti e 1/3 dei clienti hanno prenotato più di una volta.
Il margine lordo di NUBO è del 55%.
L'azienda è composta da due persone che detengono il 100% delle quote (65-35). Ha raccolto 30k da B4I.
column50:
- Fast AI-driven process
- All-in-one platform 
- Price optimized
column51:
With 500+ spaces in the network, we help companies leasing and sharing office space in days, digitizing the process from start to end: search, visits, contract negotiation providing a white-glove experience like being followed by an agent, with no agency fees for clients, though ;) We only take landlord fee.

We use technology, applying AI workflows, to make the office real estate market faster, all-in-one, price optimized. Both for landlords and tenants

Whether a client is scaling fast and needs an HQ, temporary desks, or a satellite office abroad, we specialize in matching them with spaces that fit their unique needs. From flexible, fully-managed options to longer-term leases, we've got clients covered. We are present in 20 cities of Italy and Spain.

So far we closed contracts of average of €160k+ in just 29 days, with some contracts closed just in 7 days! The further we go, the faster we will be.

We are workspace match-makers: lease and share your office space in days, not months!
column55: Corporates - Providing NUBO as a benefit for employees to tackle office cost and allow wellbeing, Freelancers - Find a more affordable option than office and look for collaborations and clients through our community

column8: Food, Social Enterprise, Cultural Awareness, Travel
column30: Un Viaggio del Gusto attraverso l'Italia, diverso ogni mese, a casa tua.
column42: Giulio Montoli, Edmondo Sparano, Francesco Varuzza, Giulia Fazzini, Edoardo Giorio, Davide Pozzi, Giulio Maria Pezzini, Arunsankar Periyasami, Dario Baroni, Andrea Tripodo, Alessandro N. Ferretti, LVenture Group API Access
column45:
Andrea Tripodo
Consegna di box di prodotti tipici che varia ogni mese. Il team è composta da 4 persone ma solo il founder detiene le quote. Non hanno traction. Super early.
column50: È un'esperienza a 360, da esperienze locali di nicchia a prodotti tipici, che arriva a casa, ogni mese diversa,per far vivere il territorio.
column51:
In Viaggi del Palato vogliamo far scoprire e riscoprire la bellezza e la bontà del territorio italiano ed incentivare la local economy e l'indotto, attraverso la riscoperta del territorio tramite esperienze tipiche e di nicchia e prodotti locali e regionali.
Il nostro prodotto, la Foodscovery Box porta ogni mese a casa dei clienti:
- il Foodscovery Ticket, ovvero un voucher che il cliente potrà spendere per un esperienza diretta sul territorio, presso uno dei nostri partners/fornitori
- una selezione di prodotti tipici
- il Foodscovery Book, aneddoti e storie per raccontarli e raccontare il territorio

L'obiettivo è portare il territorio a casa del cliente e il cliente sul territorio, promuovendo la conoscenza dello stesso.
Ecco perché collaboriamo con piccoli e medi imprenditori locali e ricerchiamo insieme autenticità e rispetto per ambiente e territorio.

Non è solo una box di prodotti tipici, ma un'esperienza di conoscenza del territorio a tutto tondo, che passa da prodotti, aneddoti e storie e esperienza fisica.

La box si rinnova ogni mese, portando il cliente in un nuovo viaggio del palato che offre gustosi scorci regionali (dalla Puglia alla Valle d'Aosta).

Il primo mercato è l'Italia, per promuovere la conoscenza del nostro territorio, che spesso non conosciamo, e poi l'estero, partendo dall'Europa, per far conoscere meglio il nostro paese, anche località diverse rispetto alle più conosciute.

Ci impegniamo per portare al cliente una soluzione che gli permetta di non perdere tempo nella ricerca di veri prodotti tipici e di storie autentiche, e che non lo lasci mai privo di sorpresa e curiosità da far assaggiare anche ad amici. 
Forniamo una soluzione sia per chi ama viaggiare ed esplorare il territorio anche attraverso la sua gastronomia e chi ama il prodotto di nicchia e sapere da dove viene. Inoltre vogliamo portare un pezzo d'Italia sia agli italiani che vivono all'estero per farli sentire un pò a casa che ai clienti stranieri, che hanno assaporato (o vogliono assaporare) l'Italia e non possono più farne a meno.
column55: "Espatriato" - Italiano all'estero che fa fatica a trovare prodotti italiani in negozio e che ha piacere a ricevere un pezzetto di casa ogni mese, "Straniero" - cittadino di un'altra nazione che ha scoperto l'Italia (magari in un viaggio precedente) ed è rimasto innamorato dei suoi sapori tanto da volerli ricevere a casa propria ogni mese., "Viaggiatore gastronomico" - riscopre il territorio tramite espereinze (tra prodotti e attività) che devono essere autentiche, gli piace riscoprire le nicchie e interagire con produttori. è curioso e si informa, spesso non ha tanto tempo per farlo. Ama la cucina tipica e si diletta

column30: VirtuAlp: our mountains, as you have never seen them!
column42: Giulio Montoli, Edmondo Sparano, Francesco Varuzza, Giulia Fazzini, Edoardo Giorio, Davide Pozzi, Giulio Maria Pezzini, Arunsankar Periyasami, Dario Baroni, Andrea Tripodo, Alessandro N. Ferretti, LVenture Group API Access
column45:
Paolo Ottaviani
VirtuAlp è un progetto aperto e una piattaforma web volta a creare una community focalizzata ad avvicinare a tutti le emozioni dei meravigliosi panorami alpini, sfruttando le potenzialità della tecnologia della Realtà Virtuale Immersiva. Gli utenti, grazie alle funzionalità di VirtuAlp, dovranno solo caricare sul sito le proprie foto sferiche della regione alpina e sottoporre il tour all'approvazione. Scalabilità e mercato bassi, ma in generale potrebbe essere interessante, ma lo terrei in backup
column50: Own-created immersive virtual tours of the Alpine regions are not available in a structured thematic platform. A community is also missing.
column51:
Few years ago, when I reached the summit of a peak that I dreamt for years, after a difficult climb along the north face of Mountain and after crossing a glacier, an extraordinary panorama appeared before my eyes. I was astonished by such an immense beauty and I started thinking on how to make this panorama accessible to all.  
I realized that, although nature is intended as a universal heritage, the most remote areas as the high Alpine regions are accessible only to a very limited niche of privileged persons: the excursionists and the alpinists. 
But why the emotions of being immersed in the high alpine remote regions can't be lived by anyone? Technology is ready to allow this experience at least in Virtual reality! 

VirtuAlp is an open project and web platform aimed at creating a community focused on bringing the emotions of the wonderful Alpine panoramas closer to everyone, by exploiting the potential of Immersive Virtual Reality technology. 

Users - thanks to the VirtuAlp functionalities - only have to upload on the website their own 360 spheric photos of the alpine region, fill in a short form and submit it for approval. 

The VirtuAlp platform will then automatically generate their own virtual tours and, if the photos meet the minimum quality requirements,  the virtual tour will be published on the website and made available to all (quoting the user who created it). From that moment on, it will be available to be shared via VirtuAlp website and main social media. 

The virtual tours are VR responsive: immersive experience and visualization of the tours is possible through smartphones and cardboards/VR glasses as Oculus (and, of course, via desktop). 

Thanks to VirtuAlp, the experience of an immersive virtual outdoor activity is accessible to all persons (including elderly people and persons with reduced mobility, ...).

VR entertainment is expected to boom in the upcoming years. Big players as Google, Meta and Playstation are investing in this market since years. VirtuAlp Virtual Tours will be a boost for the touristic promotion of different natural destinations in the Alpine remote regions, increasing the attractiveness of the whole Alpine area.
VirtuAlp in cooperation with Sportler store Udine organized a launch event on 16th December 2023. The event, organized in the Sportler store, allowed to test the product with the customers. Very positive and emotional feedbacks were received by the customers!
column55: Hotels, Airports, Sports stores, ... - VirtuAlp could offer multimedial corners where users (guests of an hotel, travellers in an airport, customers in a sports shop) can experiment a virtual reality experience in the alpine region. In addition, at a more mature stage, creators of Virtual Tour

column50: Navia stands out by integrating AI and meticulous boat engineering, making it unique and more accessible compared to competitors.
column51:
Navia is a company that specializes in the design and production of 100% electric boats. Its main goal is to accelerate the energy transition in the boating industry as much as possible through a range of innovative boats with modern design. Navia integrates AI for safety, personalized routes, predictive maintenance, energy management, and user interface, optimizing the maritime experience through intelligent decision-making and advanced automation, creating a unique and immersive experience. 

Navia's first model, a 6.80m electric RIB with 120HP motor and 63 kWh battery, leads its lineup. It offers rental packages for quick expansion, tapping into existing client bases. Simultaneously, direct sales target both rental operators and sea enthusiasts, catering to diverse customer needs. Navia aims to drive the maritime energy transition through versatile electric boats and dual business models: rental and direct sales.
column55: boat rental companies - boat tours, leisure, fun, rentals, guided tours, marine protected areas, hotels

column30: Mountain Maps is the first AI native app for outdoor
column42: Giulio Montoli, Edmondo Sparano, Francesco Varuzza, Giulia Fazzini, Edoardo Giorio, Davide Pozzi, Giulio Maria Pezzini, Arunsankar Periyasami, Dario Baroni, Andrea Tripodo, Alessandro N. Ferretti, LVenture Group API Access
column43: Travel & Hospitality,Open Air Experiences,Da sentire 45,45 call,Call schedulata/fatta,argo25
column45:
Andrea Tripodo
Una guida digitale AI per vivere un’esperienza in montagna - Google Maps della montagna. Team completo con tanta esperienza alle spalle (il loro CMO ha +15 anni d’esperienza nel settore turistico della montagna. 
150k download - 30k MAU - 2 partner locali (Dolomiti Paganella e Madonna di Campiglio). Nel 2022 hanno raccolto 86k € da business angels che detengono il 10% delle quote.
column50: Mountain Maps è la Google Maps della montagna, con servizi dedicati agli utenti ed ai comprensori turistici sviluppati grazie all'AI.
column51:
La missione di Mountain Maps è di permettere a tutti i turisti, anche i meno esperti, di visitare la montagna e godere a pieno delle sue bellezze e dei suoi servizi.

Siamo nel 2021, ormai chiunque in qualsiasi situazione quotidiana è abituato a spostarsi e navigare utilizzando un’app sul proprio smartphone. In montagna però non è ancora possibile.

L’ambiente montano, sia estivo che invernale è rimasto alle enormi mappe di carta piegate su sé stesse. Questo, oltre a risultare un disservizio anacronistico per il settore, ha due limiti: impedisce ai turisti di visitare e scoprire a pieno il territorio e non permette a rifugi ed alberghi di intraprendere operazioni di marketing nei confronti di chi è presente in quel momento sul loro territorio.


Mountain Maps è la prima app per smartphone basata sull'AI sul mercato che consente una navigazione nell’ambiente montano su entrambe le stagioni in tempo reale, integrata con le principali metriche montane, come: selezione della difficoltà del percorso, della tipologia, della durata, della “panoramicità” etc.

Per intenderci, Google Maps della montagna. Integrato con servizi specifici e di grande interesse per comprensori ed APT come “percorsi consigliati, inserzioni mirate, spazi per comunicazioni specifiche ed eventi etc.”

column30: ViVi: 24/7 global streaming, unfiltered experiences, tokenized adventures.
column42: Giulio Montoli, Edmondo Sparano, Francesco Varuzza, Giulia Fazzini, Edoardo Giorio, Davide Pozzi, Giulio Maria Pezzini, Arunsankar Periyasami, Dario Baroni, Andrea Tripodo, Alessandro N. Ferretti, LVenture Group API Access
column45:
Paolo Ottaviani
Piattaforma di streaming in web3 per esperienze outdoor e paesaggi. la VP potrebbe essere che l'uso del visore ma sinceramente è ancora molto aleatorio. No

Tiberio Chiari
non in target

Marco Riccio
Non mi sembra abbiano fatto passi in avanti rispetto all'ultima application.

Alessia Cerbone
Condivisione contenuti video. Solo idea.
column50:
ViVi innovation lies in the overturning of the classic most common social networks’ paradigm. 
Vivi is the life, is not a game.
column51:
“Vivi” is a streaming platform for static and dynamic live video content.
The platform is divided into three distinct modes: sharing live video streaming round the clock of places (“PoVS”) with greatest landscape and cultural interest from all over the world.
A second mode is to share first-person live experiental videos (“Experiental PoVS): the streamer who though his point of view shares his world, his passion, his life.
Finally, a community based on mutual trust between streamers and users as well as on sharing their passions in all their facets, positive or negative.
All this in a single platform: point of View, a window on the world!
Moreover Vivi live streaming will be able to take full advantage of new technologies: 5G – ensuring full coverage – an advanced i.a. and blockchain – that will allow the user to take advantage of a more complete experience, and the streamer of seeing their contents protected – virtual reality – user will live the experience though the streamers’ eyes – as well as stringent security protocols that prevent the spread of deep fake news.
Thanks to an instant connection and immediate feedback, PoV users will live streaming in complete symbiosis, mutually enriching their experience.

column30: AI-Powered disruption management platform for travel and freight industries
column42: Giulio Montoli, Edmondo Sparano, Francesco Varuzza, Giulia Fazzini, Edoardo Giorio, Davide Pozzi, Giulio Maria Pezzini, Arunsankar Periyasami, Dario Baroni, Andrea Tripodo, Alessandro N. Ferretti, LVenture Group API Access
column45:
Paolo Ottaviani
Assistenza in caso di interruzione del viaggio, integrando capacità parametriche all’avanguardia e competenze senza precedenti nei servizi di risarcimento del viaggio attraverso una piattaforma basata sull’intelligenza artificiale. Questa soluzione completa automatizza l'identificazione degli eventi, semplifica i reclami, garantisce pagamenti rapidi e fornisce un eccellente supporto clienti con un focus dedicato alla difesa dei diritti dei viaggiatori. Pensato sia per i viaggiatori individuali che per le aziende del settore dei viaggi, iPurvey affronta interruzioni come ritardi dei voli, cancellazioni, imbarco negato e bagagli smarriti o ritardati, inclusa l'innovativa incorporazione di un'assicurazione parametrica. Non male, li sentirei
column50: iPurvey uses AI to manage travel and freight disruptions, streamlining claims, saving costs, boosting satisfaction, and cutting emissions.
column51:
iPurvey is a comprehensive disruption management platform tailored for both travel and freight industries. Our AI-powered solutions address the challenges faced by businesses and travelers when disruptions occur, such as flight delays, cancellations, or freight logistics issues.
The problem we are solving lies in the inefficiencies and frustrations caused by disruptions in travel and freight operations. These disruptions not only inconvenience travelers and businesses but also lead to significant economic losses and environmental impacts. iPurvey's platform streamlines claims processing, supply chain rescheduling, and decision-making processes, offering quick and efficient solutions to mitigate the effects of disruptions.
By leveraging artificial intelligence (AI) and automation, iPurvey enhances the overall travel and freight experience, ensuring smoother operations, reduced downtime, and improved customer satisfaction. Our goal is to empower businesses and travelers alike by providing them with the tools and support they need to navigate disruptions effectively and minimize their impact on operations and the environment.
column55: airlines, insurance companies, logistics companies, freight operators, travel agencies, and individu - iPurvey is used for real-time disruption management, optimizing route planning, streamlining claims processing, and improving customer satisfaction.

column30: Replicate the Hotel's atmosphere in your house thanks to our platform.
column42: Giulio Montoli, Edmondo Sparano, Francesco Varuzza, Giulia Fazzini, Edoardo Giorio, Davide Pozzi, Giulio Maria Pezzini, Arunsankar Periyasami, Dario Baroni, Andrea Tripodo, Alessandro N. Ferretti, LVenture Group API Access
column45:
Edoardo Giorio
Usano l'AR per proiettare gli arredamenti e l'ambiente degli hotel in altri ambienti e poterli acquistare nel loro e-commerce. Hanno già degli accordi con degli hotel ma hanno solo €5k di revenues al momento e sono in fase di MVP e alfa test del prodotto. 
Cap table ok

Andrea Tripodo
Piattaforma E-commerce che permette agli utenti che si recano in hotel di acquistare prodotti di interior design. In poche parole gli hotel vengono resi gallerie d'arte dove i consumatori possono acquistare prodotti di un certo valore. Idea interessante. Stanno in fase di testing - Sono legati a 5 hotel e hanno come partner Minor Group, che include 8 aziende di design e un gruppo d catene internazionali. Primo contratto chiuso a Dicembre 23' - fatturato 5k €. Team ok.
column50: The sales process is B2B2C through an innovative approach in the e-commerce market of design creating a experience for the guests of hotels
column51:
Leviant, through its platform, renews the spaces of the accommodation facilities with design products made in Italy, allowing guests to live an actual design experience, finding themselves in an art gallery of design products. They can touch and use physical products, and through the app, they can discover the manufacturer, the care and construction techniques, the quality of materials and finishes and other helpful information. In addition, Leviant offers the possibility to buy and receive the object of interest comfortably at home, simply with a click.
This idea has the ambition to create a new way of buying design products without going to a physical showroom and without the uncertainty of buying online.
The selected structures are of medium-high level and focus on design.
We are witnessing increased investment in Italian properties in the hospitality and hotel sec-
tors, especially by large high-level international chains.
Leviant Design Experience fits into this context as a solution for the continuous renewal of interior spaces, necessary not to accuse antiquity that would entail a loss of market sharecompared to competitors.
The unique value of the receptive spaces is the possibility of renovating the environments through design products made in Italy on account vision without purchasing them, which involves the immobilisation of capital. In addition, by creating the platform, Leviant can offer its customer the design experience and sell the products within the structure, creating additional revenue.
This service applies to both consignment products and those owned by the structure.
The structures for the benefits mentioned above pay an annual fee and Leviant provide products on consignment.
The third parties involved in the business model are the manufacturers of furniture made in Italy. 
They need to find new sales channels alternative to the traditional retailer in the showroom.
The sale through e-commerce, however, has the limit of not having the opportunity to touch the product, verifying the quality of the material etc..
The sales channel proposed by Leviant solves this problem by offering a more excellent sensory experience and thanks to the presence of the physical product and the speed and ease of purchase through technology. Moreover, due to the high number of guests in hotels, the products receive more exposure, reaching a large number of potential customers. The annual fee also includes the use of our platform.
column55: Design company - Normal sales channels, Hotels - Buy the products without experience, Hotels guets - Normal showroom; e-commerce

column45:
pietro nobili
Conosciamo il diretto competitor, e tra i due vince Sealivery di molto. Comunque diversi problemi di scalabilità ed economicità del modello

Andrea Tripodo
Foodinghy semplifica la vita in barca consentendo agli utenti di acquistare cibo, servizi per la marina e servizi terrestri tramite l'app. Competitor diretto di Sealivery per questo motivo lascio 1.

Federico Battisti
Glovo, ma in mare. Competitor di Sealivery. Cito testualmente Eric & Pietro: se investiamo in questo mercato, o Sealivery o niente.
column50: Foodinghy allows boaters a unique experience with food, marina and land services in 60+ Italian marinas and at-anchor bays nationwide.
column51:
In 2019, Foodinghy began as the first food delivery for the nautical sector. Through the Foodinghy marketplace, boaters create unique experience by online purchases of food, marina and land services delivery at sea and at dockside. 
Foodinghy is an innovative startup to simplify the complexity of boating experience. The founders experienced this problem first-hand and then confirmed the common need among boaters through interviews in Italian ports and online. Foodinghy developed its own digital platform (web, app) to match supply and demand. In 2021, Foodinghy tested its business model with an MVP in Sestri Levante (Italy). In 2022, we expanded our offer to include 17 bays and ports in Liguria (Italy).
In 2023 Foodinghy responds to additional boater requests and expand the Foodinghy boater marketplace to include non-food delivery services directly to the boat. The successful online food and galley delivery experience includes other critical touchpoints: 
1.	Restaurant and galley on-board delivery (at dock and at anchor)
2.	mooring reservations
3.	on-location water services (ie. water taxi, diving, sightseeing)
4.	land-based nearby services (ie. ebikes, trekking, sightseeing)
Foodinghy's mission is to provide bespoke boater experiences by being a single-point-of-contact for food and non-food needs and by simplifying the interaction between customers and providers:
Foodinghy uses registered rafts specially certified by the RINA certification body and hires licensed pilots to deliver the order to the customer via boat. 
Foodinghy is the single-point-of-contact for boaters and charters and other land-based tourist providers such as restaurants, wineries, breweries, fishermen, farmers, retailers and tourist operators.

column45:
pietro nobili
Conosciamo il diretto competitor, e tra i due vince Sealivery di molto. Comunque diversi problemi di scalabilità ed economicità del modello
Conosciuti al Rs a Firenze, soluzione ok di delivery marittimo, ma non mi sembra molto una startup... Probabile rientrano nella top 50 quindi possiamo approfondire in call.

eric larsen
Molto simili a E-sealivery, ma molto meno organizzati. Rimarrei su sealivery. Sentiti in call da 45
Conosco i founder, non sono male anche se uno è un po' boomer. Il prodotto ha un senso, abbastanza innovativo come processo e con della traction. Di base sono un food delivery per barche/su barca. Guadagnano a transaction fee, fanno partnership con ristoratori ai quali danno il loro sistema per ricevere ordini. Sono attivi in 15 località turistiche, con qualche test da aprile ad agosto hanno fatturato 10k€ (GMV?) hanno digital Hub in cap table al 3.6%

stefano ceci
vediamoli e capiamo chi dei 2 è + interessante

Giulio Maria Pezzini
Identco a Sealivery che ho appena valutato con 3 stelle
loro hanno anche qualche metrica leggermente migliore
Copioincollo stesso commento scritto agli altri:
il prodotto sembra interessante, nicchia di mercato attuamente poco coperta e soprattutto altospendente.
mi vengono in mente non poche domande relative al servizio (es. che succede se non ti fanno uscire dal porto per maltempo? le barche di delivery sono della startup e date in utilizzo ai "rider" o sono dei "rider" stessi? ecc)
voto 3, se ci si parla mi piacerebbe sentirli

column50: l'innovazione sociale, l'integrazione di persone svantaggiate, lo sviluppo di nuovi servizi e nuovi approcci alle dinamiche socioeconomiche
column51:
La Cooperiamo Insieme ha una pluriennale esperienza in vari settori quali la gestione del personale domestico, trasporti persone, assistenza turistica, guide e accompagnatori turistici, attività sociali, studi e ricerche, sviluppo nuovi servizi e nuovi prodotti turistici, editoria elettronica, gestione dei contenuti. 
L'idea in fase di start-up che intendiamo proporre è la realizzazione di un'app che consenta facilmente la raccolta dei dati periodici  (foto, prezzi, indicatori europei per il turismo) presso le imprese turistiche ricettive e stabilimenti balneari e fornire un servizio di audit per la certificazione di conformità e la verifica della classificazione per i SUAP o gli enti DMO preposti. 
Con tale app i Comuni forniscono alle imprese turistiche un servizio di terza parte per la certificazione di conformità della classificazione e ottengono uno strumento per la definizione del proprio profilo di destinazione ETIS e la governance delle politiche turistiche. 
L'app facilita il processo di certificazione e audit e consente all'impresa di monitorare gli e-valuation dei propri clienti raffrontandoli con la media rilevata nella destinazione.  L'app viene personalizzata in base al Comune di competenza per la rilevazione ETIS. Il costo per le amministrazioni è proporzionale alla dimensione del Comune della capacità ricettiva dello stesso, è gratuita per l'operatore turistico che la scarica su invito del SUAP ma i processi di certificazione e gli audit sono soggetti a tariffazione Accredia e a carico dell'operatore.
Attualmente è stato sviluppato il prototipo per il marchio di terza parte "la Riviera d'Ulisse" sono in corso di definizione gli accordi con i SUAP dei Comuni della destinazione.

column50: Our Travel Creators are biggest asset. We are building the Shopify of Travel for creators to seamlessly create a sustainable income.
column51:
Human Inspired, Tech Enabled - Shopify of Travel for Creators.
Our 3 sided marketplace enables Travel Creators (85% female), to curate authentic experiences for travelers (Female, Solo travelers 65%).
We are solving 3 key problems: 
Problem 
1. Creators: Antiquated travel industry, red tape, bureaucracy,
too many platforms and lack of access and skills to transform their audience to bookers
2. Travelers - Travelers are inundated with information, the same cookie cutter approach. Want to connect seamlessly and securely with real experts to book authentic trips
3. Partners/Suppliers - Access to cheaper and newer distribution models with creators promoting their brand/product
column55: Hotels / STR/ Travel suppliers - Access to vetted creators and U35 travel audience, travel creators - The Shopify of Travel for creators, travelers - Find authentic multi day travel seamlessly bookable, co curate, customisable and ondemand - End to End platform

column45:
Paolo Ottaviani
Startup spagnola che permette di fare pagamenti in QR code per le microtransazioni. Nulla di nuovo seppur abbiano un pò di traction, tantivale spingere di più un'Italiana simile
column50: Current POS in our country does not use Big Data, Artificial Intelligence or a payment processor like ours, causing difficulties and losses.
column51:
Our company, Ibero, is dedicated to digitalizing local businesses in an affordable manner. With Ibero.app, customers can easily order and pay for products and services on-the-go without the need for registration or downloads.

We are currently streamlining the ordering and payment process in the hospitality and food service (HORECA) sector by enabling customers to place orders and make payments directly through our web-based platform. Our solution also includes a point-of-sale system with a credit card reader and a business management app that provides valuable insights and product information.

One challenge we face is in relation to transactions. We charge a 1% fee on each transaction, which is cost-effective and allows us to enter the market quickly. Our pricing model is flexible, allowing customers to pay whatever they wish, and making us an alternative to actual payment processors like Stripe (1,25% + $0,25/transaction).

Our ultimate goal is to automate business processes, provide secure payment processing, and manage customer information in real-time to gain valuable insights into consumer behavior and improve the customer experience.

column50: Built on blockchain technology and crypto-based rewards, Friendzone is the ultimate social app for anyone who loves to have fun!
column51:
Looking for a fun and engaging way to connect with friends, family, and even strangers? Look no further than Friendzone – the app that lets you challenge other users and get rewarded for it!

You can challenge anyone on the app, including your crazy ex or your favorite celebrity. Who knows if Ronaldo will score that goal or Justin Bieber will sing for you? You might just get a response and start a new connection with someone you admire.

Once the challenge is completed, you earn a certain amount of “FZ” coins (cryptocurrency), which can be exchanged for traditional currency.

column30: Secure and automated end-to-end off-airport check-in system
column42: Giulio Montoli, Edmondo Sparano, Francesco Varuzza, Giulia Fazzini, Edoardo Giorio, Davide Pozzi, Giulio Maria Pezzini, Arunsankar Periyasami, Dario Baroni, Andrea Tripodo, Alessandro N. Ferretti, LVenture Group API Access
column45:
Federico Battisti
Idea che per scalare ha bisogno di investimenti giganteschi. Non sono italiani, non hanno validazione. Peccato, ci avrei parlato volentieri.

Andrea Tripodo
Piattaforma automatizzata che consente agli utenti di effettuare da remoto il check-in quando e dove vogliono. L’obiettivo della piattaforma è quello di migliorare la user experience senza passare per la check-in desk. L’utente prenota il volo ed effettua il check-in tramite Tralli. I bagagli vengono sigillati e monitorati singolarmente in tempo reale tramite IoT e vengono trasportati alla struttura della compagnia aerea. 
Business model: B2c e B2B
Il team è esperto nel settore ma è composto solo da 2 membri che si dividono interamente le quote (60-40). Hanno un MVP ma nessuna metrica al momento. Interessante per me ma troppo early.
column50: Sound security features (i.e. biometrics) and the automatic validation of IDs and visas to skip the desk even in international flights.
column51:
Tralli is an integrated system that offers the passengers of partner airlines and airports the possibility of checking in off airport. Any time before the flight, from anywhere in the city. So that they don't have to pass by the check-in desk at the terminal nor to carry any luggage from home.

The objective is to provide passengers with a much more convenient way of starting the travel experience, sparing them time, stress and effort. Besides giving passengers a better service, the ultimate goal is to reduce the passenger traffic by the check-in area, providing airports and airlines with the opportunity of addressing one of the main bottlenecks in their operations.

With main focus on security and convenience, Tralli has integrated the latest advances in biometrics, logistics, IoT and documents verification to put together a reliable process.

Tralli has three main components:
1. Booking platform. For passengers to book in an easy way where and when they want to check in
2. Smart remote check-in system with which mobile check-in agents can check in passengers remotely in a fast, reliable and automated way.
3. Connected logistics. To transfer the sealed and IoT-tagged baggage securely from passenger's hands to the airline's chain of custody in the airport. Bags are individually tracked and monitored in real-time, and all elements are in place to guarantee total traceability and accountability in all cases.
column55: Airlines - Outsource their check-in operations, Airports - Outsource their check-in operations, Flight passengers - Check-in off-airport

Edoardo Giorio
Soluzione poco chiara e non in target Argo
column50:
Key-fact of the Blockchain revolution is "Decentralisation".
We are applying it to the Real Economy, with "success cases" already at work.
column51:
Since 1985 in IT/ICT industry, since 2016 dedicated 100% to blockchain, the team is focusing with this Startup to apply the new DLT techs to Real World needs.
For example, developing a blockchain based portal, to supply automation of collaboration to Business Networks. 
Many further project are developed in parallel, to address different markets as well.
Our Govt sent us to the UAE DFF institutional accelerator (Area 2071) in 2021, we then  activated many agreements with Top R&D entities in EU, to add also AI tek to our platform.
Currently selecting the best customers for our pilot projects, the first active in our working platform, one for each possible sector in the Real World, so to create template which can be rapidly replicated.
First investors entered our Startup, because they agree with our plans and see our great potential.

column51:

For example, developing a blockchain based portal, to supply automation of collaboration to Business Networks. 
Many further project are developed in parallel, to address different markets as well.
Our Govt sent us to the UAE DFF institutional accelerator (Area 2071) in 2021, we then  activated many agreements with Top R&D entities in EU, to add also AI tek to our platform.
Currently selecting the best customers for our pilot projects, the first active in our working platform, one for each possible sector in the Real World, so to create template which can be rapidly replicated.
First investors entered our Startup, because they agree with our plans and see our great potential.

column50: OffWeGo teaches safer travel habits to frequent risky travelers through behavioral science & gamification, helping employers reduce costs.
column51: SUMMARY: OffWeGo is a mobile app that teaches safer travel habits to frequent travelers, specifically focusing on international students, bleisure travelers, digital nomads, and remote employees. We use behavioral science and gamification techniques to encourage compliance and engagement and provide real-time tracking and prediction of travel risks. Additionally, we have a strong partnership with travel insurance companies, allowing them to create unique and customizable insurance products based on the data provided by our app. Overall, our goal is to reduce risks and costs associated with travel for employers and individuals.

column50: Arteinvivo is a unique platform for experiencial cultural turism. We promote live performing art and craft as a Destination.
column51:
ArteInVivo: Connecting Artists and Travelers Through Immersive Cultural Experiences
ArteInVivo is redefining cultural tourism by bringing together artists, performers, and travelers who seek deeper, more meaningful experiences. Our platform creates opportunities for people to engage with performing arts, crafts, and local traditions, making art more accessible, sustainable, and a tool for reconnecting communities.
Inspired by flamenco and live performance, our prototype destination is San Lucido, Calabria, an authentic small borgo where creativity and heritage come alive. We launched with a week-long festival, featuring interactive workshops, five live performances, and immersive artistic experiences. Visitors didn’t just attend—they lived art, blending with the community, tasting local flavors, and embracing an Italian way of life rooted in creativity.
ArteInVivo is more than an event—it's a growing movement that transforms how we experience culture. By building a global network of artists and travelers, we aim to unlock new ways to explore and share art, making every journey a unique creative adventure.
Discover, connect, and experience the world through art.

column42: Giulio Montoli, Edmondo Sparano, Giulia Fazzini, Michela Masoni, Giulio Maria Pezzini, Arunsankar Periyasami, Elena Martelli, Dario Baroni, Andrea Tripodo, Alessandro N. Ferretti, LVenture Group API Access
column50: Atriums restituisce metodo nell'organizzazione dei servizi quotidiani per i privati, organizzati a silos e disordinati nella gestione.
column51:
Come funziona? Detto fatto!!

01. Cerca i servizi. Cerca i servizi di tuo interesse nella tua zona, che sia un tuo Atrium (casa di tutti i giorni, casa al mare, il tuo ufficio) o una locazione temporanea. Atriums rileva in autonomia la tua posizione nel mondo o puoi indicarne una sulla mappa. Tutti i servizi sono organizzati in categorie, puoi scegliere quello di tuo interesse, al prezzo indicato e ritenuto il più affidabile.
02. Ordina il servizio. Ordina il servizio scelto, definendo la modalità di erogazione del servizio (at home, in delivery piuttosto che un servizio ad ore o a quantità) tra quelli resi disponibili dal Service Provider, il giorno e l’ora di esecuzione del servizio oltre all’eventuale ricorrenza se desiderata, le quantità dove richiesto ec onferma l’acquisto.
03. Ricevi il Servizio. Attendi semplicemente che il Service Provider si organizzi per l’esecuzione del servizio nelle modalità richieste e concordate. Una chat tra il Service Provider e Cliente verrà utilizzata per una dialogo riguardo l’ordine eseguito.
==
Poi? Semplice anche il delivery del servizio ordinato.

CHAT. Il Service Provider si terrà in contatto continuo con  il cliente, confermando il ricevimento dell’ordine e rassicurandolo sul rispetto delle modalità di esecuzione concordate, dialogando attraverso la chat di Atriums per qualsiasi questione riguardo il servizio. Alcune ore prima dell’avvio alcuni messaggi di remind verranno inviati in automatico a Service Provider e Cliente.
PARTI. Prima dell’avvio del Servizio, il Service Provider avrà già ottenuto da Atriums tuttele informazioni utili a raggiungere il tuo Atrium, tu potrai eventualmente aiutarlo a raggiungere la destinazione se necessario.
ESEGUI. Il Service Provider avvierà quindi il servizio confermandone il check-in di avvio e il check-out una volta terminato e potrà concordare nuovi servizi con te.
==
Infine? E’ andato tutto bene?

CONCLUDI. Terminato il servizio, Atriums attiva tutte le procedure per completaregli aspetti formali del servizio attraverso i passaggi successivi (Paga e fornisci recensione). Tutto è automatizzato quindi, il cliente e il Service Provider devono unicamente completare le azioni indicate da Atriums.
PAGA. Tutte le transazioni eseguite in Atriums sono garantite dal processo e come cliente sei assolutamente garantito del buon fine sia del servizio ordinato che della corretta esecuzione del pagamento a cui pensa Atriums. 
RECENSISCI. Lascia la tua review a 5 stelle se sei soddisfatto.

column50: Positioning and Business Model
column51:
The creator economy has been driving the market in recent years and many content creators, especially, find themselves without a reference partner for the creation of their events, and in general for the organisation of moments of contact with their community. Following numerous interviews, this need has turned out to be as vital as it is widespread. 
Many in fact create quality content, linked to the world of culture, education, food, travel, entertainment, but find insurmountable obstacles in the management of events and the related operational dynamics. Indeed, creators are increasingly seeking to differentiate themselves by proposing new, original and unique activities to involve and strengthen the relationship with their community.?To do this, one of the most used and effective ways is, according to the findings, to take their event format from online to offline, through experiences, workshops, meetups or live talks. However, 90% of those creators interviewed (with between 10k and 180k followers) have little time to devote to creating offline events, or find it extremely difficult to manage all the dynamics and complexities involved, from creation to organisation to payment. Those who already do their events or meetings with the community, moreover, have stated that they have to invest entire days in the organisation, juggling the search for venues, creating temporary whatsapp groups, sending information and updates on telegram, managing bookings with makeshift methods, and above all struggling enormously to manage payments. 
With Worldy, we propose the first exclusive portal for creators, which helps them to design and manage their own event format and easily share it with their community right up to the moment of payment and after-sales. 
Worldy's mission is therefore to provide all-round support to crators through a turnkey platform (management-saas) that can simplify their lives. 
From the support in the conception phase to the time-consuming part of bookings, payments and customer service is in fact managed by the company, the creator will only have to register, register the event following practical, intuitive and streamlined guidelines and monitor the progress before, during and after purchase from the comfort of the app, thus being able to concentrate on his community and the quality of the offer!

column51: TELA is the digital solution to optimize the management and administration of cultural events. It provides a wide range of management tools, including event planning, reservation management, digital content management, resource management, and budget management. The TELA network brings together only cultural structures, creating an exclusive and highly vertical environment in the sector. The structures are accurately described through automatic and customized tools to offer the best user experience. Through TELA, the Manager can access personnel administration functions, search for an operator's statistics, establish work schedules, and assign them to a ticket office station. The structures present in TELA are customizable, and it is always possible to configure new access time slots, ticket types, tours, combined tickets, and additional services to enrich the promoted cultural offer.

column30: Smarter connecting with AudioQR codes targeting shoppable TV, IoT & more
column42: Giulio Montoli, Edmondo Sparano, Giulia Fazzini, Michela Masoni, Giulio Maria Pezzini, Arunsankar Periyasami, Elena Martelli, Dario Baroni, Andrea Tripodo, Alessandro N. Ferretti, LVenture Group API Access
column50: Minfo UK has a built patented product and has largely been self-funded to date with bold innovative GTM strategy ready to launch Q1 2023.
column51:
Minfo short for more information is a SaaS Marketplace to help Brands improve engagement and get accurate attribution from offline media (TV, cinema, YouTube viewed on TVs, digital signage and radio) and public spaces. 

Minfo improves ROI with our Patented AudioQR codes, Universal App and unique GTM solutions. 
Our multipurpose solutions connect with 80M songs to create recurring usage and extends connections to info, ads, product placement with a Pay Per Click model. No click no fee in a secure no fraud solution for Brands.

The platform is highly-scalable (no coding required by clients to create Minfo landing pages/campaigns) and delivers media interactions via web/mobile Universal App and omnichannel engagement data in real time.

We have completed integrations with KONE and Otis elevator controls to allow App users to request destination floor removing the need to touch buttons. We also have an IoT solution for smaller buildings and manufacturers that do not provide an API. 

We have integrated with Oracle Opera (Hotel Manage Solution) and Symphony POS.

At Minfo we improve attribution, accountability and trust leading a new wave of ethical Tech. 

Minfo is well suited to improve citizen engagement due to our multipurpose Universal App use cases and have been selected by Innovate UK as a leader in Smart City solutions. We participated in the Global Business Innovation program visiting Seoul in 2022 to assess Citizen engagement solutions and are very well positioned at the leading edge.

With more usage of printed QR codes and the limitations and security risks, AudioQR codes deliver significant advantages connecting hundreds of people within a 10m radius of an existing PA or MP3 player and provide secure closed loop solution.

column50: We are building a Europe-wide network, solving a key consumer need & providing a platform for better customer engagement and outcomes.
column51:
PowReady: Pioneering Consumer Charging Solutions

PowReady, a trailblazer in consumer charging services in Europe, has transcended traditional power-on-demand offerings. Our innovative approach establishes a transformative platform for businesses to engage deeply with their customers. Our extensive operations across the UK, Europe, US, and New Zealand demonstrate our commitment to understanding and catering to diverse consumer needs.

Innovative IoT Network

At the heart of PowReady's offerings is our IoT network of smart charging hubs. More than just charging stations, these hubs serve as a vital link between businesses in retail, hospitality, and public spaces, and their audiences. We integrate advanced digital tools such as queue management systems, AI and AR-driven product browsing, and social media integration, crafting a holistic solution that enriches customer experiences across both physical and digital landscapes.

Addressing Digital Age Challenges

In an era where digital overload is a growing concern, PowReady strategically collaborates with corporate clients to streamline customer experiences. We are dedicated to developing solutions that minimize the need for multiple apps, thus reducing adaptation hurdles for customers. This approach not only enhances convenience but also ensures seamless integration of our services into the customers' daily routines.

Transforming Luxury Retail Experiences

PowReady’s solutions are designed to revolutionize the waiting experience in high-end retail environments. Our charging services ensure that clients' devices are always powered, enabling continuous interaction with digital content, even while in-store. This capability allows for a seamless blend of online and offline shopping experiences, enhancing overall customer satisfaction.

Our Commitment

PowReady is committed to innovation and leveraging our global presence to meet the ever-evolving demands of the retail sector. We aim to revolutionize retail experiences by integrating state-of-the-art technology with customer-centric services. Our solutions are designed not just to meet the current needs of businesses but to anticipate and shape future trends in consumer engagement.

column51:
Tourism Working is set to become a new innovation co-living & coworking district without borders independent location based, to enjoy at same time working experience, beautiful locations and travel experiences all around Europe and South East Asia. TW will thrive thanks to a strong value proposition reflected in the main place pillars:

SHARING EXPERIENCE

BORDERLESS

TRAVELING

COMMUNITY

RESILIENCE

Within the framework of the new development, TW will become the first actualization of this vision, which will come to life finding its home in a microcosm of selected actors and players. TW will become the first laboratory of the new BORDERLESSY concept, meaning with that the possibility to live and work anywhere and without borders. In the TW places it will be improved the environment to give to users the physical experience of being free to live again without physical restrictions, activating principles of COMMUNITY engagement and creating a place where the business can have continuity and be inspired. The TRAVEL will come back to be the best way to SHARE EXPERIENCE and the services inside the TW places always will be RESILIENT in order to change and adapt themself to users and their needs.

What we are selling? The Co-working Co-living model.

This typology combines the concept of living inside a community and the one of coworking, with some distinctive features: areas designed to enable the social relations between the members, i.e. places for formal and informal meetings, collaboration corners, leisure hubs, the presence of modern and attractive interior design fittings. Experiencing new ways of co-living and co-working at the same time as well making new networks are the keywords of this model.
Changing landscapes have sparked the need for new agile work habits, which implicates a new way to think about workplaces, works itself and lifestyle balance.

Our main products will be sold as :

14 days Discovery Experience in exclusive villas/venues: A new way of living and working. 10 professionals from all over Europe, 14 days, Co-living and Co-working for those who want to experience a transformation in their way of living and working, meeting professionals and join organized outdoor activities to discover and enjoy the journey.

Nomads co-living: Mid-term commitment in Co-living/coworking apartments from 2 to 6 months; living in the digital nomad cities feeling the coliving experience and the vibes of the digital nomad life with all the comforts.
Etc.

column50:
We certify all our suppliers with a proprietary sustainable tourism
standard recognized internationally by the UNWTO to assess the impact.
column51:
Transform tourism into a positive force for the global good: that’s our mission.

Faroo is the first innovative benefit startup that offers companies the opportunity to create a positive environmental and social impact through their team building experiences. Measuring and certifying the impact generated allows companies to communicate their commitment internally and externally.

Through sustainable tourism experiences of one or more days, Faroo combines team building and sustainability. Making on-the-job training in sustainability and support for sustainable tour operators its added value.

Thanks to its proprietary sustainability certification standard, Faroo measures the sustainability level of tour operators and provides the company with an assessment of the real positive impact generated by its CSR activities using quantitative KPIs (kg of C02 emission not emitted, L of water saved, kg number of products enhanced, number of people supported and hours of training provided). A fundamental tool for companies to communicate with their stakeholders and share their environmental and social commitment through measurable impact indicators.

Before being a sustainable tour operator, Faroo is a movement of people united by the desire to use tourism to generate a positive impact on the environment and local communities. Through sustainable team building for companies and support in the transition process for tour operators, as well as raising awareness among travelers on issues of the impact of tourism, Faroo wishes to propose a way of traveling on tiptoe.

A truly virtuous circle that takes us far: Far + Loop = Faroo.

column42: Giulio Montoli, Edmondo Sparano, Giulia Fazzini, Michela Masoni, Giulio Maria Pezzini, Arunsankar Periyasami, Elena Martelli, Dario Baroni, Andrea Tripodo, Alessandro N. Ferretti, LVenture Group API Access
column50: Crown Bank: Blockchain-powered finance. Empowering SMEs, crypto traders, and the unbanked with secure, accessible, and innovative financial
column51:
Crown Bank is a next-generation, blockchain-powered financial platform designed to address critical gaps in the traditional financial system. It aims to provide accessible, efficient, and inclusive financial services to three key segments: Small and Medium-sized Enterprises (SMEs), cryptocurrency traders and investors, and unbanked/underserved communities. By leveraging blockchain technology, Crown Bank offers enhanced security, transparency, and operational efficiency, bridging the gap between traditional finance and the digital asset ecosystem.
1. Problem Statement:
The existing financial system presents significant challenges:
?	SME Financing Gap: SMEs face difficulties accessing adequate financing due to stringent requirements, lengthy processes, and unfavorable terms imposed by traditional institutions.
?	Exclusion of Crypto Users: Traditional banks lack the infrastructure and expertise to accommodate the growing cryptocurrency market, leaving users reliant on fragmented and often unregulated solutions.
?	Financial Exclusion: A substantial portion of the global population remains unbanked, lacking access to essential financial services, perpetuating economic hardship.
?	Inefficiency and High Costs: Outdated infrastructure in traditional banking results in inefficiencies, high transaction fees, and slow processing times.
2. Crown Bank Solution:
Crown Bank offers a comprehensive suite of financial services tailored to specific needs:
2.1 Empowering SMEs:
?	Diverse Financing Options: Term loans, lines of credit, invoice financing, equipment leasing, and merchant cash advances.
?	Streamlined Banking Services: Business checking and savings accounts, multi-currency accounts, virtual and physical debit cards.
?	Advanced Financial Management Tools: Treasury management, payroll solutions, expense management, and API integrations.
?	Dedicated Support: Personalized relationship managers and financial consulting services.
2.2 Revolutionizing Finance for Crypto Traders and Investors:
?	Integrated Crypto Exchange and Wallet: Spot trading, margin trading, derivatives trading (future), secure cold storage, and multi-signature wallets.
?	Seamless Crypto-Fiat Integration: Instant conversions, crypto-backed loans, and a crypto payment gateway.
?	Advanced Trading Tools: Real-time market data, technical analysis tools, and API access for algorithmic trading.
?	DeFi Access: Yield farming, staking, and DeFi wallet integration.
2.3 Expanding Financial Incl

column50: Unlike competitors, we aim to create an Ecosystem where also travelers and their needs are the very core of the solution.
column51:
The tools used by travel agents require a lot of manual and repetitive operations. They adapt very poorly to the needs of the modern traveler.

Our B2B platform is designed for travel agents (agencies, travel designers and simplify and travel consultants) in order to speed up the process to create travel itineraries and send them automatically to their clients. Travelers, in turn, are able to manage their trip in all aspects using the Wayt app, from the itinerary first, to the memories (photos, notes, places visited, etc.) later, making sure that they have everything at their fingertips at all times.

The solution is presented as a virtuous circle in which a trip organized through a travel agency using Wayt can become the medium through which new customers will organize their next trips. This feature is a unique value with respect to the competitive landscape and provides a shield with respect to the competition: in fact, once a slice of the national market has been obtained, as a first mover in Italy, it will be particularly difficult for other competitors to target those agencies already in the Wayt ecosystem as the cost of migration (in terms of effort) for them and their users, would not be indifferent, even if only thinking about having to transfer all templates and itineraries for agencies or export and reorganize all their memories for travelers. This is the main competitive advantage of Wayt, which, however, requires us to take the first steps of “conquering” the target market slice quickly.

Travel agents are charged a fee for each individual travel itinerary submitted to each of their clients 

Our vision is to create an ecosystem where a strong network of travel agents will be able also to sell their trips to users directly via our B2C app.

Wayt wins because it succeeds in bringing travel agents and travelers together within a single ecosystem.
column55: Professionals in organized/group travel (travel agents, travel designers, tour operators) - They use the dedicated web platform to easily create and manage their travel itineraries and send them to their clients, Travelers (the clients of the B2B side but not only) - They manage their trips in all aspects using the Wayt app, from the itinerary first, to the memories (photos, notes, places visited, etc.) later, making sure that they have everything at their fingertips at all times.

column42: Giulio Montoli, Edmondo Sparano, Giulia Fazzini, Michela Masoni, Giulio Maria Pezzini, Arunsankar Periyasami, Elena Martelli, Dario Baroni, Andrea Tripodo, Alessandro N. Ferretti, LVenture Group API Access
column50: What sets GlobeSisters apart is our commitment to providing a safe and unique travel experience exclusively for women.
column51:
GlobeSisters makes immersive travel experiences accessible to women. Our mobile app connects women travelers who have been ID-checked with local hosts in the area where they are traveling.
First, our focus is on providing safe home-sharing experiences to female travelers. We do this by connecting them with trusted local residents who can host them for a short period of time, usually 2-4 nights. Our mission is to empower women to travel by providing them with reliable accommodation solutions.
In the long term, our aim is to build a complete ecosystem of safe services for women who travel solo. This includes various types of accommodations, activities, restaurants, insurance, and transportation.

column50: Empeeria simplifies the processes of managing and digitizing tourist services by making each product easily accessible to every customer
column51:
Using digital tools widely used today and developing and applying new technologies, the company has evolved by providing original services and customizable according to your needs, at the same time becoming the driving force behind the development of a new distribution model for tourist services. 
Our first goal has been to create a digital platform able to collect all the most suggestive experiences of the region, offering us on the market, however, in a completely new and innovative way. 
The next step was to innovate the platform - thanks to CMS DXP - to capture the major tourism trends of today and tomorrow: holiday home and experiential, creating - at the same time - multimedia products usable from home and in the territory. 
The development of software for the management and proposition of experiential activities online, with integrated marketplace and algorithm for revenue economy, becomes the main tool with which to aggregate the offer of all Italy to distribute it simultaneously on 95% of global channels.
The objective is therefore the creation of a marketplace - a virtual place in which supply and demand are combined dynamically - and of a tourist offer on destinations finally managed completely through the instruments of the revenue economy.
The functions necessary for the management of dynamic pricing aimed at price variability based on distribution channels and the Revenue Management functionalities for real time price management based on the sales trend will be designed and implemented.
The target of the project is therefore the evolution of an innovative platform composed of specific software modules that enable and support the operators of the sector in their activities of aggregation and product definition and that allows the sale both through market places and Channel Manager, with a specific focus on the principles of the Revenue Economy.
In the context of a strong digitalization of tourist services and their use, the company intends to develop a Web-App owned, versatile and functional to the interests of travelers.
The prototype, designed and tested, must be developed to make it available to the market, respecting the fundamental need for the scalability of its uses.

column50: Weforguest stands out as a distinctive CRM platform tailored specifically for the hospitality industry integrating advanced AI-technology
column51:
Weforguest is an advanced CRM system for hotels and hotel groups, designed to increase direct sales, personalise the guest experience and optimise operational efficiency. Through the use of AI-enhanced tools, Weforguest transforms the way hotels interact with their guests, offering a tailored service that elevates every aspect of hospitality.
 
Weforguest's AI revolutionises the management of guest communications, is capable of analysing incoming messages and emails, and classifies each communication by type - such as requests for quotes, general information or assistance. It offers one-click quote generation using up-to-date availability and price list data. If a customer request is incomplete, the AI automatically intervenes by requesting the missing information. Weforguest goes further: it corrects and refines texts and supports editing in multiple languages, facilitating effective and professional communication.

Jupi is the future of entertainment, tourism, hangouts, and outings. Our comprehensive mobile app offers a seamless, personalized experience for users in the rapidly-growing Saudi market. With Jupi, users can discover and book entertainment options, and tourist attractions, and find the best hangout spots and outing locations in the area.

Key features include:
AI-powered personalized recommendations
In-app booking and payment options
Virtual tours technology
Local business partnerships
User-generated content

  Jupi solves a major pain point by offering a complete solution to entertainment, tourist, hangout, and outing planning. The app also provides valuable data and insights to local businesses. The Saudi market is estimated to be worth billions of dollars and is highly attractive to Jupi, with a growing demand for entertainment and tourism services.

Jupi's target demographic is urban, tech-savvy millennials in Saudi Arabia with high disposable income and a desire for new experiences. This group presents a compelling investment opportunity due to their spending power and willingness to try new products and services.

column30: Autonomous Robots to simplify the hectic work of HORECA personnel
column42: Giulio Montoli, Edmondo Sparano, Giulia Fazzini, Michela Masoni, Giulio Maria Pezzini, Arunsankar Periyasami, Elena Martelli, Dario Baroni, Andrea Tripodo, Alessandro N. Ferretti, LVenture Group API Access
column50: Our robots meet the specific needs of our clients in Europe. They are also more safe, customizable and elegant.
column51:
Labor shortage is becoming a major problem in the HORECA sector. We are facing this problem by building robots that support workers in doing repetitive and hard tasks. Our first robot helps waiters in serving clients by delivering food and dirty dishes.
Waiter's work gets less hectic and hard: they spend more time serving clients instead of carrying things between the table and the kitchen.
Our robot stands out as the product with the best value for money. 
It is more safe thanks to our unique smart soft bumper, a wide set of sensors and automatic calibration algorithms. 
It can be used for supporting table serving and table clearing thanks to its unique capability of entering swinging kitchen doors without the need of infrastructure.
It is highly customizable and it has an elegant made-in-italy design that makes it suitable also for high-end restaurants.
Its price is very competitive and our clients have a return of investment in less than one year.

column50: Takyon operates as a tech enabler, empowering direct channels of service providers and giving final customers real ownership of bookings
column51:
Takyon is an Italian fintech company that introduces
for the first time on the market the concept of
ownership and resellability of bookings through the
transformation of bookings into digital assets (NFT),
thanks to Blockchain technology. Starting in the world
of hospitality, Takyon launched the innovative
Resellable Rate, a non-refundable prepaid rate -
bookable on the direct website of partner hotels - that
provides flexibility to the traveller through the
possibility, in the event of a change of plans, to resell
the booking on the Takyon platform to other users.

After little more than a year since its inception, Takyon
has managed to forge agreements with leading
operators in the sector, first and foremost the Best
Western Hotels Italia brand, of the well-known
American chain, but also Garibaldi Hotels, Voi Hotels,
Italian Hotel Group, and many others, as well as 500
independent hotels.
