column30: Live Music Travel is a product of Personal Travels SRL, established in 2014
column42: Giulio Montoli, Edmondo Sparano, Giulia Fazzini, Michela Masoni, Giulio Maria Pezzini, Arunsankar Periyasami, Elena Martelli, Dario Baroni, Andrea Tripodo, Alessandro N. Ferretti, LVenture Group API Access
column50: We actively support the activities of the International Yehudi Menuhin Foundation, which runs the MUS-E® program in 13 countries.
column51:
Personal Travels was established in 2014 after winning the Smart&Start grant provided by Invitalia, an Italian Government fund. The company is registered in the Public Registry of Italian Innovative Startups.

The first version of the website was using the Wordpress technology and was aimed at the general public trying to personalize the building of tourist packages.

We tested various business models until we validated the current one in 2016, when we surpassed the threshold of 20000 users and reached the semifinals of the third edition of the Wolves Summit of Warsaw, a pitching event matching worldwide investors and startups. We are partnered with companies of the Booking Holdings group including Booking.com (Hotel reservations partner), Getyourguide.com (Tour Guide partner), Rentalcars.com (Car booking partner) and other providers. On a successful transaction we get commissions varying from 6% to 10%. Users can register to access our cashback scheme from their bookings or start a revenue stream by becoming our affiliates.

We have participated to the following programs: Madeira Startup Retreat, Dublin Deep Dive Week on Travel Tech, Startup Mentoring. The first program was promoted by Startup Madeira, Turismo de Portugal and Nova School of Business and Economics and took place between 15th January 2018 and 16th March 2018, the second was promoted by Startup Lighthouse and took place between 21 and 24 June 2018. The third program was organised by Enpact. 

During the programs we had the chance to pitch, meet investors and have one-to-one sessions with mentors and other entrepreneurs. Thanks to their feedback we have decided to pivot towards a more specific target, addressing the needs of those who travel to attend musical events such as concerts, festivals, opera nights, DJ live performances and similar. In January 2019 we have deployed our new product on https://livemusic.travel using a custom code and gaining some traction and paid users. In 2020 the pandemic brought us to a hiatus. In 2022 we reverted to wordpress.

column50: The best fresh products from local producers delivered by mobile innovative locker. No mininum order requested. No warehouse needed.
column51: MySpesa (www.myspesa.net), thanks to the integration between the proximity platform and its direct logistics, allows users to purchase online shopping, especially fresh, from producers, local shops and supermarkets. Deliveries are currently carried out by an innovative electric vehicle in common, dynamic and home collection points (managed by an advanced algorithm) that respects the cold chain, the need for frequent service, very fast collection and a multi-cart product. For each order, all items from different shops and manufacturers are composed and delivered the same day with a single delivery. The basket of items is composed on board the vehicle at a controlled temperature and a darkstore (warehouse) is not required. The project makes use of a scientific collaboration with the Univ. of Genoa and a technological patent has been filed for a multi-drawer electric vehicle (such as a traveling “amazon” locker) that can be opened via smartphone and smartwatch to allow immediate loading and unloading.

column50: Recognizable lead character & story, playful, fun for the whole family, flexibility, affordable, sustainability at kids-level, global vision
column51:
Seek+See makes exploring cities and attractions for families with younger children (3-10 years) fun and easy. We offer treasure hunt inspired experiences wrapped into a story of a rescue mission with the unique alien lead character "Crash Pilot Skyla". We leverage storytelling, gamification and curious sustainability facts at kids-level to keep the whole family engaged. Our experiences are self-guided and facilitated by an app, which offers 100% flexibility and are targeted at both local and traveling families, allowing us to scale quickly and internationally.

We have launched the MVP with the first 2 self-guided city walks in Copenhagen, achieved 400 paying B2C customers, established the first paid B2B partnership with a museum, have 400+ completed treasure hunts, 5-star ratings (Trustpilot, TripAdvisor) and customers asking for more routes, verifying customer demand and satisfaction as well as willingness to pay.

We are now moving to a B2B subscription model by establishing partnerships and developing customized treasure hunts for e.g. museums and zoos. Our experience will enhance their guests' experience, thus, help increase repeat visits and revenue. In 2023, we have entered the first B2B partnership with a museum and have ongoing talks with several other major attractions including Copenhagen Zoo and the MUNCH museum in Oslo. We have an ambitious global vision and aim to scale to 30 B2B partnerships by 2028 and grow further.
column55: Attractions, museums, zoo etc. - With our treasure hunt experiences at e.g. museums we enhance the guest experience when exploring with younger kids making it playful, educative, easy and conventient for the users., Local and traveling parents and grandparents with children between 3-10 years old, active and health - It saves the adults the hustle of planning and gives them a way to explore the city, attractions, museums in a playful, engaging, flexible and educative way with kids

column42: Giulio Montoli, Edmondo Sparano, Giulia Fazzini, Michela Masoni, Giulio Maria Pezzini, Arunsankar Periyasami, Elena Martelli, Dario Baroni, Andrea Tripodo, Alessandro N. Ferretti, LVenture Group API Access
column50:
- Best price and value throught RFP and optimization tool 
- Service available anywhere in France (countryside included)
- Comparison tool
column51:
Taxi / VTC marketplace in France.

monTransport.com allows anyone to compare and book a taxi or VTC service at the best rate anywhere in France and French Overseas Departments.

2 user flow possible:
REQUEST FOR QUOTE: after sending a request, the user will be able to receive quotes from transport providers. The 5700+ taxi and VTC providers affiliated with monTransport.com will compete to send their best rate and services in order to increase chances of getting booked.

IMMEDIATE BOOKING: after filling your itinerary, if your trip is eligible, our algorithm will display a real time price that you can book straight away. We take care of the dispatch automatically.

Our main benefits are:
- ultra competitive prices due to our 5700+ taxis and VTC competing on requests.
- find easily the transport service that you need via the monTransport.com marketplace. For instance, a type/brand of vehicle, a multilingual driver, child booster seats, smoking vehicle, a tour guide as a driver, etc.

On the transport provider's side, monTransport.com is: 
- a new source of clients, complementary to other sources such as UBER or taxi booking services.
- a tool to optimize its planning.

For instance, a VTC that has a booking in 2 days with a departure from the airport. He logs onto the site to find a trip request that brings him to the airport in 2 days at the same time, then he sends an attractive price, the user books. And as a result he optimized its planning.

And in the end, it's a win-win situation, the transport provider optimized its planning and in return he allowed the user to book at a super attractive rate.
column55: Transport providers: taxi & VTC providers - To get new clients and optimize their planning., Tourists, SMB, event & travel agencies + anyone looking for a competitive taxi rate - To get a suite transport service at the best possible rate.

column50: DataMonkey is the first GeoAI which can process both language and geospatial data to empower geo analytics and geo-driven workflows
column51:
You can work with DataMonkey on our own map-interface, or integrate it as an API into your existing IT systems.

Either way, you get to work with a unique GeoAI agent which can automatically compile information from external data sources: e.g. from OpenStreetMap, federal/state geoportals, EU, ... 
The AI agent collects the data individually per request, transfers it into a geo format if necessary & returns it to you - this way, you can automatically feed it into your analytics (e.g. GIS / data platform) or into your workflows.

column50: Marketplace innovativo e indicizzazione fisica dei punti di interesse. Indice aperto all'utilizzo ad altre aziende per nuove applicazioni.
column51:
Il progetto consiste in un innovativo marketplace di contenuti multimediali relativi ai beni culturali. La piattaforma web può essere utilizzata da utenti e aziende come strumento per creare e distribuire contenuti digitali di natura informativa, potenziando così la divulgazione. Il progetto mira a promuovere, valorizzare e indicizzare il patrimonio artistico culturale del nostro paese, facilitando e agevolando l'accesso al fruitore dei contenuti (POI). A tale scopo l'azienda ha realizzato un dispositivo elettronico innovativo, integrato, autosufficiente che permette la comunicazione di prossimità attraverso un semplice smartphone sfruttando le tecnologie NFC, QR-Code e Bluetooth. 
Il dispositivo inoltre ha la funzione di creare una mappatura fisica dei POI con l'obiettivo di standardizzare l'individuazione dei punti stessi.
La semplicità e l'immediatezza di accesso ai contenuti legati ai POI risponde alle attuali esigenze di digitalizzazione dell'intero settore turistico culturale. 
Attraverso Civiglio chiunque può creare contenuti, sia esso un amante della storia e dell'arte o un semplice appassionato, e chiunque può accedere ai punti di interesse, attraverso la geolocalizzazione se si è in viaggio, o attraverso la ricerca per luogo o parola chiave se si è appassionati di arte e cultura, anche dalla comodità di casa.
I contenuti possono essere gratuiti o a pagamento e questo sarà deciso dal singolo creatore.
Grazie ai fondi stanziati dalla Regione Calabria con il bando "startup e spinoff" Guides4You, azienda impegnata nel settore informatico ha già realizzato la piattaforma ed è pronta a lanciarla sul mercato.
Oltre alla piattaforma, l'azienda ha realizzato e brevettato un dispositivo innovativo che utilizzerà per indicizzare i punti di interesse. La missione del progetto è creare una nuova infrastruttura per l'accesso ai contenuti digitali attraverso l'indicizzazione fisica dei beni culturali. Il dispositivo sostituirà le targhette attualmente utilizzate per descrivere i beni culturali, luoghi e paesaggi.

column51:
Garipalli designs and distributes innovative gaming experiences and adopts unconventional approaches for new generations to familiarize with culture. Its work translates into interactive experiences and other forms of unconventional storytelling to learn about culture, territory, history, art and traditions.
Among others, our best-selling product, City Escape, has won the heart of over 25.000 people belonging to the new generations. City Escape gives them the chance to live a never-experienced-before type of adventure that allows them to explore the city and live in first person its original stories. Through new types of interaction between the player and the game, City Escape blends the digital world with the physical one, offering the user a unique and immersive experience. The experience presents itself in the form of an interactive game that, once launched from one’s smartphone, will guide players through historical places of their city and will challenge them to interact with buildings, people, objects and stories. They take full advantage of new mobile technologies to facilitate and enrich the exploring and learning experience in real life.
Through its products and experiences Garipalli wants to help new generations understanding the past, navigating the present and making better decisions for the future.

column51:
Palhom is a specialized experience planning and management firm that focuses on designing and executing offsite events that cater to the unique needs and objectives of a particular organization. Such retreats are typically aimed at team building, leadership development, strategic planning, or other similar purposes.

Here are some of the typical services that Palhom may offer:

Consultation and Planning: We will work with the organization to identify its goals and objectives for the retreat. Based on this information, we will create a customized plan that outlines the retreat's agenda, activities, and outcomes.

Venue Selection and Logistics: We will help the organization find a suitable venue for the retreat, taking into account factors such as location, size, and amenities. We will also manage logistics such as transportation, accommodations, and catering.

Activities and Programs: We will design and implement various activities and programs that align with the organization's goals and objectives. This may include team-building exercises, leadership workshops, strategic planning sessions, and other activities designed to enhance communication, collaboration, and problem-solving skills.

Facilitation and Coaching: We may provide facilitation and coaching services to help guide the retreat's activities and ensure that participants are fully engaged and motivated.

Evaluation and Follow-up: After the retreat is over, we will conduct an evaluation to assess its success and identify areas for improvement. We may also provide follow-up coaching or other support to help ensure that the retreat's outcomes are fully realized.

Overall, the aim of Palhom is to create a highly customized and engaging experience that helps organizations achieve their specific goals and objectives while also building strong, collaborative teams and enhancing individual skills and capabilities.

column50: We put Tour Guides at the core of our business and our goal is to make them the stars of the process so they can connect freely with users
column51:
Pandemic Tours aims to be the world’s first online platform where tour guides can offer either self-guided or normal guided tours so users can experience flexibility at its top.

Our app offers walking tours, made by experienced and knowledgeable guides or Local Experts, so people can stroll around cities and attractions at their own pace.

Whether history holds a fascination, or architecture, pub crawling, music, or football, the Pandemic Tours platform will gather all interests under the same roof so anyone looking for a unique experience will be able to access it through the same app.

Every tour comes with an interactive map marked with the stops where users can listen to or read stories about that building, landmark or historical figure with photos and video to bring it alive for walkers. Also provided are handpicked insider recommendations for places to eat and drink, seasonal events and perfect selfie spots close by.

Alternatively, users can book a standard walking tour with the tour guide that aligns the most with their interests.

Our advanced technology will match users with tour guides that align best with both parties' interests, so no one loses time or money in the process and everyone gets the most out of the experience.

With Pandemic Tours, discover the world at your own pace!

column51:
Popup is a global platform that revolutionizes how businesses showcase their offerings and engage with customers. Using NFC technology, QR codes, and artificial intelligence (AI), Popup enables companies, professionals, and organizations to build interactive, customizable digital showcases. With tools that automate content creation and simplify platform management, Popup empowers users to seamlessly connect their physical presence to the digital world.

Popup provides an innovative suite of tools to create dynamic and engaging digital showcases:

Digital showcases that transform physical spaces into interactive virtual windows using QR codes and NFC technology.
Customizable landing pages that allow businesses to design geolocated and personalized pages for promoting products, services, and campaigns.
AI-powered content creation with smart assistants that automatically generate product descriptions, promotional texts, and menu content tailored to the business's branding.
Content suggestions from AI that provide recommendations for creating engaging materials.
Platform automation tools that simplify the management of digital assets and landing pages in real time.
Custom NFC devices, including branded or white-label products such as digital business cards, healthcare tools (Checkup Card), and memorials (Ricordo PerSempre).
Smart marketing tools that enable businesses to launch digital campaigns with interactive elements like QR-linked promotions or contactless engagement tools.
Popup combines cutting-edge technology with intuitive design to create a powerful digital ecosystem. It uses NFC technology for seamless interaction with digital content, QR codes to link customers directly to digital showcases, AI assistants to automate content creation and ensure consistency, and a cloud-based platform to centralize content, updates, and campaign management.

Popup serves a variety of industries:

Retailers can create interactive digital storefronts to extend their reach and engage customers.
Service providers can use digital business cards and smart assistants to maintain a professional presence.
Healthcare professionals can deploy NFC-enabled solutions for instant access to medical data.
Event planners can leverage Popup for interactive event experiences with AI-managed landing pages and promotions.
Popup operates on a SaaS subscription model and offers NFC-enabled devices, both branded and white-label. Its AI-driven features simplify content creation and platform

column50: Our multidisciplinary team conjugates audio, spatiality, immersivity, interactive narration and design, providing a one stop solution.
column51:
We create digital twins of objects, places and artworks, recreating both their geometrical appearance and their acoustical characteristics. We used advanced photogrammetry techniques to reconstruct the geometry and the textures, we use Ambisonics to model the way sound behaves in the space. 
We use this data to create immersive and narrative experiences, which we make available through WebXR, which is a web-based platform which can be accessed through any device, including smartphones, PCs, game consoles and VR headsets.

Our digitized assets will be made available with a CreativeCommons license for non-commercial use, and licensed for commercial use.
We offer a unique combination of visual and acoustic reconstruction, which can be used from anything from virtual visits, shared online experiences, video games, video virtual production, and live immersive concerts. Our audio technology allows us to model the sound propagation of individual performers with custom directivity, simulating the interaction between sound and space.

Most importantly, everything we do is highly accessible, we never sacrifice accessibility for immersivity.

In addition, our digital twins are already being used in industry settings, mainly for the research and development of products where sound and its spatiality are of utmost importance. Being able to see and hear simulations of what their products will be like is massively useful to our customers.

column50: Thanks to a culture of Open Innovation, inNavi builds a digital ecosystem capable of implementing the nautical sector and coastal tourism
column51:
inNavi is a Benefit startup committed to promoting sustainable coastal tourism through customized boat rentals and tourism services. Their mission is to make coastal tourism accessible to everyone, including non-boating savvy tourists, by offering authentic and carefree experiences. inNavi's web platform allows customers to easily book tailor-made vacations, personalizing every detail of their trip.

The company is actively involved in marine conservation and the enhancement of local culture. It promotes responsible tourism practices, raising customers' awareness of the importance of protecting the marine environment during sea excursions. It collaborates with local operators and suppliers to offer tour packages that include local food and wine experiences, shore itineraries, and other cultural activities, thus contributing to the local economy and coastal communities.

Scalability and replicability are strengths of inNavi's business model. It has the ability to increase customer numbers, booking volumes, and social and environmental impact exponentially, without the use of proportional resources. It is able to adapt its business model to different coastal locations, enabling growth and expansion into new markets.

column51:
Welcome to Wantotrip, where travel dreams come to life in a whole new way! We are a dynamic social-travel platform that brings together the best of the travel world. At Wantotrip, we're all about creating unforgettable experiences for everyone involved.

For the digital influencers and content creators out there, we're your platform to transform your passion into profit. Whether it's designing, promoting, or leading incredible trips, we're here to help you monetize your wanderlust.

For travelers seeking authentic experiences, we offer a gateway to join like-minded adventurers on themed journeys to amazing destinations. Leave behind the ordinary and embark on extraordinary adventures with Wantotrip.

Travel agencies and local guides, we've got your back too! Increase your bookings and sales by collaborating with us to operate group trips. We're all about boosting your business while making travel more accessible and exciting.

But that's not all. Wantotrip is powered by cutting-edge AI technology, revolutionizing the travel sector. Our AI-driven solution automates every step of the process, making travel planning and execution smoother and more efficient than ever before.

Join us at Wantotrip, where passion, adventure, and innovation collide to create the travel experiences of a lifetime. Get ready to explore the world like never before!

column50: The B2C platform integrated into the B2B marketplace allows to offer hosts truly exclusive brand deals and connect brands to travellers.
column51:
Our solution is a two-sided marketplace that connects hosts to brands, i.e. to premium suppliers of amenities such as food&beverages, cosmetics, home textiles, handicrafts, etc.
Our platform offers hosts a one-stop-shop to access truly exclusive brand deals for updating and enhancing their properties, while connecting, via proximity technologies, vacationers to brands to enable easy interactions.
The platform facilitates a smooth transaction process and seamless communication between hosts and brands on the one hand, and vacationers and brands on the other hand.
Thanks to our platform, hosts can improve guest experience to earn good reviews, and brands can showcase their products in native physical settings while connecting to travellers.

column51:
Just Walk is a digital platform which aims to solve some of the main problems that discourage people to go to a pilgrim route, first of all the fear of starting the route alone. The platform will contain maps of the most important "European cultural and religious routes". Just Walk aims to facilitate the departure of all users interested in undertaking a route  and that are struggling with the classic pre-trip disorientation. The company has two main objectives:The first one is to make the platform a landmark and a place of sharing for walkers, pilgrims and all fans of slow tourism. It will achieve its aim through an offer of services and tools, currently absent on the web. In fact, the interactive maps will have functions capable of solving the main problems that pilgrims might face before departure: first of all, finding travel companions to start the route together. Each route will be divided into stages and it will be possible to get to know the pilgrims departing from that particular stage, chat with them, ask for information or plan the departure together. All the registered users will have their own profile where they will insert the routes already walked. These routes will represent their Peregrinum Vitae, in order to help the pilgrims who want to walk the same path. This will allow the platform to become a community where users can share their experiences and continue to live the route even after coming back to their everyday life. 
The second objective represents the core business of the company. The platform will be a meeting place and an intermediate between customers/walkers and the increasingly numerous economic operators interested in reaching this target of users. In particular, the interactive maps and the "route planning" will be perfect showcases for selling products and services that can facilitate the route (travel packages, backpack transport services, hotel facilities present in the stages, etc.). In particular, there will be offers of tailor-made travel packages for each path or part of the route. This will give those who don't want to go on an adventure the opportunity to look for more comfortable solutions.Through the elaboration of the "route planning", the users can choose to insert these products/services in the "cart" of their travel's program.The platform will be a gatherer of Italian and international tour operators offering travel packages on walking itineraries.The company will gain from its intermediary role and from ADV.

column51:
Gluebus enables entertainment providers such as concerts, clubs, festivals, and sports clubs to sell transportation tickets to their events from anywhere in a range of 150km.
The entertainment provider has just to sell the transportation tickets, while Gluebus provides the best buses, defines the most efficient bus trips, and operates the service.
Our technology allows our customers to provide transportation from all urban areas, even in small towns at a very competitive price.
Our system groups the transportation requests into bus trips, accommodating all the entertainment providers' customers.
In this way, our customers can attract more people and increase their conversion rate by providing a safe and affordable way of transportation without having to worry about where their customers can park.
This solution additionally helps reduce drunk driving car accidents and reduces by 70% the greenhouse gas emissions by aggregating the travelers in the same vehicle.

column51: We developed the prototype of an app for iOS and Android smartphones to discover places to visit and experiences to live, enhancing and protecting the cultural and environmental heritage of the Aosta Valley. Thanks to advanced profiling and an algorithm based on artificial intelligence, it will then be possible to generate, for each user of the app, personalized experiential tourist routes according to family composition, interests, starting location and motor skills. Thanks to the Big Data collected by the app, public bodies will have precise and targeted real-time analysis of tourism trends in the Aosta Valley. Through a rewarding gamification system, rewards will be received in blockchain tokens and collectible NFTs. We will start the project in Aosta Valley as it is our home region and we are familiar with its territory and already collaborate with local tour guides. In addition, it is a small region but rich in tourist points of interest and with an interesting annual attendance. These criteria will allow us to evaluate the proper functioning of all the features of the app with the goal of expanding nationally, European and worldwide. We are now in the Beta test phase and we are looking for investors that could support us financially to shift to "go to market" phase.

column50: It is the only solution worldwide enabling both the comparison & booking of most famous ride-hailing & taxi fleets within an open-data logic
column51:
At The Good Seat, we believe that to create the world of tomorrow, more inclusive and sustainable, we have to change the way people move first.

Mobility is at the heart of today's issues. Whether initiated by cities, regions, companies or individuals, mobility is being reinvented. The MaaS (mobility as a service), which consists of a platform bringing together several means of transportation with integrated booking & payment, is emerging. But to do so, MaaS services need to access data from transport providers, which is very complex and non-standardised. This is where The Good Seat comes in.

The Good Seat has developed a solution that aggregates the offers from major ride-hailing & taxi platforms worldwide and gives access to their data in real time along with a comparator system. We provide this technology through different product types (white-label API, mobile application, website, dashboard) to companies which need it - experience platforms (mobility, travel, hospitality, event) and large accounts.

We enable these actors to meet the last-mile challenge, improve customer experience through innovative digital services, generate ancillary revenues or reduce their mobility budget as well as their carbon footprint. In short, we enable the MaaS to develop.

Thanks to our technology, we make everything happen on a single interface without any redirection (from entering a destination to booking and payment), and enable the end-users or employees to compare a broad range of services (economic, high-end, hybrid, electric, van, pool, 2-wheelers...) using multiple criteria (price, ETA, carbon emissions, user ratings). 

Finally, thanks to its activity, The Good Seat gathers and enriches large sets of historical data on consumer behaviour in terms of mobility across diverse industries and countries. These historical data are used to deliver key insights to our partners, but we are also starting to commercialise and list them on some specialised marketplaces under the form of packages.
column55: End-users - Being an essential brick to multimodality, we enable them to access complete mobility solutions for all their journeys, from the first to the last mile, Experience platforms (mobility, travel, hospitality, event) - We enable them to easily add a complete solution for comparing and booking ride hailing & taxi offers to their product (last-mile challenge, user experience, ancillary revenues), Large accounts - We enable them to access a powerful and automated mobility platform while reducing their expenses and carbon footprint, Ride-hailing & taxi platforms - We enable them to benefit from a larger traffic, increase their volume of rides and their user base as well as improving their brand notoriety

column50: Our Team of aviation data specialists, consulting over 15 years. We have the product, timing and the customers.
column51:
SafeScore offers airports and airlines access to essential and curated travel intelligence data. Relevant, timely, and accurate, SafeScore’s personalised information entices customers and increases user footfall on both the travel widget, and our client’s websites. 

Our widget and API allow travellers to run bespoke queries, while our database houses key data categories which can be tailored to each client’s specific needs. 

SafeScore’s current primary offering is travel restriction-related data as this is an urgent client requirement. This includes border statuses and vaccine/testing requirements. Our product has both front and back-end benefits. We keep passengers informed and up-to-date which means they arrive at the airport prepared for their trip, thus minimising queues. Additionally, we provide our clients with in depth user analytics which gives them unique insight into their customer’s behaviours allowing for targeted and differentiated customer communications at other touch points on their online journey.

SafeScore’s bespoke database and product offers clients the flexibility to choose what they want to display to their customers, putting relevance first, and cutting out all the noise. This can be everything from documentary requirements, to Duty Free options, and carbon credit purchasing. 

Key SafeScore pillars are, information transparency, and ease-of-use. This means that all our data comes from reputable and reliable sources, and is always displayed in the most easy to use, and easy to understand formats. 

We want travellers to feel confident that their journey starts before they arrive at the check-in counter.

SafeScore is currently live on a number of European airport websites, including a Fraport Airport.

column42: Giulio Montoli, Edmondo Sparano, Giulia Fazzini, Michela Masoni, Giulio Maria Pezzini, Arunsankar Periyasami, Elena Martelli, Dario Baroni, Andrea Tripodo, Alessandro N. Ferretti, LVenture Group API Access

column50: Stendhapp is building the only complete map dedicated to the beauty of Italy enhancing the visibility of less known cultural attractors.
column51:
Everything we do is dedicated to cultural tourism. The purpose of Stendhapp - a female company inspired by the Stendhal syndrome - is to leverage digital to increase the awareness and the fruition of the enormous cultural heritage throughout Italy, especially the lesser-known places and events.
The so-called "Economy of Beauty" clearly represents an untapped opportunity: it's one of the focus areas of the PNRR and is worth 26% of the Italian GDP (Ifis). Although Italy is undisputedly the number one country for Unesco World Heritage sites and quantity of art crafts, Italy is not the number one touristic destination and suffers from overtourims effects in few, worldwide known, touristic attractors.
Stendhapp is available on Play and App stores as a user-friendly application that geolocates the user and shows the cultural heritage around his/her with a proximity logic. It currently has over 71.000 hotspots in 20 categories of tangible and intangible Beauty, including typical food and wines. The community can grow the coverage adding missing cultural spots to the map. 
We are a B2B2C business operating in cultural touristic services: we offer to cultural operators a communication and reputational platform for attracting more cultural, high spending tourists to their venues and events.
- B2B: Stendhapp offers communication services to help the myriad of local small cultural attractors to be discovered, to find their audience. We have 2 revenue streams: communication projects and in-app messaging. Stendhapp campaigns on cultural tourists have many advantages compared to standard digital campaigns: reach of a target with high spending power, effective media spending thanks to geolocalization, correct tone of voice and storytelling, kpi based also on real visits to the location.
- B2C: the app targets over 30M Cultural Tourists: "Culture Addicts", 40+ people highly educated, looking for a simple way to discover Italy and "Here and Now", Gen Z kids, aiming at discovering unknown hotspots to share within their bubble.
We've been awarded grants by CTE Next Future Cities and Trialsnet calls to support the development of new features, inlcuding AI powered users profiling, image recognition and Augmented Reality.
Stendhapp was born in Italy as it’s the land of Beauty, but the internally developed digital platform, the apps, the structured approach to data collection and the business model can be easily extended to any Country or category, the business is fully scalable.
column55: 40+ Cultural tourists - "Culture addicts" - Simplify the discovery and fruition of cultural heritage , B2B: Tourist offices, Museums, Artistic and cultural events organizers, Wine and food producers, Tou - Promote their destinations to high spending cultural tourists, on a geolocated logic. Increase traffic to physical and e-shops. , Z Gen Cultural tourists - "Here and now generation" - Discover new unconventional places to share with friends in their "bubble"

column51:
Destination App is a SaaS solution for destinations... to launch their mobile app (+ responsive website if they wish). 
Standard way of mobile app development for destination is to build it through a software house. That costs a lot, takes time & resources. 
We're changing this, enabling destinations to launch their own mobile & web apps in under 2 weeks, without any need for tendering (monthly cost is lower than printing flyers for some destinations) or spending time on creating a developer specifications.

We originate from a consumer app "WalkABit" which was a platform that was rewarding travelers for their on-trip activities (sightseeing, visiting restaurants, shops etc.).
We've learned that building a travel consumer app requires high volumes of cash to grow globally and extensive sales force. It's also not the best idea to run the travel app during pandemic.
That's why we've pivoted into B2B/B2G, where we can easily acquire destinations and put the responsibility for acquiring users & businesses on them.

Our apps have several unique features that none of the competitors have, like:
- Collection of User Generated content - photos/reviews (with possibility of reusing it by us or the destinations - additional value/revenue stream)
- Proximity messaging - notifications with preprogrammed rules depending on users' location and interests
- Advanced rewards system - gamification of sightseeing
Just to name a few.

In short, we're reducing destinations' cost, time and effort put in creating their own mobile app for visitors and locals.

column50: 100% Proprietary Embedded Edge, Real-Time Smart Sensors for Environmental Monitoring, Indoor Air Quality & Predictive Maintenance.
column51:
Alteria Automation SL is a high-tech engineering company based in the US & Spain since 2017.  Its activity is focused on the development, manufacture and sale of industrial, health monitoring and environmental sensors with embedded-edge architecture, that we could translate as: pre-process at source or smart sensor.  

The company has/is developing various projects with clients such as IBERDROLA, EDP, IBERAPA, ITE, RENFE, REPSOL, Everis, Fujitsu, Mercedes-Benz and PowerLase among others, using proprietary technology and developing custom sensors to solve specific tasks, reaching a turnover of €450k in 2020.

Alteria has a laboratory in facilities that occupy 700 m² equipped with extensive means of rapid prototyping, including a robotic pick & place system for the manufacture of printed circuit boards (PCB) and high-end electronic instrumentation equipment.  Further, we have a production & assembly line for short series.

Since March 2020, Alteria has developed I-ON, a range of intelligent Air Monitoring & Disinfection products, using Ultraviolet C, for closed environments. I-ON AIR has three products: Fixed for air conditioning ducts, Portable for any other close space with no duct ventilation and the Air Quality Multi Sensor System. 

I-ON has already been installed in buildings, hospitals, schools, restaurants, dental clinics, gyms and offices.  

The products are certified by SGS and by INTA (Spanish Ministry of Defense). The competitive advantage is that we certify the disinfection of the air through a range of sensors in the duct and in the room since they measure all the relevant variables (CO2, VOC, Temperature, Humidity) in real time and store it in the server / cloud where they are analyzed and can be viewed from any connected device, with alarms and our Infection Probability Rate Proprietary Algorithm. 

During its four years of life, Alteria Automation has obtained various awards attending four acceleration programs: Bind 4.0, Quake Capital, Trenlab and Digital Attraxion.

It also received the European Seal of Excellence and DEEPTECH4GOOD from the European Commission (H2020) as well as completing the Ultrasound ECSEL Project “SILENSE” and participating in the PENTA Project “PLANtAR”.

Already in 2021 Alteria has received three European awards: one from the INNO4COV-19 in January, and another from the DIGI-B-CUBE initiative this past February and the last from the HUBCAP platform in May 2021, all funded by the European H2020.

column50: A Global brand set out to locate waterfalls; wild swimming; undiscovered walks & heritage in a unique 'bagging' app using gaming/geovation.
column51:
WALKS & WATERFALLS Ltd is a start up, specifically to develop nature based apps and guidebooks, with emphases on sustainable Tourism. Our first release is ‘Walks & Waterfalls’ - an app to locate Waterfalls, Wild swimming and Nature walks all over the world, with Scotland being our first release. The app offers prizes & incentives, allowing users to ‘bag’ (collect) hidden Waterfalls; discover wild swimming places, forrest walks & nearby cultural attractions. The app will feature digital leaderboards; interactive mapping; ability to up-load routes and social media allowing the user to discover their country in a whole new way.  What sets it apart from other apps is the ability to bag locations which is linked to a live leaderboard which in turn is a platform for competitions and promotions.  Currently there is no such app on the market anywhere in the world making this a unique proposition.

At the heart of the app is an environmental message  – in order to preserve and enhance our precious country side  –  Walks & Waterfalls will actively support tree planting and re-wilding schemes. Not only will we give a percentage of profits to our partner 'Trees for Life' but users can also plant trees via the app at the click of a button. Alongside the app, Walks & Waterfalls will publish a series of Guide books  - with maps detailing 100 walks & waterfalls per country -  as well as specially designed photo-books with curated responses by contemporary artist and poets. We have already received a major grant from Creative Scotland to produce the first photobook, see ; www.walksandwaterfalls.com It is the aim to launch the project in Scotland, before  releasing it in the rest of the UK followed by Europe and World Wide to create a truly Global Brand.  Oscar van Heek has a wide ranging backgrounds from film and photography to events management, and digital publishing.  Oscar started work in events management launching such films as Transpotting and The Piano. Oscar progressed to working in film, raising millions in finance for various productions including the feature film; ‘Blinded’ which he produced; and ’27 Missing Kisses’ which he co-produced.   Recently Oscar wrote and directed a short operatic film for Scottish Opera and have since been commissioned to write  a major film adaptation of the opera ‘Carmen’.  Oscar further to continues his work as photographer including work for best selling Guide book ‘Secret Edinburgh’ and has recently shown at RSA

column50: our innovative software, the integrated skills of the founders and our super team
column51:
"The recent pandemic has brought many significant changes in the hospitality industry.
Customers are becoming increasingly demanding and brand reputation has become the main and indispensable factor to distinguish your property from competitors’.

That's why we have come up with an innovative solution for a simple and efficient development of brand reputation and hotel staff soft skills.

Our software is designed to help hotels monitor and manage their online reputation and intercept potential threats of negative reviews when the customer is still in the hotel.
In addition, the software offers high-level training and development tools for all Members of the staff, which will improve interpersonal, communication, relationship, and problem-solving skills through neuroscientific methods. This will contribute to improving the quality of service offered to customers, increasing their satisfaction and, as a result, the overall brand reputation.
The software is also equipped with advanced reporting functions that will allow you to monitor progress and identify areas for improvement for both brand reputation and staff soft skills. In this way, you can make targeted decisions to improve both factors and increase the success of your hotel.
In conclusion, our software is an easy, powerful and intuitive solution fora  complete digital optimization of the team and for strongly and consistently developing the hotel's brand reputation."

column51:
We create audio guided tours to discover points of interest of city centres globally, and guide users with audio directions while they walk, run, bike or wheel chair. 

After selecting the tour, users are guided by our audio guides in 10 languages with no need of interaction with the phone. Tours are categorized by physical intensity, cultural theme and type of terrain, so to fit user's capabilities. 

We have both a B2C and a B2B offer. In the B2C offer we produce a tour and make it available to users, either for free or in the premium subscription. In the B2B offer we create a tour for our client, mostly a muncipality or a hotel, and make it available in the app to all users or only to those with the password to unlock it. 

With over 300 cities and thousands tours in the app, we have developed a scalable and reliable method to create feasible tours with relevant cultural content that satisfiy our 100.000 users.

column50: We create geolocated apps that gamify sectors such as tourism, marketing and education using geolocation and AR/VR/MR technologies.
column51:
We create gamification experiences to improve user engagement either for brands and tourism.

Play&go experience is a tool through which we create customized mobile apps that improves the user experience, based on gamification, geolocation and augmented, virtual and mixed reality. 

With geolocated data we provide the user information of interest getting more interaction, fun and immersion, in augmented, virtual and mixed reality. This kind of mechanics has been popularized through games like Pokemon Go.

It is a new channel of promotion and communication for brands and organizations, obtaining geolocated information from users, both socio-demographic and psychographic, for the design of hyper-segmented geomarketing strategies.

Through different stories, the user can follow routes in order to fulfill certain missions. Thanks to the 3D map users will be able to go out in search of the missions scattered around the place to visit. These can be located in places of interest and/or sponsored points with information and photos.

Each mission can contain different objectives: to use the items that have been collected along the way in an augmented reality test, to take a selfie and share it in social networks, to evaluate and comment on the places visited, to recognize an image or symbol or to check in at a specific location.

Depending on the needs of the experience, there are several game modes available: explorer, adventure or competition. It supports both indoor and outdoor experiences.

column51:
inReception is the one-stop shop for vacation rentals, a single app to manage, promote and distribute non-hotel accommodations such as b&b, farmhouses, holiday flats and apartments. 

Manage every aspect of your property's daily operations on the go, from bookings and payments to reports and finance. It is a SaaS solution to improve and simplify hospitality business management saving time, effort and money.

inReception is:
- a management solution tailored to the needs of small accommodation owners
- a booking engine to get direct reservation with real-time confirmation and no commision
- a channel manager to automatically update availability and prices on sales channels (Booking.com, Expedia, Airbnb, Google, etc)
- a platform to create destination portals

An owner will be able to manage:
- Dashboard with instant view of sales, revenue and occupancy
- Price List and Season Management
- Reservations, Check-in and Check-out
- Manage Rooms Assignment
- Guest Folio, Payments Balance
- Arrival and Departure List
- Invoices, Notes and Cash Book
- Contact Management, Newsletter, Marketing List

column50: It is an all in one s/w to manage all type of collectibles and the workflow related (cataloging; reports; documents production & sharing)
column51:
Through our integrated software we offer:

1) A Collection Management system for all type of collectibles (fine art, numismatic, stamps, antiques, natural goods, archeology, watches, jewellery, design ...)
2) A patent pending algorithm that produces a digital fingerprint of the object to search damages on insured items supporting the claim process.
3) Forms to speed up the workflow and the information exchange, dedicated to condition reporting, appraisals, restorations, exhibition, insurances, logistics.
4) Invitation system and permission control: Our software has a multilayer structure suitable for complex structures (as insurance companies and brokers). SpeakART has a smart management of users and can open the system to third party interaction through invitations. Every user can limit the actions of his "guest users" and allow them to work on selected objects of his profile. 
5) an innovative tool to manage all the insurance process: upload of offers and policies, management of the insured objects, production of output as insurance certificates and inventories, analysis of data collected.

column51:
Vi presentiamo il nostro progetto di punta, i:  *CAMP TREESHARING* 
Mettete a reddito i vostri alberi. https://fb.watch/gTrOFhgmJ2/

Stiamo realizzando una rete nazionale di Camp Treesharing (attualmente in trattative su 71 proprietà boschive).

Le attività nei Camp:
Arrampicare e dormire sugli alberi, Glamping, attività olistiche, foraging, disc golf, matrimoni ed eventi nei boschi, concerti nella natura e conto degli alberi, ma tanto altro ancora. 

Per chi  Possiede degli alberi privati, boschi, aree verdi alberate, una volta creato il Camp, attraverso i nostri vari canali di promozione e consulenza turistica andremmo a veicolare pacchetti turistici nelle varie location.

Principalmente noi siamo una IDS Internet Distribution System; Lavorando facendo incubazione B2B (attività, servizi, esperienze, accoglienza), ed accelerando i prodotti nella nostra rete B2C e B2G. (Tour Operator, agenzia viaggi, reti welfare aziendali, associazioni, community d'acquisto, Travel influencer, consulenti di viaggio, Travel advisor, regioni, provincie, comuni, città, borghi).

Siamo specializzati in: eco turismo, sport outdoor, adventure, escursionismo e attività olistiche. Tutto all'interno di scenari Eco&Green sostenibili, legati a 42 aree tematiche esperienziali.

column51:
World4All allows users with reduced mobility to have at hand, in a simple and intuitive way, a network of accessible realities, selected by our team.

Tourist destinations, accommodation, transport, restaurants, beaches, shops, art exhibitions, concerts, discos, tours and much more will now be accessible, to rediscover a reality you have forgotten.

But Also:

Personalized experiences
We create group experiences in the area in the name of inclusion.

Consulting

column51:
Most media , travel, mobility and hospitality companies lack efficient tools to provide to their customers localized and personalized recommendations through all digital and physical customer touch-points. 
myLike offers a global content creation and sharing platform to enable those companies to generate and monetize their own Branded Digital Travel Guides. With myLike they can engage with their customers along the whole customer journey with personally curated destination specific recommendations for locations, experiences, activities and services. Customers can use the tips right on their smart phone to plan their stay, explore the destination on the go and add their own impressions using myLike as their personal travel planner. 
The myLike business model is to license a SaaS based global platform to businesses either as an open solution or closed White Label version. In addition the tips and referrals provided by he business can be booked and generate affiliate revenues for the business and myLike. myLike has validated its business concept with paying customers and successfully tested its product as mobile app, website plug-in, dashboard and integrable PWA (progressive web application) in eleven main European languages.

column50: Gotikket seeks to digitise transport providers in emerging markets, to empower users to make informed choices including environmental impact
column51:
Gotikket is a mobile first user experience, from which users can determine the best route and price across several end-to-end travel services.  

Our aim is to reduce the pent-up frustration in Europe in the process of searching for and buying transport tickets.  We also aim to 'empower' our customers to make better informed decisions.  Not only with the practical matters of route, provider, price, and availability for example, but also in the environmental impact of a given journey.  Beyond the provision of CO2 information, we aim to provide the means to allow carbon off-setting, for those customers who wish to do so.
 
Our roots began with Buses which we will continue to build on both in the numbers of Operators on the platform and in our geographical coverage across the region.  Our platform and business operating model have been designed to scale rapidly. Our immediate focus is the emerging markets of Central and Eastern Europe, where the underdeveloped, highly fragmented market provides a clear opportunity of Gotikket: the migration to Digital based ticketing.  We are exploring other European markets.

Gotikket began its 'soft' launch into Bulgaria and Serbia early in 2020.  We adapted rapidly to the impact of COVID-19 and have continued to make appropriate investments into the platform's functionality for example, displaying the amount of CO2 used on a journey.  We have continued to build the 'inventory' with a specific focus on National and Inter-City providers. We have continued to sell tickets.

From the outset our team have all been remote and are based in several countries across Europe, as a result, they have not been impacted by the Global Pandemic. This team has a wide range of skills, experience and local market knowledge which are ‘welded’ together in an open, mutually supportive culture.   Gotikket is headquartered in the UK, its main operations are in Bulgaria and Finnland. 

At Gotikket, we want to improve our customers experience, to empower them to make ‘smarter’ decisions. And to play our part in reducing the impacts of climate change.  Gotikket – the future of transport booking.

column50: Estética de la web y nuevas funcionalidades como el mapa del entorno de cada propiedad, sistema de votación entre amigos, palabras clave...
column51:
OxigenoRural.com: el buscador más completo e innovador del turismo rural en España.

De cara a los viajeros, nuestro objetivo es convertirnos en su web de referencia y ser el único sitio que visite cuando quiera reservar. Para ello, hemos mejorado la experiencia del viajero al reservar:
- No le cobramos ninguna comisión ni gastos de gestión. 
- Mostramos los precios finales desde el comienzo de la búsqueda. Sin sorpresas posteriores ni confusiones (no damos precios aproximados).
- Todas las casas se pueden reservar online. Reserva inmediata VS reserva bajo confirmación del propietario (pueden rechazar reservas).
- Sistema de búsquedas por palabras clave personalizadas por cada propietario.
- Pueden visualizar en un mapa los lugares de interés cercanos al alojamiento recomendados directamente por el propietario (útil antes de reservar y durante los días de hospedaje).
- Pueden crear una lista de casas favoritas, compartirla con sus amigos y votar todos ellos puntuando cada alojamiento. Reservar su casa rural es muy sencillo gracias a nuestro planificador de viajes.

Y para los propietarios, tenemos también muchas ventajas: 
- Hemos creado esta web que se adapta a las preferencias y necesidades de cada propietario.
- Pueden anunciarse tanto en el plan gratuito a comisión por reserva (del 10 % + IVA) como con diferentes planes por suscripción de pago (mensual, semestral o anual) sin ningún tipo de comisión.
- Pueden mantener contacto telefónico con el viajero, acceso a su propia web y redes sociales contratando un plan de suscripción, estando además mejor posicionados en las búsquedas de los viajeros.
- Cobrarán sus reservas antes de la llegada del huésped, garantizando que se cumpla la política de cancelación que hayan seleccionado. 
- Con fotos y vídeos ilimitados.
- Con mapa del entorno.
- Con calendario I Cal sincronizado. 
- Con chat de mensajes y muchos otros servicios.

column50: Everywhere TEW promotes a single platform web and mobile for the productivity and wellbeing of Company
column51:
Everywhere TEW promotes a new work format in companies, enhancing team productivity by improving work-life balance.
With Covid19, companies have been forced to temporarily reorganize their work, allowing them to discover the benefits of remote working, both for the workers, in terms of work-life balance, and for the companies, in terms of management costs and engagement.
Everywhere TEW offers international companies innovative solutions for working, personal and professional growth in highly cultural, social and naturalistic territories.
The future of work is #everywhere: it makes no sense to impose working hours on colleagues and not to foster an environment of well-being, serenity, and trust, which would naturally improve productivity. Everywhere TEW offers companies growth paths for their teams, structured on different stages in Italy, working in work hubs, co-working, so as to foster that social and cultural contamination so that employees (the good ones!) feel a part of the company's mission.
The companies' HR department can access their own dashboard on the Everywhere platform, where they can choose the training and professional path for their employees that best suits their growth objectives, while simultaneously monitoring and analysing results based on specific KPIs.

column50: EcoBeam is providing a new platform that allows users to offer their unused parking spaces and EV chargers, being the first one in Germany.
column51:
At EcoBeam GmbH, we offer a platform named Buddyp2p that allows homeowners to rent out their unused parking spaces or their EV chargers for others to rent. This means that drivers can now find and rent private parking spaces or EV chargers.

The advantage for drivers is that they will be able to find affordable parking spaces and EV chargers in better locations.

Meanwhile, homeowners can earn additional income from their unused parking spaces and also generate more money by selling their home-produced electricity for their own desired price instead of selling it to the government at a really low price.

Rickshaw provides an environmentally friendly way for explorers to go on live virtual tours and experiences anywhere and any time, using their mobile devices, while simultaneously providing a source of income for individuals around the world who sign up as Rickshaw guides.

column51:
Terra Study: Your All-in-One Platform for Studying in Spain
With a catalog of over 300 schools and 5,000 courses, Terra Study makes it easy to explore, compare, and book the perfect study program. Find real student reviews, book language courses, calculate exact program costs (with or without accommodation), search for flights, and get visa information—all in one place. Our platform provides everything you need: school details, course specifics, accommodation options, flights, visa updates.

Why Choose Terra Study?
? Completely Free Service – No extra fees! We offer direct school prices.
? Expert Guidance – Our consultants assist with school selection, visas, student residency, and paperwork.
? Convenient Booking – Reserve your course, find affordable flights, and secure budget-friendly accommodation—all through us.
? Exclusive Discounts – Get up to 7% off on most courses.
? Access to Universities – We facilitate admission to all Spanish universities.

With 20+ years of experience in the study abroad sector, we have helped over 5,000 students come to Spain to learn the language and advance their education.

Our Mission: Making your study abroad journey simple and stress-free!
Our Philosophy: No borders—education for everyone, everywhere!

Start your journey with Terra Study today!

column50: We are a MAASIA (Mobility As A Service In Africa)  with different mobility adapted to the needs of local inhabitants
column51:
Dakar is a rising African city where everybody as to move on a daily basis but with system D and sometimes bad quality of services…. Yssah allows people to take control of each day , go to work, drop off kids at school, go to the airport, moving house, have delivery of big packages (TV, matresses…) share a trip… All those services that Yssah propose and will propose in a near future. All these features will be in the Yssah apps in development now. The app will answer different needs of the population, subscriptions, packages, provision with a driver during « x » time, days. In a short time, Yssah will deploy a green fleet with hybrid and electric vehicles to reducer cost of energy, lower sales prices to address different segments of customers, lower pollution in the city.
Part of the fleet will be Yssah acquisition but to scale the business so as the fleet, we are signing revenu sharing partnership with cars owners who put their vehicles in Yssah fleet. We also have independent drivers with cars that joined progressively our fleet. The pain point that we see in this model all over the world and especially in Africa is the training, so the quality of our service & image could be impacted. That’s why we put a big effort on training and we have set up a license driving based on point like called « Yssah 3 C’s = Conduite (driving) / Comportement (behavior) / Communication… »

We’ ve launch Yssah  a year ago after 4 years of market studies, business plan slowed by Covid…
Our vision is to change Mobility in Africa and our mission to improve Senegalese local inhabitants movements.
We’ve started with 2 drivers and now have 20 drivers.

Our Business Model:

We have an hybrid business model with :
-	Cars purchase
-	Revenu sharing
-	Independant drivers with cars

Our clients:

Our customers are : 
-	Expatriate (European, African, American…)
-	Local inhabitants
-	Tourists
-	Family with kids
-	Firms (NGO, Hotels, …)


Our Offers:

We have several offers : 
-	Simple ride
-	Kids transportation
-	Subscription
-	Touristic circuit
-	Airport shuttle
-	Hire car with a driver

Onboard / Security:
-	Comfort on board with = water, wifi
-	Security = gps trackers on each cars

We manage the activity with a tool that we build with filemaker pro. This tool allow us to dispatch rides to drivers, to have a customers, drivers, cars data base, follow our depenses, see reports… So we use :
-	Filemaker pro (manage activity)
-	Google sheet (Dashboards, KPI’s)

The information is updated at Airline’s PSS / NG PSS pace (push-ready) while every airline is the single source of truth of their own content. (This system continuously synchronizes with each airline’s PSS, allowing them to remain the authoritative source for their data)
This turns into a superb Customer experience by providing accurate real-time information delivered in milliseconds & multiple responses in one multi query request while the Airline gets a significant reduction in costs, environmental impact and customer frustration.

We are in early discussion with tier VCs, property developers, and notable brands including Coca Cola. We are also meeting strategic investors and large hospitality chains who can partner with us to accelerate the roll-out of HelloHub globally.

column51:
Xplorer è una soluzione cross-platform pensata per rivoluzionare il mondo del turismo italiano. Nasce come supporto per tutti coloro che stanno pianificando o facendo un viaggio ma anche come strumento di valorizzazione dei territori.
La vision che caratterizza la nostra idea è quella di riuscire a  far diventare questa piattaforma un importante strumento di promozione per tutti quei territori ad alte possibilità turistiche ma a basse capacità ricettive. 
L'obiettivo è quello di fornire così una rilevante vetrina sul web a numerosi imprenditori locali e luoghi di interesse, tutto ciò perseguendo una mission di rivalorizzazione di tutti quei territori italiani che fanno del turismo la loro principale economia, abbinandoci una particolare attenzione da parte del team all’implementazione di sistemi innovativi che semplifichino il percorso che il cliente/viaggiatore deve compiere per raccogliere informazioni o effettuare prenotazioni. 

La soluzione è quindi un concept incrementale e scalabile che possa con facilità essere integrata su territori diversi con esigenze diverse.

 Pronti per il turismo del futuro? Noi sì

column30: Price comparison for public transport throughout Germany
column42: Giulio Montoli, Edmondo Sparano, Giulia Fazzini, Michela Masoni, Giulio Maria Pezzini, Arunsankar Periyasami, Elena Martelli, Dario Baroni, Andrea Tripodo, Alessandro N. Ferretti, LVenture Group API Access

column50: Plain and simple: we are cheaper and more comprehensive than any competitor.
column51:
In Germany, the public transport system is complicated and expensive. For years, people have been complaining about this problem, even calling it the "tariff jungle". 

Bahnbrechend analyzed the underlying structure of the majority of tariff systems in Germany and found several ways to achieve cheaper prices by combining multiple tickets. These combinations are tricks only some people know about and no competitor can calculate them. Some require travellers to be members of groups, like students or owners of discount cards, others require journeys to pass through certain areas or the train to be of a certain type. However, using these combinations does not have any downsides, it just costs less.

From our research we developed systems, that can calculate cheapest combinations automatically and fast. It works by using endpoints of the apps of over 50 transport networks. We process and analyze the data and display the cheapest combination of tickets to the user. Effectively, users can use the system similarly to known travel route calculators.

In our research, we also found several data sources that are scattered throughout many apps. These data sources can provide valuable information about trains and stations. 

Our business model is divided into two phases. The first phase will be funded by advertisements and focussed on improving the product. We will use Google Adsense for fast integration, but may add other services.

The second phase will add a premium system, that gives subscribers access to other features. Depending on the feedback from the first phase, these features may vary, but we have several ideas.

column51:
Promote Italy as a golf destination for foreign golfers, both individual and groups. We emphasize Italy for its characteristics as a different and sustainable golf destination in comparison to the many popular golf travel destinations in the world. The difference is in the history of the Italian golf clubs, their way to operate and their size. In addition, most Italian golf clubs are part of the local community and not brought by outsiders with the intent to create new structures for the travel business.
Golf Breaks Italy selects the service providers (golf courses, hotels and tours) from those that represent quality, care for details and real Italian elements, environmental responsibility, and are overall an expression of genuine Italianness.
We also publish written material to inform the clients about the territory and the culture of the area to where they will travel.

column51: Babaiola is an application that helps GLBTQ+ community users to find gay bars, clubs, events and other meeting points in the city that users are travelling thanks to a specific map. Moreover, Babaiola App allows to search for people (local people) near the users - thanks to geolocation - in order to exchange information about the best things to do during the travel or to meet each other. So it meas that the application has a city chat where users can chat with other babaiola application users and share his/her status to share voluntarily own position for example (like a story). More, Babaiola App has a page profile where users can share photos or videos of his/her own vacation, It's an another way to connect the people - sharing the best moments and own travel experience. The application provides, for each city, a complete and update list of the biggest GLBTQ+ events/bar/club/saunas, thanks to babaiola proprietary algorithm that analyzes and processes a vast database, selecting exclusively information for GLBTQ+ users. Our business model is based on: a paid premium services for users and sale of advertising space or banner in the application.

column50: Having in one single digital tool what travellers are searching and what hotels need in order to make reservations and purchase activities
column51:
Identify has created a solution that saves front-desk-staff time and delights guests by offering cultural information, local recommendations and branded itineraries.

Identify's app and Identify's Guest Leisure Experience app bring together the demand of travellers for tailor-made plans to do during their trip and the hotel staff’s need to provide information that fully satisfies their guests. 

We have, on the one hand, travellers looking for plans and recommendations and on the other hand, hotels’ staff that give a service that doesn’t fully satisfy guests. So: we have to bring them together. How? With one single tool. 

For the user, Identify is the new travel app to discover more than 300,000 cultural hotspots around the world. A digital guide with information, audios, images, activities and rewards to enjoy knowing and identifying cultural elements of each place they visit.

For companies, Identify is the digital platform with which to provide added value to their customers, offering activities and personalised cultural content to enjoy their stay and, at the same time, increasing their sales and receive information about the behaviour of their target.

With Identify’s platforms, travellers and companies involved in tourism meet around culture.

column30: kidiwe.fr simplifies the organization and management of school trips
column42: Giulio Montoli, Edmondo Sparano, Giulia Fazzini, Michela Masoni, Giulio Maria Pezzini, Arunsankar Periyasami, Elena Martelli, Dario Baroni, Andrea Tripodo, Alessandro N. Ferretti, LVenture Group API Access
column50: With Kidiwe, the teacher can now create, organize, and inform (with parents) about the school trip. Kidiwe takes care of everything !!!
column51:
For teachers, organizing a trip (even just for one dat) is synonymous with "extra workload"
What to do, book it, and finally collect the regulations from the parents of students concerned by the exit.

We have observed that these processes strongly discourage teachers. The latter have very few solutions to facilitate the organization of the school trip.

Today, the conquest of culture and discovery are major challenges in schools. These intangible investments promote the awareness of schools.

The school principal of my children faced this problem. I proposed to him to develop a digital tool to optimize the progress of a school trip. On the one hand for parents by giving the possibility to regulate on-line and to have access to all the information and on the other hand, to the teachers who will save time in the research of the providers and will benefit from a total dematerialization thanks To the platform.

The teacher connects to ecole.kidiwe.fr, chooses an activity (museum, zoo, leisure park, theater, worker, discovery of a company or a laboratory), selects a date and sends the information to Parents concerned. If the teacher needs a mode of transportation (coach, train, metro) we take care to reserve it.

The parents receive the card of the exit, and pay the exit of their children on line.

My job in Kidiwe, are marketing and business. I call the schools to become users of Kidiwe.
column55: School and parents - Kidiwe is in fact a B2B2C, we send our service to school, but the parents pay on line the trip.

column50: We harness the power of short videos with with a metasearch approach (= light structure + no competition with travel giants).
column51:
We adapt the booking of travel & leisure experiences for the social media generation.

beder is a video-based travel & leisure booking platform - web + app. Users can explore a destination and get inspired through short videos uploaded by other users, but in a structured manner, like a travel guide. All the videos are linked to different reservation options from different providers (like a metasearch model) so users can book the experience they are watching in the short videos, selecting the best offer or the one that is more suitable for them. We work with activities, tours, hotels and restaurant.

beder is born from the knowledge that first generation travel booking tools are outdated. The tourism industry continues to bet on photos and text while younger generations consume video content and use social media for inspiration, although inefficiently as it is unstructured, without a travel focus, person-centric and without booking tools. On the other hand, most content creators do not monetize due to lack of followers or contact with brands. Travel experience providers (accommodation, activities, restaurants) struggle to reach digital audiences in an effective manner. 

Long story short, users want to consume content they enjoy, and be able to have all the needed information at hand to decide if they want to be there and have different booking options at hand to select the provider that fits their needs.

column30: We help people with disabilities enjoy tourism independently.
column42: Giulio Montoli, Edmondo Sparano, Giulia Fazzini, Michela Masoni, Giulio Maria Pezzini, Arunsankar Periyasami, Elena Martelli, Dario Baroni, Andrea Tripodo, Alessandro N. Ferretti, LVenture Group API Access
column50: Travelin is designed with Universal Design and pursues for companies the goals of the 2030 Agenda.
column51:
Travelin is the inclusive platform for customizing and sharing cultural and experiential itineraries. We enable people with disabilities and special needs, thanks to AI, to customize the tourist itinerary according to their accessibility needs. 
About 1 in 3 people in Europe have accessibility-related needs. This target group includes people with sensory and cognitive motor disabilities, people with dietary needs, including people with celiac disease or intolerance, and people with other types of needs, such as the elderly, families with young children, or even those traveling with their pets. 
Both businesses and public administration fail to ensure free tourist autonomy for everyone because without advanced technology behind them mapping the accessibility of places and events is costly, and standardization of the mapping collection flow has not yet been achieved. The lack of standardization and technological innovation make it difficult and stressful for people with disabilities or special needs to make independent travel arrangements. 
Travelin provides people with access to tourism accessibility information through an AI system that collects and processes 3 different types of data: objective accessibility data, user-specific needs data, and navigation flow data.
This project has a strong social impact because it aims for equitable access to cultural and experiential tourism and also makes possible the development of slow and responsible tourism.
The business model is aimed at all SMEs looking for projects and solutions to communicate their social impact to their target users thus demonstrating credibility and reliability and to include them within the social report. 
In Europe, investments in CSR (Corporate Social Responsibility) have an annual growth of 42% (2013) and have a current economic value of €715 billion.
To position ourselves as a market leader in social sustainability we aim at networking between associations (which to date in Europe lead the market), companies and stakeholders. 
We are a company because we strongly believe that bringing into the market a niche that has always been excluded from it is the key to give it social weight and economic importance: thus to actively participate in the creation of a fair and accessible society for all.
column55: SME - CSR (Corporate social responsibility)

column50: ElasticHotel provides both software and professionals offered to customers through simple monthly installments with no minimum commitment.
column51:
ElasticHotel provides an end-to-end revenue management solution that helps hotels increase their revenue for a fraction of the traditional cost by scaling hiring, procurement and technology and sharing access across multiple independent hotels.
The reason why we created ElasticHotel is that while tools, professionals and training required to run successful revenue management operations can bring significant benefits to independent hotels (+20% in revenue), they are also extremely expensive when applied individually ($80K+/year). In fact, only 0.3% of independent hotels in Italy are currently embracing revenue management.
