column51:
HitReview è l'app che accorcia le distanze tra Scouter ed artisti

Talent Scout:
HitReview è un gestionale leggero per Label e distributori, che permette di ascoltare in modo ordinato tutti gli artisti registrati sulla piattaforma.
Tramite la creazione del profilo, gli artisti possono inviare un brano ed inserire i dati relativi alla loro carriera musicale.
Collegando social e piattaforme di streaming, è possibile evidenziare le iscrizioni sui social network, le pubblicazioni catalogate in annualità, gli stream registrati; per passare poi allo
storico concerti (luogo, data e numero di paganti), fino ad arrivare a segnalare eventuali traguardi e riconoscimenti ottenuti.
HitReview si propone pertanto di sostituire il metodo ormai antiquato delle caselle postale intasate da file di bassa qualità, tramite un gestionale intuitivo.
Tramite la piattaforma di HitReview sarà possibile ascoltare e valutare i brani sottoposti
dagli artisti senza dover scaricare nulla, accedendo facilmente a tutte le informazioni
legate all'artista dal suo profilo.
Tramite HitReview è possibile inoltre catalogare gli artisti, filtrare le ricerche in base alle "proprie esigenze " ed attingere ad un bacino di musica nuova non influenzata e contaminata da meccanismi di sponsorizzazioni e/o playlist editoriali.
Il talent può effettuare una ricerca dinamica grazie ad un filtro.
Attingendo al database artisti, sarà possibili categorizzare tutte le informazioni messe a disposizione dell'artista.
Lo strumento, permette anche di avere una panoramica delle nuove leve e tramite meticolose proiezioni, in futuro, sarà anche possibile anticipare i trend, prima ancora della
pubblicazione sulle più tradizionali piattaforme di streaming.
Inoltre offre la possibilità ai talent scout di contattare direttamente e privatamente un artista di proprio interesse, e di monetizzare per ogni ascolto durante la sua attività di
valutazione.

Artista:
Può  caricare un proprio brano sulla piattaforma ed avere la certezza di essere ascoltati e valutati in massimo una settimana da una giuria composta da cinque esperti.
Il servizio HitReview si basa sul caricamento e valutazione del brano.
La seconda fase, avviene sul minutaggio della canzone e sarà possibile seguire in
diretta lo stato di avanzamento del processo di valutazione.
Il giudice, pertanto, avrà la possibilità di ascoltare il brano e lasciare un commento
dettagliato sul brano ed una valutazione complessiva.

column30: We Create and Organize the Best in presence and Online Activities for Group
column42: Giulio Montoli, Edmondo Sparano, Giulia Fazzini, Michela Masoni, Giulio Maria Pezzini, Arunsankar Periyasami, Elena Martelli, Dario Baroni, Andrea Tripodo, Alessandro N. Ferretti, LVenture Group API Access
column50: We have started organizing unique live events online, and we are developing the platform for the Netflix of experiences.
column51:
We started organizing events, and we ended up some of the best events on earth, as recognized by some authorities, experts and medias (link to references below, we were awarded as one of the best startups on food&wine, semifinalists as best storytelling on local food, TripAdvisor thinks we are one of the 10 "one of a kind experiences to do in Italy"). Since 2016 we have organized for companies and tour operators events that involved 3k people, and the feedback is really great. While continuing our activities as events organizers, we suddenly realized that it is difficult to find interesting activities for teams/groups, and those who organize unique activities have hard times marketing them. Esperienza.com is a marketplace of B2B activities (we have bought the domain because we think that it is relevant to have the right name). On esperienza.com you can find unique activities for groups (MICE, Tour operators etc) having always something new to propose. 
Due to Covid we have pivoted our model from the marketplace of unique activities for MICE to unique online and in-presence activities for MICE. We are currently meeting with the top agencies we can partner with for their company events. In Italy last year more than 400.000 events with more than 10 pax were organized. We aim at 10% of total available market and to scale in potentially all other countries, the model is perfectly scalable. 
For this reason we have started looking around to find perfect environments where we could develop the model to scale global, and a clear goal od FTMO is to support startups having global ambitions: we have global ambitions as the service we provide is needed and the market is still very fragmented (the need was clearly intercepted both through our direct experience and by interviewing agencies and large companies).

column51: Seashare è la piattaforma italiana di Boat pooling che mira a rendere più sostenibile e più accessibile la mobilità marittima (trasporto/turismo su imbarcazioni). Sostanzialmente viene offerto un servizio online di intermediazione automatica tra gli utenti in possesso di un'imbarcazione, con loro stessi alla guida, e tutti gli utenti in cerca di soluzioni di viaggio marittimo da condividere, il tutto basandosi sulla sostenibilità (tutela dei mari), sulla flessibilità e sulla condivisione (di esperienze e di spese). seashare apre anche la piattaforma ai soggetti professionisti del settore (società di noleggio, charter ecc..) ai quali offre un gestionale per la semplificazione e lo sviluppo delle loro attività. L'obiettivo a lungo termine di Seashare è quello di aiutare le persone a viaggiare liberamente e semplicemente sulle acque di tutto il mondo, creando un'esperienza unica basata sulla tutela dei mari e sulla condivisione.

column30: Busforfun.com is an innovative B2B green mobility
column42: Giulio Montoli, Edmondo Sparano, Giulia Fazzini, Michela Masoni, Giulio Maria Pezzini, Arunsankar Periyasami, Elena Martelli, Dario Baroni, Andrea Tripodo, Alessandro N. Ferretti, LVenture Group API Access
column50: WeTheFun helps to engage the youngest generations, contributing to generate the fans of the future!
column51:
BusForFun is the first B2B green mobility company that organizes and manages transport during major events. 
Thanks to a combination of high tech-startup, e-commerce-platform and transportation company, it is going to establish European largest bus network for events in the short time. And thanks to a powerful search engine, business intelligence, an user-friendly booking system and an extensive route network, the company offers travellers the opportunity to experience the world of fun with lower fares. BusForFun aims to implement technologies and innovative systems of integrated mobility, contributing to the decongestion of public transport services and of private vehicular traffic (which risks the quality of nature and the quality of air, as well as the quality of life in general) to sustain the transition to a more sustainable transport system.
BusForFun provides customers with great offers at lowest budget, through smart network planning, dynamic price management and an adaptive web engine. His platform is where the innovation and start-up spirit meet the experience and know-how of traditional bus companies and travel agencies.

WeTheFun is the lastest, green mobility project that operates with a 4 pillars community approach based on EXPERIENCE, DATA, SUSTAINABILITY and REVENUE. We aim to deliver a full-on, sustainable and stress-free live sport experience, enjoyed in a safe e reserved environment. 
A special event especially addressed at families, young people and the no habitual target.
Thanks to BusForFun digital registration platform, every sport event represents an opportunity to collect and organize users’ useful data. We create detailed and intuitive reports too!   
WeTheFun helps to engage the youngest generations, contributing to generate the fans of the future. By reaching families and unusual targets, we create a potential new community of sports passionates and ignite a loyalty process. The target is also sensible to merchandising, as a souvenir of the experience, so it is something that could be further developed. WeTheFun uses BusForFun’s intuitive digital platform to book and buy its services easily and safely. 
Here you can even buy the full package: travel + entrance ticket.

The company is currently investing in FlexyMob, an innovative tailor-made digital mobility platform, to respond to the new and changing demands of mobility, that combines mobility solutions based on the community needs (Companies, Stadiums, Venues, Cities,...).

column50: the only  search engine for charter/rental boats deals in the world where the users get redirected to the site of the offering company
column51:
Boatsandgo is the first web platform that aggregates and compares the offers for charter and rental boats all around the world. It is, therefore a system based on data metasearch, which collects the offers from providers (OTAs- on line travel agencies or charter companies and fleets) and aggregates them through a search engine designed to help the user to easily organize a boat vacation. 
 Our search engine, based on an specifically developed algorithm (Copyright 2020, all rights reserved), searches the web to find the offers matching the user’s selected filters.
Filters like dates, type of boat, price and others are available.
The system will give back an aggregation page with the results matching the user’s search criteria.
All offers will be displayed with the logo of the offering fleet/agency. 
The user can click on the offer and directly contact the company.
Boatsandgo does not perform reservations.
Boatsandgo does not charge the users.
Boatsandgo is also a SaaS for operators in blue tourism, with freemium entry level, suitable for small and micro companies that want to digitalise their business.

column42: Giulio Montoli, Edmondo Sparano, Giulia Fazzini, Michela Masoni, Giulio Maria Pezzini, Arunsankar Periyasami, Elena Martelli, Dario Baroni, Andrea Tripodo, Alessandro N. Ferretti, LVenture Group API Access
column50: In ViaggItalia l'operatore turistico può trovare un'offerta turistica completa e una tecnologia avanzata
column51: Viaggitalia è una startup innovativa nata nel 2020 dall’esperienza di un gruppo di manager e imprenditori specializzati in vari settori, dalla tecnologia al marketing con una esperienza specifica nel settore del turismo digitale e del turismo incoming. Forniamo servizi per gli operatori del settore turistico (es: DMS - Destination Managment System) ed è è un Tour Operator incoming, vende prodotto turistico attraverso canali tradizionali e digitali. Uno dei canali di vendita è il Portale CLiCK iT che vende prodotti turistici di tutte le tipologie: notti, esperienze, pacchetti tutti racchiusi all'interno della logica Undertourism (si punta diventare il canale italiano di riferimento per questa tipologia di turismo) e la tecnologia utilizzata è un DMS (Destination Managment System); La parte tecnologica (facilmente integrabile con i vari siti già esistenti) viene inoltre offerta in service alle piccole DMO e alla DMC che hanno la necessità di trasformare i propri portali di promozione in portali di promo-commercializzazione. Collegata alla tecnologia viene dato anche un servizio di assistenza continua svolto da professionisti del settore che aiutano le destinazioni a comporre e inserire nel migliore dei modi la propria offerta turistica all'interno della piattaforma. A tutto questo si collega poi il progetto CLiCKer, attraverso il quale diamo la possibilità a giovani ragazzi esperiti di turismo che vogliono creare la propria professione, di diventare esperti di destinazioni turistiche; Seguiti da una figura di riferimento, inizieranno attraverso la tecnologia e i nostri servizi a lavorare operativamente nei territori per migliorare l'offerta turistica.

column30: ConciIta allows hotels to earn money by recommending the best restaurants.
column42: Giulio Montoli, Edmondo Sparano, Giulia Fazzini, Michela Masoni, Giulio Maria Pezzini, Arunsankar Periyasami, Elena Martelli, Dario Baroni, Andrea Tripodo, Alessandro N. Ferretti, LVenture Group API Access
column50: There isn't any apps now who allows Hotels to earn money recommending restaurants to the guests. What's interesting? The potential numbers!
column51:
Concita is a web based app, who allows hotels and b&b to earn money by recommending the best restaurants in town to their guests.
Concita can work by itself, without the necessary intervention of the hotelier, or with the intervention of the latter, who can incentivize his guests to use the service. The higher the contribution of the hotelier, the higher the conversion rate.
But, above all, he will no longer have to offer this service for free!
Concita works as follows.
The guest, without downloading any app, with his smartphone camera, scans a QR Code found in his room and he has access to list of the best restaurants affiliated with Concita and selected by the Hotel.
Once they have chosen the one they like, they enter the booking details and send the request directly to the restaurant. Received the booking request, the restaurant will be able to accept it, reject it, or propose an alternative time.
For each seat booked by the guests through Concita, the restaurant will pay to Concita 3.50 Euros. 
Concita will transfer 2.00 Euros to the hotelier, withholding its commission of 1.50 Euros.
Concita allows hoteliers to make a further profit than that obtained from the mere sale of the rooms, significantly affecting the revenue and directly proportional to the number of rooms owned. In fact, greater is the number of hotel rooms owned, greater will be the number of people hosted, greater, once more, will be the number of potential customers who will book a seat through Concita.
The restaurant, on one hand, will ncrease the number of selected customers with a high propensity to consume, such as tourists and travellers; on the other hand, they will pay a one-off commission, without fixed subscription costs and without being forced, directly and / or indirectly, to apply discounts from 20 to 50% on the final bill.
With Concita, everyone gains: hoteliers, collecting a commission on bookings; restaurant, filling their tables; guests, receiving a reliable service which they will certainly like.
To sum up Concita's function in a few words, it could be said that "we digitized the old tip of the hotel concierge"; we have digitized one of the oldest professions in the world (and that's not what you are thinking about!).

column50: It is the first company which aggregates all service providers into one platform for families with babies traveling in Europe.
column51:
The problem: 
Traveling with bulky baby essentials is exhausting and expensive for families with babies. 
The solution: 
Renting baby equipment from locals at holiday destinations to travel light, safe and comfortable.
How it works? 
Traveling families book baby equipment on our platform. Our providers deliver clean and sanitized equipment wherever families need them: Hotels, B&Bs, vacation rentals, and airports. 
We have a growing user base:
Since March 2022 (post-pandemic) we have been growing constantly. 
As of January 2024, we have more than 300 providers located in 130+ cities in Europe.
So far we satisfied 6000+ traveling families with our service.

column42: Giulio Montoli, Edmondo Sparano, Giulia Fazzini, Michela Masoni, Giulio Maria Pezzini, Arunsankar Periyasami, Elena Martelli, Dario Baroni, Andrea Tripodo, Alessandro N. Ferretti, LVenture Group API Access
column50: Interconnect to different protocols, even directly to the plants. Artificial intelligence modules to save money.
column51:
We are developing Alfredo, a building automation system that can interconnect directly with domestic or industrial HVAC systems, even if from different manufacturers, creating synergies between them and other intelligent devices in the environment.
With Alfredo (residential) and Alfredo Pro (industrial/commercial), it is possible to remotely control systems and actuators, create automations and scenarios, consult the history of the data recorded by the devices and the systems themselves, and control several installations through a single account.
In addition, the real competitive advantage lies in the fact that Alfredo makes it possible to save on utility bills, prevent faults on installations and monitor their health, predict spending on utility bills and many other applications through artificial intelligence algorithms.
In its B2C/ B2B2C version, Alfredo will be able to transform an old house into a home automation and smart home from 0 to 100 with less than 1,000 euros, plus a monthly usage fee of just a few euros.
 In the Alfredo Pro version, on the other hand, through the device's hierarchical control, it will be possible to give timed access to a user (e.g. access for the duration of a stay to a hotel guest, or access for a set number of months to an office employee), to have detailed reporting of the actions carried out by the user and precise control over the consumption of the environment in question.

The B2C/ B2B2C version of Alfredo will be available either as a hardware version plus pay-per-use service, or as a full cloud version, whereby it will be possible not to pay for the 'Alfredo Hardware' card, but only for the monthly pay-per-use service.

column50: We are the unique platform where you and all the partners can find real sustainable travel experiences feeling the real italian way of life
column51:
We are an e-commerce that creates and sells tailor made and sustainable tourist experiences online. Our proposal includes tours on a Vespa Elettrica in Italy, an iconic and representative means of transport of the Italian way of life, but also green and non-polluting.

The experience is fully integrated since the end user can book all the services on our site. A highly simplified process also for stakeholders who are sighted in an automated way about booking the service.

The customer can choose between different experiences that he can book on the site by choosing the day on which to do them. Therefore, at the time of booking, you can customize your trip and make it even more complete by adding specific experiences such as lunches in specific places or tastings or services such as a tour guide or overnight stays in selected structures.

On the day selected for the experience, the Vespa Elettrica and helmets are delivered to the customer. Each Vespa is equipped with a mobile phone holder so that users can follow the chosen itinerary on their smartphone by opening the Google Maps application in navigator mode. In fact, at the time of booking, the user is sent a delivery email with the link that refers to the itinerary on Google Maps and a travel book with all the useful information on the stages to see and with a summary of the services booked.
Again at the time of booking, based on the services provided, the platform sends a notification to the stakeholders who are then informed in real time.
Our e-commerce is therefore an integrated platform which on the one hand satisfies customer requests and on the other simplifies the booking procedures with suppliers.

column50: Delate is the first app to offer a profit without requiring any active action, and that transforms an inconvenience into a reward.
column51:
We offer a service that monitors train journeys and calculates the minutes of delay caused by them, transforming those minutes into refunds points to access discounts on products and/or services of third parties. 
The service is accessible through an application that will be able to record the place of departure, place of arrival, duration of the trip and any minutes of delay. In case of delay, the app will calculate the minutes of it to generate points that the user can then accumulate and spend on the digital platform present inside the app. 
With Delate we don't just create benefits for the train commuters but we offer also a marketing tool for the brands present on the platform as through geolocation it is possible to create targeted offers to a specific audience in a specific place and time of day.

column30: A new revolutionary tourism concept
column42: Giulio Montoli, Edmondo Sparano, Giulia Fazzini, Michela Masoni, Giulio Maria Pezzini, Arunsankar Periyasami, Elena Martelli, Dario Baroni, Andrea Tripodo, Alessandro N. Ferretti, LVenture Group API Access
column50: There’s nothing like this on the market: with us you can travel independently, but at the same time professionally and virtually guided!
column51:
This new tourism concept is addressed to foreigners traveling in Italy: the peculiarity of this new formula is that people can travel independently, but with a virtual tour guide always at their side.
When they contact us to organize their Italian holiday, they have a choice between 21 tour proposals that cover all Italy, from the Dolomites to Sicily.
The tours include hotel accommodation (there’s the 3-star, 4-star or 5-star package), transportation between towns/cities, a virtually guided tour in each place visited and the pocket WiFi. So, they are free to decide how to spend their time while in Italy: either to relax and live the atmosphere, or actively, including as many activities as they want.
Nearly all transfers are echo-friendly, but where the activities of the tour generate carbon, we compensate this by planting native tree species in Italy: their holiday is 100% zero emissions! 
Once arrived clients just need to wear their earbuds and listen to their virtual guide, who gives them lots of information about the location they are approaching, like how to move around, what to eat and drink, the best activities and experiences, the movies that were shot here...
The virtual guide gives them also practical advice, like how to catch a train in Italy or what to wear when entering a church.
This way, they avoid all the problems one has with independent travel, but at the same time without having to join a group.
For every location, a selection of walking tours is offered: these are virtually guided, so clients can do them whenever they like, at their own pace like if they were by themselves, but driven by a professional voice so they won’t miss interesting spots that they would probably lose alone. 
There’s also a selection of experiences that it’s worth trying, like a cooking class in Tuscany, a wine tasting in Veneto, a boat cruise on Lake Como or a bike tour in Rome.
Under the section “Excursions” they can decide for a professionally organized day tour, like for example a day in Murano and Burano from Venice, or to the Chianti region from Florence.
Finally, the section “Monuments & Museums” offers a selection of the best ones to visit in every place, and gives clients the possibility to buy the tickets and reserve their spot.
In case of need of assistance, we can be reached through the chat of the app: we’re there to assist!
That’s why our concept is “Sustainable, Safe and Smart”, but also flexible, customized and dynamic: this the new way of “touring”

column50: A new perspective of tourism that brings benefits and unforgettable experience, not only to the guest but to the local population that will
column51:
Welcome to Dogliola!
We are in Abruzzo, a strong and gentle land.
Dogliola stands on a ridge in the Trigno Valley, a step away from  Trabocchi Coast.   Our project starts with one word: Sustainability.
The opposite of consumer tourism, sustainable tourism promotes knowledge and appreciation of local culture and traditions, respecting the environment and life in the villages. The sharing of local wealth, the revaluation of traditional habitations, local uses and traditions.
A slow experience, an experiential journey that can increase the quality of life of residents, making the experiences lived by travelers unique and unforgettable.
The project aims to buy back the abandoned and ruined houses of the village, and then re-evaluate them together with the historical center, in order to create a "Albergo Diffuso": an unconventional hotel structure, spread throughout the village with a single central reception.
With the help of the local population we will create a welcoming place, which will be the center of an unforgettable, sustainable and low environmental impact experience.

column51:
Winety Fair for your next wine experience. Explore and find your next tasting experience. A journey through enchanted places and flavors. Winety Fair was born from the passion for good wine and the desire to make known the behind the scenes of the production chain, supporting the small realities of the territory.

Through the experiences, it is possible to own the ideal tasting in a simple and fast way. The portal offers the possibility of completing each visit with the accompaniment of a tutor (sommelier) and the option of staying overnight in characteristic locations, where provided.

Winety Fair is the platform that allows you to discover the best itineraries to discover the certified Italian typicality and to live a memorable experience.

Good vine for best wine.

The goal of Winety Fair is to encourage food and wine tourism but without distorting the tasting experience or the tasting of quality products, promoting territorial and sustainable marketing.

The platform offers detailed information sheets for each winery, full of images and videos useful to promote knowledge of places and experiences. Ensuring a perfect match between the needs of users and companies in the sector.

Through interviews with producers and in-depth articles, the choice becomes even easier!

Not just wine: Winety Fair offers producers and wineries Web Marketing services and tools that allow them to search and schedule customers by interests and tastes, even in the case of Major Events.

column50: Flexibility, Accreditation, Scalability, Replicability, Autonomy, Modulation, Usability, Accessibility for deaf people: a new era of tours
column51:
Smart-Tour is a company that aims to innovate the experience of travelers and tourists through a modern and innovative tool: an excursion with a local guide that can be used directly from your smartphone, enriching the trevellers's experience with an accessory service with a high perceived value by the customer, who will be accompanied in his local experience by our step-by-step guides to discover the destination he has chosen to discover directly from your smartphone. I'll explain them better: they are in effect experiences for tourists and travelers to discover a given city. Our Smart-Tour are, in fact, an innovative discovery destination tool that can be used independently and are based on the creation and use of tourist itineraries (consisting of themed itineraries, be they historical-cultural, food and wine, shopping and fashion and many others, consisting of 10 stops, each dedicated to the best attractions of the destination city and its territory). Obviously I invite you to think about the potential of technology as the contents that we will show you are completely modular and rewritable according to users’s needs.
Authentic and interactive, therefore, guided by real local experts who can be used directly from your smartphone in full autonomy and freedom: their technology combines the most modern tracking, GPS and geolocation techniques - which thanks to their high degree of precision - accompany the traveler in an interactive, multilingual excursion, with the possibility of including LIS for the deaf, of variable duration, of about two hours, stops and visits to the points of interest and monuments included, which can be used in full autonomy and freedom directly on your smartphone, operating with a fully branded white label integration.

X DESTINATION presenta un'app rivoluzionaria per viaggiare in modo decentralizzato grazie all’algoritmo LS proprietario.

L’utente viene ricompensato per postare i suoi ricordi geo-localizzati sulla blockchain, calcolare il suo lifestyle, monitorarlo e farlo crescere nel tempo.

I ricordi postati vanno a popolare la mappa del mondo delle experiences decentralizzate, che viene ordinata e mostrata agli utenti in una modalità che permette di trovare l’esperienza più adatta risparmiando ore di ricerca.

Il calcolo del livello di lifestyle permetterà di creare match tra gli utenti, i quali potranno trovare i loro nuovi compagni di viaggio e grazie alla blockchain, con una funzione di creazione specifica, l'utente più esperto può generare una ”intenzione di viaggio” e attirare gli altri utenti interessati a partecipare all'esperienza in modo totalmente decentralizzato.

L'utente passa da consumatore di viaggi a creatore di esperienze decentralizzate da condividere con persone allineate alla sua vision con X DESTINATION.

column42: Giulio Montoli, Edmondo Sparano, Giulia Fazzini, Michela Masoni, Giulio Maria Pezzini, Arunsankar Periyasami, Elena Martelli, Dario Baroni, Andrea Tripodo, Alessandro N. Ferretti, LVenture Group API Access
column50: We have a unique positioning and business model in the Longevity market. We have the biggest Italian community of Over 50s
column51:
In Italy 48% of the population is over 60 retaining 75% of national wealth and they refuse traditional stereotype image of declining seniors: welcome to the longevity economy. That's why Cocooners launched a digital platform aimed at active agers providing them content, services and products around which we are creating the largest community of active over 50s, we are building services around the 3 pillars of our longevity model: Social wellbeing, Physical wellbeing and Financial Wellbeing.  We are a B2B2C company with the ambition to become the active aging reference point across Europe.
Research has shown that seniors are often times neglected by media and brands who typically aim the communications at younger generations.  On the contrary this age group not only is active, but they are actively engaged in personal projects, interests and passions.  They are looking for ways to connect and socialize with peers that share common interests and they are searching for products and services tailormade for them. 
That's why we offer:
1. Social wellbeing: we are a travle agency and tour operator offering group travel and local events for the community
2. Physical wellbeing: we offer an health center developed with Reale Group
3. Financial wellbeing: we offer job services and in the future a proper job board.

column42: Giulio Montoli, Edmondo Sparano, Giulia Fazzini, Michela Masoni, Giulio Maria Pezzini, Arunsankar Periyasami, Elena Martelli, Dario Baroni, Andrea Tripodo, Alessandro N. Ferretti, LVenture Group API Access
column50: We are the first marketplace combining the great quality of Made in Italy with a unique, high-end customization service both in B2C and B2B
column51:
Ad Hoc Atelier is a Milan-based start-up offering high quality handcrafted products strictly 'Made In Italy'. Our workshops make custom embroideries and prints with logos, names and initials on a wide range of products such as accessories, bags, shoes, luxury hotel equipment and many more.

Our mission? To create a virtual atelier where the best Italian fashion artisans and brands meet customers looking for unique, high quality and personalized products. A dream that is based on a concrete idea of supporting Made in Italy through the online sales channel, focusing on quality and customization.

Italian fashion SMEs generated a turnover of €95 billion euros in 2020 (€72 billion abroad). However, they are not able to adapt to new sales models, due to lack of digital know-how. Indeed, while 92% of the fashion business in Italy is generated by SMEs, only 12% of these are active online, not being able to satisfy the increasing foreign demand.

In addition to more than 500 customers on our ecommerce, many luxury hotellerie establishments have already approached us, including the 'Principe di Savoia' and 'Park Hyatt' in Milan, 'JK Place' in Capri, 'Villa TreVille' in Positano and 'Au Charmant Petit Lac' in Champoluc. Together we create increasingly exclusive and engaging experiences for customers, touching their souls with our Made in Italy products.

column51:
Creare, all’interno di un’area protetta, Parco Pollino, il primo centro per svolgere interventi assistiti con animali (Pet Therapy) in Basilicata; con annesso Glamping (campeggio Glamour) con tutti i confort che si possono trovare in un normale Albergo, offrendo a tutti i clienti i prodotti tipici del territorio, con realizzazione di un Bistrot, forniti dalle piccole e medie imprese agricole biologiche presenti nell’area; in questo modo si crea un mercato di sbocco anche per queste aziende. 
Il tutto con impatto ambientale quasi zero poiché la maggior parte dei materiali usati per la realizzazione degli alloggi per il glamping, tenendo presenti i vincoli ambientali, sono legno da foreste a crescita lenta; pietra, vimini, e materiale riciclato; per le fonti di energia si prevede l’installazione di impianti fotovoltaici che andrebbero a svolgere anche la funzione di parcheggio coperto. Inoltre si vuole puntare anche sul mercato dei cosiddetti “nomadi digitali” creando delle postazioni attrezzate di smart-working, che offrono oltre al necessario per poter lavorare, un immersione nella natura, e nella tranquillità senza tralasciare il comfort.
Per offrire una maggiore esperienza on Nature, sono previste passeggiate con alpaca alla capezza alla scoperta dei sentieri del Parco Pollino ed inoltre escursioni in e-bike sulle suggestive rive del fiume Sinni.

column51:
My Take It è una piattaforma web innovativa per prenotazioni ricettive (alberghi, case vacanze, b&b e affittacamere). Svolge una funzione mediatrice tra turista e host.

Ci proponiamo come soluzione win to win a quelle che sono le esigenze dei clienti viaggiatori e a quelle che sono le necessità degli albergatori.

Da una parte abbiamo il cliente che cerca il suo alloggio ideale al suo miglior prezzo, senza ulteriori costi extra.

Dall’altra, gli albergatori che hanno bisogno di uno strumento flessibile che gli permetta di ridurre quanto più possibile il loro invenduto.

My Take It è la piattaforma strategica che risolve queste due problematiche, unendo il tutto, in un’unica soluzione.

Il nostro portale non ha vincoli di utilizzo, una struttura può registrarsi e usufruire dei vantaggi offerti dal nostro servizio, ovvero ogni volta che vuole limitare la percentuale di camere invendute.

Questo grazie al nostro algoritmo che fornisce una risposta immediata, non servono attese di conferma, con la garanzia del miglior prezzo da entrambe le parti.

Questo perché facciamo leva su commissioni nettamente più basse e giochiamo su prenotazioni non rimborsabili.

column50: We're on a quest to make travel research faster, social and tailored around you. No more wisdom of the masses, but wisdom of your sources.
column51: Nextflag aims to redefine the way we consume and engage with travel content. From simple inspiration research, to having a place to store our favourite places (where we've been and the ones in our bucket list), to booking and having a seamless platform to find all our reservations (hotels, restaurants, tours etc.). We believe that the digital travel customer journey is highly fragmented, and with too many actors competing in very disconnected market segments and for different steps of the journey. We aim to streamline this process by adopting a two pillar strategy, where on one side we act as a recommendation engine

column51:
Co-experience fornisce una piattaforma marketplace utilizzabile da due segmenti di clientela: da un lato strutture ricettive, coworking e chi vende esperienze (tour, corsi, degustazioni, ecc...), che possono creare la pagina della loro attività, dall'altro i nomadi digitali e remote workers, che possono creare un profilo personale. 
I nomadi digitali, nell'organizzazione dei propri viaggi, possono servirsi della nostra piattaforma per le prenotazioni: la suddetta piattaforma, tramite una profilazione del cliente e recensioni incrociate, gli consiglierà le strutture, i coworking e le esperienze da fare in loco personalizzate, in modo da ridurre i tempi di prenotazione ed aumentare la soddisfazione dell'utente. La piattaforma fornirà anche assistenza clienti, pagamenti sicuri e la possibilità di lasciare recensioni ambo i segmenti.

column42: Giulio Montoli, Edmondo Sparano, Giulia Fazzini, Michela Masoni, Giulio Maria Pezzini, Arunsankar Periyasami, Elena Martelli, Dario Baroni, Andrea Tripodo, Alessandro N. Ferretti, LVenture Group API Access
column50: Cshark boasts a business perspective based on open-research and a software development department capable of overcoming demanding challenges
column51: CShark S.r.l. was born on 7th November 2018 and operates in the Information Technology sector, designing and developing customized software and hardware solutions for entrepreneurial and commercial realities. The company was created to give way to ideas, transformed into patents, to reach the reference market and give an improved service to production activities, research bodies and individuals. The company consists of a team of ICT experts to offer a wide range of services and products. The skills developed in the wide and varied ICT sector allow us to satisfy any type of need: from HPC and IoT to the custom programming of each individual software. Cshark offers the following services: Research, development, production and marketing of innovative and high-tech solutions in the IT field and associated sectors, including the custom hardware production sector; Consultancy and experimentation on technology transfer projects and the use of non-traditional materials; Software program design; Software trading; Provision of organization and construction services for corporate IT structures; Organization of training and refresher courses on behalf of third parties. After creating the "Pongo IDE" Programmable Intelligence platform and completing the first Pilot-1 space mission (which paved the way for the entire project), Cshark developed: a second nano-satellite (Pilot-2), finalized the digitization of company production processes; an earth-sky "link", to give Pongo the possibility to coordinate and deliver services to facilitate any IT process. The main goal of CShark is to create a private constellation of nano-satellites taking a first small step towards the private space economy. The long-term corporate mission concerns the use of this connection to have increasingly heterogeneous and innovative devices and provide a multitude of solutions that facilitate sectors related to industry 4.0. All this following the concept of "ethical technology". The critical factors are the use of Pongo and Pilot, both patents of which Cshark is the applicant.

column50: Innovative tourist travel package with integrated investment service to become a landowner and receive your fruit and vegetables periodicall
column51: pardoola is an innovative tour operator platform that offers tourists the possibility of a new tourism experience in the villages and hinterland of sardinia. Through the application, it will be possible to select travel periods in which one can fully relive the true lifestyle of the land, supplemented with unconventional services that will allow the tourist to live as if he were a landowner, combined with the unconventional services that the territory can offer. Pardoola unites small and medium-sized enterprises in Sardinia to offer a fully customised travel service so that you can experience the countryside and the land, have your own plot of land to cultivate, your own livestock to care for, and your own fruit to grow. All this combined with premium gastronomic experiences such as the cultivation and production of wine and oil, basic knowledge of cultivation and the seasonality of vegetables and fruit. The innovative element of pardoola is that it does not create the classic tourist packages but allows the tourist to be able to live a new travel experience, immerse himself in nature and at the end of the period have the opportunity to invest in the land in order to periodically have the fruits of his land that he cultivated during the trip

column50: WillAge is an easy way move abroad for medium long period without stress. In few clicks you can personalize your new life abroad
column51:
WillAge helps people to move abroad with only one subscription that will include accommodation, entertainment and extra services. Starting with a paid trial period of 30 days, the customers can check if everything satisfies their own needs before starting with the subscription plan.
With the WillAge the customers are able to know all the costs for the new life abroad before moving abroad.  The customer can start with a paid trial period of 30 days and after he/she can start a subscription plan.
The subscription plan is customizable and editable every month

In a world where everything is connected, the people must do a lot of activities before being able to move abroad for a medium or a long period. 
WillAge is here to help the people interested in moving abroad, especially the retirees. The number of retirees will grow in the next 30 years and already now a lot of them decide to spend their retirement in affordable breathtaking countries. 
The WillAge will be the Top Player for helping the people interested to move abroad easily and fast

Customer
Early adopters are retirees with a high cultural level and an above average pension (30% of the over 65). Most of them are interested in moving overseas for a long period (1 month or more) to spend the winter in a warmer country (such as Canadians who move to Central America for the winter) or to spend the whole summer at the sea.
They will Start to test the service through one or more long vacations in different locations, before finding the perfect place for their retirement life.

Market
The market size was 72 billion $ in the 2019 for only the USA market and the value was provided by https://www.ibisworld.com/ in a research of Over 55 villages in the USA. 
Also the research of IBIS World shows that 90% of people in the USA want to live in a village for Over 55 but most of them can not spend all the necessary money to do it.
Also, the number of USA retirees will grow for the next 30 years and so the market size will be bigger than 72B$ in the future.
There is no data about Canada and the UE market but already 35.000 retirees moved to Italy to live here because there are breathtaking locations, delicious food and the average price to have a good life for a couple is 2.500 euro.
Therefore, the Italian life cost is affordable for the USA, Canada, Russia and North Europe pension and the 20% of the retirees in South Europe.

column50: Appoderi ha l’unicità di mettere in sinergia solo le aziende biologiche e creare un sistema di accoglienza integrato
column51: Appoderi è una piattaforma digitale che mette in sinergia le aziende agricole biologiche delle aree rurali per creare un modello di accoglienza coordinato e diffuso sul territorio. Permette di esplorare il territorio agricolo a partire dal lavoro degli agricoltori: assaggiare i prodotti di qualità, conoscere i processi di produzione, viaggiare facendo esperienze autentiche nei territori. Punta ad essere il servizio di riferimento per entrare in contatto con il mondo dell'agricoltura biologica e di filiera, mettendo a sistema le realtà agricole esistenti in una rete strutturata e organizzata per svolgere attività esperienziali, offrendo un servizio per il turismo rurale di qualità. In questa ottica, il turismo non conosce stagioni: in ogni periodo dell’anno l’agricoltura offre moltissime attività da fare e tante storie da raccontare. Secondo i dati del rapporto ISMEA 2021 “Agriturismo e multifunzionalità”, i viaggiatori ricercano attività connesse al mondo dell’agricoltura naturale e ai temi della sostenibilità. Mettere in sinergia le aziende agricole biologiche, di filiera, artigianali e multifunzionali permette di rispondere a questa esigenza, offrendo al viaggiatore itinerari in base ai propri interessi ed esigenze. Lo strumento permette di promuovere i valori dell'agricoltura biologica, di valorizzare l'impegno ambientale degli agricoltori, di sensibilizzare sui temi della tutela della biodiversità in agricoltura. La realizzazione di mappe interattive permette al fruitore di esplorare in maniera dinamica e intuitiva il territorio, ricercando esperienze e prodotti. Tra le attività sono proposte le iniziative organizzate da associazioni culturali del territorio, come il cinema all'aperto, le installazioni artistiche permanenti nelle aziende agricole e il teatro rurale. E’ prevista la creazione di un e-commerce per la consegna dei prodotti biologici e di filiera in tutta Italia e di un’applicazione da scaricare sul cellulare. Le piattaforme digitali che si pongono l’obiettivo di creare un mercato diretto con i produttori, e di promuovere la vendita online dei prodotti agricoli, tendono a non fare distinzione tra i modelli di produzione. Appoderi si pone l’obiettivo di connettere aziende agricole esclusivamente biologiche e vuole essere un modello replicabile, in cui la cooperazione tra aziende agricole biologiche e le associazioni culturali permette un turismo esperienziale autentico e originale, per la promozione dei valori dell'agricoltura biologica

column51:
Local Knowledge is that local friend you wished you had when travelling to a new destination. That plug with inside access & real-time insight into the best recommendations.
 
We're creating the first travel app that uses generative AI & personalisation algorithms to connect Millennial & Gen Z Travellers to the authentic, personalised city guides curated by locals. 

Our team consolidates hidden-gem recommendations, trending happenings & sustainable travel experiences curated by local experts, social media influencers, traveler bloggers & other existing online content sources (through APIs & generative AI.)

Our impact algorithm ranks recommendations that match a user’s interests & passions based on ESG/SDG scores. 

While our connect feature enables travellers to access a community of like-minded users interested in the same recommendation so that they can get together to share once in a lifetime experiences with new friends.

column51: Digitalizziamo in modalità immersiva l'offerta culturale e turistica di borghi, musei ed altri attrattori culturali e la rendiamo disponibile sia on line, sia attraverso l'uso di un cofanetto vr da noi prodotto e brevettato. Grazie a questo prodotto phygital siamo in grado di offrire alla nostra clientela B2B un prodotto (fisico e digitale allo stesso tempo) che potrà essere da loro distribuito (attraverso i loro canali di vendita fisici e digitali) allo loro clientela. Una volta venduto il primo prodotto/servizio, creiamo entrate ricorrenti attraverso la fornitura continua dei nostri cofanetti, che permetteranno alla ns clientela di ottenere margini importanti di ricavo. Qui di seguito il link di uno dei ns prodotti realizzati per il comune di Cascia in umbria (https://www.museuminbox.it/cascia) navigando all'interno del prodotto si potranno avere contenuti immersivi, guide in formato avatar, audio guide, video immersivi, video tradizionali. La nostra produzione è un mix tra un prodotto editoriale (un documentario) e un gioco digitale ( la navigazione è simile a quella di un digital game ) ed è facile ed intuitiva, ed è possibile usare sia uno smartphone, ma anche altri device come ad esempio un visore vr o uno smart tv. Il prodotto realizzato può essere continuamente aggiornato, può essere tradotto in tutte le lingue richieste, può essere adottato da un museo, come un comune, o una società sportiva, ma può essere impiegato anche da un parco a tema o altro ancora. Può essere facilmente impiegato da un disabile, piuttosto che in una scuola, data la bassa necessità di tecnologia per usarlo ( basta un semplice smartphone ). Al momento non esiste sul mercato nessun prodotto in grado di fare ciò che fa Museuminbox, inoltre è trasversale a diversi mercati ma soprattutto costa poco, è facile da usare, è ottimo come regalo, ma anche come acquisto personale per avere un ricordo digitale immesivo della propria vacanza o della propria visita culturale. Inoltre la sua produzione consente al ns cliente un veloce recupero dell'investimento, creando inoltre continue entrate grazie alla vendita continua del cofanetto che può essere realizzato sia on line che in retail fisici come librerie, store, bookshop museali, alberghi, ecc.

column50: We offer tourists the possibility to know and discover the artisan’s excellence by connecting with the local community, its rituals and trad
column51:
The desire to create this tourism-based website arose from the desire to give value to artisans. We have created experience packages in the craft world to share what lies within the very heart of the Marche region.

Contrary to other industries, offers in this sector still do not exist or, more precisely, there are undervalued, small businesses. Marchecraft wants to collaborate with small businesses to find common synergies in order to better develop a well-defined and seasonal touristic offer.

Marchecraft is a marketplace offering a new concept of tourism, where added value is provided from the direct experience of the tourist, artisans, tourism professionals, and the local community itself. The aim of the platform is to give value to the historical and handcrafted tourism businesses in the region, ensuring tourists experience the authenticity and quality of the area.


MARCHECRAFT MEANS…

Uniqueness: A detailed and precise offer in tourism

Quality: Artisans are selected according to their experience and what they can offer to tourists.

Synergy: Collaborations with tourism providers to facilitate the interaction between tourists and artisans.

Innovation and cohesion: Old and new artisan trades are the main focus of this platform.

Territory: Enhancement of the territory, also through museums, to rediscover the artisans of Italian villages.

column50: MyOrango sparks collaboration and innovation, uniting freelancers, professionals, and businesses for growth in a dynamic ecosystem.
column51:
MyOrango is a startup that aims to create a "Generative Habitat" where freelancers and companies can collaborate in an authentic and innovative environment. Our platform connects professionals with businesses, encouraging the cross-pollination of ideas and skills to spark new growth and innovation opportunities.

MyOrango operates through three core areas: the Generative Community, which enables the exchange of expertise between freelancers and companies; the Agency, offering strategic and organizational consulting to help businesses turn their ideas into tangible projects; and, launching in 2025, the Call for Generation, a feature that allows companies to initiate specific projects and invite skilled freelancers to participate.

Our mission is to simplify and enhance the collaboration process, providing companies with access to a pool of qualified professionals while giving freelancers the chance to work on high-quality projects. By fostering authentic relationships and creating an ecosystem where innovation thrives, MyOrango is committed to driving continuous growth and value for both freelancers and businesses alike.

column50: We customize the itinerary for each user based on their preferences and assuring the itinerary we provide it's not risky
column51:
We're developing a mobile application which customizes the way bikers choose new itineraries.
As an innovative Startup, we are building an algorithm with which the application is able to compute the best itineraries based on several inputs regarding user preferences in order to get the most out of it and enjoy his passion. 
Each route is built from scratch and it's changing every time based on new updates among the user preferences.

During the registration phase, the user has been asked to insert his preferences regarding the streets and interests in order to profile him. The profile is used then to compose the itinerary he will then ride. 
After the user rides our itinerary, we ask feedbacks or a review in a way that we can improve our accuracy in the future. 
Given the strong community behind us, we want to provide a place where the user can build an itinerary on his own and share it with all the people that share his passion. These “custom” itineraries will be then validated by our team and make available for everyone. 
Following this process, we assure the safety of the itinerary for other users and accuracy in the data we're sharing.

Along with the services we listed, we want to provide an internal navigator in order to guide the user along the way. 

Given all these main features, secondary functionalities are expected such as the possibility to make groups with your friends, giving the possibility to see them on the map and avoid to leave a teammate behind, stopping the route. Since it’s difficult to call while he is driving, this function can be really appreciated by the users who travel together. 
Very important for our business model is to display commercial activities along the route. The latter will be used to suggest places where the users can rest, sleep or even grab a cup of coffee. Restaurateurs can use our platform as a tool to improve their visibility and enlarge their clients pool through particular discounts to our premium users.

column50: We are the solution to the needs and wishes of today's travelers: all planned, all included, affordable and authentic. A traveler must have.
column51:
Toratora is an online platform that organizes surprise trips for amazing experiences all across Europe.
With only the departure date and the budget selected, the algorithm will propose random destinations with flight, hotel and travel guide included. The traveler will discover their destination seven days before departure!. It is also the first startup to offer the same price year-round: 199€ to go anywhere, at any time.
Toratora promises to revolutionize the way you travel thanks to a mix of
surprise destinations and low-cost prices, all in order to meet the needs of the desired experiences and budgets of younger travelers.
Another novelty introduced by Toratora, in the growing industry of travel “in the dark,” is the possibility of departing from 40 European cities. The destination will obviously be a “surprise,” and on the website, www.toratoratravel.com, you can discard up to 3 destinations for free and 5€ for each next one.
The innovation of Toratora lies in the development of a proprietary algorithm that, through the crawling of data, is able to propose the ideal solution (creation of a package including flight, hotel, activities), according to the needs of the user.
The platform guides the user in choosing their type of travel and collects data that
allows the app to handle requests and preferences. The Front-End is developed in HTML,  JQUERY and for the dynamic part in the COLDFUSION language (proprietary to Adobe). The Database uses MYSQL. The Api (Back-End) are developed in ColdFusion and interact by sending and receiving Json file.
Once the city of departure, the duration of the trip and the budget are selected, the traveler will receive the summary of the selected options via email and – a week away from the start – a new email with the “surprise” destination, information about the flight and the hotel, and an exclusive custom travel guide with more original and authentically local activities in the city!

column50: We are a very strong team, working to disrupt a market which is worth $43BL, poorly digitalized, and incredibly fragmented.
column51:
Mapo Tapo is a web platform where certified guides can digitalize their daily operations, and collect and manage their bookings. 

Simply put, Mapo Tapo has:
- a "customer facing" component (mapotapo.com), where outdoor sports enthusiasts can find and and book their next outdoor sports adventure around the world. 

- a "booking management software" component, thanks to which guides can manage their bookings inside and outside mapotapo.com 

The outdoor travel industry is a huge market, but incredibly fragmented. It is made by passionate yet unstructured professionals. Mapo Tapo's approach walks back from outdoor sports enthusiasts' needs in order to build a product that is "certified guide" centric, allowing them to focus on what they do the best (guiding and trip designing) and taking care of the rest (marketing, group aggregation, CS, payments).

 Skipit è una startup fintech che semplifica il pagamento dei trasporti pubblici in diverse città d'Europa. Non prende quindi la singola country ma da la possibilità di rendere "europei"  e unificati i mezzi di trasporto. Oltre a questo ha una forte visione sull'impatto generato dai mezzi di trasporto scelti dall'utente, andando ad erogare dei premi in caso gli utenti scegliessero mezzi green. Guadagnano a transaction fee e 1€ di top-up del wallet. Sono attivi ad Helsinki e Zurigo, ma hanno partnership con FS e come piano hanno apertura Italia. Hanno raccolto 100k ad oggi, quindi potrebbero essere in target.
column50: We go beyond paying for sustainable transport in our app including Journey planning, local activities and rewards
column51:
We provide an app that makes it easier for people to pay for public transport , across various cities in Europe. It provides a unified and simplistic way to pay, use and get around on public transport regardless of city location. We do this to help combat the 70% of global emissions that come from our cities, by making it easier to use sustainable transport modes. 

We provide a European wide digital smart card called the "Skipit card", inspired from the "Oystercard" or in Denmark the "Rejsekort". It allows users to pay for public transport throughout various European cities. Based on your destination the card automatically calculates the cost and type of ticket you need, and the user simply confirms the purchase.

In order to pay for the public transport in local currency we provide our users with a currency based digital e-wallet. This Allows our community to store, exchange and spend their money in local currency dependent on the city they are using the app. 

Our app uses open data and API's sourced directly from Public transport networks across Europe, to allow for both the most up to date journey planning data and the paying for tickets. 

Alongside our Skipit card we connect our community with neighbourhood's of a city with a personalised neighbourhood feed. Encouraging the leisure expenditure of our community to be spent in neighbourhood's  supporting local communities and entrepreneurs. 

Today, we have agreements within multiple cities and public transport networks, and the needed digital infrastructure that allows us to scale easily. We are live in Helsinki, Zurich and Copenhagen.

Our product is originally designed for Tourists and travellers due to a recurring theme of "lack of understanding" when using public transport in a new city. However due to Covid-19 we have decided to focus on building a product that can also serve domestic commuters.

column51:
Tueke is an innovative, first-of-a-kind, web-based service that connects travellers looking for a better and more convenient accommodation and hosts willing to trade their unsold rooms. As opposed to the traditional OTAs’ workflow, travellers start
the process, creating customized offers, built “by-design” around their needs. Offers can include for example the destination of travellers’ journey, how much they would be willing to spend, on what dates they would like to travel, and the accommodation category they are looking for. The offer is then submitted to the accommodation facilities registered. Hosts matching travellers’ needs can filter the
incoming requests and answer, proposing one of their unsold rooms, thus competing with other facilities to secure the client, and potentially cover what was expected to remain unsold. Once hosts forward back their offers, travellers can evaluate with no obligation the proposals and eventually conclude the transaction, at the benefit of both parties.

Chkar is an online marketplace that connects tourists with locals letting them rent out their spare rooms or even entire places in Pakistan. Travelers save money and locals can monetize their spare room. 

What is Chkar.com’s vision? 
To help traveler find a home away from home.

Offer a wide range of options for people to find a home away from home at prices so low that as many people as possible will be able to travel and experience a new culture as a local.

column50:
Improves engagement with existing customers (postcard sender) 
Enables new leads generation (postcard recipient)
Provides high valuable data
column51:
Pemcards is a Customer Engagement and Marketing Platform that enables consumers to share their emotions and memories with people they know, featuring business brands. 
Pemcards enables consumers to capture the magical moments they are living and share these memories through a postcard featuring business logo and Call to Action (CTA).
Brands will be associated with memorable life events that consumers share with friends and families.
Pemcards will turn consumers into brands best ambassadors.

How It Works for our customers (B2B) 
The customer integrates Pemcards widget on its web site. The widget is personalized with the customer logo headline, etc.
Through our web dashboard the customer can set up campaigns defining images and call to actions and assigning a budget. The budget is created by allocating the previously booked PemCredits (1 PemCredits = 1 mailed Postcard).
The customer can monitor all the campaigns as well as retrieving all the small data collected from the mailed postcards and getting a precise understanding of each campaign’s performance thanks to Pem Analytics.

column50: our breadth of activitities give us a quirky flavour. we intend to reward consumer for interaction,+ we have several revenue streams planned
column51:
Bouvo will be a multi revenue streamed marketing services company for the providers of adventures challenges and escapes + associated products. In doing so we will create an interactive online and offline community for our consumers whilst helping our business customers (who have a huge risk of distressed inventory) generate more revenue. The initial revenue stream will be a 300 (£/Eu) listing fee (discounts may be given at launch). 

Once traction has been proven - the company can look for partners/investigate the potential for further revenue streams 
	“channel development”, that is content creation for our partners to improve their marketing collateral
	Bespoke marketing campaigns 
	Reselling other companies’ services (or apps) 
	Events - such as creating a sports event with ASAP watercrafts
	Proposition betting/challenges 
	Entrepreneurial challenges 
	Exhibitions
	Dating services
	Financial services
 	 	 
in the last week we have met a potential partner and are at early stage discussions about the creation of "Quizes as a Revenue Stream"
We have an MVP https://bouvo.online/
and a facebook group facebook.com/groups/460677534864856 
Covid has been a blessing and a curse in that (i) our business clients have been forced to close ie a dreadful time to be selling a listing! but (ii) a great time to build a site, fill it with content and see if we can gain traction - since our bootstrapped launch in July 2020, we have seen visitors grow from 0-c200 vistors a month (c30% mom growth), and our site has been viewed in 57 countries. Not too bad considering zero budget and a lack of a CMO/digital marketing cofounder

column30: Genus, 1st tech-based hospitality, tackles labor shortages w/ AI, Hologram
column42: Giulio Montoli, Edmondo Sparano, Giulia Fazzini, Michela Masoni, Giulio Maria Pezzini, Arunsankar Periyasami, Elena Martelli, Dario Baroni, Andrea Tripodo, Alessandro N. Ferretti, LVenture Group API Access
column50: We're introducing industry-first technologies to hospitality with our brand new concept of Cloud Concierge, Hologram, and NFC technologies.
column51:
We experienced the challenges faced by the hospitality industry firsthand during the COVID-19 pandemic. General Managers of hotels and motels were covering night shifts due to labor shortages, which sparked the idea for Genus Hotels. After extensive discussions with our peers in senior positions throughout the industry, we came up with a solution to automate the previously manual processes in the industry.


Our highly secure mobile application that will revolutionize the industry. We have already completed 80% of the development process. Our voice-enabled mobile application will eliminate the need for guests to visit the reception, unlike other hospitality giants such as Marriott, Hilton, Hyatt, and Sheraton, who offer mobile applications for online check-in and digital keys but still require guests to visit the reception to validate their payment and IDs.

We are also thrilled to introduce Cloud Concierge, an innovative concept that involves a digital reception, virtual front desk staff, and voice+conversational AI powered Avatars, providing an efficient solution to address the current labor shortages in the hospitality industry. Our unique model of the Hospitality Gig Economy will allow professionals worldwide to serve hotels anywhere, based on their own schedules, at much higher hourly rates than currently offered in the industry, ensuring quality services are delivered at all times. Additionally, we will implement a proprietary onboarding procedure to gauge the skills and experience of virtual staff. Despite the higher hourly rates earned by hospitality professionals, this cutting-edge technology will significantly reduce HR and training costs while enhancing guest experiences. 

Our second phase of technologies, including property management centric in-room automation and hologram, are non-existent in the industry. Although we are currently in the pre-revenue stage, we have already received interest from several hospitality management companies who are keen to test our technology once it is ready.

column51:
Wanderoo is your warranty for an unforgettable travel organized without stress and time lost.
Wanderoo is a website that collect the best travel bloggers to deliver tailor-made travel itineraries in just 5 days for only 6€ per day of travel. 
The customer can explain his travel style and preferences in just 5 minute on our website, we assign his itinerary to the TB which is most experienced on the customer's destination. Inside Wanderoo itineraries the customer can find all the info needed before departure (for example the best flight, hotel and car to book that you he will be able to book just clicking on the link) and all the info needed once in the destination (our travel blogger will realize a daily roadmap with the best places to see, the best experiences to try and the best restaurant where to eat, with the travel times from one place to the other; for every place of interest the customer will find photos and (eventually) prices).

A comfortable, cheap, tailored and time saving way to organize your perfect travel.

Take a look on www.wanderoo.it

column50: Grazie a VinoinVigna produrrai il tuo vino da protagonista in una cantina a un'ora da casa. Ti resta solo da decidere l'etichetta.
column51:
The core business of the project lies in the idea expressed by the slogan "Produce your own wine", i.e. creating a personalized production, and derived from the experiential interaction of the consumers who will go to work personally in the vineyard, concluding with the delivery of the wine co-produced with the partner winery chosen by the subscribed consumer. Therefore, not just any wine, but a wine made in the optioned cellar and personalized in its label according to the wishes of the participant. Among the strengths of this model there is, in fact, the complete experience in the vineyard capable of raising the awareness of the final consumer of what is hidden behind each wine. But the project does not have only people or groups of people among its buyers, in fact season tickets can also be subscribed for in groups, such as friends, couples, etc. There is also a professional user and it is in the BtoB component of the proposal.
VinoinVigna also opens the doors of partner wineries to companies. In times of great revival of the issues of sustainable economy and the protection of the territory, one of the great trends, with reference to the techniques of Inclusion & Retention, is to propose an on boarding, with concrete Team Building proposals, as a stage for the performances of group.
The project takes the form of a path of support for the consumer with local winemakers to allow him to come into direct contact with the dynamics of production so as to enhance the final product. Tasting a wine thus obtained is a sort of concrete viaticum so that the final consumer is allowed to better understand the territory and the production chains of local wines.
VinoinVigna aims to open the doors of partner wineries to give the consumer an all-round wine experience. See with your own eyes the development phases of the cultivation, walk along the rows with the grower, learn and educate yourself on the growth phases of the row that will give birth to your wine.
On the platform, to date, it is possible to buy the wine to be produced by being able to choose it from over one hundred references, coming from winemakers located in different regions. It is possible to choose the number of bottles and customize the label.
Experience remains, in our vision, the fulcrum from which a deep and lasting bond between the consumer and the cellar must develop.

column50: Being vertical in the experiential tourism field related to food&wine with a unique and broad offering including B2C and B2B business lines
column51:
We are a Travel Tech Company and a vertical experiential tourism marketplace on the food tourism field with which travellers organise, book and live authentic and selected food and wine experiences. Not just a marketplace but a retailer of exclusive experiences built with our partners.

Today positioned in 10 Italian regions with over 300 active experiences on our website. Foody works on two tracks: it combines a "marketplace" approach with a far more important "retail" approach that is highly scalable and consists of building in collaboration with our partners dedicated experiential packages. To this activity, Foody also combines consulting and experience design for the B2B sector.

A new frontier of tourism where the word experience has revolutionized the idea of travel. "Travel activities" are the 3rd largest segment in the market and in this context, food and wine takes on a new centrality because it encapsulates and conveys the values of today's traveler. Food becomes the new travel driver crucial element in choosing a destination. 71% of global travelers want to experience memorable food and wine experiences, 53% declare themselves a pure food and wine traveler. This applies both globally and to the Italian market. The Italian food and wine tourism sector, is worth more than 12 billion euros or about 5 percent of tourism GDP (Source Enit).

The development of territories has always been one of our main objectives. In fact, Foody was created to develop and promote tourism linked to the territory by leveraging the food and wine products that that territory expresses. This has a strong impact on local economies at 360°, because through the enhancement of food and wine products, tourists are also made aware of the enormous cultural heritage in which our communities are rich. In doing so, the paradigm is inverted, highlighting not the destination but what it expresses in terms of experiences!

column50: Unexpected Italy redistributes tourism by connecting travellers with ethical, local Italian businesses, based on their passions & interests.
column51:
Unexpected Italy combines social innovation with responsible tourism, to encourage a more respectful, personal and experiential way of travelling. A project that wants to empower local communities to regain control of their identities and traditions by bringing together the most unique local excellences to promote their territories, people and traditions in a new way, to encourage off season and off the beaten path tourism. At the core of the project the transformation of the destination into an algorythm in order to allow a precise targeting of clients to increase both hosts' and clients' satisfaction. 
Unexpected Italy is both the first Business Club for Responsible Tourism in Italy, combining top-notch experts in the field with unique winemakers, artisans, artists, farmers, hosts, chefs and an innovative mobile app that allows travellers from all over the world to discover unique local places and people, purchase bespoke maps and itineraries based on their passions and interests and measure their carbon footprint whilst they travel, based on the choices they make and how they support the environment and the local people whilst they are in Italy.

column50: Specialized in F&B, Restworld merges a human-centric approach with technology, ensuring seamless accessibility for both workers and employer
column51: Restworld addresses the pressing need for professional enhancement in the restaurant sector, where restaurateurs often struggle to find trained and competent staff. A communication gap exists between job seekers and employers, with 45% of restaurant owners citing a lack of suitable candidates. The hospitality industry further faces challenges in staff training, with 71% of operators requiring additional skills development. Independent, ad-hoc recruiting procedures by small and medium-sized enterprises in the tourist-accommodation sector can result in wasted time and resources. Restworld aims to mitigate this by providing a precise matching service between candidate profiles and restaurateurs' needs. This cost-effective solution intends to uplift the hospitality professions and improve the working environment by resolving existing recruitment and training issues.
